1b1(rgyud): #/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba thAg ta a d+hiSh+ThA na hri ya gu
1b2(rgyud): hud+hu kuraN+Da mudrAnA ma d+hA Ni ma hA yAn sUt+ma/ bong skud du/ 'phags
1b3(rgyud): pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi snying po gsang ba
2a1(rgyud): ring bsrel gyi ma tog ces bya ba'i gzus// theg rten
2a2(rgyud): mdo// sang+yas rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyagal gro/
2a3(rgyud): skang dag gis thos pa dus ga cig na/ bcom ldan 'das yu lu ma ga d+hA drim nga
2a4(rgyud): pa'i dun dga' ba dang / rin po che sa sa kyi rje ni/ byang chu ba sems dpa'i ge dun
2b1(rgyud): chen po dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
2b2(rgyud): mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa bye ba mang po rnams dang / yul gyi mi
2b3(rgyud): 'bum phrag du ma rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du byas nas thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas 'khor gyi nang de
2b4(rgyud): na bram ze chen po shing sA la chen po lta bu mkhas pa/ mdzangs pa/ gsal ba/ yid gzhungs pa/ mthong na dga' ba/
2b5(rgyud): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su bzung ba/ dri med legs snang zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de'ang gcig tu dkon mchog
3a1(rgyud): #// gsum la dad cing gus la phyag byed pa'i dge ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ zhib mo brtags pa/ sems can thams
3a2(rgyud): cad dang dge ba'i don la brtson pa/ nor che ba/ longs spyod che ba/ phyug pa/ rdzas mang ba/ yo byad phun sum tshogs pa yin no// de nas
3a3(rgyud): bram ze chen po dri med legs snang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/
3a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang bdug pas mngon par mchod do// na bza' rin 'bum ri ba'ang gsol/ bcom ldan 'das la mu tig
3a5(rgyud): gi do shal 'bum ri ba'ang gsol nas/ zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas
3a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sras kyi tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa bdag gi sdum par gdugs
3b1(rgyud): tshod la spyan 'dren na/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis snang bar mdzad par ci ga nang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze chen po dri med legs sdang gis spyan drangs par thugs su drung
3b2(rgyud): nas ci'ang mi gsung bar gyur par gnang ngo // de nas bram ze chen po legs snang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ des rings pa rings par rang gi khyim du
3b3(rgyud): song ste/ de nyid kyi mtshan mi 'das pa dang / zhal zas dang / yo byad dang / zhal zas ro brgya pa mang po bshams nas/ bkod pa chen pos bkra shis kyi gzhal med chen po dang
3b4(rgyud): gzhal med khang chen po sna tshogs dang / me tog dang / bdug pa khyer te 'khor mang po dang / sil swanA dang / be brdob pas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan
3b5(rgyud): 'das la dus la bab par gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ bram ze chen po dri med legs snang gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni gshegs pa'i dus lags
3b6(rgyud): ter bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa'i dus chod la bab na/ bdag la snang bar mdzad pa ci gnang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze chen po dri med legs sdang dbugs phyung nas/ nyid kyi
3b7(rgyud): 'khor la gzigs te bka' stsal pa/ 'khor ji ltar lhags pa thams cad deng don chen por mdzad par 'gyur gyis tshur shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan de las bzhengs nas/ bcom ldan
4a1(rgyud): 'das gdan de las bzhengs ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las 'od zer tha dad pa sna tshogs byung ste/ 'od zer gyi snang ba des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
4a2(rgyud): thams cad snang bar byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la yang dag par bskul te gzigs nas gshegs par shes so// de nas bram ze chen po legs snang gis mchod pa dang
4a3(rgyud): bkur sti chen pos mchod cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi gshegs shul mdzes pa cher byas so// 'khor mang po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
4a4(rgyud): mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang // lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / srid med kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang
4a5(rgyud): gshegs shul mdzes par byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dang ha cang mi ring ba'i lam gyi bar gyi nang zhig na skyed mos tshal bde byed ces bya ba zhig yod de/ skyed mos tshal de'i nang na mchod rten
4a6(rgyud): rnying pa chen po zhig yod de/ zhig pa/ tsher mas gang ba/ rtswa dang / shing dang / gyo mos kun tu gang ba phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu zhig yod de/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i drung du gshegs pa dang
4a7(rgyud): mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de'ang kun tu 'bar zhing 'od zer 'bar ba kha dog sna tshogs pa dag byung ngo // phyag dar gyi phung po de las kyang legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo // de bzhin
4b1(rgyud): gshegs pa shAkya thub pa legs so legs so// ded ni gshegs pa'i lngas bzang po'o// bram ze chen po de bzhin gshegs pa spyan drangs pa na yang khyod legs so// deng khyod la don chen ma/
4b2(rgyud): mdzad par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de la yan lag lngas phyag mdzad nas/ nyid kyi sku las na bza' bsil nas mchod rten gyi
4b3(rgyud): pa phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de la gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis mchi ma byung ba chen po phyung bas bshums pa mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad pa bstan te/ 'dzum pa bstan
4b4(rgyud): pa des phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lag mthil na bzhugs pa bzhin du mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang spyan mchi mas gang zhing bzhugs so// de bzhin gshegs
4b5(rgyud): pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'od zer bkye ste/ mchod rten rnying pa'i phung po chen po der bzhugs so// de nas 'khor mang po 'dus pa de ya mtshan chen por gyur cing / yi chad de 'khod par gyur to//
4b6(rgyud): de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje lus ni 'dar zhing snying ni 'gul/ rdo rje ni gsor zhing rings pa rings par bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
4b7(rgyud): gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bshums pa'i snga ltas chen po gda' ba gang gis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan mchi
5a1(rgyud): mas gang bar bstan pa'i snga ltas gda' ba bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor 'di'i nang du zhu ba 'di skabs dbye bar ci ga nang / de nas
5a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje ring bsrel gyi phung po de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba til
5a3(rgyud): gyi gang bu snyed thams cad kyi snying po'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i mchod rten gyi chos kyi rnam grangs yod de/ lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang na gnas pa der/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba
5a4(rgyud): til gyi gang bu snyed gnas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa khar yas khar yas zhes bya ba snyed kyi sku gdung ring bsrel rnams gnas so// chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong gnas so// de bzhin gshes
5a5(rgyud): pa 'bum phrag bye ba til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i gtsug tor dang spyi bo'ang de bzhin du gnas so// lag na rdo rje gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gnas pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten
5a6(rgyud): lung bstan to// lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'di ltar phan yon che zhing mthu che ba yin no// lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni phan yon che ba yin no// lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'dra
5a7(rgyud): bkra shis thams cad rdzogs par byed pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das las 'khor mang po 'dus pa de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma
5b1(rgyud): dang bral la/ de nas nye ba 'i nyon mongs pa dang bral lo// kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo// kha cig gis ni dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo// kha cig gis ni rang byang chub kyi 'dran
5b2(rgyud): bu'o// kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// kha cig gis ni phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas so// kha cig gis ni byang chub tu lung bstan pa
5b3(rgyud): thob bo// kha cig gis ni sa dang po'o// kha cig gis ni sa gnyis pa'o// kha cig gis ni sa gsum pa'o// kha cig gis ni sa bzhi pa'o// kha cig gis ni sa lnga pa'o// kha cig gr-i ni sa drug/
5b4(rgyud): pa'o// kha cig gis ni sa bdun pa'o// kha cig gis ni sa brgyad pa'o// kha cig gis ni sa dgu pa'o// kha cig gis ni sa bcu la gnas par gyur to// kha cig gis ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs
5b5(rgyud): su rdzogs so// bram ze chen po de'ang mngon par shes pa lnga thob cing dri ma dang bral ba dang / ser sna dang phrag dog dang bral bar gyur to// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje cho 'phrul chen po
5b6(rgyud): 'di lta bu mthong nas ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba chen por gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs kyi mtshan thos pas kyang phan yon gyis brgyan
5b7(rgyud): pa 'di lta bu thob na/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du phung dud dang bkur sti shin tu mang po bgyid par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ bcom ldan 'das de bsod nams kyi phung po ji lta bu'ang mthong bar 'gyur/
6a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa lag na rdo rje khyod nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am dge bsnyen
6a2(rgyud): nam dge bsnyen ma gang la las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dri bar byed na/ lag na rdo rje des de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bsod nams
6a3(rgyud): kyi phung po dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis rjes su gzung bar 'gyur ro// gang zhig klog par byed pa de dag kyang de bzhin
6a4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i mdo sde rnams bcangs par 'gyur ro// gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'dzin pa de dag phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag skye
6a5(rgyud): ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gzung bar 'gyur zhing
6a6(rgyud): nyin gcig bzhin gzigs par 'gyur ro// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa byed pa dang / khong du chud par byed pa dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / me tog 'bring rgyu nga
6a7(rgyud): byug pa dang / namapa' dang / lhang lbung dang / rgyan gyis mchod pa byed pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge bsnyen nas/ dge bsnyen ma des// phyogs bcu dang phyogs
6b1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu steng dgu bcu rtsa dgu la lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / me tog 'phreng rgyu dang / thug pa dang / na baba' dang / lcung
6b2(rgyud): lbub dang / rgyan gyis mchod par 'gyur ro// phyogs re re'i de bzhin gshegs pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i sprin rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i ri rab chen po tsam gyi phung po'i yon
6b3(rgyud): tan byung ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mau dang / mi
6b4(rgyud): ma yin pa de rnams dang / sems can gyi tshogs chen po de rnams kyang ya mtshan du gyur nas/ gcig la gcig 'di skad du mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar dang gyo mo'i phung po de bzhin gshegs pa'i
6b5(rgyud): byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas/ 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi 'phrul chen po ston pas mthu che ba yin no zhes zer ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes
6b6(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di sus phyag dar gyi phung por bgyis pa las rin po che'i mchod rten du gda' ba bgyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje 'ang phyag dang /
6b7(rgyud): gyi phung po ma yin gyis/ 'di ni rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ rin po che'i mchod rten chen po yin no// lag na rdo rje 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ston pas
7a1(rgyud): nub par gyur gyis/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po'i mchod rten rnams ni 'jig pa'am 'gyes par mi 'gyur te/ de bzhin
7a2(rgyud): gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i snying po'i sku ji ltar 'gyes par 'gyur/ 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin par snang ba las kyang nub par gyur to// lag na rdo rje gzhan yang phyi ma'i dus
7a3(rgyud): phyi ma'i tshe sdig pa kun tu spyod pa dang / sdig pa can dang / dmyal ba la gzhol ba shin tu tshabs cher 'byung bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas ma yin/ chos ma yin/ dge 'dun 'tshel ba ma yin zhing
7a4(rgyud): dge ba'i rtsa ba dang kyang skyed par mi byed de/ rgyu de dang rkyen des dam pa'i chos nub bo// lag na rdo rje de'i phyir nga'i mig gnyis mchi mas gang la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mchi ma byung ngo //
7a5(rgyud): dam pa'i chos rnam grangs 'di lta bu ni nub par 'gyur gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten ni ma gtogs te/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro// de nas
7a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bris te mchod rten gyi nang du 'jog na dge ba'i rtsa ba ci
7a7(rgyud): zhig skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bris te mchod rten gyi nang du bzhag pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
7b1(rgyud): rna snang bab dang 'brel gyi mtshad na du 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzungs su snang ba gas bas sbyin gyis bsgrubs papas dzad rten 'gyur ro// de rgyun gshegs pa/
7b2(rgyud): til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i mchod rten du 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor dang spyan gyi mchod rten du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// gang zhig sangs rgyas
7b3(rgyud): gzugs bstan nam/ mchod rten thams cad kyi nang du 'dzod par byed na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// 'khor lo ni
7b4(rgyud): 'phreng ba dang / dril bu g.yer ga'i dra bar spel ba dang bcas pa dang / bkra shis dang / char khab kyi gzugs dang / dril bur bcas pa rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs
7b5(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthu dang / byin gyi rlabs dang / bden pa dang / dam tshig gis byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du byin
7b6(rgyud): gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag mchod rten de la phung dud dang bsti stang byed pa de dag nges par phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
7b7(rgyud): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// phyag 'tshal ba gcig dang / skor ba gcig gis mnar med pa la thug go bar la sogs pa rnams las yongs su thar par 'gyur zhing / zin
8a1(rgyud): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// gnas gang na mchod nam gzugs brnyan 'di lta bu gnas pa'i sa phyogs de'ang
8a2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// phyogs der klu mi bsrun pas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ sad dang se rabs kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ gnas der srog
8a3(rgyud): chags mi bsrun pa dang gdug pas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ gcan gzan kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ bya mi bsrun pa dang / ne co dang / ri skegs dang / byi ba dang / srin po dang /
8a4(rgyud): sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / byi ba dang / sbrang ma mchu gsum pa dang / mchu rings dang / rta bla'i 'jigs pa'ang mi 'byung bar 'gyur/ sbrul gdug pas kyang mi tshug par 'gyur
8a5(rgyud): phyogs der yams kyi nad dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa'ang mi 'byung bar 'gyuraganod sbyin dang srin po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / 'dre dang / bajed byed kyi
8a6(rgyud): 'jigs pa'ang mi 'byung bar 'gyur/ gdon thams cad kyis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ rims thams cad kyis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur// nad thams cad dang / 'bras
8a7(rgyud): dang de rol mig dang ldog pa dang / mtshan par rdol ba dang / rkang shu dang / g.yan pa dang / mdzes kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur zhing / mchod rten de mthong ba tsam gyis thams
8b1(rgyud): cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro// phyogs der ba lang gyi nad dang / phyugs nad dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnam pa mang po gzhan dag gi nad dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / du ser/
8b2(rgyud): nad kyis kyang nam yang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ dus ma yin par 'chi bas kyang dus ma yin par 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ dug gis ma yin// mtshon gyis ma yin zhing / me dang rgyas kyang nam yang mi tshugs par
8b3(rgyud): 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pas kyang ma yin/ lo nyes kyi 'jigs pas kyang nam yang mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po'i dmag gi 'jigs pa'ang mi 'byung bar 'gyur
8b4(rgyud): ro rgyal po chen po bzhi'ang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sa phyogs de srung bar byed/ yongs su skyong bar byed do// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad po de dag kyang rtag tu rgyun 'chad par srung
8b5(rgyud): ba dang / slob pa dang / sred par byed par 'gyur ro// rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / zla ba dang / tsa ma dang / mjug rings chen po'ang nyin mtshan mthun par byed par 'gyur ro// klu'i rgyal
8b6(rgyud): thams cad kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mdangs mi 'phrog cing / legs pa kho nar char gyi rgyun 'bebs par 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyang mchod rten chen po de la phyag 'tshal ba dang / bkur sti bya
8b7(rgyud): ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i phyir gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis nas dus gsum du 'ong ngo // yul du gnas pa thams cad kyang mchod rten dang gzugs brnyan de'i drung du dus gsum du 'ong ngo // bstod/
9a1(rgyud): par byed pa skor ba byed par 'gyur ro// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i bu mo dang / lha'i tshogs rnams dang ldan cig rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mchod rten
9a2(rgyud): nam gzugs brnyan de'i drung du nyin mtshan dus gsum du 'ong ste phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod pa la 'ong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang rtag par dgongs pa dang / byin gyis rlob
9a3(rgyud): cing bzhugs so// mchod rten dang gzugs brnyan ji lta ji lta bu las byed pa sa'i 'am/ rdo'i 'am/ shing gi 'am/ dngul gyi 'am/ gser gyi 'am/ zangs kyir byed pa dang / chos
9a4(rgyud): kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang bris te de'i nang du bzhag na/ bzhag ma thag tsam gyis rin po che sna bdun gyis rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// 'phang dang / them
9a5(rgyud): skas dang kha sran dang / 'khor lo'i 'phreng ba dang / bkra shis dang / gdugs dang / dril bu 'phyang ba dang / ba dan dang / dril bu g.yer ga'i dra ba thams cad kyang rin po che sna
9a6(rgyud): bdun gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// phyogs bzhi'i kun ra'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan gnas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlabs
9a7(rgyud): kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i mchod rten rin po che dang / sku gdung gi snying po'i mchod rten dang / mchod gnas su 'gyur ro// sku gzugs dang / mchod rten de 'og min gyi gnas kyi
9b1(rgyud): khrus kyang yongs su bskyang ba dang / mchod pas yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po la gar rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to//
9b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i yon tan gyi khyad par ji lta bur 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi snying po
9b3(rgyud): gsang ba ring bsrel gyi za ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs yin te/ lag na rdo rje des namathu 'di ni yon tan gyi khyad par 'di lta bur byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin no// rdo rje 'dzin
9b4(rgyud): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i za ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par ci gnang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje rjod cig
9b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs
9b6(rgyud): pa'i sku gsum ste/ chos kyi sku dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / de bzhin du sprul pa'i sku ste/ dus gsum pa thams cad ring bsrel gyi za ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs kyi
9b7(rgyud): chos kyi rnam grangs yin no// nem s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kAnAn/ sarba thAg tA ni/ oM b+hu ldan pa rib car/ hU~M lu chulu/ thoraHre/ sa r+b+ba ba ba ga ta/ thA d+yan+Da ro/ badz+ramaHte/ dzam /
10a1(rgyud): a tsu le/ sma ra ta thA ga ta/ d+har+m+ma tsakra/ pra brta ne badz+ra bo d+hi ma NA a laM kA ra/ a laM kr-i te/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ a d+hiSh+Thi ti bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya / bo d+ha ni /
10a2(rgyud): d+ha ni bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ sa bo d+han sa bo d+ha ya/ tsal tsal/ tsa la d+hu sar+b+ba a ba rat+na na/ sar+b+ba pA pa bi ga te/ hu ru hra ru/ sar+b+ba sho ka bi ga te/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/ badz+ri Ni/ saM b+hA ba sa d+ha/
10a3(rgyud): ta thA ga te gr-i h+Na/ d+hA ra Ni mu dre/ bud+d+he bud+d+he/ su bud+d+he/ sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Thi te/ d+hA tu gar+b+he sA hA/ sa ma ya a d+h+yeSh+Thi te swA hA/ sarba ta thA ga ta hr-id ya/ d+hA tu mu dre swA hA/ su pra tiSh+Thi te sU be/
10a4(rgyud): ta thA ga ta a tiSh+Thi te/ hUM hUM swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta uSh+NI Sha d+hA tu mu dra Ni swA hA/ sarba ta thA ge tA na sA d+hI tu bi b+hu Shi ta a d+hiSh+Thi te hu ru hu ru hUM hUM swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ring bsrel gyi za ma tog/
10a5(rgyud): gi phyag rgya'i gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu/ phyogs bcu dang phyogs re re kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu gshegs nas bcom
10a6(rgyud): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la shAkya thub pas sems can thams cad kyi don du 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu'i chos kyi gter bzhag pa dang ring bsrel gyi snying po'i mchod rten
10a7(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs pa legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no// 'don de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang byin gyi rlabs yin no// gang na ring bsrel gyi phyag rgya'i gzungs 'di
10b1(rgyud): smod par byed dam/ mchod rten gyi nang du 'jog gam/ gzugs brnyan gyi nang du 'jog par byed pa der/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang gcig tu rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rjes su 'brang zhing
10b2(rgyud): bzhugs par 'gyur ro// thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de nas gzungs bshad pa dang / ji tsam na mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar
10b3(rgyud): gyi phung po lta bu de rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten du mngon par 'phags shing / 'phang dang / legs par rnam par 'phyes pa dang / 'khor lo'i 'phreng ba dang / bkra shis dang /
10b4(rgyud): bcas par gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das dgyes te de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang
10b5(rgyud): za dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po de dag dang / lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do//
10b6(rgyud): 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba ring bsrel gyi zam tog ces bya ba'i gzungs theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan
10b7(rgyud): bo bid+d+ha kar pra b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he bcangs dben dra rak+Shi tas 'askur cing nus te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du
11a1(rgyud): bo d+hi gar+dz+dza lad+hA ra la k+Sha d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ byang chub kyi snying po rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
11a2(rgyud): oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ bi pu la ba da la kany+tsa nod k+Ship+ta/ pra b+hA sa ke tu mur+N+Na ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na mo b+ha ga ba te shAkya mu na ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te ka samya
11a3(rgyud): saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ b+ho d+hi bo d+ha/ b+hau d+hi na tho d+hi ni/ sarba ta thA ga ta gau tsa ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ha ra ha ra/ pra ha ra pra hi ra/ ma hA bo d+hi tsit+ta d+ha re/ tsu lu tsu lu sha ta rasmi sats+tshe di te/ saH/
11a4(rgyud): ta thA ga tA b+hi Shi ka te/ gu Ne gu Na ba te/ sarba bud+d+ha guN+Da ba b+hA se/ mi li mi li/ ga ga na ta le/ pra tiSh+Thi te/ sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiShI te/ na b+hU stA le/ sha ma sha ma/ pra sha ma brag me
11a5(rgyud): sarba pA paM pra sha ma mesarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ni/ hu lu hu lu hUM/ ma hA bo d+hi mArga saM pra tiSh+Thi te sarba ta thA ga tA su pra tiSh+Thi te shud+d+he swA hA mU la man+tha/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta bya ba lo ki te/ dza ya dza ya
11a6(rgyud): swA hA da thaMngs/ oM hu ru Taru/ dzas mu She swAH/ u badz+ra da ya~M/ oM badz+ra a su She swAhA/ dge slong ma/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bstan ma 'am/ gzhan yang
11a7(rgyud): rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gzungs 'di thos te mchod rten gyis la/ mchod rten da'i nang du gzungs 'di bcugan das mtsha ga byas na 'dum byas par 'gyur ro
11b1(rgyud): lhums kyi me tog dang / dz+ra dang // 'bring ba dang / dathug pa dang / phyem dang / na bapa' dang / gang+gA gra dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan la sogs pas kyang mno par 'gyur te/ mdzad/
11b2(rgyud): rten 'ba' zhig mchod pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog rnams la'ang mchod pa'i yo byad de dag gis mchid par 'gyur ro//
11b3(rgyud): dga' bo ngas mdo 'di bshad pa ni bsod nams zhan pa dang / ma dad pa dang / lta ba log pa dang / the tsom za ba dang / mtshams med pa byed pa dang / tshe thung ba dang / sems can dmyal
11b4(rgyud): ba dang / byol song dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mtshams med par 'gro ba'i sems can de lta bu dag gi phyir gzungs 'di bshad do// dga' bo phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe khyim na gnas
11b5(rgyud): pa dang / dge slong las phal cher gzungs 'di klog pa dang / mchod par mi byed pa rnams ji ltar khyim pa rnams sdug bsngal bar bshad pa de bzhin du rab tu byung ba rnams kyang sdug bsngal bar
11b6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de ste de bzhin du sangs rgyas mchod cing 'di la nyan pas mchod rten gcig byas na chos kyis brgyan pa brgyad khri ba ni stong rnams kyang mchod par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang bsod nams
11b7(rgyud): kyi phung po dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// sdong pos brgyan pa bklags shing la ton du byas par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor du'ang zhugs par 'gyur ro//
12a1(rgyud): kyang dus kyi seM ba rgyan 'bum las bdas pa sas rgyag ngas tshugs su/ drug swA hA/
12a2(rgyud): bud+d+ha kan nam mahA An suH/ bad skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas bcu gnyis banyis bya 'jug pa chen pa'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bya /
12a3(rgyud): 'di skang bdag gis thas pa'i dus gcigasabacom ldan 'das rgyal ba'i khabar bya rgyang byung ba mal/ dag sungs kyis pa lnga brgya dge slong gi dge na na pa dang bas rag
12a4(rgyud): bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' mi pham pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong gi byang chub sems dpa' dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs cig go// de nas bcom ldan
12a5(rgyud): 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig
12a6(rgyud): 'bum phrag brjod du med pa bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi ning 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mu tig can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
12a7(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha'i dpal dri med rdul sel rab mdzes yon tan gyi tog gi 'od me tog pad+ma bai DUR+Ya'i 'od zer rin po che'i gzugs lta bu'i sku dang ldan pa// spos
12b1(rgyud): mchog dam pas mchod pa/ sku rnam par spras shing legs par brgyan pa/ gtsug tor gyi gtsug nas nyi ma'i 'od zer dpag med zla 'od smon lam gyis brgyan pa // rab sprul bkod pa chen po
12b2(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings las mngon 'phags chags med rin chen rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// su rgyal ba'i mtshan 'dzin pa de bskal pa chen po 'dzam
12b3(rgyud): bu'i gling gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul sred kyi bskal par 'khor ba las ldog go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri med ces bya ba lung bstan te/ de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
12b4(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha'i dpal dri med rdul sel rab mdzes yon tan gyi tog gi pad+ma bai DUR+Ya'i 'od zer rin po che'i gzugs lta bu'i sku dang ldan pa/ spos mchog dam pa
12b5(rgyud): mchod pa sku rnam par spras shing legs par brgyan pa/ gtsug tor gyi gtsug nas nyi ma'i 'od zer dpag med zla 'od smon lam gyi brgyan pa/ rab sprul bkod pa chen po chos kyi dbyings las
12b6(rgyud): mngon 'phags chags med rin chen rgyal po de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dam pa'i chos nub ma thag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
12b7(rgyud): te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/
13a1(rgyud): #/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu zla gzhon nu nyi ma'i sgron ma zla ba'i me tog pad+ma gser sdug nam mkha' lta bu'i sku rnam par
13a2(rgyud): snang mdzad 'od zer rab brgyan thogs med 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor phyogs bcur 'od zer rab 'byin 'jig rten khams kun snang byed tog gi rgyal mtshan rgyal po zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar
13a3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// shar phyogs de nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bkod pa dri med 'od ces bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo // tshig 'don to// phyag bya'o// /
13a4(rgyud): lho phyog kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spobs pa'i rgyal po la dgongs pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo // yid la bya'o// nub phyogs kyi de bzhin
13a5(rgyud): gshegs pa dri med zla ba'i tog gi rgyal po grags ldan zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo // phyag bya'o// byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa me tog bkod pa snang bar mdzad pa zhes bya ba'i
13a6(rgyud): mtshan yang gzung ngo // phyag bya'o// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mdzad ces bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo // phyag bya'o// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams de bzhin
13a7(rgyud): gshegs pa rin chen mchog gi tog grags ldan zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo // phyag bya'o// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dri med rnam par gzigs zhes bya
13b1(rgyud): ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo // phyag bya'o// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig bral bag tsha mi mnga' spu zing mi byed ces bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo // phyag bya'o//
13b2(rgyud): 'og gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge bsgyings pa'i med pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo // phyag bya'o// steng gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od gzi brjid 'jigs
13b3(rgyud): bral rgyal po zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo // phyag bya'o// byams pa dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
13b4(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcu gnyis po 'di dag gi mtshan brjod la nyi ma bcur sdig pa thams cad kyi nyes pa bshags par bya// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rjes su yi rang bar bya/
13b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams la bskul ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba 'debs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad chos kyi dbyings su yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// 'on
13b6(rgyud): tang sdig pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ro// las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'byang bar 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / mi
13b7(rgyud): 'jig pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzungs phun sum tshogs pa'ang 'thob bo// ting nge 'dzin
14a1(rgyud): #phun sum tshogs pa'ang 'thob bo// bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen phun sum
14a2(rgyud): tshogs pa'ang myur du yongs su 'dzin to// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la sa nyams par mi 'gyur zhing yongs su nyams par yang mi 'gyur ro// 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe'ang
14a3(rgyud): kun tu mdzes pa dang / de'i longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang / rigs phum sum tshogs pa dang / skye ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / rus phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzugs phun sum
14a4(rgyud): tshogs pa dang / rigs 'dra ba'i skye bo'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'ang yongs su 'dzin to// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang dang gang du skyes pa yi/ tshe rabs tshe rab sa thams cad du
14a5(rgyud): mthong na dga' zhing dga' byed dang // 'od byed pa dang mthu che dang // 'byor pa chen por 'gyur ba yin// gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams kyang brjod par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ a khe ma khe sa maM tu
14a6(rgyud): mu khe/ so ti yuk+te/ ne ruk+She pra b+he/ sa ma yo ge/ tsit+ta tsit+tarti/ a khe ma khe/ ma da ne/ bi brti/ sa man+ta mu Na/ sad d+hA ra me yuk+te pra yuk+te/ hi li hi li ma sa le ga A na le
14a7(rgyud): tsa me/ a tsi rbo a tsi Ti 6 tse/ a ra he/ ba hud tshe/ ma yu gra he/ he ma ba ti/ d+yo ti ba ti d+harmA tsit+te/ ts+ya ti b+ha ge/ a bik+Sha be ra d+h+r-ikA me/ skaM d+hi ba b+hak+te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub
14b1(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams grub par gyur cig/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gzungs 'di dag ni bzung
14b2(rgyud): byas na// phyogs bcu dag na gang bzhugs pa'i// bye ba drug cu'i drang srong rnams// de dag de la dgongs par 'gyur// skye ba dag ni kun tu yang // dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed par 'gyur// cung zad
14b3(rgyud): dge ba gang yin pa// don rnams thams cad 'byor par 'gyur// pad+ma'i snying por bzhugs pa yi// sangs rgyas rnams ni mngon du mthong // gzungs 'di dag ni 'dzin byed pa// mkhas pa dpal
14b4(rgyud): ldan rdzus te skye// dran dang blo gros rtag pa dang // mos dang shes rab rab tu 'phel// thos pa thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur// thos pa rnams kyis yongs mi nyams// 'jig rten mgon po
14b5(rgyud): 'di dag gi/ mtshan rnams su zhig rjod byed pa// ngan 'gro thams cad spangs nas ni// bzang 'gror myur bar 'gro bar 'gyur// ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi mchog/ de dag de la mngon du//
14b6(rgyud): 'gyur// byang chub rab tu de 'tshang rgya// zhing ni bye ba phrag stong dag/ gser gyis bkang ste sbyin byin pas// gang zhig de bzhin gshegs rnams kyi// mtshan rnams 'dzin par byed pa yi//
14b7(rgyud): bsod nams phung po de ches mang // rtag tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyur// byang chub spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe// mi khom thams cad rnam spangs te// sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab mdzes rnyed//
15a1(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes par byed// dad pa bla na med pa 'thob/ sangs rgyas rnams la rab dad cing // mchod pa dam pa byed par 'gyur// sangs rgyas
15a2(rgyud): 'byung ba mnyes byed de// mthong nas ston la rab tu dang // 'jig rten sgron ma mthong nas ni// mchod pa bzang po byed par 'gyur// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/ bskal pa bye ba
15a3(rgyud): grangs med du// 'khor ba rnam par spangs nas su// byang chub myur du 'tshang yang rgyu// nyin zhag bdun du tshang bar ni// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed na// gang gis 'dren rnams mthong
15a4(rgyud): 'gyur ba'i// rgya chen mig ni sbyangs par 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon po de dag gi/ mtshan rnams me gang 'dzin byed na// skye ba gang dang gang skyes par// de ni phyag bya'i 'os su 'gyur//
15a5(rgyud): mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// bskal pa bye ba bas ma yas su// bkur sti ma yin thob mi 'gyur// 'jig rten dag na grags pa 'thob// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// de la
15a6(rgyud): bskal pa du mar ni// lha rnams bsti stang byed par 'gyur// byang chub myur du 'tshang yang rgya// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// mos med shes rab 'tshal mi 'gyur// g.yo dang sgyu
15a7(rgyud): ni rnam par spangs// rtag tu sangs rgyas rnams kyang mthong // mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// lha dang dri za klu dbang dang // mkha' lding lha min gsang ba pa// rtag tu de la srung bar
15b1(rgyud): byed/ gzugs dang mtshan ni phun sum tshogs// nor tshe khyim du skye bar 'gyur// sems can kun la sbyin par byed// dpa' zhing gtong bod ser sna med// bskal pa bye ba brgya mang po la
15b2(rgyud): lha yi tsan dan dmar po dang // shin tu dri zhim spos kun gyi// spos dad de yi kha nas 'byung // mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// bskal pa bye bar sgra skad 'di// tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang
15b3(rgyud): ldan par 'gyur// rtag tu chos rgyal tshul dang ldan// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// rin chen sna bdun pad+ma'i 'dab// bye ba stong phrag mang yod las// 'byor chen de skye lha gzugs
15b4(rgyud): ldan/ mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa// de ni pa ma spun sdug dang // skye bo dag gi tshogs rnams dang // 'bral bar 'gyur ba mi mthong ngo // drang srong chen po rnams kyi mtshan// dud
15b5(rgyud): med kyis ni bzung byas na// bud med lus la ma chags nas// skyes pa blo gros ldan par 'gyur// mi yi lus ni thob 'gyur nas// bla med byang chub thob 'gyur te// chos kyi 'khor lo rab
15b6(rgyud): bskor nas// 'dod pa ji bzhin mya ngan 'da'// mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa// de yi lus la mtshon dang ni// dug dang me dang rgyal po dang // g.yon can rnams kyis mi tshugs so//
15b7(rgyud): mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa// de yi sems la rnams kyang ni// dpung dang bzhon par bcas pa yi// bdud kyis glags rnyed mi 'gyur ro// 'di dag gi ni mtshan gyi rnams// mi gang
16a1(rgyud): 'dzin par byed pa de// zhing ni bye ba bsam yas par// nam mkha' la ni 'gro bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas bstan pa rnams mchod nas// 'jigs pa med par zhu
16a2(rgyud): bzhu// de dag de yi bsam mkhyen nas// rgyal ba de dag lung ston 'gyur// sangs rgyas mgon po de dag las// lung bstan pa ni thob gyur nas// de ni shin tu yi rang ste// rgyal ba'i bstan la/
16a3(rgyud): the tsom med// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// 'jigs rten mgon po rnams las ni// zab mo'i chos ni thos 'gyur te// thos nas thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur// de nas pha rol
16a4(rgyud): phyin pa dang // mi 'jigs pa dang stobs rnams dang // mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnams// ma lus par ni rdzogs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas de dag rnams kyi ni// gang gi zhing du
16a5(rgyud): 'dod 'gyur ba// der ni bla med yang dag rdzogs// byang chub rtogs nas 'tshang rgyar 'gyur// skyes pa'am ni bud med gang // mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin pa yi// yon tan 'di dag
16a6(rgyud): gzhan dag kyang // sangs rgyas bskal par rgyun du gsung // bag yod ldan par gyur nas ni// yon tan phun sum 'di thos nas// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags ldan pa// de dag
16a7(rgyud): mtshan rnams 'dzin par 'gyur// sangs rgyas 'di dag dpal snying po// sprin gyi rgyal po mi yi mchog/ 'jig rten mgon po 'di dag gi/ mtshan ni bskal par gang nyan dang // gang dag
16b1(rgyud): 'di rnams mtshan nyan cing // thos nas gus par byed 'gyur ba// de dang de dag shes rab che// rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur// drang srong chen po de dag gi/ 'di 'dra'i mtshan dag thos
16b2(rgyud): gyur nas// bag yang ldan zhing mkhas gyur la// shes rab ldan mi su mi 'dzin// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
16b3(rgyud): byams pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang // dge slong de dag dang // thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mo dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i
16b4(rgyud): 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa sangs rgyas bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// /
16b5(rgyud): rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab
16b6(rgyud): pad/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sa p+ta bud+d+ha kan nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas bdun pa zhes bya ba theg
16b7(rgyud): pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ti se'i ri'i rtse mo lha'i gnas
17a1(rgyud): #/ na drang srong gi spyod pa dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya la 'di lta ste
17a2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang / kun tu bzang po dang / mtha' yas me tog dang
17a3(rgyud): kun nas me tog dang / de dag la sogs pa skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcon ldan 'das kyis ri'i rtse mo'i nags khrod de nyid na/ dge
17a4(rgyud): slong zhig 'byung pos zin nas brdol zhing gcer bu gos med la lag pa bsgreng ste ngu zhing 'dug pa gzigs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos
17a5(rgyud): bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
17a6(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i dkyilan kyi hud ces sgra 'byin pa 'di dang / dge slong gcer bu gos ma mchis la lag pa bstod pa cig shos 'di'ang su zhig
17a7(rgyud): lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i snying po 'di ni nad kyis btab pa
17b1(rgyud): yin no// cig shos 'di'ang nad kyis btab pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems 'dapa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// nang
17b2(rgyud): thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa dang / 'byung po bzlog pa'i rig sngags bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas
17b3(rgyud): sprul pa mdzad de/ de nas nam mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa drug byung ngo // bdun pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
17b4(rgyud): rnam par gzigs steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags
17b5(rgyud): kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to// na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+har+m+ma ya/ na maHsaM g+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM ha la ha la/ he li hi lA ya/ na mo dza ga na mi tsan+da ya/ na mo na maHswA hA/ de nas de
17b6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i snying po gang la la zhig rig sngags
17b7(rgyud): 'di 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed na de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ chu dang sdug bsngal ba'i nad kyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// dus ma yin pa'i 'chi
18a1(rgyud): bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// des dug zos kyang zas bzhin du 'gyur ro// zas dang skom la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te zos na pha rol gyi gnod pa mi
18a2(rgyud): 'byung ngo // nad thams cad kyis btab par mi 'gyur ro// ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ro// mtshon btab
18a3(rgyud): pa'i rna bar bzlas brjod byas la sna ma'i mar sbyin no// mdze dang skrangs nad kyis btab pa rnams la/ sna ma'i mar dang / ut+pa la sngon po dang / shu ti dang / nye'u shing pa rnams bsres pa'i mar
18a4(rgyud): byin na nad thams cad sos par 'gyur ro// las thams can la'ang sbyar bar bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan
18a5(rgyud): pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to// na mo bud+d+ha ya/ na mo d+har+m+ma ya/ na maHsaM g+hA ya
18a6(rgyud): oM pa tsa pa tsa pA tsa ya pA tsa ya sarba b+hU tA nA/ tsin+ta ya/ kI lA ya/ pa ra bi d+h+wa nAM swA hA/ nam mkha'i snying po sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang
18a7(rgyud): 'go ma nyes pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa thams cad bzlog pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dgag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas gsungs shing / ngas kyang da ltar bshad pa'i
18b1(rgyud): snying po 'di zung zhig nam mkha'i snying po gang la la zhig nga'i snying po 'ang nyin lan gsum med la byed na de la pha rol gyi gnod pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na de bzhin
18b2(rgyud): gshegs pa'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ro// gshes ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro// 'di nas shi 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur zhing mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro// de nas
18b3(rgyud): 'di'i cho ga gzhan ni nang thams cad la skud pa bcing bar bya'o// 'dus pa las gyur pa la ni sna ma'i mar la bzlas brjod byas te sbyin no// chus phyogs bcing bar bya'o// srung pas bdag bsrung ngo //
18b4(rgyud): byis pa rnams kyi gdon dag la skud pa sngon po gdags so// mtshon btab pa'i rna bar lan bdun bzlas brjod bya'o// gzhan dag la'ang rang gi blos sbyar bar bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
18b5(rgyud): thams cad skyob steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi
18b6(rgyud): gni 'di dag bka' stsal to// na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+had+hA ya/ na maHsaM g+hA ya/ oM ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ ku lod swA dan+na/ ku ru sarba grahA nA~M swAhA/ nam mkha'i snying
18b7(rgyud): gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams kyis gsungs shing / ngas kyang da ltar bshad de/ nam mkha'i snying
19a1(rgyud): po khyod kyis gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag zung zhig/ gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed na/ de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs dug gis
19a2(rgyud): mi tshugs dbyig dug gis mi tshugs/ rims nad kyis mi 'debs shing chu dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur te/ sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa rnams ni ma gtog
19a3(rgyud): so// dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig nang par langs nas mgo bkrus te de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod na/ de'i las
19a4(rgyud): kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro// de la sems can sdang ba gang dag rgyal po rnams thog mar smra bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad de'i dbang du 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa thams cad kyi nang
19a5(rgyud): du yid la bya'o// 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad du skud pa dkar pos gdags so// mig nad la shing 'o ma can las skud pa byas te rna ba la gdags so//
19a6(rgyud): dmag rengs par byed par 'dod pas zho dang sbrang rtsi la bsngags pa'i 'bras yos lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o// rA dzA nAM rA dzA ma tra ma bA shi kAr tu kA me na/ 'o ma can gyi shing gi sbar shing gi me bus
19a7(rgyud): la bsreg bya til dag la lan stong sbyin sreg bya'o// bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang / sdig pa sbyangs shing dpal chen po dang / nor gyi phung po chen po sgrub par 'dod na ka'o//
19b1(rgyud): macan gyi shing gi slar shing gis me bus la bsreg bya til dag lan stong sbyin bsreg bya'o// sdig pa ji snyed pa thams cad sbyang bar 'dod pa dang / rig sngags thams cad sgrub par 'dod pa dang / bdag
19b2(rgyud): bkru bar 'dod pas shu ti dang / na lang dang / khre dang shi ri ga dang / rgya spos dang gur kum dang / zla sgang dang / an+d+ra bdun dang / byang chub kyi shing dang / e mra'i mgo thogs dang /
19b3(rgyud): 'di rnams kyis bkru bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bya zhing bum pa gsar ba gzhag ste/ zla ba nya la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi spyan sngar snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags la
19b4(rgyud): khrus bya'o// dug mi gdug par byed par 'dod pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar seng ldeng gi phur ma spyi bor bsnyugs la brgya rtsa brgyad ming nas smos te sbyin sreg byas na dug mi gdug par 'gyur ro// gdon
19b5(rgyud): dang bsrung ba dang / 'byung po la sogs pa'i las thams cad la'ang sbyar ba byas na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa log par dadang sel steng gi nam
19b6(rgyud): mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal
19b7(rgyud): to/ na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsaM g+hA ya/ na maHkra kuts+tshan dA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ oM ka Ta ka Ta/ ka Tha ka Sha/ ki Ti ki Ti/ ko Thi ki Thi/ ki nA pa
20a1(rgyud): ya na maHswA hA/ nam mkha'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas log par dad sel ces bya ba gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag/
20a2(rgyud): gis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'i snying po 'di khyod kyis zung zhig/ blangs shing bzung ste kun chub par byas na/ phyi ma'i tshe dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma/
20a3(rgyud): dag de'i tshe dkon mchog gsum la dad pa rnyed nas khrus byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dag gis mchod pa byas nas gsang sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad rjod par
20a4(rgyud): 'gyur te/ tshe rabs bdun du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// lha rnams kyi nang du lha'o che ba nyid thob par 'gyur ro// yang na mi rnams kyi nang du 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// yang na cho ga bzhin du
20a5(rgyud): bsgrubs na de mir skye ba tha ma thob par 'gyur te// 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ tshe 'di la'ang rtag tu brjod na nad thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro//
20a6(rgyud): thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// zas dang skom gyi rnam pa la lan bdun bsngags te zos 'thungs na nad thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// ci ste skom zhi bar 'dod na bza' thams cad la lan stong
20a7(rgyud): rtsa brgyad kyis bkru bar bya'o// lhog rgal bcad na zangs kheb kyis bya'o// 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / bcings pa thams cad las thar par bya na lan bdun bzlas brjod bya ste/ rtag/
20b1(rgyud): nor yang 'phel bar 'gyur/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad las kyang thar par 'gyur ro// ci ste de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'dod na/ des phyogs gtsang mar 'jig rten gyi 'khor/
20b2(rgyud): sar dkyil 'khor bskus la a ka rus bdugs te/ lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ de'i drung du sngas shar phyogs su bstan te nyal na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/
20b3(rgyud): yid la ci smos pa thams cad ston to// tshe 'am/ stobs sam/ 'pham rgyal thams cad kyang ston to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/
20b4(rgyud): sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to// na mo bud+d+ha
20b5(rgyud): ya na mo d+har+m+ma ya/ na maHsaM g+hA ya na maHka na ka mu na ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te sa myaka saM bud+d+ha ya tad+ya thA/ oM sa ra sa ras ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ si ri si ri
20b6(rgyud): sI rA ya/ d+hi ma d+ha ma/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ d+hu ma d+hu ma/ d+hu ma d+hu ma/ d+hu mA ya/ na mo na maHka na ka mu na ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya sA hA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs
20b7(rgyud): pa gser thub kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i snying po gang la la zhig snying po 'di 'dzin cing rtag tu bzlas brjod byed pa de la
21a1(rgyud): mtshon gyi 'jig pa mi 'byung / me dang / chu dang / lce 'bab pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ dug thams cad kyang zas dang 'dra bar thub par 'gyur/ dus ma
21a2(rgyud): yin par 'chi bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ tshe ring por 'gyur/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur/ rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ de bzhin
21a3(rgyud): gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas na sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro// ci ste pha rol nad las thar par byed par 'dod na ci nus su/
21a4(rgyud): gtor ma gtong zhing pog gam/ a ka ru'i bdug pas bdugs la/ gza' thams cad la khrus bya'o// mdzes dang / spangs nad dang / mchin sman la shun dag 'jam po btags la sbrang rtsi
21a5(rgyud): dang bsres te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags la bskus na mdzo nad thams cad sos par 'gyur ro// zhag bzhi pa la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
21a6(rgyud): sngar sna ma'i me tog gi 'phreng ba la lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags te/ mi'i mgo la bcings na zhag bzhi pa'i rims sos par 'gyur ro// mtshon btab pa'i rna bar bzlas brjod byas na brjed byed las
21a7(rgyud): thar par 'gyur ro// lus srul pos zin pa rnams la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog gis bdug go// de la sogs pa'i las rnams byed de/ las thams cad pa zhes bya'o// de nas de bzhin
21b1(rgyud): gshegs pa 'od srungs steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir
21b2(rgyud): gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to// na mo dud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+har+m+ma ya/ na maHsaMg+hA ya/ oM ha ra ha ra/ ha ra hA ra/ ha ha ha/ na maHkA shrA pA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ an te sa myaka sa
21b3(rgyud): bud+d+hA ya/ sid+d+h+ya nA man+t+ra pad swA hA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srungs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i snying
21b4(rgyud): po snying po 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed dag gis gsungs pa ste/ nam mkha'i snying po khyod kyis kyang snying po 'di zung zhig/ kun chub par gyis shig
21b5(rgyud): gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ nyin mo 'am mtshan mo lan gsum gsum bzlas brjod byed na/ mdor na rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro//
21b6(rgyud): de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang byang bar 'gyur te/ sngon gyi las ni ma gtogs so// las thams cad la'ang sbyar bar bya'o// mdze dang sha gar la sogs pa la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog la
21b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags te bklags shing bskus na sos par 'gyur ro// klad pa na ba la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar bzhag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi/
22a1(rgyud): #spyan sngar lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o// thams cad du'ang sbyar bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa steng gi nam mkha' la
22a2(rgyud): bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don gyi phyir rig sngags 'di dag bka' stsal to// na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsa g+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ g+hu me g+hu me g+hu me/ ma hA g+hu me/
22a3(rgyud): ta l-i ta le/ ma hA ta le/ tsa le tsa le/ ma hA tsa le/ d+hu re d+hu re/ ma hA d+hu re/ ti ri ti ri/ ma hA ti ri/ ki li ki li/ ma hA ki li/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma hA tsu ru/ mi l-i mi l-i/ ma hA mi l-i/
22a4(rgyud): li ti li/ ma hA ti li/ d+hu me d+hu me/ ma hA d+hu me/ tsa le tsa laM/ ma hA tsa laM/ khi ri khi ri/ ma hA khi ri/ tsi li tsi li/ ma hA tsi li/ swA hA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas
22a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// klad pa'i nad bsal na mtshan dang la gi mthil gyis bya'o// sprin bzlog na shing ka ra wI ra'i
22a6(rgyud): lcug mas so// dug spos na chus bya'o// las gzhan rnams kyang bya'o// khrus kyi tsho gas sbyar bar bya'o// cho ga thams cad dus thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
22a7(rgyud): bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa sangs rgyas bdun pa
22b1(rgyud): zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA sarba bud+d+ha a ga ba tin+t+ra ma d+hA raN/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas tham/
22b2(rgyud): cad kyi yan lag dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung
22b3(rgyud): chen po'i 'gram na// 'jig rten skyong ba bani dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/
22b4(rgyud): rgyal po chen po dag skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams la 'jigs pa chen po bzhi po 'di dag 'byung ngo // bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rga ba dang / na ba dang / rgud pa dang /
22b5(rgyud): 'chi ba'o// de la'ang 'jigs pa chen po gcig ste/ 'di ltar 'chi bdag gi 'jigs pa chen po ste/ btsam pa med pa/ gnyen po med pa/ rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'o// rgyal po chen po dag de la
22b6(rgyud): 'jigs pa chen po gcig pu de'i gnyen po ngas 'dir brjod par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du/ bcom
22b7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis srog rab tu stsal bas skye dgu rjes su gzung ba 'di ni/ deng bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das shar phyogs su thugs mngon du phyogs te bzhugs
23a1(rgyud): nas/ nase gol gyi sgras de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bskul te/ 'di skad ces/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yong dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang su
23a2(rgyud): ngag sems can rnams la thugs rtse ba'i slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de dag bdag gi grogs mdzod cig/ des na bdag 'dir sangs
23a3(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas/ sems can thams cad kyi dus ma yin par 'chi ba rab tu bzlog par bgyi'o// sngon ma bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa'ang
23a4(rgyud): bskor bar bgyi'o zhes gsung ngo // de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / steng dang / 'og gi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bskul te/ 'di skad ces de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
23a5(rgyud): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang su dag sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i don du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de dag
23a6(rgyud): bdag gi grogs mdzod cig ces gsung ngo // de bzhin du phyogs mtshams rnams su'ang 'di skad ces gang gi phyir 'di dag tshe dang / stobs dang / kha dog dang ldan pa yongs su grub cing
23a7(rgyud): du sa ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar/ sangs rgyas thams cad bdag gi grogs mdzod cig ces gsung ngo // de nas phyogs bcu'i sa'i khams ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi spyan la
23b1(rgyud): snang bar gyur pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang ste/ de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i grogs mdzad pa ra zhal gyis bzhes nas
23b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad 'di skad ces gsung ngo // tad+ya thA/ tsa la tsa la tsa le/ bin ti/ swa s+t+ri kaM/ tsakra a~M ga ti/ pra sha ma du/ sarba rog an te/ kuN+De kur+Ne ma hA kuSh+Tha/
23b3(rgyud): re re/ he ma gi ri/ he ma gau ri/ he ma ni shun+di/ he ma si sau/ kaur be kaur ba be/ he ku ra re ku ra re/ ku ma ti/ bi Sha sa ma Ni/ shi Shu b+hi/ tsa le tsa le/ bi tsa le/ mA bi laM ba hu mu hu mu swAhA/ gsang ba
23b4(rgyud): pa'i bdag po ji snyed pa thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang nye bar 'dug nas/ de dag gis smras pa/ hUM hUM/ si si swA hA/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / de bzhin gshegs/
23b5(rgyud): pa thams cad mi snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs/
23b6(rgyud): kyis bsrung bar bgyi'o// dus ma lags par 'gum pa las bzlog par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ shre te shwe te shwe te/ le li li/ 'phags skyes pos kyang smras pa/ mA taM ge mA taM ge/ mA taM gi ni/
23b7(rgyud): shU mA shU mA/ yul 'khor srung gis kyang smras pa/ tsa re tsa re re swA hA/ mig mi bzang gis kyang smras pa/ ba la~M ba pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po/
24a1(rgyud): #gang la la zhig sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gzigs pa'i rig sngags 'di nyin re la lan re 'don na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par/
24a2(rgyud): bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ngan song gsum du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// 'dis sems can thams cad kyi srog la phan btags par 'gyur ro// gang zhig sems can thams cad
24a3(rgyud): kyi don du nyin gcig bzhin du tshig tu 'don pa dang / gang yang 'di klog pa de la dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa med do// de'i lus la nad ngan pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// chus 'chi ba'i dus
24a4(rgyud): byed par mi 'gyur ro// mes ma yin/ mtshon gyis ma yin/ dug gis ma yin/ lce 'bab pas ma yin no// gang la la rgyal ba'i bu dag rig sngags 'don pa'i sa phyogs de sangs rgyas dang byang chub
24a5(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par rig par bya'o// yi ger 'dri ba'am 'drir 'jug pa des/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rim gro bya ba thams cad kyis bsti snang byas par 'gyur ro// de/
24a6(rgyud): ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can rnams la rim gro byed pa ni sangs rgyas la rim gro byed pa yin no// zhes de bzhin gshegs pa rnams gsung ba'i phyir ro// su zhig gis 'di bris nas yan lag la btags/
24a7(rgyud): na de'i yan lag thams cad bsrungs par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang /
24b1(rgyud): dang / ldu ma yin dang dri bar bcas pa'i 'jigs rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yan lag dang
24b2(rgyud): ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsang ban+d+ha de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing nus te/ skad
24b3(rgyud): gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bud+d+ha hri da ya nA ma d+hA ra Ni d+harma darA ya/ bod skad du/
24b4(rgyud): 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
24b5(rgyud): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul/ chos kyi dbye dgon pa rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams/ ye shes kyis rnam par spyad pa/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyis
24b6(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs pa sems cad thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i gnas/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa
24b7(rgyud): nyid kyi rjes su spyod pa / kun nas 'od zer gyi khang bzangs kyi dbus na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa nas lung bstan pa/
25a1(rgyud): thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa nas 'dus pa/ thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi rgyal po'i sras/ thams cad kyang gzungs dang ting
25a2(rgyud): nge 'dzin sna tshogs thob pa sha stag gis yongs su bskor cing bdun gyis bltas nas thabs cig tu bzhugs te chos ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor
25a3(rgyud): rgya chen po la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / lha dang mi'i skye bo phal po che'i chos kyi
25a4(rgyud): dang phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i
25a5(rgyud): gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yod do// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ngam/ 'dzin tam/
25a6(rgyud): klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston tam/ dad dam/ lhag pa'i bsam pas mos par byed na/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
25a7(rgyud): pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ chos thams cad 'dzin pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa
25b1(rgyud): la lta ba dang bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ chos nyan pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ dge 'dun la rim gro byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ bskal pa stong du 'khor ban
25b2(rgyud): srid pa'i rgya mtsho phyir spel bar 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag
25b3(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ de la 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad srung bar 'gyur/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang /
25b4(rgyud): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang // lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad dga' bar 'gyur/ de'i lus la nad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur//
25b5(rgyud): pha rol gyi gnod pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ cha dang spangs pa dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ de la bdud sdig can
25b6(rgyud): gyis klags rnyed par mi 'gyur/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis skabs rnyed par mi 'gyur te/ gang du yid la byas pa der bdud kyi ris kyi lha de dag thams cad skrag cing dngangs la/ dang
25b7(rgyud): bar 'gyur zhing / phyogs bcur 'bros par 'gyur ro// de la 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi tshig go// sangs rgyas kyi chog chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshig chen po'o// sangs
26a1(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi tshig go// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshig yin no// tad+ya thA/ bud+d+he su bu d+he/ mahA bud+d+he/ iH pre d+d+he ka ta bud+d+he/ bud+d+he bud+d+he
26a2(rgyud): bud+d+ha ma ti bud+d+he sarba bu d+hA/ a nu ma tesar+b+ba du d+h+we a nu dz+nyA na te bud+d+he bud+d+ha bu d+d+had+hA / bu d+hA/ bu d+h+we bud+d+haka bu d+hA// bu d+d+hA ka bu d+hA ka du D+hA sangs rgyas kyi yul
26a3(rgyud): mtha' yas te/ chos bstan pa'ang mtha' yas mod kyi/ gcig tu yid la bya ba ni mdor na chos bsgom pa'o// gzungs 'di ni sems can rnams la thugs brtsi ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas
26a4(rgyud): thams cad kyis gsungs pa ste/ chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya yin no// tad+ya thA/ shud d+he / su shud d+he/ su shud D+he ka sho d+ha ni/ saM go d+ha ni/ nirmA le ma la a bA ga te/ gti sa mAd+hita
26a5(rgyud): ti kra me sa ma sa ri/ sa nA sa ra pa ri a sho ke/ bi go kaM/ ba sho ka sha ma ni ka shA ta~M/ u prag+hA ta/ prah+mA ti/ a pran+d+ha se/ sar+b+ba prad+d+he pa mi tit+te/ sar+b+ba d+harmA pra ti maHte/ Sharaha8
26a6(rgyud): laTha8/ 6 ra/ saM / tsal tsal sa tsal/ tal ta la ma tal/ sa ma ta la/ ri Ni/ s+yA ra~M r+Ne/ sa ma d+hi/ r-iNa.a lo kad+ha re/ lo ka r+dz+dza / bad+hAng/ DU 8/ 8\u0f7f
26a7(rgyud): don mdza bajas bAtsad/ gan can/ sarba rba N+ye/ gzig rje si ga sar+b+ba nA pa tho/ sarba nA ba mi ti/ mam tha ti ldan sa rjeg samata/ A la~M ga su ga gi e AH
26b1(rgyud): ti mo ri te/ b+ha ga ba te sa ra sa ra/ pra sa ra pra sa ra/ bi sa bi sar/ pra sa ra sarba sho ka A ba gA te swAh+na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi snying po gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad
26b2(rgyud): mthag tu ri dang gnas su bcas pa dang / tshal rnam pa drug du g.yos/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyisa'ang g.yos// rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so//
26b3(rgyud): rgya mtsho chen po'ang 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so// ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang ldeg cing 'gul to// bdud kyi gnas thams cad skrag nas/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha
26b4(rgyud): rnams dang / bdud sdig can rnams shin tu sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bar gyur nas nyam thag go// sems can gang dag sa chen po g.yos par mthong ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs
26b5(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes ched du brjod
26b6(rgyud): ba lan gsum ched du brjod do// lha gang dag sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa de dag gis/ lha'i me tog man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po sa bcom ldan 'das la gtor mngon par gtor nas/
26b7(rgyud): gang dag sangs rgyas la skyabs su dong ba de dag thams cad rab tu dga' ba skyes so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ shAkya seng ge yang dag rdzogs pa yi// sangs rgyas skyob pas skad cig yud gang la
27a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni snying po yi// gzungs 'di dag ni rab tu bshad pa yis// skad cig yud dengs yang rnam drug g.yos/ rgya mtsho 'khrugs shing bdud kyi
27a2(rgyud): gnas kun kyang // rab tu g.yos nas bdud kyi rigs rnams ni// lha dag rab tu dang dra shing 'khrugs par 'gyur// bdud yid ma bde sdug bsngal mya ngan non// de tshe lha rnams ngo mtshar rab thos
27a3(rgyud): nas// 'jig rten mgon la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir// nam mkhar gnas nas me tog mnad 'thor// gang dag sangs rgyas mngon dang gzhan rnams kyis// se mo do dang do shal spros rnams dang
27a4(rgyud): phye ma dag dang byug pa gos rnams dang // rgyan dang dpung rgyan dag kyang rab tu 'bul// brgyad po 'di dag ni de'i yon tan gyi phan yon gyi rgyan du 'gyur ba'o// brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub
27a5(rgyud): kyi sems mi brjed pa'i rgyan dang / thos pa thams cad yongs su 'chol bas mi ngoms pa'i rgyan dang / chos zab mo rnam par nges pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rgyan dang / sems can thams
27a6(rgyud): cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin par shes pa'i rgyan dang / ji ltar thos pa dang ji ltar khong du chud pa'i chos rnams la tshul ba nin so sor rtog cing dpyod pa'i rkyen dang / sems can yongs su sa
27a7(rgyud): par bya bar byor chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i rgyan dang / rgyan bang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis thabs la mkhas par rgyan dang / gzungs thob pa'i rgyan te/ brgyad po de dag na ri'i yon te/
27b1(rgyud): mya ngan yon gyinams gyur // gzungs 'an dag tu rgyun du mi labrug/ sangs rgyas rjes su rdzun pa pasgom par bya'o// gangs kyigana'ang dag mas mang la byu / /
27b2(rgyud): ma gas bya gyu / pa zhes bya ba ngas su dug du lag dus pa
27b3(rgyud): dpag tu med pa bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang / ming
27b4(rgyud): lha ma yin dang / dri bar bcas pa'i 'jig rten mi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngo par bsnad nga// 'phags pasangs rgyas kyi snying do zhes bya'i gardungs smos kyinam
27b5(rgyud): grangs rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya puSh+pa ku Ta nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa me tog brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
27b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mtsho chen po ma dros pa na/ klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa'i khang
27b7(rgyud): pa nadage slong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag nas 'dus pa/ byang
28a1(rgyud): chub sems dpa' stong du tshang ba thams cad kyang gzungs thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa/ de ma thag tu rgya
28a2(rgyud): tshab tu dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba/ go cha chen po bgos pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad la the tshom med pa sha stag dang thabs cig go// de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
28a3(rgyud): chen po seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge rnam par rtse ba stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa
28a4(rgyud): gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
28a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyis na/ de'i bsod nams ji snyed cig skyed par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
28a6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge rnam par rtse ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la
28a7(rgyud): mchod pa bgyis na/ de'i bsod nams ji snyed cig skyed par 'gyur zhes seng ge rnam par rtse ba khyod de skad ma zer cig/ de ci'i phyir ni na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshul khrims dpag tu med pa/
28b1(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin dpag tu med pa/ shes rab dpag tu med pa// rnam par grol ba dpag tu med pa/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dpag tu med pa ste/ seng ge rnam par rtse ba gang gi d+hir de
28b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan gyi tshogs dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa de'i phyir/ de la mchod pa'i rnam par smin pa de'ang dpag tu med par shes
28b3(rgyud): par bya'o// seng ge rnam par rtse ba gang la la dag de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs kyang rung / yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/ mchod pa byed pa de dag thams cad ni/ 'di lta ste/
28b4(rgyud): nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/ theg pa chen po 'am/ theg pa gsum las theg pa gcig gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// seng ge rnam par rtse ba/
28b5(rgyud): yang gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong nas sems dang bar gyur la/ dad pa'i sems kyis rnyed pa dang / na bza' dang / zhal zas dang //
28b6(rgyud): gzims na dang / baspyan gyi gsos sman dang / yo byad dang bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyi ba sti sdang du byas shing ri mor byas te/ mchod cing rje la/ rim gror bus pa dang / gang
28b7(rgyud): zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam gyi mchod rten la mchod pa byas pa'i rnam par smin pa ni mnyam par shes par bya ste/ bye brag gam
29a1(rgyud): tha dad du bya ba med do// seng ge rnam par rtse ba byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa gang zhig gis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
29a2(rgyud): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la rin po che'i phung po ri rab tsam dbul bar phul ba bas byang chub sems dpa' gang rab tu byung nas/ kar sha pa Na gcig tsam
29a3(rgyud): dbul bar bul la/ phul nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba snga ma des dge ba'i rtsa ba phyi ma'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ stong
29a4(rgyud): gI ma dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / zangs dang cha dang / bgrang ba dang bskrun pa dang / rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ dpe'i bar du'ang mo bzod do// seng ge rnam par rtse ba gang zhig/
29a5(rgyud): gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la lo gcig gam/ lo brgya 'am/ lo stong yang rung ste/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkra
29a6(rgyud): byas pa dang / gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan 'das 'dus pan ma dzang / nal byang chub kyi sems kyis yang dag par za pas// de banan gshegs pa la mdzad pa
29a7(rgyud): stog pas 'jams pa/ sumal pa yang ma yang yo/ thug pa 'i tshig sa thal pa/ dag gi ni nyim tshal 'byug gas byug pa 'du ma/ sus 'phrul yi
29b1(rgyud): tog 'bul lam/ 'dug spos 'phrul lapa/ 'greng ba 'bul lam/ rom ma tshas la snyan 'dul lam/ gdugs 'bul lam/ ji 'phrul lam k+Sha dbyangs pa 'dul las/
29b2(rgyud): mtshan 'bul lam ba dan 'bul lam dar 'bul lam/ mar me 'bul zhing / phul nas dga' ba'i sems kyis gom pa'i gar stabs 'ga' bor te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
29b3(rgyud): 'das de la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes smra ba de dag ni seng ge rnam par rtse ba bskal par ram/ bskal pa brgya 'am/ bskal pa stong du 'am/ bskal pa 'bum du'ang ngan 'gro log par
29b4(rgyud): ltung bar 'gro bar 'gyur ba de'i gnas mod de/ 'di la dogs pa 'am/ yid gnyis sam/ the tsom za bar mi bya'o// seng ge rnam par rtse ba me tog brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
29b5(rgyud): yod kyis skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi'i skye bo phal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir de bshad
29b6(rgyud): bar bya'o// song ge rnam par rtse ba gang la la zhig me tog brtsegs pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ yid la byed dam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag/
29b7(rgyud): la'ang rgya cher yang dag par 'chad pa de rtag tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// ngangan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ ngal pa rnyed par 'gyur/ nam du'ang dkon mchog gsum dang mi
30a1(rgyud): 'bral bar 'gyur/ nam du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ nam du'ang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ nam du'ang
30a2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' dang mi 'bral 'gyur/ nam du'ang byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// nam du'ang dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur/ nam du'ang rigs dma' bar skye bar mi
30a3(rgyud): 'gyur/ spobs pa sna tshogs zab mo phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro// tad+ya/
30a4(rgyud): thA da d+ha ra Ni/ d+ha ra Ni/ mu ni pra b+hU sA raM/ sid+d+he / tsaN+Dare/ nA maHtsi ni he re/ a ro ga ba ti/ bu d+hA ma ti d+he r+ye/ oM kA ra te/ ga ga ra te rA dza bi ta/ bi yu la bud+d+hi/ d+har+m+ma a ba b+ha se
30a5(rgyud): ak+ShA ya kal+le ka kal+la ba ti/ a mr-i kal+le hUM tA shra ne/ te dzo ba ti/ ni d+ya saM hi te/ te dze gra ba/ tiSh+Thi ni dra ye bud d+hi swA hA/ seng ge rnam par rtse ba gang la la zhig gis me tog brtsegs pa'i gzung
30a6(rgyud): 'di'i ming dang / yi ge dang / tshig mtha' dag shes te kun chung bar byed pa des/ dpyid zla za chung dbye/ dbyar blar ba dang / son nu tha chung yar myong 'i tshis brgyad nas bzung la/ bco lnga'i
30a7(rgyud): bar dusangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya ste/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum pasam ning de bzhi ni gshegs pa la cigacig tu med la byas la// bcom ldan 'das la sus dag
30b1(rgyud): me tog dang / mang me dang / bdug spos kyis mchod na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i sring po'i seng ge'i khril bzhugs shing / chos kyung ston pa bco sa mthong bar 'gyur ro// gzungs
30b2(rgyud): rab tu thob par 'gyur/ dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ blo gros dang ldan par 'gyur/ rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ blo dang ldan par 'gyur/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du tshe rabs
30b3(rgyud): dran par 'gyur ro// thos pa thams cad dang bstan bcos thams cad dang / bzo thams cad dang / las thams cad rab tu shes par 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyang de'i sems la
30b4(rgyud): gnas par 'gyur te/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhini ma gtogs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na// chos de dag ni zag pa med par gtogs pa'i phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
30b5(rgyud): stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge rnam par rtse ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri
30b6(rgyud): bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa me tog brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
30b7(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bi ma la nAm hAr Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dang 'a thams cad la phyag
31a1(rgyud): 'tshal lo// 'di gang bdag gis thos pa dus gcin na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khaban bya rgod byung pob rol bzhugs te/ denas bcom ldan 'das kyis nga /
31a2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' blo gros rnam par dag pa la bka' stsal pa/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go// blo gros rnam par dag pa
31a3(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go// blo gros rnam par dag pa/ bzod pa yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go// blo gros rnam par dag
31a4(rgyud): pa phan pa'i dngos po yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa byams pa yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go// blo gros
31a5(rgyud): rnam par dag pa/ snying rje yongs su dag pa dang / dga' ba yongs su dag pa dang / btang snyoms yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go// blo gros rnam par dag pa/ rnam
31a6(rgyud): par grol ba yongs su dag pa/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ stobs yongs su dag pa dang /
31a7(rgyud): 'jigs pa yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go// blo gros rnam par dag pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su dag
31b1(rgyud): ngas banan pagags pa yongs su ga // thos rnam pa dgapa// denan ca sa shegs pa sangs dug pa phywa/ spyanAg sa nga / gzung dang / sa / dadag /
31b2(rgyud): rgyal mtshan la sogs pa dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / byug pa rnams kyis bsti stang byed pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i mtha' rtogs par mi nus te/ de'i mtha' ni theg pa gsum po las theg
31b3(rgyud): pa gang yang rung bas mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthur thug pa ma gtogs par/ bsod nams kyi phung po de phyi ma'i mthar yang zad par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo gros rnam par dag pa
31b4(rgyud): ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi tshad med pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yon phul ba'ang tshad med do// mtha' yas so// bsam gyis mi khyab bo/
31b5(rgyud): mtshungs pa med do// grangs med do// dpag gis mi lang ngo // brjod du med do// blo gros rnam par dag pa/ su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa la bsti sna
