31b6(rgyud): du byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / rjed pa dang / phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang
31b7(rgyud): bsrel yungs 'bru tsam la bsti stang byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / rjed pa dang / yang dag par sems mnyam par bzhag ste/ byang chub tu gnol
32a1(rgyud): pa'i sems bskyed pas phyag 'tshal ba dang / phyag byed pa dang / bsti stang byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / rjed par byed pa dang / mchod pa/
32a2(rgyud): dang / gsol ba dang / bsngags pa dang / skor ba byed pa des phan yon lngar shes par bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / ngo
32a3(rgyud): shes shing khrel yod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / myur du bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / mthong nas kyang dad pa skyed par 'gyur ba ste/ phan yon lnga po dag tu shes par bya'o// de nas
32a4(rgyud): gzhan yang chos gzhir shes par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i tshig so sor 'dzin pa dang / de dag kyang ji skad bstan pa de bzhin du sgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas
32a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar 'gyur ba dang / myur du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// blo gros rnam par dag
32a6(rgyud): pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis mi brdzi bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rigs che ba dang / btsas ma thag tu sangs rgyas
32a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnams yid la byed pa dang / phyi ma'i dus dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang / rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin/
32b1(rgyud): gyis brlabs par 'gyur ba ste/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ bdud dam bdud kyi rigs kyi lnga'i bu rnams kyis mi brdzi bar 'gyur ro// rba/
32b2(rgyud): gros rnam par dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa gang gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten mthong nas dad pa bskyed de/ pus mo gnyis ka'i ldangs la
32b3(rgyud): btsugs nas phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan pa de ci 'dra bar bdag kyang de 'dra ba'i lus thob par gyur cig ces de ltar
32b4(rgyud): mos pa bskyed na/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po de'i mtha' brjod par mi nus te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas pa'i phyir ro// bsod nams kyi
32b5(rgyud): phung po doni rgyal po nyid dam/ brgya byin nyid dam/ tshangs pa nyid dam/ nyan thos nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas nyid dam/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyis kyang zad
32b6(rgyud): par byar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo gros rnam par dag pa rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bzung ba yin te/ blo gros
32b7(rgyud): rnam par dag pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa grong du 'jug gam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/
33a1(rgyud): grong khyer du 'jug kyang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du rgyu'ang rung 'chag kyang rung 'greng yang rung / 'dug kyang rung / chos ston kyang rung
33a2(rgyud): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can lha 'am/ klu'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za 'am/ lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ mi 'am ci 'am/ lto 'phye
33a3(rgyud): chen po 'am/ mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa 'am/ shing ngam/ ri 'am/ khung bu 'am/ bya skyibs kyang rung ste/ thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der logs su 'dud pa dang / rab tu
33a4(rgyud): 'dud pa dang / kun tu 'dud par mi byed pa de gang yang med de/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan par byed pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de
33a5(rgyud): dag grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ yul 'khor ram/ pho brang 'khor na rgyu ba la sems can rnams 'dud/ rab tu 'dud/ kun tu 'dud par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
33a6(rgyud): 'das 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// a mi tA ma taM pra b+he/ ma hA pra b+he/ pra b+ha ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ pra
33a7(rgyud): b+ha ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ bcom ldan 'das mthus bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das mthus bstan du gsol/ tad+ya thA/ ma ti ma ti/ ma ti ma ti/ ma ti ma ti/ ma ti ma ti/ ma tim d+ha/
33b1(rgyud): / d+hu/ m+puk+Sha/ ts+tsha/ 5\u0f7fsatA/ chags pa dug drug
33b2(rgyud): du gsol/ so me/ so me/ so me/ so me/ so me/ so me/ so me/ so me/ so me/ so me/ so me/ so me/ sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/ sau mya na s+ya mu pa na ya/ sau man s+ya mu ba na sa/
33b3(rgyud): sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/ sau ma na swa mu pa na ya/ sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/ so ma na s+ya mu ba na ya/ sau ma na s+ya mu pan ya/ sau ma na s+ya mu pa na ya/ sau man s+ya mu pa na ya/ shaM khaM ga She/
33b4(rgyud): shi khri shi lag khaM/ shi khri shi khai/ shi khri shi khi/ zhi bar gyur cig/ nad med par 'gyur cig/ bgegs med par gyur cig/ pra b+ha ba ti/ ma hA ma t+ye/ rash+mi/ rats+yai/ rash+mi/ ra
33b5(rgyud): rash+mi/ rash+mi/ rany+dzi/ rany+dzi/ rash+mi/ rany+dzi/ rash+mi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di dag gi mtshan yang gzung bar bya zhing phyag bya'o// 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung
33b6(rgyud): gnas dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen nyi ma dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen bla ma dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen mkhregs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen me tog dang / bcom ldan
33b7(rgyud): 'das rin chen 'od 'phro dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen mthu dang / bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med dang / bcom ldan 'das dbyangs dpag med dang
34a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das su bdaka' dang / bcom ldan 'das grags pa mtha' yas dang / bcom ldan 'das na can 'od dang / bcom ldan 'das pa chen pa na dang /
34a2(rgyud): bam ldan 'das skar ma'i 'ad dang / bcom ldan 'das bden dbyangs dang / bcom ldan 'das nad kyi drim bral ba dang / bcom ldan 'das zla bdakar dang / bcom ldan 'das dri med/
34a3(rgyud): 'od dang / bcom ldan 'das nyi ma dkar dang / bcom ldan 'das nye ba'i 'od dang / bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen mtha' yas dang / bcom ldan
34a4(rgyud): 'das rin chen snying po dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung dang / bcom ldan 'das zla ba'i sgron ma dang / bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i sde dang / bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i sgra dang / bcom
34a5(rgyud): ldan 'das pad+ma'i mchog dang / bcom ldan 'das yan lag mchog dang / bcom ldan 'angs gser 'od dang / bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i'adis kyu rgyal po dang / bcom ldan
34a6(rgyud): 'das gser lta bur snang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das gser gyi 'byung gnas dang / bcom ldan 'das klu'i dbang phyug rgyal po dang / bcom ldan 'das me tog dang / bcom
34a7(rgyud): ldan 'das spos thams cad kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / bcom ldan 'das 'phreng ba'i rgyal po dang / bcom ldan 'das dpa' bstan pa'i sde dang bcom ldan 'das mtshonar spong /
34b1(rgyud): dang / bcom ldan 'das dpal gyi snying po nor bu rin chen snang dang / bcom ldan 'das dpag med rtogs 'od dang / bcom ldan 'das seng ge sgra dang / bcom ldan 'das seng ge dbang phyug/
34b2(rgyud): rgyal po dang / bcom ldan 'das mthu chen brtson 'grus nges 'byung dang / bcom ldan 'das snying pos zil gnon dang / bcom ldan 'das rnga sgra'i rgyal po dang / bcom ldan 'das zla ba/
34b3(rgyud): mchog dang / bcom ldan 'das pad+ma zil gnon dang / bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten sgron ma dang / bcom ldan 'das me dang / bcom ldan 'das skrag byed dang / bcom ldan
34b4(rgyud): 'das rin chen mu khyud dang / bcom ldan 'das rtag tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / bcom ldan 'das blo yangs dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen dpag med sbrul 'od dang / bcom
34b5(rgyud): ldan 'das ri rab ltar rnam par gnon pa dang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rin chen mchog dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'dus pa'i dpal dang / bcom ldan 'das phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo
34b6(rgyud): rin po che'i tshig gi dpal dang / bcom ldan 'das kun nas rnam par snang mdzad rnam par dag pa brnyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das nyi zla sgron ma dang / bcom ldan 'das lhun po
34b7(rgyud): dang / bcom ldan 'das lhun po chen po dang / bcom ldan 'das ri rab dang / bcom ldan 'das shin tu lhun po dang / bcom ldan 'das ri rab lta bu'o// tad+ya thA/ pa ta pa ta/
35a1(rgyud): dmad ma/ gram g+ha ma swAhA/ shar phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di dag la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag/
35a2(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gis kyang bdag 'khor dang bcas pa la nad med pa dang / zhi bar mngon du srung du gsol/ lho phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag
35a3(rgyud): btsugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang / zhi bar srung du gsol/ nub phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhug
35a4(rgyud): ba 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang / zhi bar srung du gsol/ byang phyogs lags na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa/
35a5(rgyud): de dag la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang / zhi bar srung du gsol/ 'og gi phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa
35a6(rgyud): de dag la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang / zhi bar srung du gsol/ steng gi phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren
35a7(rgyud): pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang / zhi bar srung du gsol/ phyogs mtshams logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa
35b1(rgyud): 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang / na bar srung du gsol/ \u0f7f/ bi ma le bi mA lA/ kA ba ma la saM rbA be swAhA/ bi ma la/ 8/
35b2(rgyud): le/ ma laM/ bi ma le/ bi ma le/ bi ma le/ bi ma le/ bi ma le/ bi ma le/ bi ma wA ka re/ bi ma wA ka/ bi ma wA ka re/ bim lU ka re/ bi ma wA kA re/ bi ma la
35b3(rgyud): kar / bi ma lA ka re/ bi ma lA ka ra/ bam lA sa mun te/ bi ma lAs mun te/ bim lAs bud+hAt+ta/ bim lngas mun te/ bim lA sa mung+ga te/ bi me lAs sur+hate/ bi ma la sa munaH/
35b4(rgyud): bi ma lAs mung+ga te/ ba~M ma lA sa mung+gate/ rigs sngags 'di ni rig sngags che/ lha rnams kyis ni brjod pa yin// 'di ni dus gsum brjod byas na// nad rnams las ni yongs su thar/
35b5(rgyud): mi ma yin gyis gang byas dang // sdig pa gang dag sbyor byas sgrol// de dag dran pa brjed mi 'gyur// gzung ba rnams kyang chud mi pa// de dag skye ba rnam su yang // rtag tu sangs rgyas
35b6(rgyud): 'bral mi 'gyur// su zhig dri ma med pa'i gzungs// 'di ni dga' bas 'dzin par byed// zhing rnams kun tu rgyu ba rnams// dpal ldan pad+ma'i snying por 'byung // mtshan rnams kyis ni
35b7(rgyud): legs par brgyan// yan lag 'od zer dra ba 'byung // tad+ya thA/ ku Ti ku Ti/ ku ta tsA lo/ e la e la/ muH/ kong thA lo/ e ri ri/ ra mr-i ti swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad/
36a1(rgyud): ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rnam par dag pa dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa
36a2(rgyud): 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
36a3(rgyud): gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsan dan aM ga nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du 'phags pa tsan dan gyi yan lag ces bya ba'i gzungs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
36a4(rgyud): 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dge slong khri nyis stong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge
36a5(rgyud): 'dun chen po dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang / gzhan yang lha khyad par can mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
36a6(rgyud): gdan pa shams pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul gyis lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'khor der byang chub sems dpa'
36a7(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / rnga 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i pha rol gyi'ang ches pha rol 'jig rten gyi
36b1(rgyud): khams bye ba zag khrig 'bum phrag gdu'i drung grangs med pa'i bye ma sbed 'das pa na/ can na gyi dang la zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ don deban gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
36b2(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan dan gyi yan lag ces bya ba ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// gang 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can de dag thams cad
36b3(rgyud): ni phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba sha stag ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan dan gyi yan lag des sems can thams
36b4(rgyud): cad kyi don gyi phyir tsan dan gyi yan lag ces bya ba'i gzungs kyi rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi gsungs pa 'di thos nas phyir mi ldog ste/ sdig pa dang bral bzhin byang chub kyi sems dang mi
36b5(rgyud): 'bral lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang / gzhan yang
36b6(rgyud): 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang sngon chad gsungs te/ ngas kyang da khyed rnams la bshad kyis/ sems cad thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir legs par rab tu
36b7(rgyud): ying la zung zhig dang / phyi mamatsho phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i tshe thams cad chos dang mi ldan pa/ mtshams med pa byed pa/ dam pa'i chos la spong pa/
37a1(rgyud): / mchod rten 'dral ba/ dge 'dun gyi rdzas la chu 'phrog byed pa/ dge sbyong ma yin par dge sbyong du khas 'che ba slob dpon dang mkhan po spong ba dag 'byung ste
37a2(rgyud): de dag rjes su gzung ba'i phyir tsan dan gyi yan lag gi gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa 'di bshad kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngal
37a3(rgyud): nyon cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bskul ba
37a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / gzhan yang sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag rnams la thugs brtse ba dang / sdig pa byang bar bgyi ba'i slad du
37a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bshad du gsol bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa bshad du gsol/ bdag cag gis kyang gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi
37a6(rgyud): gzhi de dag gzung bar bgyi ste sems can thams cad kyi don du rgya cher yang dag par bshad par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
37a7(rgyud): tad+ya thA/ tsin te/ mardo rje ke/ du da me/ dur dAn te/ dur rA rud/ pra badz+ri/ tsan dad gzo/ sa man+ta pa dz+nyAn bi shud+d+he nI la/ rat+na ba ti/ an t+ya pra ti thA re/ @
37b1(rgyud): aHSh+TaNe/ b+hag ba ti/ pA pa k+Sha ye/ Ag+na m+be par d+ha ra la swA hA/ rigs kyi bu pa'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gzungs can po'i gas sngags 'ad dag 'dzin tapa/ \u0f7f/
37b2(rgyud): gam ston tam/ kun chub par byed na/ de'i tshe 'di nyid la mig rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// thos ma thag tu sdig pa'i las las rab tu grol bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' thams
37b3(rgyud): cad kyi byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ zla ba phyed kyi bar du bzlas pa byas na/ 'phags pa sbyar ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
37b4(rgyud): zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa mthong bar 'gyur/ mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa byas pa'ang 'byang bar 'gyur/ skyo ba dran par 'gyur/ tshe brjes nas kyang lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur/ khyim
37b5(rgyud): bdag chen po skyid pa dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur/ skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// 'di ltar sa chen po ma lus pa 'di ni grub par 'gyur yang srid/ rgya mar ni bskam yang srid
37b6(rgyud): bzhin du ra'i rgyal po ri rab ni 'jog par 'gyur yang srod/ rlung mi nags pas bcing du rung yang srid/ zla ba dang nyi ma ri sa'i steng du lhung yang spyod/ nam mkha' ni lag pa gnyis kyis mnan/
37b7(rgyud): du rung yang srid men rur 'gyur yang srid / 'byung ba chen po banon gzhan du 'gyur yang srid/ sems can thams cad kyi sems ni gcig tu 'gyur yang srid kyi/ de bzhin gshegs
38a1(rgyud): pas gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs pa ni gzhan du 'gyur mi srid do// sus kyang bskyod pa'am bskul bar mi nus so// 'di la ni bdud sdig can gyis grags
38a2(rgyud): rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
38a3(rgyud): 'das bdag gis kyang gzungs 'di'i cho ga bshad par bgyi'o// chos kyi rgyal po'i mchod rten ring bsrel dang bcas pa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil
38a4(rgyud): 'khor bgyis te/ me tog sil ma gtor la tsan dan gyi bdug pas bdugs te/ zla ba tshes nas brtsams nas tshes bco lnga'i bar du dus gsum du khrus bgyi zhing / gos kyang lan gsum du/
38a5(rgyud): brjes te/ kha zas bsreg bya 'tshal zhing gso sbyong dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang / zla ba nya'i nyin par zhag gcig sbyang bar bgyis te/ rtswa bam gyi steng
38a6(rgyud): mchis shing / zla bar btong ba'i snying du thal la sems rtse gcig tu bzlas pa bgyi zhing / me tog drinam po lan brgya sdong du gtor nus g.yo bar 'gyur// bdag cid kyang bcom ldan 'das
38a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa 'ad pag med dang / sun ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur/ gzungs can bzas ma thag tu tshe 'dod pa thob par 'gyur/ zas pa na par ya 'gyur/ las kyi
38b1(rgyud): dam ga pa byang gyu ga/ ma na sa na kyis snrums// rdzu nga / rgyu sa nga / ma na
38b2(rgyud): A dang / ma dang / lha ma yin dang / dri bar bcas pa'i 'jig rten la rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bsod do// 'phags pa nang na gyi yan lag ces bya
38b3(rgyud): gzungs rdzogs so// @rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA pra ti t+ya sa mu dred par hr-ing ma d+ha raNI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba
38b4(rgyud): snying po'i cho ga'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// chos gang rgyus byung de dag ni// rgyu la 'gog pa gang yin pa// de bzhin gshegs pas
38b5(rgyud): bka' stsal to// de skad gsung ba dge sbyong che// tshig 'di sgrub pa'i cho ga ni// sems can rnams la phan byed pa// las kun grub par byed pa'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs pas rab
38b6(rgyud): tu gsung // rigs kyi bu dag gang gi phyir// dang por sangs rgyas bcom ldan la// gus shing dang ba'i sems bskyed nas// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rten 'brel zab
38b7(rgyud): mocho ga bshad// thams cad las dang mthun par gsungs// dang po 'jug pa'i tshig gsungs pa// 'di ltar las dang nyon mongs yod gyur na// sems can rnams ni 'khor bar 'gro
39a1(rgyud): 'gyur la// las dang nyon mongs med na 'khor ba las kyang ldog/ bden pa 'di yis bdag gi bsam pa grub gyur cig/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo//
39a2(rgyud): chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bzhugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// rang sangs rgyas rnams la phya
39a3(rgyud): 'tshal lo// dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo//
39a4(rgyud): brtul zhugs grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can rnams kyi sman pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// nor bu grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM ye d+harmA he
39a5(rgyud): rba pra b+ha bA he dud+hi ShAn+ta thA ga te h+ya ba dat+ta/ teSh+Thany+dza yo na ro d+ha e ba~M ba dI ma hA tha ma NaHswAdz+dza/ las rnams kun gyi cho ga la// tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag brjod// bas ma rgyu rang gi lag mthom/
39a6(rgyud): la// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku// skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyis brgyad// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus spras// me yi khams la zhugs pa bsgom// de ni lha dag rjes su dran// de ni
39a7(rgyud): sbyor ba'i las bshad de// rim pa bzhin du so sor bsdad// rims kyis btab nas na ba dang // klang pa na dang mig nad dang // khong nang la sogs nad rnams la// tshogs bcad 'di dang sring po 'di/
39b1(rgyud): mang por bzlas shing langs ras ni// lag pa g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis// dbyung ba'i thabs su khyab par bya// rang rnams thams cad sod par 'gyur// nyin gcig nyin gnyis nyin gsum dang/
39b2(rgyud): nyin pa ni rtag pa'i rims rnams la/ bu mo gzhon nus bkal ba yi// srung pa dkar po sum bsgril la/ bzlas brjod nyi shu brgyad bzlas nas// mgul du btags na bde bar 'tshe/
39b3(rgyud): nad la phan pa'i sman rnams la// gzungs sngags 'di dag bzlas shing btang // snying nad rtsib logs na pa dang // khong na nang rnams ci yod la// tshul sngags 'di mang bzlas nas/
39b4(rgyud): brung na pa ma ning bde bar 'gyur// nad la phan pa'i spyan rnams la// bzlas shing btang na 'tshe bar 'gyur// g.yan pa dang ni 'brum bu dang // bol mig dang ni rma rengs la// grog
39b5(rgyud): tshangs la snying po 'di// mang du bzlas te btab na 'tshe// gzhang 'brum gnang nad za gu dang // po mtshan spangs shing na ba la// skyer ba'i kha d+hA'i ril bu 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i/
39b6(rgyud): ril bul// nyi shu bzlas shing bskus na pan// nad kyi rnam pa gdan yang // nang tshabs che chung tshong brtags nas// tshigs su bcad pa'i bzlas brjod la// ma cang nad dang sbyar
39b7(rgyud): nas su// lus la bya bcing bzlas na pan// 'khru gnad kyis btab pa la// sman nam ral bu la gas la// bdun nam nyi shu bzlas ras kyang // 'ang du btab na phan par 'gyur/
40a1(rgyud): de yi bzlas brjod snga ma ste// 'di dag rab tu bzlas par bya// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya ba da ta/ teSh+Tany+dza yo ni ro d+ha e baM
40a2(rgyud): bA dI ma hA shra ma NaHswA hA/ de dag bzlas na nad rnams 'tsho// de ni nang rnams 'tsho ba'o// de nas yang ni bka' stsal pa// nas dang gro dang sran ma dang / 'bras dang sran chung mon sran dang /
40a3(rgyud): shing thog rgun 'brum a ru ra// de dag kun la za ba yi// srid bu sbur bu phye ma leb/ bye'u dang byi ba ne tse dang // lo tog za ba kha bcing na// zhing gi khyon dang sbyar nas kyang // bye ma
40a4(rgyud): sa dang thal ba la// bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas// zhing dang shing thog gtor byas no// de dag kun kyang kha bcings 'gyur// ha cang char pa ches pa na/ bcom ldan 'das la
40a5(rgyud): phul ba yi// me tog dpar ma re re la/ bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig bya// gtsang zhing bde ba'i gnas dag tu// dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus rag tu// bum pa gang ba'i steng
40a6(rgyud): dgaN+Da// kham po gtsangam nang du yang // me tog gtsang sa bzlas par// bsregs na pa 'ad par 'gyur// ser ba drug pa 'ong ban// sa ba cid phrag rgyug ma la// badz+ras
40a7(rgyud): badzad can rtsa rgyang 'jus// sa ba gang nas gsangs su// tha la bgod nang byabs na nga// sang thal chen yungs ga la// bzlas brjod rgyan gyi brgyad gyi/ khrum pa byas
40b1(rgyud): sdug ma la// btags te btsugs na ser ba 'chang// 'byung po sha pa yi dgas dang // brjod byed gdon gyis zin pa la// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang grub pa ni la// bum pa gtsang ma lngaldan/
40b2(rgyud): spre dgu gul dud pas bdugs nas kyang // yungs kar ga pur tsan dan dang / glu rtsil sogs sman sbyar te// bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas// gos dang zas ni dkar po sbyar
40b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor de yi nang du gzug bum pa'i chu yis bkru bar bya// sangs rgyas sku bsil byas pa'i chus// bkru zhing klung na rab tu phan// nang dang gnod pa kun las thar// 'byung po brjed byed
40b4(rgyud): sha za yis// glags kyang rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// bus pa gdon gyis 'jigs pa la// gi'u wang la ni sngags bzlas nas// snying po stobs chen 'di zas gdags// i badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA
40b5(rgyud): ba la/ ha na da ha pa tsa bi d+h+wan sa ya dza Ti/ laM po dar/ uts+tshaSh+pa kro d+ha hUM phaT swA hA/ gtsang sbra byas te mgul par gdags// de bzhin yungs kar dag la yang // bzlas brjod byas te gtums/
40b6(rgyud): la gdags// mkha' 'gro'i gdon gyis zin pa na// yungs kur dang ni gu gul la// sngags gnyis lan ni bdun bdun bzlas// dud pas bdugs na 'tshe bar 'gyur// de la the tsom
40b7(rgyud): ba'o// bus pa gdon dang nad las thar// mung med bu ni thogs gyur ni// chul 'bres brjod lnga bdun byas// thung na legs par bca' bar 'gyur// bud mid mog sham du med la/
41a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas sku bsil byas pa'i chu// de la bzlas brjod nyi shu bya// khrus byas lus ni gtsang ma la// chu de zung na bu tsha'aphan// rigs brgyud dag ni
41a2(rgyud): 'phel bar 'gyur// lam du zhugs te 'gro ba na// srud pa dang ni gos kyi grwar// bzlas brjod bdun bzlas mdud pa bdun// mdud cing bzlas te song ban// bde bar 'gro zhing don yang /
41a3(rgyud): 'grub// dgra dang rtse zho med par 'gyur// yid ni gzhungs par 'dod pa na// shu dag tshon gang tsam pa la// mar srang sum brgya drug cu la// bzlas brjod byas te bsres nas kyang /
41a4(rgyud): bum pa gcig tu blugs la dkrug/ nyi ma re re lo gcig tu// shu dag gi ni dum re dang / mar srang dag ni re re la// bzlas brjod re re bya zhing bza'// de ni yid gzhungs blo ldan
41a5(rgyud): 'gyur// de bzhin pa ni ser skye ma'i// mar dang 'o ma dag la yang // bzlas brjod brgyan rtsa brgyad du// bzlas te'o thug dkrug cing bzal yad gzungs pa yi mchog tu 'gyur/
41a6(rgyud): mi dang 'grogs shi mdza' 'dod// gang dag yid dang 'thad pa la// me tog dang ni rtsa shing ngam// 'bras bu'am ni 'dzi bdag/ leg pa gsas pa'i chang par bcug/ bzlas bad
41a7(rgyud): btsun rtsa gcig gdag/ gang gi lag tu byi // nga dang rtag tu mnga' bar 'gyur/ rgal sogs pa'i byugra rnams sun/ 'chi ba par gnas pa na// chu dang rungs pa
41b1(rgyud): brnas pa/ bas d+hA DU \u0f7f/ de la gtan smos ts+tsha/ sangan su nga // 'azlas par rgyu sa smra gas/
41b2(rgyud): bang bar 'gyur// me rnams 'tshangs 'jigs gyur na// sungs kar lan bkris brjod bya// rnam pa byas dmag la gdags// bzlas rjo bcwam 'du ma yang bzlas// mi de
41b3(rgyud): ni phyug nad kun// ming yang med cing bde bar 'gyur// de dag kun gyi bzlas brjod ni// 'di dag kun tu rgya cher gsungs// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM yai d+harma he tu pra thA bA nA tran
41b4(rgyud): thA ga to h+ya ba dA ta/ teSh+Tha n+ya yo ni ro d+ha e baM bA dI ma hA shra maN+DaHswAhA/ rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na ni// bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// gnod pas ces kyang tshugs mi 'gyur/
41b5(rgyud): dam chos yongs su gzung bar 'gyur// tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ni// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab// cho ga 'di dag thams cad ni// gang la dad pas yid ches na//
41b6(rgyud): 'grub par the tshom med par 'gyur// bzlas brjod 'bum ni byas gyur na// dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// ston pa shAkya'i thugs rje 'di// dge slong nor bar
41b7(rgyud): rak+Shi tas// tho gar yul nas rnyed pa ste// 'gro ba kun gyi dpal du shar// 'phags pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po'i cho ga'i gzungs rdzogs so//
42a1(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pra tI t+ya sa mut+pA dA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra bod skad du/ 'phags pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
42a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i gnas na// ar mo ni
42a3(rgyud): ka lta bu'i rdo leb la tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rnams dang 'phags pa byams pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / phyag na rdo rje la
42a4(rgyud): sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin po che dpag tu med pas brgyan pa rnams dang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po dang / sred med kyi bu dang / dbang /
42a5(rgyud): byug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang dri za'i rgyal po zur pud lnga pa la sogs pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa
42a6(rgyud): sems da 'du rnyan sa ga nga drug sanalas sa thugs byug pag nas/ smras pa gsas pa stsu da kyi mas rgyas / ma
42a7(rgyud): 'angs gas pa la gis sums basbyang ba ma 'das ma na 'dasas 'digad ces gsum na/ bam ldan 'das su 'a sa mchod ra tsad pa 'tsham pags
42b1(rgyud): sgra 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dang mchis na canas tshangs pa'i bsod nams 'phel ba dang / lnga dang bcas pa bdung dang bcas pa tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /
42b2(rgyud): dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu las dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge snyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag bsod nams shin tu mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ba de ste de skar bcom
42b3(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis de dag la chos bston du gsol zhes zhus pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i tshigs su bcas pa bka' stsal pa/ oM ye d+harmA he tu pra
42b4(rgyud): b+ha bA he tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya ba da ta/ te ShA n+ya yo ni ro d+ha e baM bA dI ma hA shra ma Na/ chos gang rgyus byung de dag gi/ rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa// de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal
42b5(rgyud): te// dge sbyong chen pos de skad gsungs// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di lta ste/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'don de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi sku yin te/ sus
42b6(rgyud): rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mthong ba des de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo // spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu ma dad pa can gang la la zhog gis mi gnas
42b7(rgyud): pa'i sa phyogs su mtshad ter ni skyu ru ra'i 'bru tsam srog shing ni khabatsam gdugs ni bgu la'o me tog tsam zhing byas la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba chos kyi dbyings kyi
43a1(rgyud): tshigs su bcad pa nang du bcug na/ des tshangs pa'i bsod nams skyed par 'gyur te/ 'di nas gi 'phos shing 'chi ba'i dus byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten/
43a2(rgyud): du skye bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ nyan thos de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag da/
43a3(rgyud): lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa rten cing 'brel par//
43a4(rgyud): 'byung ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dz+nyA noskA nA ma d+hA ra Ni sarba ga ti pa ri sho d+ha ni/ bod skad du
43a5(rgyud): 'phags pa ye shes ta la la zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su sbyong ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
43a6(rgyud): cad la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ta la la la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi 'od brtsegs sdang ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
43a7(rgyud): gshegs pa bden pa gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub
43b1(rgyud): sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gdungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' ban po de dag
43b2(rgyud): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag zla ba dang nyi ma'i gnas na bzhugs so// de nas lha'i bu phra ba dang nyi ma gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ga la bzhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'ade
43b3(rgyud): dag ga la ba der song nas ka de nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rin po che bkod pa'i seng ge'i khril bzhugs pa rnams dang / khang pa brtsegs pa 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan brtsegs pa ded/
43b4(rgyud): gi nang na byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'khod pa'ang mthong ngo // de nas lha'i bu zla ba dang nyi ma gnyis gcig la gcig sems te/ ji ltar byas na bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
43b5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' 'di rnams las sems can thams cad la snang ba sbyin pa dang / mun pa mun gdag bsal ba'i phyir/ shar ba'i gzungs sngags phyogs bcur khyab pa'i blo can zhes bya/
43b6(rgyud): ba gang gi mthus/ bdag cag sems can thams la snang ba byed pa thob par 'gyur zhig gu snyam mo// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis/ lha'i bu
43b7(rgyud): zla ba dang nyi ma de dag gi sems kyis yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa de dag gis gzungs sngags 'di bka' stsal pa//
44a1(rgyud): s+yAd ya the dan/ tsak+Shu shur dngad / tsak+Shu kA b+hA/ rdul beSh+Ta/ ka lang thA/ id ting nas/ sU rad tragasu rang tra/ sud thA ya/ yid thanas/ belA be lA ba t+se/ tsaru/
44a2(rgyud): mUrti ni/ A ra ni/ A ra Ni/ kA la pa Ni/ kA la pa Ni/ tur+ra du si tu ru du si/ d+h+we su ti/ d+hA su ti/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru kA la kA la/ sa thA se/ gI la gI la/ gI la pa ya/ gI la pa/
44a3(rgyud): ya d+hu su d+hu su sun d+hu sune d+hu/ sid thA su/ yad thA su e thA su/ i thA sA pa ni/ yu dzu re d+he/ su d+ha re/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ kurba kuma?/ kurma pA Ni
44a4(rgyud): kurma pA NaM/ ke lu ke lu/ ke lA ba ni/ ke lA ba ni/ ka tA ri/ ka tA ri/ lA ru bud d+he d+hu ru d+he d+hu ru d+he/ ma hA d+hu ru d+he/ ka ra kar/ ki ri ki ri/ pi du si/ pai hu
44a5(rgyud): sid+hi su d+ha su/ ha su ha su/ ha sA pa ni swA hA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos lha'i bu zla ba dang nyi ma rnams lnga 'di skad ces smras so// kye rigs kyi bu dag
44a6(rgyud): gzungs sngags dzi sems cand du sang du 'gre bad+ha masal pon gdags pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bye ba zug pargyad cu tso bzhis gsungs pa yin te// rigs kyi bu dag/ u ma par mi ga
44a7(rgyud): rnyed par su'o/ gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ni 'jig rten du 'byung ba de la ma yin no// rigs kyi bu dag gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag na ches rnyed par su'o// 'di dag ni 'chang pa'am
44b1(rgyud): klog pa ni de lha ma yin no// rigs kyi bu dag sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni ches rnyed par sa'i// gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag 'jug rten du 'byung ba dang snya ma yin no// rigs kyi bu dag gal
44b2(rgyud): sems can mnar med pa na 'khod pa bskal par gnas pa/ mtshams med pa lnga byed pa/ dam pa'i chos spong bar byed pa'i sems can de dag gi phyir/ gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag zhag
44b3(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum brjod na/ de'i tshe gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gi mthus sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa kha brgyar 'gyes par
44b4(rgyud): 'gyur la/ sems can de dag kyang yongs su thar par 'gyur na/ 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams lta ci smos te/ gang dag gi rna lam du grags par gyur pa de dag gis ni/ bdag cag ni de
44b5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa bzhi po rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' bzhi po rnams dang / zla ba dang nyi ma rnams kyis yongs su zin pa yin no snyam du yongs su shes pa kho nar bya ste/ 'di la
44b6(rgyud): som nyi 'am yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// tad+ya thA/ d+hun tri/ rdzun Ti/ ma hA d+hu nA ni/ su ru su ru swAhA/ shru k+Sha bai sho d+ha ni/ tar t+na ra s+yAt+ma/ dz+yo ti shrI dI pi/ d+hu ru d+ha ru swAh+ma
44b7(rgyud): pad+ma mA li ni/ sad t+ya ta ra bud+d+hi/ hu ru rba ru swAhA/ sad tu bud+d+he/ sad t+ya a ba l-i kan/ kar kar/ ki ra ko re sAt+ma/ d+ha ra na mu Ti/ e pra ti tsa ta/ shud+hi / tsu ru tsu ru swAtra
45a1(rgyud): lak+ShAHte ka rba ma pa ri/ ha ra/ hu ru hu ru/ lu ru khu ru sUt+sA/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mAng+ga ra/ d+ha rad+ha ra/ d+ha ra yan+ti ye swAhA/ s+'up+sA t+ti/ sum he/ a pra tita
45a2(rgyud): bud+d+hi d+ha ra d+ha rad+ha ra ya nI ye swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ta la la la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi 'od brtsegs snang ba la phyag 'tshal/
45a3(rgyud): lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bden gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// swA hA/ 'phags pa ye shes ta la la zhes bya ba'i/
45a4(rgyud): gzungs 'gro ba thams cad yongs su sbyong ba rdzogs so// @rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya mA hI ma hen+na nA nA ma d+ha ra Ni bod skad du/ 'phags pa sa'i
45a5(rgyud): dbang po chen po zhes bya ba'i gzungs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par
45a6(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu 'od bram ze sa'i dbang po chen po shing sA la chen po lta bu'i gnas lha dang ldan pa na bzhugs te/ de nas bram ze sa'i dbang po chen po shing sA la chen po lta
45a7(rgyud): bus bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu 'od ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu 'od kyi zhabs la
45b1(rgyud): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bram zes 'i dbang po chen po shing sA la chen po lta bu'i/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
45b2(rgyud): rgyas kun tu 'od la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab lags na/ gang gis bdag skye ba drad par 'gyur/
45b3(rgyud): bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems brjed par mi 'gyur ba'i thabs de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la legs par bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol
45b4(rgyud): pa dang bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu 'od kyis/ bram ze sa'i dbang po chen po shing sA la chen po lta bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
45b5(rgyud): phyir bu khyod gal te de ltar smon na de'i phyir kun tu 'od kyi rig sngags kyi snying po 'di zung zhig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ kun tu 'od kyi
45b6(rgyud): rig sngags kyi snying po gang zhen/ tad+ya thA/ a mo da ni/ pra mo da ni/ bi mo da ni/ saM mo da ni/ pri yaM ka ra Ni/ shA ka ra Ni/ shA ka ra NI/ bo d+hI ka ra ti/ a rud+ha ra/ s+yanas d+ya/
45b7(rgyud): saM bu d+ha ka ra Ni a nud+ha ra Ar+ya ka ra Ni/ a nut+ta ra pra dzA ka ra Ni/ a rut+ta ra ba shI ka ra Ni/ a nut+ta ra ba shI ka ra Ni/ a nut+ta ra sar+b+ba kle sho pa kre sha bi d+ha ra Ni/ a ba d+hA na d+ha ka ra bi d+ham/
46a1(rgyud): ni/ a nut+ta ra bid+d+ha a lo kong pA dIn a rud+ha ra shaM kA shI la bid+d+ha tsa raN/ bi muk+ta gu Na ga Na/ saM b+ha d+ha ni/ a nut+ta ra sar+b+ba ku sha la mu lod pyod na
46a2(rgyud): nut+tA ra la b+ho na mU la ni a nut+ta ra rA ga do Sha mo ho na mU la ni a nut+ta ra she kA me Na a bid+d+he an+ta ka rA bi d+ha ma Ni/ a nut+ta rA sI a pra ti ha ta ba la tsakra a nut+tA rA sar+b+ba lA ra bi drA ma n+ta
46a3(rgyud): tr-i hi bA dre a nut+ta rA ba la b+ha dra su b+ha dra shrI b+ha drA a nut+ta ra b+he dra sa man+ta b+ha dra a sa ma se ma b+ha dra a nut+ta ra ma hA pu ru Sha b+ha dra a nut+ta ra ma hA pu ru Sha se bi tA/ a nut+ta ra ma hA pu ru Sha
46a4(rgyud): nu brta nI/ a nut+ta ra ma hA pu ru Sha d+harma de shi kA/ a nut+ta ra ma hA pu ru Sha/ d+harma ko Sha/ saM b+har+t+ti kA/ a nut+tA ra ma hA pu ru Sha nirbA Na/ a nud pra ta ra shi gA/ te hi b+ha d+haM gai ga si ta pak+Shu
46a5(rgyud): samyaka saM bud+d+he/ a se be tA/ b+hA bi tA b+hA ba hu lI kro d+ha sU ta stau me ta bir+Na tA pra shas+t+ra/ bu 'di ni kun tu 'od kyi rig sngags kyi snying po yin te/ de bas na bu khyod kyis kun tu 'od kyi rig
46a6(rgyud): sngags kyi snying po 'di 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba na'ang yid la gyis shig/ bu gang la la zhig kun tu 'od kyi rig sngags kyi snying po 'di ming dang / rigs dang /
46a7(rgyud): rigs kyi bye brag yid la byed dam skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'am/ lha 'amalha mo 'am/ klu'am/ klu mo'am/ dri za'am/ dri za mo 'am/ lham
46b1(rgyud): yin nam lha ma yin po'am/ mi 'am ci 'am/ mi'am ci mo 'am/ lto phye chen po 'am/ lto 'phye chen mo 'am/ yi dgas sam/ yi dgas mo 'am/ sha ba 'am/ ga za mo 'am khrul/
46b2(rgyud): bum mam/ grul bum mo 'am/ lus srul po 'am/ lus srul mo 'am/ kun tu 'od kyi rig sngags kyi snying po 'di 'chang ngam klog gam/ lung 'bog gam/ ston tamaka'atsha
46b3(rgyud): na de tshe rabs bdun gyi bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// de ji srid 'khor gyi bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems mi brjed par 'gyur ro// lhar gyur kyang rung / mi
46b4(rgyud): gyur kyang rung ste/ de mtshon cha 'am/ dug gam/ chu 'am/ mes par ma dor 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu rgyal
46b5(rgyud): bi 'od srungs kyi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od mtha' yas rgyal ba'i 'od srungs kyi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal
46b6(rgyud): lo// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'chi med 'od rgyal ba 'od srungs kyi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
46b7(rgyud): rgyas 'od chen po rgyal ba 'od srungs kyi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od chen rgyal ba 'od srungs kyi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag
47a1(rgyud): 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od mnyam pa med pa rgyal ba 'od srungs kyi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan
47a2(rgyud): 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa rgyal ba 'od srungs kyi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang rgya drang srong chen po 'od srungs
47a3(rgyud): kyi rigs dang bcas pa bdun po de dag la phyag 'tshal lo// zhi ba'i dbyings su zhugs pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis
47a4(rgyud): de skad ces bka' stsal nas bram ze sa'i dbang po chen po shing sA la chen po lta bu yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa sa'i
47a5(rgyud): dbang po chen po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// bod skad du/ 'phags pa gdon mi za ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs so// 'di skad bdag
47a6(rgyud): gis thos pa dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das be sha la'i spre'u rdzing gi 'gram gyi khang bu brtsegs pa na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang pos bcom ldan 'das la
47a7(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag lha ma yin rnams kyis rgol zhing gtses te/ bdag dang lha ma yin dus yun ring por mi mdza' zhing dgrar gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das
47b1(rgyud): kyis bdag la ci nas kyang yun ring por phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba'i phyir de lta bu'i chos bdag la bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ brgya byin lhar
47b2(rgyud): dbang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de'i phyir ko'u shi ka khyod kyis nga'i snying po gdon mi za ba zhes bya ba'i rig sngags 'di long zhig/ tad+ya thA/ urba pa/ ni dzi siH/ urbu rdur
47b3(rgyud): leh+na me thA di khru me / pra tu ga ma A ga tA ma hA ma yu ri nA ma bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang // 'tsho ba thams cad dang / 'khor thams cad dang bcas pa la srungs shig/ sarba kA ya bAg/
47b4(rgyud): ma ni sh+tsa ri ti swA hA/ bcom ldan dgyes shing de skad bka' stsal pa dang / brgya byin lha'i dbang po yid dga' ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la rjes su yi rangs nas/ bcom ldan
47b5(rgyud): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// rdzogs so// @yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas can thos kyi dge
47b6(rgyud): 'dun dang bcas pa bdun la phyag 'tshal lo// dgra dang 'jigs pa kun las brgal// rnam par gzigs ni gzi brjid che// rdzu 'phrul ngo bo gtsug tor ro// thams cad skyob pa'i shes rab dang // log
47b7(rgyud): dang sel ba'i stobs nyid dang // gser thub kyi ni bslab pa dang // 'od srungs kyi ni yon tan dang // shAkya thub pa'i brtson 'grus kyis// bdag ni rtag tu bde bar shog/ tad+ya thA/ dza yan+ti/ bi dzi yan+ti dza ye biH/
48a1(rgyud): ye/ dzi ti dzi ti/ a pa rA dzi te/ pa ra sair+ya pra marda nI ye swA hA/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rig pa chen mo rdzogs so// / @\u0f7f/ rgya gar skad
48a2(rgyud): du/ Ar+ya anan+ta mu kha ni hA ra nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
48a3(rgyud): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul yangs pa can tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang bzang na/ dge slong brgyad stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun po dang /
48a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe zla ba gsum po 'di dag 'das nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las bzla/
48a5(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis dran pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen bzhin du tshe'i 'du byed rnams btang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po
48a6(rgyud): la bka' stsal te/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po khyod song la stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams na dge slong ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang bzangs
48a7(rgyud): 'dir sdus shig/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ skad cig de nyid la rang gi rdzu 'phrul
48b1(rgyud): gyi stobs kyis ri rab kyi rtse mo la 'dug ste/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams skad kyis go bar byas pa/ bde gshegs slob ma sems can gang su dag/ 'jig rten khams 'dir gnas bkun
48b2(rgyud): nyon cig/ deng 'dir ston pa chos kyi char 'bebs kyis// gang dag nyan par 'dod pa 'dir gshegs shig/ de'i tshe tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang bzangs su dge slong ba ni khri 'dus par
48b3(rgyud): gyur te/ de dag lpags nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig
48b4(rgyud): tu 'khod do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi mthus skad cig de nyid la 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba gang mngon par 'du byas pas/
48b5(rgyud): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na nyan thos kyi theg pa kun nam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can nam/ theg pa chen po'ang rung ste/ dge slong ji snyed gnas pa
48b6(rgyud): de dag thams cad tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang bzangs su 'du bar 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du bya gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas tshe dang ldan
48b7(rgyud): pa shA ri'i bus rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de lta bu mngon par 'du byas te/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de mngon par 'dus byas pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
49a1(rgyud): / khams na nyan thos kyi theg pa can nam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can nam/ theg pa chen po can yang rung ste/ dge slong ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad tshal
49a2(rgyud): chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang bzangs su 'dus par 'gyur te/ de dag lhags nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te
49a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skad cig de nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/
49a4(rgyud): bka' stsal pa 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthong ba don yod ces bya ba dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
49a5(rgyud): po ngan song thams cad spong ba dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan thams cad kyi mun pa nges par 'joms pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams
49a6(rgyud): cad rnam par sel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yul thams cad kyi mur pa nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros
49a7(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
49b1(rgyud): chen po yid yongs su mi skyo ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spos kyi glang po che dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpa' bo dang / byang chub sems dpa'
49b2(rgyud): sems dpa' ched po nam mkha' mdzod dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od dpag med dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa'
49b3(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po ye shes tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang stong dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho dang / byang chub sems
49b4(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub
49b5(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa brtsegs pa
49b6(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed deng la/ phyogs bcu thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi ning gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
49b7(rgyud): dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tham pa dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa 'am/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa 'am/ dad pas mos pa
50a1(rgyud): snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang bzangs 'dir sdus shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis
50a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te/ bcom ldan 'das leg so legs so zhes gsol nas skad cig de nyid la ltas de lta bu byas te/ ltas de byas pas tshul chen po'i khang pa brtsegs
50a3(rgyud): pa'i khang bzangs su byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa'i brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum dag lhags par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'
50a4(rgyud): skye ba gcig gis thogs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgya stong phrag dgu bcu dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu dang / byang chub sems dpa
50a5(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgya stong phrag sum cu dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dad pas mos pa bya ba khrag khrig
50a6(rgyud): 'bum phrag brgya stong phrag brgyad lpags par gyur to// de dag thams cad lhags te bcom ldan 'das mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom
50a7(rgyud): ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa chen po de mthong nas/ skad cig de nyid la
50b1(rgyud): 'di snyam du sems te/ zhus pa lung bstan pa jis bus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag gis som thams cad spong bar 'gyur ba dang / sgrib pa med pan
50b2(rgyud): ye shes dang spobs pa myur du thob par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad
50b3(rgyud): la chos bstan pa thos par 'gyur ba dang / thos nas kyang 'dzin par 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du brjed par mi
50b4(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang yin pa bzhi po de dag rjes su thob par 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
50b5(rgyud): sems can yongs su dag pa dang / chos yongs su dag pa dang / smon lam yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa ste/ de dag rjes su thob par 'gyur ba dang /
50b6(rgyud): gya nom pa ming du 'ong bar byed pa'i chos pa ni rjes su 'thob par 'gyur te/ bani gang zhe na/ 'di sa ste/ lus yid du 'ong ba dang / ngag yid du 'ong ba dang / sems yid du 'ong ba dang
50b7(rgyud): skye ba meng du 'ong ba rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / gzungs kyi sgor 'jug pa bzhi 'thob par 'gyur / bzhi gang zhen/ 'dis ste/ sgo ma bzad pas bsgrubs pa'i gsungs kyi sgor/
51a1(rgyud): 'jug pa dang / sems can rnams kyi dbang po la mkhas pa'i gzungs kyi sgor 'jug pa dang / las dang rnam par smin pa la mkhas pa 'dus ma byas kyi gzu
51a2(rgyud): kyi sgor 'jug pa dang / chos zab mo la bzod pa'i gsungs kyi sgor 'jug pa rjes su thob par 'gyur ba de lta bu zhu ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
51a3(rgyud): rgyas la bdag gis zhu gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus zhu ba ji skad smos pa/ ji ltar gzung ba/ ji ltar yid la byas pa/ ji ltar kun chud par byas pa de dag
51a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgya cher gsol to// 'di skad ces kyang gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das zhu ba ji skad smos pa/ ji ltar bzung ba/ ji ltar yid la bgyis pa/ ji ltar kun chub par/
51a5(rgyud): bgyis pa 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag gi spyod pa ji ltar yongs su dag par 'gyur ba de ltar/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol/
51a6(rgyud): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu legs so legs so// shA ri'i bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di su bar
51a7(rgyud): sems pa khyod ma legs so// shA ri'i bu rde byor byed legs par rab tu na la yad la srung zhig dngangs kyang la ba shad do// tsha dang ldan pa / da ti'i dus/ bcom ldan 'das la
51b1(rgyud): 'tshal lo// de banan no zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyur mnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'ang skad ces bka' stsal to// shA rarI Ta 'di la byang chub sems dang /
51b2(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po gang chos thams cad khas mi len cing 'dzin par mi byed pa des/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gzung bar bya'o// tad+ya thA/ oM a NA ma NA~M/ a le ma khe mu She/
51b3(rgyud): sa man+t+ra mu She/ dz+yo ti sau mas t+yes twA rA me/ sau ti yuk+Shi/ ni ruk+ti/ ni ruk+ti pra b+he/ hi yau hi li kalpi/ kalpa si sA re/ sA ra wa taM/ hi le hi le hi li/ hi le hi le hi le/ hi le ha~M la
51b4(rgyud): hi li le/ ma hA ha~M li le/ hiM li tu/ tsany+dza/ tsawa ne/ tsarA tsar NAM/ a tsa le ma tsa le/ a naH/ a nan+ta ga ti/ anan+t+ra mu khe/ a ra Ne/ nir+m+maNe/ nirba pa Ne/ narbar+d+ha ne/
51b5(rgyud): ma sa/ rnamal prad+ha/ sar+b+ba kad+hi/ \u0f7f/ mahA d+har/ ma la 9/ a le/ maN+Dal/ sam sa
51b6(rgyud): sar+b+ba sa sbal pa/ a saH/ a sarba tra~M/ a sa na ni dza/ na snga ma ma/ nabar ga tan/ thams ma/ sla snga ma/ sngam la te/ ma maH/ sa na rba
52a1(rgyud): pu la pra b+h+re/ bi pu la rasmai sam+b+ha wa mu khe/ sarba twA rA ga te/ anAts+tshe d+h+ye pra ti b+hA ne/ d+hA ra Ne d+ha raH/ d+harma nidz+nyA ne/ d+hAH ni dz+nyA nA go tre/ sasan b+h+yadre/ sarbaH
52a2(rgyud): thA ga ta hri da ya/ a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te swAhA/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs 'di dag 'dzin pa ni 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la rlom sems su mi
52a3(rgyud): byed/ dmigs par mi byed/ smod par mi byed/ btang snyoms su mi byed/ 'dzin par mi byed/ rtsom par mi byed/ de dag thob par bya ba dang / spang bar bya ba dang / bsgom par
52a4(rgyud): bya ba dang / rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed/ mtshungs par ldan pa'i chos rnams kyang mi mthong / ldan pa ma yin pa rnams kyang mi mthong
52a5(rgyud): chos rnams kyi skye ba'ang mi mthong / 'gog pa'ang mi mthong / 'das pa'i chos rnams kyang mi mthong / ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams kyang mi mthong / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyang mi mthong /
52a6(rgyud): chos rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa'ang mi mthong / chos gang yang sogs par yang ma byed/ 'grib par yang mi byed/ rnam par rig par yang mi byed par sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'as
52a7(rgyud): zhig sgom ste/ de sgom pa na gzugs su ma yin gzugs med par ma yin/ mtshan du ma yin/ mtshan med par ma yin/ dpe byad babang por ma yin/ dpe byad ba zang ba
52b1(rgyud): med par ma yin/ rnam par shes par ma yin/ rnam par shes pa med par ma yin / can mongs par ma yin tshan mongs pa med par ma yin rtul khrims su ma yin//
52b2(rgyud): khrims med par ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin du ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin med par ma yin/ shes rab tu ma yin/ shes rab med par ma yin/ rnam par grol bar ma yin/ rnam par grom
52b3(rgyud): ba med par ma yin/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bar ma yin/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba med par ma yin/ skye bar ma yin/ skye ba med par ma yin/ rigs sum
52b4(rgyud): yin/ rigs med par ma yin/ rus su ma yin/ rus med par ma yin/ 'khor du ma yin/ 'khor med par ma yin/ gnas par ma yin/ gnas med par ma yin/ thob
52b5(rgyud): par ma yin/ thob pa med par ma yin/ mngon par rtogs par ma yin/ mngon par rtogs pa med par ma yin/ nyon mongs pa zad par ma yin/ nyon mongs pa ma zad par ma yin//
52b6(rgyud): phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched du ma yin/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched med par ma yin/ shes par ma yin/ shes pa med par ma yin/ chos ston par ma/
52b7(rgyud): yin/ chos mi ston par ma yin/ bdag rnam par dag par bya ba ma yin/ gzhan rnam par dag par bya ba ma yin// sems can rnam par dag par bya ba ma yin/ sems can med par rnam/
53a1(rgyud): par dag par bya ba ma yin/ bdag gi don du ma yid/ gzhan gyi don du ma yin/ chos su ma yin/ 'dul bar ma yin// lus rnam par dag par ma yin
53a2(rgyud): ngag rnam par dag par ma yin/ yid rnam par dag par ma yin/ spyod pa rnam par dag par ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha'i spyod pa rnam par dag par ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha'i spyod pa rnam par dag par
53a3(rgyud): ma yin/ da ltar byung ba'i spyod pa rnam par dag par ma yin/ bdag gi rnam par ma yin/ gzhan gyi rnam par ma yin pa 'di ni/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos
53a4(rgyud): thams cad mi 'dzin pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o// don dam pa bsgrubs pas chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba la mi 'jigs pa thob par byed pa zhes bya ba'i
53a5(rgyud): gzungs so// gcig tu nges pa thob pas bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad gzhan la rag ma las pa'i ye shes sgrub pas
53a6(rgyud): chos kyi gter mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i rigs zil gyis mi non pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs so// dam pa yongs su 'tshol ba la mkhas pas bdud kyi las thams cad las yang dag par 'da'
53a7(rgyud): ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs so// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sgo mtha' yas pas sgrub pa'i gzungs 'di'i don thob pa de dag ni phyir mi ldog cing / myur du blan med pa yang dag pa
53b1(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i pi bzhen/ shA ra'i bu 'dir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos dang yon tan thams cad kyi gteng nges bya'i phyir ro
53b2(rgyud): dmigs pa med pa'i spyod pa dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di nyid las/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi bye brag mchog yin pa'i phyir ro// rab tu dbye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//
53b3(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// chos rnams stong par dogs med cing // byang chub ched du spos mi byed// chos rnams 'khrugs par mi byed/
53b4(rgyud): de phyir gzungs ni thob par 'gyur// mdo sde 'di ni mnyan par bya// 'di la gzungs 'di zad pa med// ye shes sbyor 'di 'di la ste// des na byang chub thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems/
53b5(rgyud): dpa' 'jigs med pa// gzungs 'di rab tu bzung byas na// phyogs bcu dag gi sangs rgyas kyi// chos bstan pa ni thos par 'gyur// don dang tshig 'grus bskyed kun gyi// mchog
53b6(rgyud): gis chos rnam par shes// tsa ma pa 'od bar ji snyed pa// de tha~Mng tshig rnams shes par 'gyur// gang dag chos kyi mchog 'gyur ba// chubs chen gzungs kyi sgo rnams te// gang nas
53b7(rgyud): mnga' 'dzin del// thams cad cag tumangan du 'gyur// gam thasems can thams cad kyis// de la 'amam par dgas dris te// tshe tsham thams cad cad kyar // dem mags
54a1(rgyud): mi zad do// mdo sde 'di la su dga' ba// de ni chos kyi rgyal po'i sras// byang chub mchog la nye ba ste// yid brtan gyur dang chos 'dzin pa'o// gzungs 'di 'dzin par/
54a2(rgyud): su byed pa// de la sems can thams cad dga'// sangs rgyas rnams kyang de la dgyes// grags pa 'jig rten 'byung bar 'gyur// su zhig mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa// de ni 'chi ba'i dus byed che//
54a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas bye ba brgyad cu zong // lag pa de la nye bar 'jog/ gzungs 'di 'dzin par byed pa ni// bskul pa bye ba stong rnams su// sngon chad sdig pa gang byas pa// zla ba gcig gis byang ba
54a4(rgyud): 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams gang // bskal pa bye bar sgrub pa kun// gzungs 'di 'dzin par byed pa yis// zla ba gcig gis zil gnon 'gyur// khams gsum sems
54a5(rgyud): can ji snyed pa// gal te thams cad bdud gyur kyang // mdo sde 'di ni gang 'dzin pa// de la bar chad byed mi nus// byang chub 'tshang rgya bar du de// dran dang blo gros rtogs ldan 'gyur// gzung/
54a6(rgyud): kyi dam pa gang yin pa// de yi lce yi rtse mor gnas// ji ltar mdo sde bstan 'di la// gzungs ni so sor nges pa bzhin// 'di las thams cad mkhyen pa bstan// 'di las byang chub thob par
54a7(rgyud): 'gyur// gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu yang // mar me zhes byas nga lung bstan// skad cig de la sangs rgyas ni// gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyed mthong // gang zhig sangs rgyas thams cad
54b1(rgyud): kyis da / bstan pa 'dir na rtogs 'dod cing // mdo sde 'di la bstan pa des// thams cad myur du thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas nang ni rnam dag dang // nyan thos phun sum tshogs pa/
54b2(rgyud): dang / 'od dang mtshan kyang rnam dag pa// mdo sde 'dis ni byed par 'gyur// de bas bag ni yod gyur la// zhag bdun par du 'di sems pa// sangs rgyas bye ba brgyad cu yis//
54b3(rgyud): yi 'og tu gzungs sbyin 'gyur// bsam bya sems par mi bsam ste// bsam bya min pa'ang mi bsam mo// soms shig 'gal bar ma sems shig/ de yi 'og tu gzungs
54b4(rgyud): thob 'gyur// dper na rgya mtshor phyin pa'i mi// nor la som nyi med pa ltar// de bzhin gzungs 'di thob gyur nas// bde ba la yang som nyi med// 'di las rdzogs pa'i byang chub nye//
54b5(rgyud): de bas 'di la sbyor bar gyis// zhi ba'i gnas ni thob gyur nas// rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang // tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka'
54b6(rgyud): stsal pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ro// bani gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa rnams la lhag par
54b7(rgyud): chags pa med pa yin/ sems can thams cad la phrag dog med pa yin/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su gting zhing 'gyod pa med par sbyin pa'i tshul can yin/ nyin mtshan du 'dod cing
55a1(rgyud): chos kyi kun dga' la dga' ba yin te/ nyin mtshan du chos la dga' zhing chos 'dod pa yin te/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos ban/
55a2(rgyud): po de dag dang ldan na gzungs 'di 'thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcon ldan 'das kyis tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// ngan cing bdud kyi spyod yul ba/ 'dod pa dri nga spang bar
55a3(rgyud): blos// de dag sems can dmyal ba'i rkyen// ngan song rnams kyi rgyu yang yin// shes kyi khe dang rnyed dang grags pa'i phyir// pha rol dag la phrag dog mi bya ste// dga' ba'i mig gis
55a4(rgyud): sems can bltas byas na// mthu che ba dang gzugs kyang mdzes par 'gyur// sems can gang dag kha cig rtsod 'gyur ba// de yi gzhi rtsa yongs su 'dzin pa ste// de lta sa gang la
55a5(rgyud): sred par 'gyur ba spongs// sred pa spang ba byas na gzungs su 'gyur// gal te byang chub 'dod na gzhan ma sems// nyin dang mtshan du chos ni btsal bar byos// chos tshig 'di 'dra 'di
55a6(rgyud): ngag sten byed na// de la gzungs ni mngon du 'gyur bar 'ong // shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na gzungs 'di thos par 'gyur ro//
55a7(rgyud): bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dgon pa dang dben pa la gnas pa dang / chos zab mo la bzod pa'i stobs bskyed pa nyid dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa la lhag
55b1(rgyud): par chags pa med pa dang / sdug pa'i dngos po thams cad la mi lnga zhing / za na lus dang srog kyang yongs su gtong ba ste/ shA rari'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos/
55b2(rgyud): bzhi po de dag dang ldan na gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// rgyal bas bsngags pa'i dgon par gnas
55b3(rgyud): par gyis/ de la gnas pas gzhan la brnyas mi bya / zab mo'i bzod la 'dun pa bskyed nas su bag yod mgo la 'bar bzhin gnas par gyis// de ltar tshul 'chos byed kyi gzhir
55b4(rgyud): gyur pa'i// shes khe rnyed pa rnams la gnas ma byed// bya dang 'dra bar ngan ngon dag gis mchog byas te// mir gyur pa yi 'bras bu yod par byos// kye ma sangs rgyas bstan pa
55b5(rgyud): legs par rnyed// sdug bsngal mang po'i rtsa ba khyim yang spongs// lus dang ngag dang yid kyang yongs dag pas// sangs rgyas dang ni chos la gus par gyis// rnyed 'dod dran pa ma
55b6(rgyud): yin shes rab min// dang dang tshul khrims ma yin chos sems min// de ni byang chub ring ste gnam sa bzhin// de ltas rnyed pa yongs su spang bar bya// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
55b7(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yi ge 'bru brgyad kyi don khong du chud par bya'o// brgyad po de dag
56a1(rgyud): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pa zhes bya ba don dam pa chos thams cad la bdag med pa la 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang / la zhes bya ba mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang /
56a2(rgyud): mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po med par de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku la 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang / ba zhes bya ba byis pa'i chos rnams dang mkhas pa'i chos rnams ji lta ba bzhin du
56a3(rgyud): gnyis su med pa la 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang / dza zhes bya ba skye ba dang rga ba dang / 'chi ba dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba med pa'i 'gro ba mi skye mi 'gag pa la 'jug pa/
56a4(rgyud): khong du chud pa dang / ka zhes bya ba la sa dang rnam par smin pa dang / las dang rnam par smin pa med pa la 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang / d+ha zhes pa gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi stong pa
56a5(rgyud): nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang sha zhes bya ba zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong dang / lhag mthong med par
56a6(rgyud): chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid khong du chud pa dang / kA zhes bya ba chos thams cad skad cig pa ste gzod ma nas zhi ba'i phyir zad pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa dang / rgyu med pa
56a7(rgyud): dang / chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das par 'jug par khong du chud pa ste/ de ltar yi ge 'bru brgyad po de dag gi don khong du chud par rtogs par bya ba 'di ni don khong du chud pa dang po'o//
56b1(rgyud): gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bris te gzung bar bya ba 'don don khong du chud pa gnyis pa'o// zla ba byed byed cing gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rtag tu klog pa dang / rjes
56b2(rgyud): su dran par bya ba'i phyir brtson par bya ba 'don don khong du chud pa gsum pa'o// gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa mngon par brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
56b3(rgyud): chen pos sems can thams cad yang dag par dga' bar bya ba dang / yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug pa dang yang dag par gzengs bstod pa la gzung pa'i phyir brtsod par bya ba
56b4(rgyud): 'di ni don khong du chud pa bzhi pa ste/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das
56b5(rgyud): kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// yi ge 'bru brgyad 'di dag bsam par bya// mdo sde 'di ni bris nas bcang bar bya/ zla ba phyed cing rtag tu bklag
56b6(rgyud): bar bya// sems can rnams kyang 'di 'dzin gzhug par bya/ shes rab rgya chen byang chub nye ba ste/ shes rab rgyu yang che ba ste// phyogs bcu rnams na sangs rgyas gang
56b7(rgyud): su dag/ bzhugs pa thams cad des ni mdun du mthong // de phyir 'dun pa bskyed de 'di la bslab// shA ri'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni gzungs 'di la mngon par brtson pa'i byang
57a1(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan yon yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad de la
57a2(rgyud): dgongs pa dang / de la bdud kyi las mi 'byung ba dang / de'i las kyi sgrib pa myur du 'byung ba dang / spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa myur du 'thob pa ste shA ri'i bu bzhi po de dag ni
57a3(rgyud): gzungs 'di la mngon par brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phan yon yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//
57a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyis de ni yid la mdzad// de la bdud kyis glags ni rnyed mi 'gyur// de yi las kyi sgrib pa myur du 'byung // spobs pa mtha' yas rnams kyang thob par/
57a5(rgyud): 'gyur// shA ri'i bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa yangs pa rgya cher gyur pa tshad dpag tu med pa
57a6(rgyud): de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po lta bu zhes pa rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar
57a7(rgyud): gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ shA ri'i bu
57b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po lta bu de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe/ 'khor na/
57b2(rgyud): sgyur ba'i rgyal po snang ba 'dzin ces bya ba/ mi'i dbang po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa zhog byung ngo // de'i bu yon tan rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de skyes
57b3(rgyud): nas lo bcu drug lon pa dang / des sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
57b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas rin chen dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po lta bu de las thos te/ des gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu thob par bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur to// de lo bdun khrir rmugs pa dang gnyid
57b5(rgyud): kyis ma brten to// non par ma gyur to// de lan 'ga' yang rgyal srid la dga' ba 'am/ nor la dga' ba 'am/ bdag la dga' bar ma gyur to// de lo bdun khrir lan 'ga' yang sa la
57b6(rgyud): gros ma phab ste/ gcig tu nges par nang du yang dag 'jog la gnas so// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu las chos bstan pa thos te/ thos nas kyang nyams su blangs so// thams cad bzung
57b7(rgyud): gzungs nyams su blangs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po lta bu de nyid la rab tu byung //
58a1(rgyud): de rab tu byung nas lo dgu khri 'das pa dang / des sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa'i gzungs 'dib sgrubs te/ bsgrubs nas kyang sems can rnams la rgya cher yang dag
58a2(rgyud): par bshad do// des tshe gcig pu de nyid la sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du btsud cing / phyir mi ldog
58a3(rgyud): pa'i sa la bkod par gyur to// shA ri'i bu 'khor de na tshong dpon gyi bu zla ba'i tog ces bya ba zhig yod de/ des sgro mtha' yas pa sgrub pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chos smra ba'i dge
58a4(rgyud): slong de las thos so// thos nas kyang rjes su yi rang bar gyur te/ de rjes su yi rang ba'i modo las skyes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu las chos bstan pa thos so// thos nas
58a5(rgyud): kyang nyams su blangs so// thams cad bzung ngo // thams cad du'ang gzungs thob pa thams cad kyi mchog dang / tshig btsun pa dang / gzungs su bzung ba'i tshig dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog
58a6(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa rgyun mi chod pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to// des bskal pa gsum du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang
58a7(rgyud): rgyas de dag ma nyes par byas so// mnyes par byas nas bskal pa gsum 'das nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// shA ri'i bu
58b1(rgyud): de'i tshe de'i dus datshong dpon gyi bu zla ba'i tog ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod som yi'am/ yid gnyis sam/ the tsom za bar gyur na shA ri'i bu khyod kyis de ltar mi
58b2(rgyud): blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi bu zla ba'i tog ces bya/
58b3(rgyud): bar gyur to// shA ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na yon tan rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya ba chos smra bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi dang / yid gnyis sam
58b4(rgyud): the tsom za bar gyur na/ shA ri'i bu khyod kyi de ltar mi lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med
58b5(rgyud): de de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong chos smra ba yon tan rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya bar gyur to// shA ri'i bu nga dang bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
58b6(rgyud): po rnams kyis kyang de'i tshe gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos so// thos nas kyang rjes su yi rang ba'i modado las skyes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ nges bskal pa bye ba 'bum phrag pa ni
58b7(rgyud): khrir 'khor ba phyir bsnyil to// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu las chos bstan pa'ang thos te/ thams cad du'ang gzungs thob pa rnams kyi mchog dang / tshig btsun pa bzung ba'i
59a1(rgyud): #tshig dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa rgyun mi gcod pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to// shA ri'i bu de lta bas na byang
59a2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ za na gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la rjes su yi rang
59a3(rgyud): bar yang brtson par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ched du phyir mi ldog pa'i sa dang / chos smra ba rnams
59a4(rgyud): mgu bar byed pa'i rgyur 'gyur na/ gang yi ger 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / gzhan
59a5(rgyud): dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa lta ci smos te/ bsod nams kyi phung po de'i tshad ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par/ sems can thams cad kyis kyang shes pa 'am bsam par mi/
59a6(rgyud): nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// mdo sde thos nas rjes su yi rang dang // yi ger bris dang gzung dang bklags pa yi/
59a7(rgyud): bsod nams chu bo ji tsam bskyed pa ni// sems can kun gyis shes par yongs mi nus// des ni tshe rabs kun tu rgyal ba mthong // de dag la yang dad pa bsam yas rnyed// mdo sde
59b1(rgyud): mo'i tshul yang shes par 'gyur// de ni myur du byang chub mchog 'tshang rgya// bla med byang chub ma reg bar du yang // de ni ting nge 'dzin dang mngon shes dang // gzungs rnams dang ni gzungs/
59b2(rgyud): dang longs spyod dang // sangs rgyas mthong las nyams par yong mi 'gyur// rjes su dran pas sngon gyi tshe rabs na// tshong dpon bus ni gzungs 'di thos gyur nas// sangs rgyas gang+gA'i bya
59b3(rgyud): sred mthong gyur te// des ni 'dod bzhin byang chub rnam sangs rgyas// mar me mdzad pa de tshe tshong dpon du// sngon gyi tshe rabs 'od zer mtha' yas gyur// de tshe chos smra sangs rgyas
59b4(rgyud): dpag med// nga ni bskal pa bzang dang bcas yi rang // byang chub myur du reg par su 'dod dang // bdud rnams myur du gzhom par su 'dod dang // bsod nams brgya yi mtshan bzang su
59b5(rgyud): 'dod pa// 'di la brtson na rnyed par dka' mi 'gyur// gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyed 'jig rten khams// gang gis rin chen dkang ste sbyin byin yang // bris dang bzung ba'i bsod nams gang
59b6(rgyud): yin pa// de la sbyin pas dper yang mi 'gyur ro// de ltas thos nas rtse gcig bag yod par// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pas 'di bzung ngam// gzungs 'di zis shing sems
59b7(rgyud): pa de dag ni// byang chub rnyed pa dka' ba med par bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa'i gzungs
60a1(rgyud): 'di la mngon par brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus la/ gangs la gnas pa'i gnod sbyin brgyad gzi byin mdangs 'jug cing / nyin
60a2(rgyud): mtshan du srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sred par byed do// brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gnod sbyin dpa' bo zhes bya ba dang / brtan po dang / bdag po dang / sred med kyi bu'i stobs
60a3(rgyud): dang spyod pa'i blo gros dang / thub dka' dang / 'jigs su rung ba dang / gnod sbyin lag bzangs zhes bya ba ste/ gnod sbyin brgyad po de dag 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir shin tu khrus bya ba
60a4(rgyud): dang gos shin tu gtsang ma bgo ba dang / 'chag sar 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems su bya/ gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang yid la
60a5(rgyud): bya ste/ de ltar byas na de la gnod sbyin brgyad po de dag myur du bzhin ston par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa brgyad po la/
60a6(rgyud): ngag kyang de la sems par 'gyur te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par snang byed ces bya ba dang / snong byed dang / shes rab 'od dang / nyi ma'i 'od
60a7(rgyud): dang yang dag par skul byed dang / bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs byed dang / skar ma'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba ste/
60b1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad po de dag des gzungs thob par bya ba'i phyir mngon par brtson par 'gyur ro// gzungs 'di la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang
60b2(rgyud): bden pa'i dam bca' bar bya'o// byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa tshor ba can dang / chos 'dod pa dang / chos la dga' ba dang // bab mo'i chos la bzod pa mngon par brtson par bya'o// byang
60b3(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs la brtson pas kun 'gyed/ bgo bsha' byed pa'i nga tshul du bya ste/ des ji ltar chung ba dang / ji ltar nyung ba las kyang sbyin pa sbyin par byan/
60b4(rgyud): mang po las lta smos kyang ci dgos bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma sum cus
60b5(rgyud): ni sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa'i gzungs 'di thob ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu sngon sems
60b6(rgyud): bskyed pa dkrigs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'bum phrag drug cus ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
60b7(rgyud): bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i
61a1(rgyud): #bu de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa'i gzungs zhes bya bar bzung zhig byang chub sems dpa' gcig tu nges par ston par
61a2(rgyud): 'phags par byed pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ bdud thams cad rnam par 'jigs par byed pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ gcig tu nges pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
61a3(rgyud): nyid shin tu thob par byed pa zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang
61a4(rgyud): chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
61a5(rgyud): 'phags pa sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du Ar+ya ShaT mu khi nA ma d+hA ra Ni bod
61a6(rgyud): skad du 'phags pa sgo drug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na
61a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi khyams gnas gtsang ma'i steng gi nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa// rin po che sna bdun rab tu bye bas rnam par sbas pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs grang
61b1(rgyud): med pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis 'gro ba thams cad la phan/
61b2(rgyud): pa dang bde ba'i phyir sgo drug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di zung zhig/ de 'di lta ste/ bdag 'khor ba na 'khor ba'itshe sdug bsngal gang la la myong ba de sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid du
61b3(rgyud): mi shes pa'i mtshan nyid du ma gyur cig/ bdag gis 'jig rten pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'i bde ba gang la la myong ba de sems can thams cad dang thun mong du yongs su spyad par gyur cig/ bdag
61b4(rgyud): la sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi sgrib pa gang la la yod pa de so sor bshags pa bla na med pas so sor ma bshags par ma gyur cig/ bdag la bdud kyi las gang dag yod pa de dag yongs
61b5(rgyud): su shes pas bla na med pas dngos su mi shes par ma gyur cig/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa 'jig rten nam 'jig rten las 'das pa gang yang rung gang ci yod
61b6(rgyud): pa de bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi 'bras bur gyur cig/ bdag gi rnam par grol ba gang yin pa des sems can thams cad rnam par thar par gyur cig/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la
61b7(rgyud): bdag gnas par mgyur cig/ tad+yatrA~M/ me hA ma lnga ma/ na ba/ dmad mi/ da / mjaman/ su rtsa su mazo/ su tha dra/ tsan+de rjo/ su ban+da su
