62a1(rgyud): tsan+da kir Ni/ tsan+d+ra ba te/ te dzo ba tI/ d+hA d+hU ba te/ ya sho ba ti brah+ma ba ti/ sar+b+ba kleng na bi sho d+hA ni/ sarba ar+tha sad+ha ni/ sarba ar+tha pra sha ma ni/ par ma/
62a2(rgyud): r+tha sA d+ha ni/ kA ya bi sho d+ha ne/ bA ga bi sho d+ha ne na ma \u0f7f saM sho d+ha ni sA hr-i/ rigs kyi bu dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las sgo drug pa'i gzungs 'di nyin lan gsum
62a3(rgyud): mtshan lan gsum brjod na/ de las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das
62a4(rgyud): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/
62a5(rgyud): la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa sgo drug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba d+harma gu Na b+hu ha ra dzA nA ma ma hA
62a6(rgyud): yA na sU tre/ bod skad du 'phags pa chos thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal
62a7(rgyud): lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na/ dge slong lnga brgya tham pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen
62b1(rgyud): bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong ces brgya thams cad kyang gzungs thob pa/ chags pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba/ spyod yul chags pa med pa thabs mkhas pa/ khams gsum/
62b2(rgyud): thams cad la sems snyoms pa/ phan pa dang snying brtse ba'i bsam pa la zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'phel po'i gtum 'dri ba sha stag la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
62b3(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brtson dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa dang / byang
62b4(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi g.yo ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen po dang /
62b5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa mtha' yas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab gnon blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
62b6(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / de dag la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' stong nyis brgya dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams dang / klu'i rgyal
62b7(rgyud): po rnams dang / srin po'o bdag po thams cad dang / gnod sbyin sum brgya dang / gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa drug stong dang / nam mkha' lding
63a1(rgyud): ##gi rgyal po bdun dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la bskor ba byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i
63a2(rgyud): phyir/ lha'i me tog gi char mngon par bab bo// tsan dan gyi bye ma'i char yang mngon par phab bo// lha'i sil sran dang pheb rdob pa dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir bsgrags so//
63a3(rgyud): gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la mngon par dad pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang tshig 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
63a4(rgyud): gshegs pa'i bstan pa nyon mongs pa thams cad zad par bgyid pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che ste legs so legs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa rdul
63a5(rgyud): med pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sa chen po 'di tho ba dang dma' bar byas te/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul
63a6(rgyud): g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg/ 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur
63a7(rgyud): kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem mo// lha'i tsan dan gyi bye ma'i char yang phab bo// lha'i me tog gi char yang phab bo// lha'i 'od snang ba'ang
63b1(rgyud): byung ngo // stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sems can gang su dag ngan song du skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang ngan song rnams las yongs su grol bar gyur to//
63b2(rgyud): lha'i dbang po dang / klu'i dbang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang / srin po'i dbang po dang / mi'i dbang po de dag thams cad kyis gnas kyang sdang bar gyur to// lha'i sil
63b3(rgyud): snyan gyi sgra dag kyang grag go/ lha'i 'od dag kyang snang bar gyur to// lhan spos kyi ngad kyang ldang bar gyur to// de nas de dag thams cad cho 'phrul chen po de mthong nas ya mtshan du gyur te
63b4(rgyud): 'di snyam du sems so// gnas 'di dag snang bar gyur pa 'di dang / cho 'phrul chen po snang bar gyur pa 'di dang / sa cher g.yos pa 'di dang / me tog gi char chen po bab pa 'di su'i
63b5(rgyud): mthu yin/ su'i byin gyi rlabs yin zhig gu snyam nas/ de dag thang cig cang mi zer bar sems nas gcig la gcig 'di skad du/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu yin no// 'di ni
63b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa yin no zhes smras so// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang /
63b7(rgyud): mchod pa dang // chos nyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'dodang gor ma chag skam mo// de nas lha'i dbang po dang / klu'i dbang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang / srin
64a1(rgyud): #po'i dbang po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba de dag thams cad kyis lha'i me tog ut+pal dang pad+ma dang ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / dri mchog dang /
64a2(rgyud): man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po dag khyer nas/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la
64a3(rgyud): mngon par mchod de phyag byas so// me tog gi char chen po des kyang sa chen po 'di pus mo rub pa tsam du khyab par 'dug go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams
64a4(rgyud): cad chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje byang chub sems
64a5(rgyud): dpa' bye ba phrag du mas bskor cing / lha bye ba phrag du mas bskor te/ rig sngags 'chang brgya phrag du mas mdun du bdar bas rdzu 'phrul dang / mthu chen po dang / bkod pa chen po dang / me tog dang
64a6(rgyud): spos dang / me tog 'phreng ba dang / bdug pa dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / sil snyan dang / pheb rdob pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
64a7(rgyud): tshogs dang bcas pa la mngon par mchod do// de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa'i rgyal pos lha'i bkod pa dang / bkod pa'i mthu dang / me tog gi char chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa
64b1(rgyud): la mchod pa chen po byas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis 'dus pa chen po de mthong nas chos 'bel ba'i gtam 'dod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
64b2(rgyud): sems dpa' de dag gi sems thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu song la sa chen po 'di ltos shig/ de nas byang chub
64b3(rgyud): sems dpa' bkod pa'i rgyal pos/ sa chen po la bltas so// bltas nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sa chen po la bltas lags te
64b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can thams cad la bde ba'i 'dus pa chen po mdzad pa mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bkod pa'i rgyal po srog chags
64b5(rgyud): drug khri bzhi stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu deng kho na lung bstan par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
64b6(rgyud): gnyis la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / mi dang / spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu mang po
64b7(rgyud): 'dus lags so// bde bar gshegs pa sems can mang po 'dus lags so// bcom ldan 'das chos mnyan pa'i dus ni 'di lags so// bde bar gshegs pa chos mnyan pa'i dus ni 'di lags
65a1(rgyud): so// de nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab ste/
65a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bstan du gsol/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa grub par mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das 'gyod pa bsal ba dang / sems
65a3(rgyud): can thams cad la sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du chos thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bgyi ba'i mdo// nyon mongs pa thams cad zad par bgyid pa/ bdud thams cad yang dag par
65a4(rgyud): 'joms pa sdigs pa thams cad zad par bgyis pa/ sems can ma dad pa rnams dad par bgyid pa/ mu ge'i gnod pa zhi bar bgyid pa/ nad thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa
65a5(rgyud): dus ma lags par 'chi ba thams cad zlog pa/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa glog snang ba las zos nas/ thos pa'i mod la chos thams cad mngon sum du gyur cing / ngan song tha ma
65a6(rgyud): cad yang dag par chad de/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yang dag par chad pa gang lags pa de bstan par gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la
65a7(rgyud): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe/ sems can nga'i bstan pa la ma dad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sdel mngon par ma dad cing yid ma
65b1(rgyud): ches lag tshig 'di skad du 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde ma yin no// 'di la ni legs par byas pa dang nyes par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras su rnam par smin pa ci'ang med do zhes zer ba
65b2(rgyud): dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni chags pas zil gyis rin nas/ mchod pa'ang mngon par 'du byed par mi 'gyur la/ chos smra ba de dag la'ang mchod pa byed par mi 'gyur te/ de dag na ni 'di 'ad/
65b3(rgyud): sang 'khrug pa mang ba 'byung bar 'gyur la/ phyis kyang sems can dmyal ba rnams su 'tsho bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi su 'dan de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yab sum dang dra ba las thams cad 'ang /
65b4(rgyud): par byed pa'i mdo sde'i rgyal po chen po mnyan pa'i dus ma yin te/ gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu de dag dang / sems can mang po gzhan dag kyang ngan song du 'gro bar 'ong ngo //
65b5(rgyud): rigs kyi bu de dag ni mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di la dad par mi 'gyur te/ 'dod par ldongs pa'i yid kyis khyim yongs su skyong bar byed cing / mo ko dang / tshong dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / 'tha' ba/
65b6(rgyud): la sred par 'gyur ro// de nas shi 'phos nas kyang sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad po dag tu 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe srog chags brgyad khri stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das
65b7(rgyud): kyis zhabs la gtugs te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni dad par bgyid lags so// mngon par mchod par bgyid lags so// rgyas par yang bgyid lags so// 'dzi
66a1(rgyud): ba dang / klog pa dang / nyan du stsal ba dang pa/ 'don pa la spro bar bgyid lags so// slad kyis chos ma lags pa'i dus de la bab pa na/ smyo ba dang / brgyad bka
66a2(rgyud): pa dang / bsdigs pa bzod par bgyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni bka' drin gapho bar bgyid kyi bka' drin mi gzo bar mi bgyid de/ bdag cag slad kyis 'gyod par 'gyur
66a3(rgyud): bar mi bgyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bgyi ba'i mdo bstan du gsol/ 'di ni slad ma'i dus srad ma'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
66a4(rgyud): 'phrin las bgyid par 'gyur ba lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
66a5(rgyud): dpa' chen pos dge ba'i bshes gnyen ji ltar yongs su btsal bar bgyibacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyun mo/
66a6(rgyud): 'chad par dge ba'i bshes gnyen la blta bar 'dod pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / bsam gtan yongs su dag pa dang / chos 'dod par bya ste/ chos ban po de dag dang ldan pa
66a7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' na pos dge ba'i bshes gcan mangs su bcal bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' lag na rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'adas
66b1(rgyud): pa la gnas pas ji ltar bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di lta ste/ khyim na gnas pa yongs su spang ba dang / mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi 'du'ang yongs su spang /
66b2(rgyud): pa dang bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces
66b3(rgyud): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas ngan song du mchi bar 'gyur ba de ma mthong ste/ de ni gnas ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gang la la chos kyi
66b4(rgyud): rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang 'di la phyag 'tshal ba de ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba lags na/ gang yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir sgrol ba dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / gdugs dang /
66b5(rgyud): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyis mchod pa bgyid pa dang / chos smra ba de la'ang gos dang rgyan rnams kyis mchod pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs
66b6(rgyud): pa lags so// de ni de bzhin gshegs pas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su lung bstan pa kho na lags so// chos smra ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba kho nar blta bar bgyi'o// bcom
66b7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ legs so legs so// chos sba ba de la ni ngas kyang mchod par bgyi'o// 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du'ang lung bstan par bya'o// gang de
67a1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa la thama'i sri'u byed cing / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gos dang / rgyan rnams dang / gdus/
67a2(rgyud): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyis mchod pa byed pa de ni dus ma yin par 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa'ang med/ mu ge'i gnod pa'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ bu las
67a3(rgyud): gyur pa'i yid mi bde ba'ang med/ chung ma las gyur pa'i yid mi bde ba'ang med la/ bsam pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung ba dang
67a4(rgyud): mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di thos par bka' 'o// rigs kyi bu grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ khyim mam/ dgon pa'i gnas gang la lar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa'i sa phyogs de
67a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su bzung ba yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang
67a6(rgyud): phyug spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bgyi ba ci'i slad du de skad ces bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ gang gi phyir 'di ltar 'jig rten thams cad la lta bar byed/ rtog par byed/ tshim par byed/
67a7(rgyud): yongs su skyong bar byed/ yang dag par dbugs 'byin par byed cing / snying rje'i sems dang / bde ba'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang / snying brtse ba'i sems dang ldan la/ bsam pa
67b1(rgyud): thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pas na/ de'i phyir spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
67b2(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ming tsam la rtog pa gang lags pa de'ang bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur na/ gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par mchod pa dang // chos kyi rnam grang
67b3(rgyud): 'di la mngon par dad pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir srol ba dang / gos dang rgyan gyi mchod pa chen po dag gis mchod pa bgyid pa dang / rgyan gyis brgyan
67b4(rgyud): nas yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir stsol ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces
67b5(rgyud): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni mthu che ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las bgyid pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu rgyal ba can rna
67b6(rgyud): bya ba'i gzungs yod de/ de ni nga byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbyangs las blangs te thob pa'i mod la'ang sa bcu thob par gyur la/ srog chags stong phrag du/
67b7(rgyud): mas kyang chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzungs mthu chen po bstan par gsol / de nas bcom 'das de/
68a1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa byakal bang ka'i sna dang gdangs sgrogs pas gzungs 'di bka' stsal pa/ taHn+tu/ dza sa ngas/ dzam ba6/ nga ya ba h+Na/ labata/ #
68a2(rgyud): pad+ma be/ A ba ma pa me/ sa ra sa ra Ne d+hi ri dz+nyi ri/ de bat+tA/ a nu pA lA ne/ yud d+hod tA ra dzI/ par tsakra ni bA ra ti/ pU ra ya/ b+ha ga bAn/ sarba A shwAn+ta/ ma ma sarba ka mak+Sha pa ya/ bud+d+he a d+hiSh+TA nen swAH
68a3(rgyud): rigs kyi bu 'di ni rgyal ba can zhes bya ba'i gzungs yin te/ sdig pa thams cad zad par byed pa/ nor dang 'bru rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs zlog par byed pa/ mu ge'i gnod/
68a4(rgyud): pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ tshe nur bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yab yum dang 'dra ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yin no// rigs kyi bu la la zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang / gzungs
68a5(rgyud): kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing bsam pa yongs su dag pas mchod par byed de/ yi ger 'dri ba'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / mchod pa chen pos chos smra ba de la mchod pa byed pa/
68a6(rgyud): de ni las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ro// dus ma yin pa'i 'chi bas 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro// tshe 'di nyid la'ang bde ba myong bar 'gyur te/ byed yid bde bar 'gyur ba dang // chung mas yid bde ba
68a7(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / khyim gyis yid bde bar 'gyur ba dang / rgyal srid kyis yid bde bar 'gyur la/ bsam pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sem/
68b1(rgyud): dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la phyag 'tshal lo// chos smra ba de dag dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba rnams dang / 'anang ba ngas/
68b2(rgyud): dang / klog pa rnams la'ang mchod par 'tshal lo// gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa dang / chos smra ba de dag la gos dang / rgyan rnams dang / gdugs dang / bzhon pa rnams kyis mchod
68b3(rgyud): pa de dag gis ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa bgyid pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la'ang mchod pa'i mchog gis mchod pa
68b4(rgyud): bgyid pa lags so// rgyal srid thams cad la'ang bdag gis bsrung bar bgyi'o// bsam pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// rgyal srid thams cad la'ang mchod par 'gyur bar bgyi'o//
68b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos nyan pa de dag gi don du gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams rjes su btsal bar 'tshal lo// bsam pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// sgring
68b6(rgyud): slas su'ang bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sems can gyi don gyi phyir spros shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' lagar rdo rjes gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi
68b7(rgyud): 'di dag smras so// namaHsarba ta thA ga tA nan/ na mo a mi tra thA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHsarba bo d+hi satwa nA ma/ na maHsa sam hAr bi'i b+h+ya \u0f7f \u0f7fthA/ hu hu he he/ matim ti/ mahAm ting/ badzum /
69a1(rgyud): dr-i d+ha badz+ra ma ti/ ta thA ga ta/ a nu pa ri pra li de/ sa ra sa ra/ a yo mu ge/ TI kuT+Ta/ b+h+ri ku Ti/ mu khi/ kr-i bo kr-i pA lu ke/ sa t+ya ba tsan/ ma nu s+phar/ b+ha ga ban/ badz+ra pA
69a2(rgyud): sarba kam+ba A ba ra NA ni/ k+Sha pa ya sarba A shrI pa ri pU ra ya/ de hi me ba raM/ bud d+ha sa t+ye na/ bo d+hi satwa sat+ye na swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'tshal ba dang / de bzhin
69a3(rgyud): gshegs pa blta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye ba dang / rgyal srid dang longs spyod 'tshal ba dang / yul gru 'tshal ba dang / nor 'tshal ba dang / 'bru 'tshal ba de ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang
69a4(rgyud): chos smra ba de la mchod pa chen pos mchod par bgyi'o// gang yi ger 'drir ba dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa de la'ang spos dang / me tog 'breng dang / byug pa dang / mal cha dang / stan dang /
69a5(rgyud): gos dang / rgyan rnams dang / gdugs dang / bzhon pa rnams kyis mchod par bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das de la ni bdag gis bsrung bar bgyi'o// rgyal srid thams cad la'ang ches mchod par
69a6(rgyud): 'gyur bar bgyi'o// ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin du sems dang yid bde bar bgyi'o// bu gcig pa bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// gang la la bdag mthong bar 'tshal ba dang / stobs kyis 'kho
69a7(rgyud): los sgyur bar 'gyur ba dang / ting nge 'dzin thob pa dang / zos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / khams rnam par smin par 'gyur ba dang / lus mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang / nam mkha' las mchi bar 'tshal
69b1(rgyud): bdes ni/ zla ba yar gyi ngo chos brgyad la nyin mtshan du smyung bar bgyis la gzugs bgyid du stsal te/ rdo rje 'chang gi gzugs 'dam bu mda' rgya'i mdog can/ rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhi ba'i
69b2(rgyud): tshul can sku gdung dang ldan par bgyi'o// dbus su ni de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa bzhugs par bgyi'o// g.yas logs su ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag pa bzhi pa
69b3(rgyud): rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa su gdung dang bcas pa gzhag go// g.yas g.yon dag tu rgyal po chen po bzhi mchod par bgyid pa gzhag go// sgrub pa po'i rigs kyi bu des kyang gtsang sbra bgyi
69b4(rgyud): dang / dus gsum du khrus bgyi ba dang / dus gsum du gos brje ba dang / sems can thams cad la'ang byams pa'i sems su bgyi'o// zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad nas brtsams te/ rdza ba
69b5(rgyud): phyi ma nya ba'i tshes bco lnga'i bar du zas su nas kyi 'o thug 'tshal zhing / dus gsum du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// bdug pa ni a ka ru dang / tsan dan dang / lce bog dang / gu gul dbul lo//
69b6(rgyud): lan gsum gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyis te/ de ni sngar bsnyen par bgyi ba lags so// sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten nam/ dgon pa'i gnas spos dang / bdug pa dang / me tog sna tshogs
69b7(rgyud): dang / ba dan sna tshogs kyis kyang mchod par bgyi'o// dkar bag gi lha ba shos kyang dbul bar bgyi'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang yi ger 'drir stsal cing / gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub
70a1(rgyud): dang / gdugs dang / bzhon pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod par bgyi'o// de nas zla ba nya ba'i chos bco lnga'i bar du sems can thams cad la sring rje'i sems dang ldan pa
70a2(rgyud): dus gsum du khrus bgyi ba dang / dus gsum du gos brje bar bgyi ba ste/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa ba lang gi lcibs bskus la/ me tog sna tshogs kyis khebs par bgyis te/ bum pa gang ba
70a3(rgyud): bcu drug dang / mar me bcu drug kyang gzhag par bgyi'o// gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs kyis kyang sa phyogs de brgyan par bgyi'o// ro sna tshogs sbyar ba'i lha ba shos
70a4(rgyud): rgya chen po phab la spos chab kyis phyogs der chag chag btab nas/ nam sku gzugs dang / sa gzhi 'gul ba dang / bdag nyid kyang dga' bar gyur pa'i bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o//
70a5(rgyud): de nas des 'di ni gcig tu nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro snyam du shes par bgyi'o// de nas de'i 'og tu bdag gis rmid lam du bstan par bgyi zhing 'bel ba'i gtam bgyi'o// bsam pa thams cad
70a6(rgyud): kyang yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// bu gcig pa bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// dam pa ci 'tshal ba'ang stsal bar bgyi ste/ gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ma dad cing spong bar
70a7(rgyud): bgyid pa ni ma gtogs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje khyod kyis tshig de skad smras pa legs so legs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa
70b1(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'dod sems can bsod nams chung ngu rnams kyi yul na spyod par/
70b2(rgyud): mimi 'gyur ro// 'di ni sems can bsod nams chung ngu rnams kyis yi ger 'dri ba 'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug pa'am/ 'chang ba 'am/ klog par mi nus te/ de dag la bdud kyi bar chad byed
70b3(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu bzhi po 'di dag ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / nyan du 'jug pa'i bdud kyi las yin te/ bzhi gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ le lo dang /
70b4(rgyud): ma dad pa dang / bla ma la sri zhu med pa dang / chos smra ba'i sems mi brtan pa ste/ rigs kyi bu des de la 'di ni bdud kyi las yin no snyam du shes par bya'o// gzhan yang bdud kyi las bzhi yod/
70b5(rgyud): de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la 'dun pa med pa dang / yid la mi byed pa dang / khengs pa'i tshig sba ba dang / 'jig rten 'di la sems pa ste/ 'di snyam du
70b6(rgyud): 'jig rten 'di la'ang 'jigs pa med do// 'jig rten pha rol la'ang 'jigs pa med do// sdig pa'i las rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'ang med do// bdag la tshig mi gsal ba'ang med/
70b7(rgyud): do yid rtul ba'ang med do// bdag ni mdzes pa yin no// bdag ni dbang phyug dang ldan no snyam du mi sems shing khyim dang bu spang rnams la zhen to// de dag ni bskal pa du mar sdug bsngal bar/
71a1(rgyud): 'gyur te/ bzhi po de dag ni de dag gi mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par blta bar bya'o// gzhan yang bdud kyi las bani yod de/ bani gabazhin/ 'dis ste/ nor la brnam pa
71a2(rgyud): ste/ de dag bskal pa du mar sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba dang / de dag ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang dgod cing smra ba dang / chung mas yid bde ba dang / chos nyan pa de dag gi 'dun pa zlog par byed pa ste/
71a3(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ blon po dang 'khor rnams de dag gi thad du lhags nas/ 'di skad du sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa med do// chos smra ba 'do ni sdig pa byed pa/ dbang gis rgyags pas myos pa/ 'dod pa la log
71a4(rgyud): par g.yem pa phra ma la dga' ba yin te/ 'di ni khyod kyi srog gi bar rang byed par 'gyur la khyod ni chos la gnas pa ste/ khyod kyis chos mang du byas so// khyod ni mdo sde klog pa
71a5(rgyud): dang 'drir 'jug pa yin no zhes 'dzer te/ de dag mdo 'di yi ger 'drir 'jug par mi byed/ mchod par mi byed de/ de dag la ni tshe 'di nyid la'ang bar chad mang bar 'byung bar 'gyur la/ phyi ma la'ang
71a6(rgyud): sems can dmyal bar 'tsho bar 'gyur te/ de'ang rigs kyi bu des bdud kyi las yin par rig par byas la/ de'i dbang du 'gyur bar mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs
71a7(rgyud): po dag ngas len gnyis lan gsum du tshig gis bsgo ste/ bag yod par gyis shig/ phyis sems can dmyal ba dag btso bar gyur na 'gyod par gyur ta re/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
71b1(rgyud): de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// ngas ni mdo sde'i rgyal po bstan// byang chub la ni sems can du ma bkod// sangs rgyas tshul yang de yis bstan par gyur/ de thos nas
71b2(rgyud): ni bag kyang yod par gyis// khyod rnams byi dus rab tu 'jig pa'i tshe// log par lhung bar 'gro bar gyur ta re// mdo 'di la ni rtag tu gang dad pa// de ni nges par nga yi bu yang yin// mdo 'di la
71b3(rgyud): ni rtag tu gang mchod pa// de ni sangs rgyas zhing du skye bar 'gyur// gang phyogs mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di gnas pa// der ni 'byung po gnod sbyin srin po dang // yi dag grul bum lto 'phye chen po dang /
71b4(rgyud): gshed byed byed snyems rnams kyis yong mi tshugs// de ni bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs shing // de ni bde bar byang chub 'tshang yang rgya// de'i tshe rgyal po chen po bzhis tshigs su bcad pa 'ang
71b5(rgyud): dag thos nas// ros kyi shugs kyis mchi ma blags te/ lus 'dar bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
71b6(rgyud): 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis chos smra ba de la mchod par bgyi'o// chos nyan pa de dag la'ang bsrung bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang
71b7(rgyud): yi ger 'drir stsol ba dang / gzungs 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / chos smra ba de la gos dang rgyan dag gis mchod pa bgyid pa de la'ang bdag cag gis bsrung
72a1(rgyud): par bgyi'o// de'i yul yang yongs su bsnang bar bgyi'o// nor dang 'bru thams cad kyang stsal bar bgyi'o// bu gcig pa bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o//
72a2(rgyud): g.yul 'gyed pa thams cad du'ang mdun du mchi bar bgyi'o// rgyal srid thams cad du'ang ches bkur sti 'gyid par 'gyur bar bgyi ste/ bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bka' drin gzo bar bgyid/
72a3(rgyud): kyi/ bka' drin mi gzo bar mi bgyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mchod par mi bgyid pa dang / chos smra ba de dag la'ang mchod par mi bgyid pa de la/
72a4(rgyud): ni bdag cag gis sems mi bde bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po dag legs so legs so//
72a5(rgyud): rgyal po chen po khyed legs kyis rtag tu khyed kyis de ltar gyis shig/ de nas dri za'i bdag po chen po yul 'khor srung gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
72a6(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe sems can mi dge ba spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la ma dad cing gro bar ma chud pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni
72a7(rgyud): chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis bu 'dzin par mi bgyid/ klog par mi bgyid/ yi ger 'drir stsol bar mi bgyid/ sbyin pa sbyin par mi bgyid/ sbyin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa la yid mi ches shing /
72b1(rgyud): 'jig rten 'da'i bde ba la lta bar gyid de/ sems can de lta bu dag gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba'i mdo sde'i rgyal po chen po 'di bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
72b2(rgyud): rigs kyi bu chos gnyis kyis sems can dmyal bar ltung bar byed de/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'dod chags dang / ne sdang dang / rigs kyi bu chos de gnyis kyis sems can dmyal bar ltung bar
72b3(rgyud): byed do// rigs kyi bu chos 'di bzhis ni bde 'gror 'gro bar byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang / bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang / bdon/
72b4(rgyud): pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// rgya chen sbyin pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che//
72b5(rgyud): ngan song ngan 'gro kun las rab grol byed// rmongs pa'i sems can rtag tu 'dod la chags// chags pa sna tshogs brgya yis de dag myos// mdo sde 'di la dad par mi byed cing // sangs rgyas bstan
72b6(rgyud): la sbyin pa sbyin mi byed// sems can de 'dra ba dag ngan song sar// skyes nas tshor ba dag kyang myong bar 'gyur// sems can de dag la ni phan pa'i phyir// de ltar mdo sde mthu chen rab tu bstan// mad/
72b7(rgyud): sde 'di la rtag tu dad pa gang // de la gshed byed med cing sdig byed med// 'byung po grul bu ma lto 'phye chen po med// rgyal po de la sdig pa byed pa med// legs 'dri nyan du 'jug dang mchod pa dang //
73a1(rgyud): legs par 'dzin pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa// sangs rgyas ye shes kyis ni bsngags pa de// sems can kun gyis bskul mang brjod pa nus// gang dag rtag tu
73a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub rnams// brjod cing mchod pa byed pa de dag dang // la la gzhan 'gas mdo sde 'di nyid las// yi ge 'bru gcig tsam yang legs bris na// de la bsod nams snga ma de yis ni// de yi
73a3(rgyud): brgya stong char yang mi phod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
73a4(rgyud): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dad de/ me tog dang / gdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
73a5(rgyud): ba dan rnams kyis mngon par mchod pa dang / chos smra ba de dag dang / 'dri ba rnams dang / 'dzin pa rnams la mchod pa chen pos mchod pa bgyid pa de dag ni/ tshe 'di nyid la yon tan dang phan yon mang
73a6(rgyud): bo thob par 'gyur te/ de'i lus la mig nad dang / rna ba'i nad dang / sna nad dang / lce nad dang / rims nad dang / dug dang / mtshon dang / mes mi tshugs lags so// de dag la ba mas yid bde/
73a7(rgyud): ba dang / bu dang chung mas yid bde ba dang / khyim gyis yid bde ba 'byung bar 'gyur lags so// g.yul 'gyed pa thams cad du'ang rgyal bar 'gyur ro// 'gum pa'i tshe'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi
73b1(rgyud): 'khrugs pas yang dag par dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/ kye mi khyod tshur shog/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du song zhig/ skyes bu chen po khyod ni dge ba'i rtsa ba 'bar ba dang ldan te/ gang /
73b2(rgyud): du 'dod pa'i gnas rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes gsung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
73b3(rgyud): ldan 'das legs so legs so// de bzhin gshegs pas 'dzam bu'i gling du bzhag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las bgyid pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das rig sngags chen mo 'di
73b4(rgyud): ni las thams cad rnam par dag par bgyid pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni sems can bsod nams chung ngu dag gi yul na spyod par mi 'gyur ro//
73b5(rgyud): sems can bsod nams chung ngu dag gis thos par mi 'gyur ro// lag tu 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi mthus gang gi lag tu 'ongs sam/ de bzhin gshegs pas nyan du bcug na/
73b6(rgyud): des thos pa'i mod kho na la bri bar bya/ yi ger 'drir gzhug par bya/ bklag par bya'o// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming tsam thos na'ang ngan 'gros 'dzi
73b7(rgyud): par mi 'gyur ro// la la zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las yig 'bru gcig tsam mam/ ming tsam nyan du bcug gam/ phyogs sam/ yul 'ga' zhig tu lung 'bog par byed na/ de ni/
74a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa bdun po rnams kyis bsrungs so// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis rjes su la rang ngo // ma thams cad kyis rjes su bzung ngo // yongs su/
74a2(rgyud): bskyangs so// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha ma lta bu'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la// byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
74a3(rgyud): 'das smad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par thams cad rdzogs par gang du spyod par 'gyur lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu
74a4(rgyud): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnas dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi gnas su thams cad rdzogs par gnas par 'gyur ro// lho phyogs su'ang spyod par 'gyur ro// 'dzam
74a5(rgyud): bu'i gling du ni cung zad tsam gnas par 'gyur te/ gnas kha cig kha cig tu spyod par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// /
74a6(rgyud): lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung bar bya ba dang / bklag par bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba dang / nyan du gzhug par bya ba'i phyir khyod la gtad do// de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba'i chos
74a7(rgyud): kyi rnam grangs 'di nus par gyur te re/ 'don de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba byed pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
74b1(rgyud): ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bgyi ba dang / bklag par bgyi ba dang / mchod par bgyi ba dang / nyan du gzhug par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag gis gzung lags so// chos spras/
74b2(rgyud): de dag la'ang mchod par bgyi/ rjed par bgyi'o// gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang / chos smra ba de dag la mchod par bgyid pa don bdag la'ang mchod par bgyid pa lags te/ de bdag gis bsrung bar
74b3(rgyud): bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi ste/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bka' drin gzo bar bgyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje kha legs so zhes bya
74b4(rgyud): ba byin nas/ lag na rdo rje legs so legs so// khyod kyis de ltar gyis shing / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces
74b5(rgyud): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la phyag 'tshal lo// chos nyan pa de dag dang / yi ger 'dri ba rnams dang / 'dzin pa rnams dang / klog pa rnams dang / nyan du 'jug pa rnams
74b6(rgyud): la'ang mngon par mchod par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te sems can bsod nams chung ngu dag gi yul du dro kyi rnam grangs 'di byung ngam/ gal te rgyal po chos dang mi ldan pa'i yul du chos kyi rnam grang /
74b7(rgyud): 'di byung ste spyod pa na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la rgyal po de mchod par mi bgyid/ dad par mi bgyid la/ chos smra ba de dag dang / yi ger 'dri ba rnams dang / 'dzin pa rnams dang / klog pa rnams
75a1(rgyud): dang / nyan du gzhug pa rnams dang / lung dbog pa rnams la'ang mchod par mi bgyid/ bla ma'i 'du shes skyed par mi bgyid na/ des na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nub par 'gyur
75a2(rgyud): lags so// de'i yul du sdig pa'i chos mang po dang / yid mi bde ba mang po 'byung bar 'gyur te/ des na rgyal rigs rgyal po des bdag gi yul du chos nub par gyur to snyam du 'tshal bar bgyi ste/ des chos
75a3(rgyud): spyad par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// de ni de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu dper na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can gang la la zhig gis/
75a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la lo brgya 'am/ lo stong gi bar du bla na med pa'i mchod pas mchod pa byed la/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir
75a5(rgyud): rin po ches yongs su gang bar byas te/ nyan thos rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams la sbyin pa byin pa dang / bdag nyid yongs su gtong ba gang yin pa dang / chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo yongs su gtong
75a6(rgyud): ba gang yin pa dang / gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchod pa 'am/ yi ger 'dri ba 'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug pa 'am/ klog pa 'am/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog
75a7(rgyud): 'phreng rnams kyis mchod de/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i phyir/ zho'i brgyad gcig tsam sbyin pa byin na/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba snga ma shos de ni brgya'i
75b1(rgyud): char yang nye bar mi 'od na/ gang bla ma'i 'du shes bskyed de/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyis mchod pa byed cing / chos smra ba de dag la'ang gos
75b2(rgyud): sam/ rgyan nam/ gdugs sam/ bzhon pa'am/ grong khyer ram/ sa gni ba lang gi rmig rjes tsam yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i phyir sbyin pa byed la/ lus 'di ni snying po med pa'o snyam du shes
75b3(rgyud): shing rmi lam lta bu'o// sgyu ma lta bu dang / chu'i chu bur lta bu'o snyam du shes te/ lus 'di la ni snying po med do// chos thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o snyam du shes na/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pas lung
75b4(rgyud): bstan pa kho na yin no// de bzhin gshegs pas dbugs phyung ba kho na yin no// de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa yin no// phyis kyang mthar gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
75b5(rgyud): byang chub kyi bar du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha'i dbang po rnams dang / klu'i dbang po rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang /
75b6(rgyud): po rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po rnams dang / mi'i dbang po rnams kyis tshig mthun par/ bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba gsol te/
75b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so// 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis bskor bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang gcig tu mthun par bgyis te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
76a1(rgyud): la mchod par bgyi'o// yul de'ang bskyang bar bgyi'o// chos smra bde la'ang mchod par bgyi bsrung bar bgyi/ lung bstan par bgyi/ dbugs dbyung bar bgyi'o//
76a2(rgyud): gang la la chos smra ba dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa de la bla ma'i 'du shes bskyed pa dang / pa'i 'du shes dang / bu'i 'du shes bskyed pa de la ni/ bdag cag gis
76a3(rgyud): pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bgyi'o// gal te chos kyi rnam grangs de ma rungs par bgyid na ni/ de'i yul thams cad du bu dang / mchis brang dang / pha mas yid mi bde bar 'gyur la/ de'i
76a4(rgyud): 'og tu sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang lha'i dbang po nas mi'i dbang po'i bar de dag la legs so legs so//
76a5(rgyud): zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu dag legs so legs so// grogs po dag khyed kyis de ltar gyis shig/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan du gzhug pa dang mchod par bya ba'i phyir khyed la gtan
76a6(rgyud): do// de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di myur du nub par gyur ta re/ la la zhig gis spangs te sems can dmyal bar lhung b.re/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni skye bo mang po la
76a7(rgyud): phan pa dang / skye bo mang lta bde bar 'gyur ba'o// khyod kyis 'gyod par gyur ta ra/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na sa chen po 'di g.yos te/ g.yos/ rab tu g.yos srog chags
76b1(rgyud): drug stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces/
76b2(rgyud): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir stsol ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag
76b3(rgyud): la'ang rgyas par yang dag par ston pa dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'breng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
76b4(rgyud): dang / ba dan rnams kyis mchod par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams ji snyed cig skyed par 'gyur lags gang du ni skye bar 'gyur lags
76b5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// khyod kyis de bzhin//
76b6(rgyud): gshegs pa la 'di zhus pa ni legs so// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas khyod la bshad do// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la chos
76b7(rgyud): kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgyas par yang dag par ston pa dag /
77a1(rgyud): me tog dang / bdug pa dang / me tog 'phreng dang byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyis mchod pa
77a2(rgyud): byed pa de ni/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gang la las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po ches yongs su
77a3(rgyud): gang bar byas te/ nyan thos rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams la sbyin pa byin pa bas ni/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / mchod pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug
77a4(rgyud): pa dang / chos smra ba de dag la'ang me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa la sogs pas mchod pa 'di rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod
77a5(rgyud): nams ches mang du 'phel bar 'gyur gyi/ rigs kyi bu snga ma gang yin pa de ni de snyed bsags pa ma yin no// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad de/
77a6(rgyud): bu dang / bu mo dang / chung ma yongs su gtong ba dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mig dang / mgo bo yongs su gtong ba bas ni/ gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yi ger 'dri ba 'am
77a7(rgyud): yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/ klog gam dad par byed pa 'di bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar 'gyur gyirigs kyi bu snga ma gang yin pa des ni de skad bsags pa ma yin no// chos snga
77b1(rgyud): ba'i rigs kyi bu de de de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba kho nar blta bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba kho nar mchod pa mngon par 'du bya bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang
77b2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin pa /
77b3(rgyud): bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi ba'i 'os lags so// chos smra ba de la phyag bgyi ba dang / mchod par bgyi ba'i 'os lags so// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni rdza
77b4(rgyud): 'phrul che ba lags te/ de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can gyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gus par bgyi ste mnyan par 'gyi'o// gus par bgyi ste yid la bgyi'o//
77b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das sa phyogs gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa'i sa phyogs de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa lags so// sa phyogs de ni mchod rten du gyur par blta
77b6(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// sa phyogs de ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi ba'i gnas lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rigs kyi
77b7(rgyud): bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rigs bu sa phyogs de ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi ba'i gnas yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la
78a1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs/
78a2(rgyud): 'di la'ang mchod pa bgyid la/ 'di'i slad du mchod pa dang bkur sti la brtson pa'i sems kyi sbyin pa yungs 'bru tsam stsal na/ de'i mtshams med pa lnga'i las rnams yongs su zad par
78a3(rgyud): 'gyur la/ bskal pa dgu khri'i bar du longs spyod che ba'i rigs rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// bskal pa brgyad khri'i bar du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing
78a4(rgyud): yongs su dag pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// gau shis ngan du 'gum par mi 'gyur ro// ngan song du skye bar mi 'gyur ro// bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de nas
78a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/ rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i
78a6(rgyud): dus na bskal pa bgrang ba las 'das pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi ye shes mtha' yas pa chags pa med cing rdul dang bral ba'i rgyal po'i tog ces bya ba byung ste/ der ngas bram ze'i/
78a7(rgyud): gzungs kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos so// thos nas kyang sems can rnams la bshad do// de ngas rnyed pa'i mod la chos la bzod pa thob ste/ chos rnams la chos kyi mig rnam par dag
78b1(rgyud): go ka sems can gang dag gis thos pa de dag thams cad kyang ngan song thams cad las yongs su grol te/ nams kyang ngan song du mi 'gro bar 'gyur la/ chos rnams la chos kyi mig rnam par
78b2(rgyud): dag ste/ sems can de dag thams cad mthar gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// rigs
78b3(rgyud): kyi bu ngas kyang lo mang po lo brgya phrag mang po lo stong phrag mang po lo 'bum phrag mang por sems can 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis dkris pa rnams kyi phyir/
78b4(rgyud): nor dang / 'bru dang / 'gron bu dang / gser yongs su gtong ba byas nas/ mthar gyis lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mig dang / mgo bo dang / sdug pa'i bu dang / chung ma dang / bu mo'i
78b5(rgyud): bar du yongs su gtong ba byas so// rkang dang rus pa yongs su gtong ba dang / khyim dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang yongs su
78b6(rgyud): gtong ba byas so// lo 'bum phrag du mar tshangs par spyod pa spyad do// khyim pa dang 'dres par ma byas// rgyal srid la dga' ba dang // nor la dga' ba dang / yul 'khor dang po zang 'khor la
78b7(rgyud): dga' ba dang / bu dang bu mo la dga' ba dang / chung ma la dga' bar ma byas so// gcig tu nges par tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa bsten to// gcig tu nges par sbyin pa byin no// gcig tu nges par
79a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun rnams la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byas so// gcig tu nges par yang chos smra ba rnams la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang //
79a2(rgyud): me tog 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas so//
79a3(rgyud): dge ba'i bshes nyen mang po'ang ngas bsnyen bkur byas so// de'ang ngas 'khor ba la skyo ba'i lugs kyis lus rnams byin la/ mig rnams dang / rang gi sha rnams dang / rkang dang rus pa rnam
79a4(rgyud): dang / rang gi pags pa rnams kyang byin na/ phyi rol gyi dngos po gzhan dag lta ci smos te/ nga 'gyod par gyur pa'ang med do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha'i dbang po rnams dang // /
79a5(rgyud): klu'i dbang po rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang / me'i dbang po rnams dang / spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa rnams
79a6(rgyud): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi tshul 'di thos nas/ chos kyi shugs kyis mchi ma blags te/ de dag thams cad kyis bzod pa thob par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
79a7(rgyud): pa/ grogs po dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung zhig/ 'di ni sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba byed pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags/
79b1(rgyud): ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dad pa dang / mchod pa bgyid pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par/
79b2(rgyud): bgyid pa'i sems can de dag ni dkon lags so// gang dag gi sug par mchis pa de dag ni sangs rgyas byung ba dang 'dra bar blta bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs
79b3(rgyud): kyi bu leg so legs so// rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang mos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod par byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug
79b4(rgyud): ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / chos smra ba de dag la'ang me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang /
79b5(rgyud): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyis mchod pa byed pa de dag ni dkon te/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba kho nar blta bar bgyi'o// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grang
79b6(rgyud): 'di la mchod par mi byed pa dang / 'dzin par mi byed pa dang / klog par mi byed pa dang / sbyin pa mi byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni bskal pa du ma dang / bskal pa brgya dang / bskal
79b7(rgyud): pa stong gi bar du 'khor ba na 'khor bar 'gyur te/ sdug bsngal mang po sdug bsngal brgya dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ dper na bud med sbrum ma zhig yod la/ bud med
80a1(rgyud): sbrum ma de'i ljon bu chags pa de'ang / khye'u 'am bu mo zhig tu gyur na// bud med de'i bu gang gi tshe zla ba gcig lon nam/ zla ba gnyis lon nam/ zla ba gsum lon
80a2(rgyud): nam/ zla ba lnga lon nam/ zla ba tshang ba'i bar du gyur pa de tsam du bud med de'i lus non par gyur te/ tshigs kyang 'bye bar 'gyur/ lho'ang chung bar 'gyur/ skad kyi gcom yang chung bar 'gyur te/ tshe
80a3(rgyud): ba de dag gis yongs su gzir ba'i lus kyis de tsam gyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bzhin du lus 'dzin par byed de/ bu btsa' ba'i dus kyi bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong ngo // de 'di
80a4(rgyud): snyam du sems te/ gang gi tshe bdag gi bu btsa' bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag bde bar btsas par gyur na/ de'i tshe tshangs par spyad par bya'o snyam mo// de phyis yang 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis chags par/
80a5(rgyud): gyur na/ sdug bsngal de dag phyis mi dran te/ bde ba'i 'du shes skyed par byed do// de bzhin du phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na/ sems can 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dad par mi byed//
80a6(rgyud): mchod par mi byed/ 'dzin par mi byed/ klog par mi byed/ de dag sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// de dag kyang 'dre//
80a7(rgyud): chags kyis myos nas tshor ba de dag bzod par 'gyur te/ bdag cag gis khyim dang bu smad yongs su bskyang bar bya'o// chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo yongs su bskyang bar bya'o snyam mo// gang gi
80b1(rgyud): che'ang sems can dmyal bar skye ba de'i tshe ni 'gyod par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe phyir thar par gyur pa de'i tshe ni/ 'dod chags kyis chags nas sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal brjed par gyur te/
80b2(rgyud): sbyin pa'ang sbyin par mi byed/ tshul khrims kyang srung bar mi byed do// 'di lta ste/ dper na mi rang gi sa rab zhing myos te/ tshabs cher ro zhing myos ya/ gtu lum par gyur nas// mi de sems kyis kyang /
80b3(rgyud): khyim 'chol mi nus/ lam yang mi 'arol/ pha ma dang / chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo'i 'du shes kyang med/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun yang mi dran te/ de chang gis byos pa de'i
80b4(rgyud): mthus dur khrod na 'dug na'ang 'jigs pa med la/ 'di snyam du sems te/ lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nga skrag par byed nus pa su zhig yod snyam po// de bong ba dang / shing dang rtswa dang / tsher ma'i
80b5(rgyud): mal gzhan dag la bde ba'i 'du shes bskyed pa las lus sor chud cing // ra ro ba de sangs nas gang gi tshe dran pa rnyed par gyur pa de'i tshe 'gyod par byed de/ bdag ni srog la thug kyang bla/ bdag gis
80b6(rgyud): chang ni btung bar mi bya'o snyam mo// de bzhin du sems can 'dod chags kyis brgyags shing khyim na gnas pas rnam par 'khrul pa nor gyis sems myos pa rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas dang
80b7(rgyud): chos dang / dge 'dun yang yongs su 'tshol bar mi byed/ sbyin pa'ang mi dranamatho ris su skye ba dang / rgyal por 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye ba'ang yongs su 'chol bar mi byed de//
81a1(rgyud): 'khor ba de nyid na 'khor zhing / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams su skyes pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur
81a2(rgyud): la 'di snyam du 'dzin te/ bdag gi lus ni bde ste/ sdug bsngal ba med do snyam mo// gang gi tshe sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig
81a3(rgyud): rten de dag nas thar te/ brgya la brgya lam na mi'i lus thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ mngal na gnas pas lus yongs su gzir cing mun nag gis kyang yongs su skyo/ mngal du skye bar gyur pa'i
81a4(rgyud): lus bad kan dang / mkhris pa dang / ldan ljin dang / khrag dang / phyi sa sa brtags pas skyo bar gyur nas 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag lo brgya'am/ bskal pa 'am
81a5(rgyud): bskal pa brgya 'am/ bskal pa stong 'am/ bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du 'khor ba na 'khor zhing / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi bzad cing yid du mi 'ong ba'i sdug bsngal myong la gang du'ang/
81a6(rgyud): bdag cag gis skyabs med pa 'di las gang dag gi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yin zhig gu bdag cag gis kyang sngon sdig pa mang du byas so snyam ste/ de ltar mngal na gnas nas sems//
81a7(rgyud): can dmyal ba dang 'dra bar 'gyod pa skyed par byed de/ gang gi tshe bdag cag mngal na gnas pa'i sems can dmyal ba 'di las thar par gyur pa de'i tshe ni sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge
81b1(rgyud): 'dun la mi phyed pa'i dad pas sgrub pa dang btsal bar bya ste/ ci nas kyang bdag phyin chad mngal gyi sems can dmyal bar mi 'gyur bar bya'o snyam mo// de dag phyis mngal gyi gnas nas thar
81b2(rgyud): nas bag med par byed de/ de dag yang sems can dmyal ba rnams su sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro// de lta bas na nams kyang bag med par mi bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang
81b3(rgyud): ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun
81b4(rgyud): dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can thams cad kyi skyabs byed pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ byang chub sems dpas zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig bkod pa'i rgyal po'i rnam
81b5(rgyud): par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ chos thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa'i rgyal po
81b6(rgyud): zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang
81b7(rgyud): 'jig rten skyong ba de dag thams cad dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri bar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'dra/
82a1(rgyud): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa chos thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
82a2(rgyud): rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA barma dang / su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
82a3(rgyud): gar skad du/ Ar+ya a gra pra dI pa d+hA ra Ni bid+yA rA dza/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal po sgron ma mchog gi gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
82a4(rgyud): 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga
82a5(rgyud): bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / lha dang mi 'bum phrag du ma dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas/
82a6(rgyud): nas chos ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog mtha' yas zhes bya ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ya
82a7(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgron ma mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing ga zhes la chos kyang ston pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od chen po dang / 'od dpag med ces bya ba byang chub
82b1(rgyud): sems dpa' gnyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir btang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba dang / bcom
82b2(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der sor ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan
82b3(rgyud): 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
82b4(rgyud): 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag 'bum 'das par 'jig rten gyi khams me tog mtha' yas zhes bgyi ba de na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
82b5(rgyud): rgyas sgron ma'i mchog ces bgyi ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgron ma'i mchog
82b6(rgyud): des bdag cag gnyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir btang ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgron pa'i mchog des/ bcom
82b7(rgyud): ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam bskyod pa yang ngam 'tshe 'am/ stobs dang / bde ba dang / kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa la reg par gnas sam zhes bsnyun gsol lo//
83a1(rgyud): 'di skad ces kyang gsung ngo // 'di na mi 'am/ mi ma lags pa 'am/ 'byung po 'amasha pa 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po'am/ grul bum mam/ grul bum gyi sde
83a2(rgyud): dpon nam/ rgyal po 'am/ blon po chen po 'am/ chom rkun nam sbrul lam/ srin bu 'am/ srin bu lu ta 'am sbrang bu lcags phye 'am/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gang yang rung ba bdag la 'tshe bar
83a3(rgyud): bgyid pa 'ga' yang ma mchis sam zhes gsung ngo // sems can rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba dang / mdangs dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / gzi brjid dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / grags pa
83a4(rgyud): dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / yon tan dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / stobs dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / mdog dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyab pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das
83a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgron ma'i mchog des gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag kyang bskur te/ 'di lta ste/ dz+wa le dz+wa le/ dA le ga te
83a6(rgyud): hu kru / muk+ku sa ma te/ ma hA saM ma te/ ma hA dzA le ga dz+nyA ba la me sa he sa he/ ma hA dzA le/ u ke ru ke/ sha me/ saM ma he/ ma hA saM ma te/ ma hA sha me sA hA/ de ras bcom ldan 'das kyis/
83a7(rgyud): dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag zung zhig/ long zhig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gzhan dag
83b1(rgyud): la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston cing / kun dga' bo sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka' 'o// gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag rnyed par dka' 'o// kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi
83b2(rgyud): ga ni 'di dag 'dzin pa'ang shin tu rnyed par dka' 'o// kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa dang / len pa dang / 'chang ba dang /
83b3(rgyud): klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de ni tshe rabs bdun du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// tshe 'di nyid la'ang sngon gyi las ma gtogs par gzhan gyi gnod pa
83b4(rgyud): thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad dang rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa
83b5(rgyud): bdun gyis gsungs te/ gang gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag las 'da' bar byed pa de ni de dag thams cad la 'khus pa yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma
83b6(rgyud): pham pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom
83b7(rgyud): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sems can rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba dang / mdangs dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / gzi brjid dang ldan par
84a1(rgyud): bgyi ba dang / grags pa dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / yon tan dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / stobs dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / mdog dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / bsrung ba/
84a2(rgyud): dang / sba ba dang / bskyab pa'i slad du gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams brjod par bgyi'o// 'di lta ste/ at+te bat+taM/ nat+te/ kun t+te/ pu ka se/ ku pu ka se/ ka se/ a na
84a3(rgyud): ka se nA ma ka se/ a nu ta phra nu takha dze/ ma hA kha dzaM/ sad pa pe/ ta Da phe/ tu Da be tu Da be hi li mi li ti le swA h+ma/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
84a4(rgyud): ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag zung zhig/ long zhig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shi ga ka gzhan
84a5(rgyud): dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig/ kun dga' bo sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka' 'o// gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag rnyed par dka' 'o// kun dga' bo gzungs
84a6(rgyud): kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa'ang shin tu rnyed par dka' 'o// kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa dang
84a7(rgyud): len pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de ni tshe rabs bcu gnyis su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// tshe 'di nyid la'ang
84b1(rgyud): rjod kyi las ma gtogs par gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi
84b2(rgyud): dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis kyis gsungs te/ gang gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag las yang 'da' bar byed pa ni de dag thams cad la 'khus pa yin no// de nas
84b3(rgyud): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal po sbyar
84b4(rgyud): ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sems can rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / mdangs dang ldan par bgyi ba dang /
84b5(rgyud): gzi brjid dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / grags pa dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / yon tan dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / stobs dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / mdog dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / bsrung
84b6(rgyud): ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyab pa'i srad du gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams brjod par bgyi'o// 'di lta ste/ ag khe/ bag khe/ na dzi te/ nA gA sa re ga na hI le
84b7(rgyud): hi li/ dza hi li ba hi/ tsa DI la ba te swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa kun dga' bo khyod kyis gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di
85a1(rgyud): dag zung zhig/ long zhig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston cig/ kun dga' bo sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o// gzungs
85a2(rgyud): kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag rnyed par dka'a'o// kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa'ang shin tu rnyed par dka' 'o// kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
85a3(rgyud): gang la las gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa dang / len pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de ni tshe rabs
85a4(rgyud): bcu gsum du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// tshe 'di nyid la'ang sngon gyi las ma gtogs pa gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad dang rjes su mthun par
85a5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis kyi gsungs te/ gang gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag las 'da' bar
85a6(rgyud): byed pa de ni de dag thams cad la 'khus pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ngas kyang sems can rnams kyi don dang / phan pa
85a7(rgyud): dang bde ba dang / mdangs dang ldan par bya ba dang / gzi brjid dang ldan par bya ba dang / grags pa dang ldan par bya ba dang / yon tan dang ldan par bya ba dang / stobs dang ldan par bya/
85b1(rgyud): ba dang / mdog dang ldan par bya ba dang / bsrung ba dang / sra ba dang / bskyab pa'i phyir gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams bshad do// 'di lta ste/ an+te/ ban+de/ narje/ gan/
85b2(rgyud): kle e ke/ tA She/ tu khaM/ ra ke/ ai le/ hu le/ hi li/ mi lo/ ti le/ shI le/ shA la/ ar+the/ ba nan/ kun D+h+we/ aT ba taM bar+Ne ba tI/ ka se ka
85b3(rgyud): ka se pa se pha se pha se/ ma hA pa se pha se swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gni
85b4(rgyud): 'di dag zung zhig/ long zhig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston cig/ kun dga' bo sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka' 'o//
85b5(rgyud): gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag rnyed par dka' 'o// kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags 'di dag ston pa'ang shin tu rnyed par dka' 'o// kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang
85b6(rgyud): la la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa dang len pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun nub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de ni tshe rabs bcu bzhir tshe
85b7(rgyud): rabs dran par 'gyur ro// tshe 'di nyid la'ang sngon gyi las ma gtogs pa gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las 'da' ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad dang rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gzug
86a1(rgyud): kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis gsungs te/ gang gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag las 'da' bar byed pa de ni de dag
86a2(rgyud): thams cad la 'khus pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la dag gis gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag shing skam po gsher bag med pa la bsrung ba bya ste/ yongs
86a3(rgyud): su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang bcing ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba byas na shing de la lcug gu dang lo ma dag kyang skye bar 'gyur te/ me tog dang 'bras bu/
86a4(rgyud): rnams kyang mngon par 'grub par 'gyur na/ mir gyur pa lta ci smos namaHsarba bud+d+he b+h+yaHsid+d+ha d+hu d+hA ra ti/ man+t+ra pA da ni swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang / dge
86a5(rgyud): slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag sems can rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / mdangs dang ldan par bya ba dang / gzi brjid dang ldan par bya ba dang / grags/
86a6(rgyud): pa dang ldan par bya ba dang / yon tan dang ldan par bya ba dang / stobs dang ldan par bya ba dang mdog dang ldan par bya ba dang / bsrung ba dang sba ba dang bskyab pa'i phyir
86a7(rgyud): gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi gzhan dag kyang bshad par bya'o// 'di lta ste/ at+te mat+te pa ke pA ra ke pe ke DA dra ma ti ta ra ma tig Tu Ta ma T+wA~M ga Tu Ta maH
86b1(rgyud): mu ma Te/ TuDa Tu re/ su re hi li mu le ti le swAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis gzungs kyi gsang sngags
86b2(rgyud): kye ga ni 'di dag zung zhig/ long zhig/ chongs shog/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston cig/ kun dga' bo sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed
86b3(rgyud): par dka' 'o// gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag rnyed par dka' 'o// kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi dag 'dzin pa'ang shin tu rnyed par dka' 'o// kun dga'
86b4(rgyud): bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa dang len pa dang / 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang /
86b5(rgyud): gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de ni tshe rabs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// tshe 'di nyid la'ang sngon gyi las ma gtogs pa gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las 'da' ba
86b6(rgyud): dang 'gro ba thams cad dang rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro// gang la la zhig la bsrung ba byas na de la'ang 'byung po thams cad kyis mi tshugs so// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
86b7(rgyud): dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs so// skul dang /
87a1(rgyud): srin bu dang / srin bu lu ta dang / sbrang bu lcags phye thams cad kyis mi tshugs so// rims rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / 'dus pa dang
87a2(rgyud): dus tshigs 'gyur ba las byung ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs so// zhag gcig pa'am zhag gnyis pa 'am zhag gsum pa'am/ zhag bzhi pa 'am/ zhag bdun pa 'am/
87a3(rgyud): zla ba phyed pa'am zla ba gcig pa'am lo gcig pa'am nad rgyun rings sam skad cig pa rnams kyis mi tshugs so// 'bras sam/ phol mig gam/ rkang shu'am/
87a4(rgyud): lhog pa 'am/ me pal lam shu ba 'am/ khyi rngo 'am/ g.yan pa'am/ mdze thams cad dam/ ldog pa thams cad dam gshed byed thams cad dam/ bsgyur ba'i las
87a5(rgyud): thams cad dam/ byang thams cad dam/ ro langs thams cad kyis kyang mi tshugs so// kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus
87a6(rgyud): gsungs te/ gang gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag las 'da' bar byed pa de ni de dag thams cad la 'khus pa yin no// kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni rgyal po'i bo
87a7(rgyud): brang na 'dug na'ang yid la bya'o// chom rkun gyi nang na 'dug na'ang yid la bya'o// srin po'i nang na 'dug na'ang yid la bya'o// gcan gzan khro bo'i nang na 'dug na'ang yid la bya'o// 'brog dgon
87b1(rgyud): pa'i nang na 'dug na'ang yid la bya'o// klung dang bgrod dka' ba na 'dug na'ang yid la bya'o// me'i nang na 'dug na'ang yid la bya'o// chu'i nang na 'dug na'ang yid la bya'o// de yid la byas pa den du/
87b2(rgyud): 'jigs pa de dag thams cad mi 'byung ngo // des dug zos pa thams cad kyang khazas nyid du 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa ni 'byung po thams cad kyis
87b3(rgyud): mi tshugs so// yi dgas thams cad dang / srul po thams cad dang / gshes byed thams cad dang / bsgyur ba'i las thams cad dang / byang thams cad dang / mi dang ma ma yin pa thams
87b4(rgyud): cad kyis mi tshugs te/ kun dga' bo mdor na de la gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs so// kun dga' bo gsad pa'i rigs pa ni chad pas thal bar 'gyur ro// chad pas gcad pa'i
87b5(rgyud): rigs pa ni brdegs pas/ brdegs pa'i rigs pa ni brgyad pas/ brgyad pa'i rigs pa ni bsdigs pas/ bsdigs pa'i rigs pa ni mi tshugs su bltas pas thar par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo/
87b6(rgyud): gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gis gang la bsrung ba byas pa 'am yongs su bskyab pa 'am/ yongs su bzung bas bcing ba 'am/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba byas pa
87b7(rgyud): gzhan du 'gyur ba de ni gnas med de/ lha dang bcas/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lham
88a1(rgyud): yin gyi nang na'ang ngas ma mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las nges
88a2(rgyud): par 'byung bar byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro// de nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rdzogs pa'i rjes la/ rgyal po chen po bzhis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag
88a3(rgyud): cag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgya cher rgyas par bgyi ba dang / chos smra ba de dag rjes su yongs su gzung ba dang / dam pa'i chos ci nas kyang yun ring du gnas pa dang / bdud thams cad tshar gcod pa'i/
88a4(rgyud): slad du gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams rjes su stsal bar 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la legs so zhes bgyi ba gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
88a5(rgyud): rgyal po chen po bzhi la thugs brtse ba'i phyir cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ste/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang bar rig nas ched du
88a6(rgyud): brjod pa ched du brjod do// de ni 'di lta ste/ dan n+te/ de ni rbe/ ma hA na n+te/ dza~M b+hanA/ sta~M b+ha ne/ Ta Te Ta Ta ne ma hA Ta Ta ne/ kun+te/ ku Ta ne/ ma hA ku nu ne/ d+harmA le ka tsarma le swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das
88a7(rgyud): 'di dag ni gzungs 'di'i 'khor gyi tshig lta bur gda' ba lags te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa dang / bzlas te bton nas 'chang
88b1(rgyud): ba de ni sngon gyi las ma gtogs par gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las 'da' ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad dang rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro// de la ni dam pa'i chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba la'ang bar
88b2(rgyud): tshad 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag la grogs po dag khyed bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa legs so legs so zhes bya ba
88b3(rgyud): byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis de dag rdzu 'phrul che bar 'gyur ba dang / phan yon che ba dang / byin che bar 'gyur ba'i phyir
88b4(rgyud): gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung zhig/ long zhig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston cig/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
88b5(rgyud): 'das rgyas par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag gis bzung lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// gzungs
88b6(rgyud): sngags kyi ni mdo sde 'di// sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa ste// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// de ni ngas kyang bshad pa yin// gang zhig gzungs sngags mdo sde 'di// 'dzin tam
88b7(rgyud): yang na klog byed pa// tshe rabs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu// de ni tshe rabs dran par 'gyur// gzungs sngags 'di rjod byed de la// mi min gang yang rung ba dang // gnod sbyin grul bum srin po dag/
89a1(rgyud): nams kyang bar chad mi byed do// gzungs sngags 'di rjod de la ni// 'dod khams dbang phyug gang yin pa// sdig can bdud de nam du yang / bar chad byed par mi
89a2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin byed de yi// pha ma dang ni phu nu dang // sring mo mdza' ba shes gnyen dag kyang // log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ro// de phyir gzungs sngags mdo sde 'di//
89a3(rgyud): 'jigs med gang gis thos gyur nas// gzungs sngags 'di rjod byed pa des// nams kyang 'jigs par mi bya'o// gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin byed de yi// bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su/
89a4(rgyud): sgrib pa'i las ni gang byas pa// zhag bdun gyis ni byang bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams gang // bskal pa bye bar bsgrubs pa kun// gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin//
89a5(rgyud): byed pa des// zhag bdun gyis ni zil gyis non// phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten skyong ba po// rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag/ lus ngan dang ni yul 'khor srung / mig mi bzang dang
89a6(rgyud): 'phags skyes po// kha dog ldan zhing grags dang ldan// 'khor bcas blon bcas de dag kyang // gzungs sngags 'di ni rjod byed pa// de la rtag tu srung bar byed// de nas bcom ldan
89a7(rgyud): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / 'phags pa byams pa dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'
89b1(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
89b2(rgyud): mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal po sngon ma mchog gi gzungs rdzogs so// @rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA d+hA ra NI/ bod/
89b3(rgyud): skad du/ 'phags pa gzungs chen mo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgya
89b4(rgyud): bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo grong
89b5(rgyud): khyer gnas bcas su dbyar gnas nas dbyar zla ba gsum 'das pa dang chos gos byas te/ chos gos zin nas lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas phyin
89b6(rgyud): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di/
89b7(rgyud): skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / stobs dang / gzi brjid kyi phyir gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags
90a1(rgyud): kyi gzhi 'di dag zung zhig/ chongs shig/ long zhig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ yid la zung zhig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga'/
90a2(rgyud): gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams ni rnyed par dka' zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba'ang rnyed par dka'
90a3(rgyud): ba'i phyir te/ dper na u du ma ba ra'i me tog lta bu yin gyis zung zhig/ chongs shig/ long zhig/ lhogs shig/ yid la zung zhig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ kun dga' bo dad pa'i rigs
90a4(rgyud): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di 'tshang ngam/ 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ yid la 'dzin tam/ kun chub par byed na/ de mtshon gyis 'chi ba'i dus
90a5(rgyud): byed par mi 'gyur/ dug gis ma yin/ mes ma yin/ chus ma yin/ rgyal po'i chad pas ma yin te/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// de lha dang / lha ma yin dang / klu dang / chung
90a6(rgyud): lha dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri ba dang / ma'amachi dang / lto 'bye chen pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / ba dang / grul bum dang / srul po dang / lus mul gyi
90a7(rgyud): dang / 'byung ba dang / brjed byed dang / smyo byed dang / gdon pa dang / grib gdan dang / gsheng byed dang / gnang byed dang / byad kyis ma tshugs// del ri ring mi ma yin pa rnams kyis
90b1(rgyud): mtshugs/ de la rig pa'i las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyims kyis mi tshugs/ de la rims nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / sbyi bzhi pa dang //
90b2(rgyud): rtag pa'i rim dang / 'byung po'i rims dang / yud tsam dang / rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pas mi tshugs par
90b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi ni 'di rnams yin no// tad+ya thA/ dz+wa le/ ma hA dz+wa le/ dz+wa la ne/ ma hA dz+wA le ne/ tA pa ni/ ma hA tA pa ne/ dz+wa la te/ uk+ke/ buk+ke/
90b4(rgyud): b+ha daM dam hA saM b+ha da/ tsakre/ ma hA tsakr-i/ bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'gro ba thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/ kun
90b5(rgyud): dga' bo gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun gyis gsungs te/ da'ang de ltar 'chad cing rjes su yi rang ngo // kun
90b6(rgyud): dga' bo dang pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ yid la byed dam/ kun chub par byed na/
90b7(rgyud): dem bas bdun gyi bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// de byang chub kyi sems las mi ldog par 'gyur ro// de la gsungs chen po'i gnas gsang sngags kyi gnoni 'di rnams yin no// tad+ya thA/ na
91a1(rgyud): ban+de/ kA me/ kA ma me/ dz+nyA na se/ bad ne/ sad ne/ ya ne/ hu le/ ma hA le/ ka re ga b+hi re/ dul+lus te/ bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad dang
