91a2(rgyud): gnod pa dang / nad 'gro ba thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/ kun dga' bo gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad/
91a3(rgyud): kyis gsungs te/ nga'ang nga ldan 'chad cing rjes su so rang ngo // kun dga' bo dang pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gni 'di 'chang ngam
91a4(rgyud): 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ yid la byed dam/ kun chub par byed na/ de tshe rab sa bcu bzhi'i bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// de byang chub kyi sems las mi ldog par 'gyur/
91a5(rgyud): ro// de la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhini 'di rnams yin no// tad+ya thA/ an+de/ badz+re/ ag+ne/ bgre/ 'gre/ Thagre/ d+ha ke / d+hA ra d+hA ke/ Ta ke Ta ra ke a kas/
91a6(rgyud): sa ka si/ maka si/ i li mi li/ ti li mi li/ ro ra be/ ma hA ro ra be b+hU ta me b+hU ta pa rA ya Ne/ ti mi ma gi se/ ma hA ti mi se/ saM b+hA be/ ma hA so b+hA bi / bdag dang sems can
91a7(rgyud): thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / nad 'go ba thams cad las srungs shi gsungs shig swA hA/ kun dge' bo gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi'ang/
91b1(rgyud): ngag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs te/ dbang da lta na 'chad cing rjes su yi rang ngo // kun dga' bo dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang /
91b2(rgyud): la la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dga'atshang ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / kun chub par byed pa de tshe rabs nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du tshe rabs dran
91b3(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// de byang chub kyi sems las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro// de la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi ni 'di rnams yin no// tad+ya thA/ ru le/ ma hA ra le/ he he ri ka mang
91b4(rgyud): ta ri/ dzaM b+ha ni/ staM b+ha ni/ kun dga' bo dang pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gis shing skam po bsrung ba'am/ yongs
91b5(rgyud): su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad pa dang /
91b6(rgyud): mtshams gcad pa dang / nam mkha' bcing ba dang sa bcing ba byas te/ de la srad bus bcings na de'i rtsa ba'ang skye bar 'gyur/ yal ga dang / lo ma dang / lcug ma dang
91b7(rgyud): me tog dang 'bras bu'ang skye bar 'gyur na/ rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa'i lus la lta spos kyang ci dgos te/ kun dga' ba sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so// kun
92a1(rgyud): dga' bo nyi zla 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba/ 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa 'di gnyis nis la khrung yang mi srid ngo // kun dga' bo ral rgyal ba
92a2(rgyud): rab gnas nas g.yo'ang srid do// kun dga' bo rgya mtsho chen po 'di ltar bab pa/ 'di ltar rgya chel/ 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul me ning mthu che ba ba ni po 'di dag ni bskams shing yongs su zad de mthar
92a3(rgyud): thug par 'gyur yang srid do// kun dga' bos chen po 'di na rnam pa stong du 'gyes kyang srid/ chu ni gsher ba nyid 'dor yang srid/ men tshab 'dor yang srid/ rlung ni grang ba 'dor yang srid kyi
92a4(rgyud): gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni su mi srid do// kun dga' bo lha'am/ klu'am/ lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ rlung lha 'am/ dri ba 'am/ mi 'am
92a5(rgyud): ci 'am/ lto 'phye chen po 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po 'am/ yi dgas sam/ sha za 'am/ grul bum mam/ srul po 'am/ lus srul po 'am/ 'byung ba
92a6(rgyud): 'am/ bram ze 'am/ srin po 'am/ grib gnon nam/ mi dang mi ma yin pa gang la la zhig gam/ gzhan su'ang rung ba zhig gis gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags 'di dag las
92a7(rgyud): 'gal bar byed/ 6/ mthi le/ sa/ bal la/ mal ye/ ma thun/ mdzan/ dzaThan/ saM blan/ bdag dang sems ca na thams cad las srungs shes sungs shig saH
92b1(rgyud): rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung yang lcags kyi 'khor lo 'bar ba / rab tu 'bar ba / kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ba / me lde gcig tu gyur pas de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gems so// sa/
92b2(rgyud): po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / rnam thos kyi bu'ang ljags kyi 'khor 'bar ba/ rab tu 'bar ba/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ba/ me lce gcig tu gyur pas de'i man
92b3(rgyud): tshal ba bdun du 'goms so// lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang rdo rje 'phen to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'ang rdo rje 'bar ba/ rab tu 'bar ba/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ba/ me lce
92b4(rgyud): gcig tu gyur pas de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas so// de rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du gnas su mi dbang ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas so// bcom ldan
92b5(rgyud): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / me dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
92b6(rgyud): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa gzungs chen po rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye
92b7(rgyud): shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o// @rgya gar skad du/ ar sbal pa ak+Sha ra pra dz+nyAH/
93a1(rgyud): ra mi tA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
93a2(rgyud): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khabar bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong khri nyis stong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po
93a3(rgyud): dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum gyis yongs su/
93a4(rgyud): bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/ dpal gyi snying po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/
93a5(rgyud): bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'dzum dmul te/ bcom ldan 'das la
93a6(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu las bsod nams che ba gang thos pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar
93a7(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / byang chub la nges par gzhol bar 'gyur ba/ gang dag gsang sngags sgrub par brtson pa de dag bgegs ma mchis par gsang sngags sgrub par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol/ de nas
93b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu khyod yun ring por sems can
93b2(rgyud): thams cad la phan pa'i phyir brtson pa legs so// de'i phyir rigs kyi bu legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu las bsod nams che ba gang thos
93b3(rgyud): pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa byang bar 'gyur ba dang / byang chub la nges par gzhol bar 'gyur ba dang / gang dag gsang sngags sgrub par brtson pa de dag bgegs med par
93b4(rgyud): sngags 'grub par 'gyur ba ngas khyod la bshad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
93b5(rgyud): gsol to// sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe sems can thams cad dgrol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so//
93b6(rgyud): mnyam par bzhag pa des smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu'i phrag nas 'od zer 'bum phrag du ma byung ste/ 'od zer de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad khyab par gyur to// sems can gang dag 'od zer
93b7(rgyud): des reg pa sems can dmyal ba yan chad sems can de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos so//
94a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du lnga'i tsin+dan gyi phye ma'i char yang phab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsungs pa 'di lta ste/
94a2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' mnyam pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang / byas pa gzo ba dang / sdig pa thams cad dang bral ba'i sems su bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po 'dir
94a3(rgyud): gdon par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ oM mu ne mu ne ma dA mu ne ye swA hA/ ngas shes rab kyi pha ro
94a4(rgyud): tu phyin pa 'di rnyed pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo// sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa chen po las khyod kyis 'di nyid tho
94a5(rgyud): pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to// khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa gse
94a6(rgyud): pa'i dpal brtsegs rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes sangs rgyas nyid du lung yang bstan to// gang dag khyod kyi ming nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher ston pa dang /
94a7(rgyud): glegs bam du bris nas mchod pa byed pa de dag thams cad ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// tad+ya thA/ oM dza ya dza ya/ pad mA b+he/ a ba me sa ra sar Ne/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hi
94b1(rgyud): d+hai ri/ de ba dz+ra/ a nu pA la ni/ bud d+ho tat+tA ra ti/ pu ra ya pU ra ya b+ha ga ba ti/ sarba A shAM ma ma pa ri pU ra ya sa pa ri bAr s+ya sarba satwA nAH/ sarba karma A ba ra tA ni mi shro d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya bud+d+ha sad+hi/
94b2(rgyud): nen sAhA/ don dam pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i yum/ 'phral du sdig pa 'phrog pa/ byang chub sbyin par byed pa ste/ 'di la
94b3(rgyud): ste/ bskal pa bye ba brgyar yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis phan yon brjod par mi nus so// 'di bklags pas dkyil 'khor thams cad du dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// gsang sngags thams
94b4(rgyud): cad kyang mngon du 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
94b5(rgyud): ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thabs sla ba'i phyir te/ sems can gang dag spro ba chung ba de dag shes rab
94b6(rgyud): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa de dag thams cad thabs slabs byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyir shes rab
94b7(rgyud): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
95a1(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis ji tsam du sems can thams cad la sman pa dang / sems can bsod nams chung ngu rnams kyi don dang sman pa dang /
95a2(rgyud): bde ba'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub
95a3(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang
95a4(rgyud): dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
95a5(rgyud): rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga ba ti pradz+nyA pa ra mi tA hri da ya/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
95a6(rgyud): snying po// bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ril
95a7(rgyud): dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das zab mo snang ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi ting nge
95b1(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab mo spyod pa nyid la/
95b2(rgyud): rnam par lta zhing phung po lnga po de dag 'a'ang rang bzhin gyis stong par rnam par lta'o// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
95b3(rgyud): bo 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa des
95b4(rgyud): ltar bslab par bya// de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so//
95b5(rgyud): shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa des/ 'di ltar rnam par blta bar bya ste/ phung po lnga po de dag kyang rang bzhin
95b6(rgyud): gyis stong par yang dag par rjes su blta'o// gzugs stong pa'o// stong pa nyid gzugs so// gzugs las stong pa nyid gzhan ma yin no// stong pa nyid las kyang gzugs gzhan
95b7(rgyud): ma yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnams stong pa'o// shA ri'i bu de lta bas na chos thams cad stong pa nyid de/ mtshan nyid med pa
96a1(rgyud): ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ drin med pa/ drim dang bral ba med pa/ zab med pa/ gang ba med pa'o// shA ro'i bu de ska bas na stong pa nyi la gzugs med/
96a2(rgyud): pa med/ 'du shes med/ 'du byed rnams med/ rnam par shes pa med/ mig med/ rna ba med/ snga med/ khre med/ lus med/ yid med/ gzugs med/ ska med/ dri med/ ro med
96a3(rgyud): reg bya med/ chos med do// mig gi khams med pa nas/ yid kyi khams med/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du'ang med do// ma rig pa med/ ma rig pa zad pa med pa nas/ rga shi med//
96a4(rgyud): rga shi zad pa'i bar du'ang med do// sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam med/ ye shes med/ thob pa med/ ma thob pa'ang med do// shA ri'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sem
96a5(rgyud): dpa' rnams thob pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la brten cing gnas te/ sems la sgrib pa med pas skrag pa med de/ phyin ci log las shin tu 'das nas mya ngan las
96a6(rgyud): 'das pa'i mthar phyin to// dus gsum du rnam par bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
96a7(rgyud): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de lta bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags/ rig pa chen po'i sngags/ bla na med pa'i sngags/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sngags/ sdug
96b1(rgyud): bsngam mams ca ba tan pa byed pa 'ams/ mdzun pa san ba dan lags pa na/ sa dkyapa ma tu phyin pa'i sngags/ smras pa// shA
96b2(rgyud): sog te/ b+ha rje swA hA/ shA ri'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de 'a shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab po la bslab par bya'o// dedus bcom ldan 'das kyi
96b3(rgyud): 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/ legs so legs so// rigs
96b4(rgyud): bu de de bzhin no// rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la spyad par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang rjes su yi rang
96b5(rgyud): ngo/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag
96b6(rgyud): dang lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// bcom ldan 'das mi shes rab kyi pha
96b7(rgyud): rol tu phyin pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so// @sangs rgyas 'khor dang bcas pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzugs sngags dang
97a1(rgyud): bcas pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das spring
97a2(rgyud): rje'i tsan dan dri zhim po'i spos chus byug pa'i sku/ zhabs pad+ma lha dang lha ma yin gyi nor bu'i cod pan gyis gtugs pa/ rang byung sel mdzad bla ma 'jig rten la phan par mdzad pa/ ston pa de bzhin
97a3(rgyud): gshegs pa thub pa nyes pa dang bral ba/ zhi ba'i bdag nyid can/ gzugs mdzes pa/ mtshan gsal ba'i gzi brjid can/ sku dpe byad kyis brgyan pa yon tan thams cad yang dag par
97a4(rgyud): rdzogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// pad+ma rgyas pa ltar zhal bzhad de/ tshems dkar zhing snyoms la thags bzang bas rab tu rgyas shing snang la nor bu drim med pa lhur 'od gsal zhing mdzes te/ swa ning
97a5(rgyud): gsal ba la nyi ma 'od zer stong 'bar ba mang po'i 'od snang ba'i dkyil 'khor zil gyis gnon pa/ thub pa'i mchog stobs bcu dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'dud do// oM b+ho/ hU~M hUM/ A A/
97a6(rgyud): hU~Md+hI/ ba shaM ba/ shA te tsU ti/ ga ma ga ma sha mA pa ya/ ta thA ga ta/ a rbu ga ta/ swaSh+TAH/ a thA ba/ sa mud tA ya/ a sa ma bal/ a bi ral ba la/ a mata pa la/ a d+hi \u0f7f li/
97a7(rgyud): mam[।।ऽ] ma #
97b1(rgyud): dugasal ba'o// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyan mnga' ba// grags shing dri ma rab spangs la// dri med skyon bral chos kyi gro// khyab bdag chen po stobs bcur ldan// rdul bral dpal dang ldan pa pa/
97b2(rgyud): rin chen sa gzhi chen po la// pho brang rtse mo rdo rje rtse// rgyal ba'i sras rnams gnas gyur pa// nor bu du ma rab 'phro zhing // 'od zer dri med gsal bkod pa'i// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor po brang na/
97b3(rgyud): thub pa'i longs spyod sa gzhi la// seng ge'i khri chen yangs la bzhugs// nor bu'i dbyig gi sa gzhi dang // khri chen rab spa de nyid la// de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes chen gyi// phun sum tshogs
97b4(rgyud): brgyan bkod lta// thub pa me zla nor bu'i 'od// nyi bar non pa'i 'od ldan pa// bde bla ga shin tu bkra shis tshul/ 'od gsal skyil mo krung bcas nas// sku 'od 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor can// 'od gsal
97b5(rgyud): rgyas pa thub dbang gis// dri med 'od zer bkye ba ni// mi g.yo rdo rje can zhes bya// dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs pa yi// rdo rje can dag rab 'dul ba// gang yin de kun dag byas nas// dkyil 'khor/
97b6(rgyud): dri med skor bar byed// ngan song dam tshig dri ma kun// legs par shin tu dag byas so// srid gsum dkyil 'khor rgya che la// rnam pa du mar 'od gsal ba// 'gro dang mi 'gro ma lus pa// bkod
97b7(rgyud): nas bde chen rdo rje can// rdo rje ral gri thobs pa de// cod pan ma g.yos nang du zhugs// de nas 'jigs pa'i sgra skad kyis// 'gengs shing mig ni glog ltar 'gyu// rig sngags hUM zhes sgrogs pa/
98a1(rgyud): bo// rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs byed pa// bzhin mdzes 'dzum gyis rnam par brgyan// sdig med mig rtsa rgod gyung cing // stan las langs te phyag 'tshal nas// legs par
98a2(rgyud): mchos byas smras pa ni// kye ma skye ba'i phyogs 'joms shing // bskal pa du ma'i dri ma sel// rig sngags yon tan sgrub byed pa// thub mchog rnams kyis rab tu gsungs// de gzigs
98a3(rgyud): dge ba du ma brnyes// sangs rgyas blo gros rgyas par gyur// byang chub sems dpa' blo gros che// bskal pa gcig tu spyod pas kyang // brgyud mar sangs rgyas kun 'byung zhing // spyod pa du ma
98a4(rgyud): 'byung ba yi// yon tan 'di yis spos ldan 'di// thob pas spro bar mi nus so// longs spyod rgya mtsho chen po can// byang chub sems mchog dkyil 'khor du// rgyal mchog rnams kyis dbang bskur
98a5(rgyud): pa'i// phyir mi ldog pa'i chos chen ldan// 'di thos sangs rgyas spyod pa yis// sems can kun gyi sdig pa rnams// ma lus rab tu bsal nas ni// blo gros dri ma med par 'gyur// ni zhing dge
98a6(rgyud): byed bkra shis la// rdul med rgyan te zhi bar byed// dge zhing mya ngan thams cad sel// sdug bsngal thams cad nges par 'joms// dbang byed gsang sngags dam pa ste// sa stengs sdig pa
98a7(rgyud): thams cad sel// ma smad 'bras bu nges par sbyin// bstan pa yin te sdang ba 'dul// nyes pa byas pa sel ba yi// gzungs 'di gang gis thos gyur des// sangs rgyas rnyed par dka'
98b1(rgyud): yang // ring por mthogs thob par 'gyur// sgrib pa thams cad rab na zhing // khyab bdag nyon mongs kun sel ba// gang zhig con mongs ni byed pa// gzungs 'di 'chang bar byed pa yis/
98b2(rgyud): kun tu bzang po nyid dang ni// lag na rdo rje nyid kyang 'thob// rig sngags 'chang gi bdag po yang // 'di thos pas ni thob par 'gyur// 'jig rten kun la lham me ba// bcom ldan rnam par
98b3(rgyud): snang mdzad kyi// dkyil 'khor dam pa gting med pa// 'di ni ji srid ma gsan par// rab zhi nyon mongs 'dul ba yi// rang byung go 'phangs ma brnyes te/ rnam par dag phyir gser gyur nas/
98b4(rgyud): gsan ma thag tu rnam par dag/ de phyir phun sum tshogs pa dang // legs par 'dod pas brjod par bya// gzhan gyis mi thub gzugs gsan nas// thub pa kun gyis gang brnyes pa// 'khor
98b5(rgyud): ba 'di ni nam du yang // bdud kyi las dang 'khrug med dang // mya ngan med cing 'thab med pa// gzungs la gnas pas 'thob par 'gyur// gnas kyi dam pa thos nas kyang // thub pa dri ma med pa'i gro//
98b6(rgyud): gzigs pa bzang rnams gar gshegs pa'o// bzang 'gro der ni 'gro bar 'gyur// legs pa 'dod pa rnams kyis ri// tshig gi mdo 'di mnyam par gyis// nyon mongs zad par bya ba la/
98b7(rgyud): rgyal bas gsungs pa'i gzungs 'di cho ga/ sdig pa byed cing dge la sdang // sdig pa'i rang bzhin rab 'jungs pa// gang gis thos nas des spong ba// nga yis mngon sum 'byor par 'gyur/
99a1(rgyud): sdig pa gzhan yang mi bya zhing // snga ma rnams kyang bgagra par bya// gzungs mchog gi ni mthu stobs kyis// sdig pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur// tshe rabs
99a2(rgyud): gzhan ni stong dag dang // tshe rabs bye ba phrag brgyar yang // sdig pa mi dge gang byas pa// dag 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// yar gyi ngo yi tshes brgyad dang // de bzhin chas ni bco lnga la/
99a3(rgyud): bsnyen gnas legs par lhur blangs te/ cho ga bzhin du sangs rgyas mchod// de nas rmongs pa med par yang // nyon mongs dgra ni rab 'joms shing // shin tu thub dka' dpe med pa/
99a4(rgyud): nyes pa zlog pa'i gzungs brjod na/ thub pa'i zhal gyi zla ba'i 'od// 'bar ba nges par mthong bar 'gyur// de nas tshogs rnams rdzogs pa yang // rgyal ba'i sras po nyid du 'gyur/
99a5(rgyud): 'od dpag med la mnga' ba yi// yon tan mtha' yas rab brgyan pa// bskal pa bye ba stong du yang // mtha' mi rtogs pa thob par 'gyur// de nas rdo rje 'chang gi tshig/ dkyil 'khor dag
99a6(rgyud): na gnas rnams kyis// thos nas rgyan rnams sna tshogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das la 'bul bar byed// rdo rje ril ba la sogs pa// lte bdag gsal ba thams cad dang // ri bo ti se ri rab la/
99a7(rgyud): gnas pa'i rig sngags 'chang rnams dang // de bzhin dkyil 'khor chen pon// 'khod pa'i ga sngags 'chang rnams dang // ma la ya yi ri bo la// gnas shing rgyan 'bar thogs rnams
99b1(rgyud): khyab 'jug lha chen la sogs pa// lha'i bdag po rnams dang ni// lag na rdo rje la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' stobs chen rnams// nor bu'i dpung rgyan nan dang // ldan napas rab tu/
99b2(rgyud): g.yo ba'i lus// rab tu bskyed de langs nas ni// sdig bral mnga' bdag rgyal ba la// phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar byas nas// kun gyi sa yi dbang phyug go// thub mchog dam pa de la ni// mtshan
99b3(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad dag gis bstod// mnyam nyid chos de de bzhin nyid// shin tu rtogs pa lham me ba// dul ba bstan pa dri ma sel// dri ma med pa skyon bral ba// thub pa sangs rgyas shin tu ni//
99b4(rgyud): 'jig rten mgon po skye dgu'i bdag/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs thul// de bzhin rgyal ba rdul bsal ba// ston pa ston mdzad brtan pa ste// sdig pa med pa rdul dang bral// 'jig
99b5(rgyud): rten mgon po sdang mdzad pa// dag pa zhi ba zas gtsang sras// nyon mongs rab bcom pan 'dogs pa// ston pa po de dri ma sel// spyod tshul dri med tshul bzang ba// zab pa rnam par gdon/
99b6(rgyud): pa btan// btsan po thugs brtse rnam par rgyal// mgon po de bzhin mgon mdzad pa// zhi ba'i bdag nyid zhe sdang bral// bcings pa las grol nges par grol// 'jig rten kun mchog/
99b7(rgyud): 'khra ba'i sa/ bdag gir mi 'dzin dri ma med// nyon mongs sel ba dpal dang ldan// dpal mdzad de bzhin phan mdzad pa// mnyam pa med pa dpe med pa// khyab bdag nyon mongs las
100a1(rgyud): sa lus /
100a2(rgyud): sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa ste// 'jig rten kun la phan par brtson// dpa' bo ni bzhi mdzad pa// nyon mongs dgra rnams zad par mdzad// mnga' bdag thabs mkhyen thabs me ga
100a3(rgyud): sems can kun gyi 'khras lags// don yod rnyed dka' bro dang ldan// rdo rje dkyil 'khor thub par dka'// skyob pa 'jigs sel tshangs pa ste// de bzhin sangs rgyas chos 'dzin pa// dang
100a4(rgyud): bo chen po 'jigs pa med// gzugs bzang mtshan rnams gsal ba ste// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' ba// chos kyi longs spyod rgya mtsho lags// dpe byad bzang po bkod pa'i sa//
100a5(rgyud): spras pa'i bdag nyid ya mtshan ston// dka' ba med pa'i ston pa po// de bzhin nges pa bde sbyin pa// mthu chen yangs pa rgya che ba// bdud bzhi'i stobs rnams sel mdzad pa// brtson chen sde/
100a6(rgyud): ba che ba ste// dgyes pa chen po stobs po che// mthu brnyes bstan pa chen po ste// gnas ldan dbang gis dar ba lags// gsal ba gsung ldan dpe med pa// dge ba stong pa nyid kyis rgyal//
100a7(rgyud): rab tu zhi ba mun pa med// blo gros chen po chos 'dzin te// phun sum tshogs ldan sa chen brnyes// 'dod pa rnams ni 'dul mdzad pa// dpal mdzad dpal mnga' dpal dang ldan// dpal gyi
100b1(rgyud): longs spyod shin tu rgyus// bcom ldan legs bgo bgo bar mdzad// gsung ldan bkra shis rgyal ba'i gnas// mnyam cid mnyam pa nyid mkhyen pa// mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshan dpag med/
100b2(rgyud): rab tu dgrol longs spyod gsal// gzhi bcas sel ba mnyam pa lags// blo dag blo ldar dri ma spangs// gnas chen brten pa ldan pa ste// rgyal ba longs spyod dri ma med// thub thugs
100b3(rgyud): rje'i rgyan mnga' ba// bskal pa bzang po 'jigs pa'i skyabs// de bzhin 'jigs med nyon mongs sel// dri med skyon bral longs spyod can// sna tshogs 'od ldan dkyil 'khor mdzes//
100b4(rgyud): sku bzang dge ba rig pa'i mchog/ thugs rje'i 'od ldan 'od bzang ba// mi gnas longs spyod dam pa lags// chos kyi rgyu ste yon tan gnas// rjed 'os mchog gnas longs spyod ni// na
100b5(rgyud): mkha' mtshan te rnam dag blo// rin chen gzugs 'dra bkra shis pa// khyu mchog che spyan pa rdzi ma// rgyal ba skyon gsal shes rab can// shes rab thabs dang ldan pa ste// 'jig rten mi dge
100b6(rgyud): kun las 'das// dag par longs spyod brtan pa dang // sa dang stobs dang ye shes bzod// pha rol phyin pa kun la mnga'// ting 'dzin mnyam par longs spyod pa// rnam par bgol
100b7(rgyud): mngon sum pa// stong pas sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// chos chen bde bar 'char ba lags// thams cad mkhyen pa yul las 'das// spyod yul sgrib pa mi mnga' ba// byang chub
101a1(rgyud): sems dpa'i dbang po rgyal// dam pa'i don de tshul che ba// shes bya'i yul rnams mtha' dag la// sgrib pa med par 'char ba brnyes// rin chen mthun par skyes pa
101a2(rgyud): ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i gnas// khyad par brnyes pa mnyam nyid brnyes// mi mnyam sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// don chen shin tu mthar phyin pa// nyon mongs bral ba thub
101a3(rgyud): par dka'// dge sbyong sdig pa sbyong mdzad pa// gnod pa med par bde bar 'byin// blo rgya che ba thams cad mkhyen// thos pa'i mtshon cha ma lus gsan// dkon pa bde bar 'thob 'gyur ba/
101a4(rgyud): mnyam pa khyad par yul dang ldan// 'jig rten thams cad dang mdzad mgon// zhi gnas mtshon cha thub par dka'/ bsam gyis mi khyab bsam yas yul// dpe med pa ste dper
101a5(rgyud): bya ba// 'od bzang rab dgyes dpal dang ldan// legs gsung bro yi stobs kyis 'byung // mkhas pa zhal bzang bde sbyin pa// rab dgyes 'das pa'i spyod yul can// gsung
101a6(rgyud): ba chen po ye shes che// gnas chen bkra shis chen po ste// mchod par gyur pa yul las 'das// bya ba'i mtshan nyid med pa po// sangs rgyas yul du skyes pa ste// shes bya'i spyod
101a7(rgyud): yul rgya che ba// kur mkhyen longs spyod 'bras bu can// 'jig rten dbang 'das spyod yul ba// kun mkhyen yul gyi snang ba ste// thabs mkhas phun sum tshogs ldan pa// rdzu 'phrul rol/
101b1(rgyud): pa'i thabs dang ldan// chos kyi gang thabs ston pa po// rab ston yon tan bsgyur mdzad pa// spyod pa ma lus 'dud par mdzad// yongs su rdzogs pa rnam par dag/ sangs rgyas spyod yul
101b2(rgyud): rnam sangs rgyas// bgegs med ma legs byed pa bcom// bdud kyi dregs pa sel bar mdzad// g.yul ngor rnam par rgyal ba brnyes// dpa' bo chen po thub med stobs// theg pa chen
101b3(rgyud): po'i shing rta bci bas// blo chen brgal bar dka' ba yi// nyon mongs rgya mtsho'i pha rol gshegs// theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas// theg pa mchog la longs spyod pa// nyan thos
101b4(rgyud): 'das pa'i spyod yul can// rang rgyal las kyang 'das pa ste// sangs rgyas pa yi 'bras bu gnas// gong nas gong du khyad par mkhyen// khyod ni nam mkha'i gnas na bzhugs// bde
101b5(rgyud): 'byungs dang zhing rnams kyi// mtsho chen dag la longs par spyod// sangs rgyas dbang po rgyas pa la// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod nas// de la lha tshogs tshogs rnams kyis// phyag
101b6(rgyud): byas mgo smad phyogs gcig 'khod// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po na// gnas pa ma lus chem mer 'khod// thod du rdo rje'i thod 'ching zhing // langs nas cod pan rab tu g.yos// dkyil
101b7(rgyud): 'khor mthon po thams cad du// skad bar chen por yongs bkang nas// nor bu'i rgyan ni rnam g.yo zhing // ha ha drag po'i sgra sgrog ste// kye ma sangs rgyas yon tan che// bskal pa grangs med
102a1(rgyud): gsum bsags pa// byang chub sems sogs mchog rnams kyis// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad legs par brjod// kye ma rnyed dang bde 'byung ba// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad thos/
102a2(rgyud): nas kyang // gang zhig klog cing rgyal la bstod// 'bras bu chen po 'grub par 'gyur// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags bcas pa// bcom ldan 'das drung brjod nas ni// sgri ba dang kun nas nyon mongs dang /
102a3(rgyud): sdig pa thams cad dag pa 'thob// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad mchog bton na// sgrib pa kun las nges grol zhing // nyon mongs mtha' dag rnam par spongs// shes rab che ba nyid du 'gyur// de ni longs
102a4(rgyud): spyod chen po dang // bde ba las kyang nyams mi 'gyur// de ni tshe rabs thams cad du// blo ldan tshe rabs dran par 'gyur// de nas rdo rje thod 'ching ba// yon tan mtha' yas sras de la/
102a5(rgyud): bcom ldan bdud las rgyal ba yis// mngon sum gzigs nas bka' stsal pa// rgyal ba'i sa 'di zhi ba ste// nga rgyal la sogs nyon mongs 'joms// 'jig rten bde ba kun las/
102a6(rgyud): 'das// de bzhin gshegs bde mngon du phyogs// gzhin gyis mi tshugs gzungs dang ni// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad nyan byed pa// de dag rnam dag bdag nyid de// sems can kun la
102a7(rgyud): bdo 'dod pa// lan cig zos pa tsam gyis kyang // de dag sa chen 'bras bur 'gyur// ring por mi thogs dga' 'gyur// / 'chang sogs lha la ci zhig spos// de phyir rtag tu rab bsgrim
102b1(rgyud): la// gtan du bde ba 'dod pa yin// yon tan rgya mtsho ldan pa'i gzungs// mnyam par bya zhing bcang bar bya// gang ni gnang par langs nas brjod// bdag nyid kyis kyang bton na no// de la
102b2(rgyud): don kun 'grub 'gyur la// gnod pa dang yang phrad mi 'gyur// 'di ni yon tan kun gyi snod// dge ba phun sum tshogs sbyin pa// kun mkhyen 'bras bu bla med mchog/ bde 'byung thob par byed pa yin//
102b3(rgyud): 'bras bu 'byor pa ci yang rung // thob par mi 'gyur dogs pa med// kun mkhyen go 'phang thob gyur nas// dpe med gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur// 'di ni dge zhing 'bras bur ldan// sangs rgyas sa yi 'bras
102b4(rgyud): bu sbyin// yid du 'ong zhing yon tan ldan// snying rje dri ma med sbyin pa// 'di ni mnyam pa nyid kyi mdo// 'jig rten kun gnas dga' ba ste// 'jig rten kun gyi bde 'byung ba// 'di dang 'dra ba gang
102b5(rgyud): yang med// ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so// // de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
102b6(rgyud): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ oM mu ni mu ni ma hA mu ni ye swA hA/ lan cig bzlas brjod byas na bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag brgyad khri'i bar du
102b7(rgyud): sdig pa byas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa shAkya thub pa'i snying po'i gzungs rdzogs so// @dkon mchog
103a1(rgyud): / gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub/
103a2(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ bai bi ri/ hu ru hu ru/ bai ro tsan rash+mi sats+tshe de A gats+tsha/ Ar+ya A kA sha gar+b+ha ma hA kA ru NaM kA pU ra
103a3(rgyud): ya ha shAn/ d+ha ra ya bud+d+he bi sh+tsa ya na/ tsar tsar/ tsi ro tsi ri swAhA/ bton pas 'grub ste/ mtshon cha dang / me dang / chu dang / dug dang / dug sbyar ma dang / byad snyems rnams kyis mi tshugs
103a4(rgyud): so// rgyal po dang tsam rkun la sogs pa thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed do// gang du bris te bzhag pa der yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nad thams cad mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
103a5(rgyud): ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// bcom
103a6(rgyud): ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ a mi te/ a mi tod b+ha be/ a mi ta sa~M b+ha be/ a mi ta \u0f7f
103a7(rgyud): krAn+ta gA mi nI/ ga ga na kIr ti ka re sarba kle sha kA yaM ka ri swAhA/ gzungs 'di'i yon tan ni bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa'ang lan gsum bzlas pa byas na/ de rnams zad par
103b1(rgyud): rig par bya'o// nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas pa byas na/ rtsa ba bzhi'i ltung ba'ang sdig pa yongs su byung bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bsrun par yang 'gyur ro// snang ba mtha'
103b2(rgyud): yas rjes su dran pa rdzogs so// / zla ba'i 'od de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA//
103b3(rgyud): tsan+de tsan+de/ su tsan+ne/ ma ti tsan+ne/ tsan+da kar// si ri si ri/ bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/ ki li ki li/ d+har+m+ma a d+hiSh+Ti te/ ki li ki li/ saM g+ha a dISh+Ti te swA hA/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi burma
103b4(rgyud): gang gis rtag tu nang par langs te/ zla ba'i 'od de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dran par byed pa de ni bskal pa bzhi khri'i tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/ de ni ngan song du lhung bar mi 'gyur ro// zla ba'i 'od kyi
103b5(rgyud): man rjes su dran pas yon tan de rnams thob par 'gyur ro// zla ba'i 'od kyi mtshan rjes su dran pa rdzogs so/ namaHsa tan dzad pa/
103b6(rgyud): ga te/ oM ku ru gi ni swA hA/ 'di lan cig bzlas pas kyang bskal pa 'bum phrag brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa'ang zad par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa spyi'i snying po rjes su dran pa
103b7(rgyud): rdzogs so// sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo rat+na sha khe ne/ ta thA ga tA sa/ ar+ha te sa myaka saM bud+d+hA ya/
104a1(rgyud): thA/ rat+ne rat+ne rat+na shi khe ne swAhA/ 'chi ba'i tshe dran na ngan song kun las rnam par grol bar 'gyur/ shi 'phos nas kyang sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lhar skye'o// sangs rgyas
104a2(rgyud): rin chen gtsug tor can gyi mtshan rjes su dran pa rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ pU dza me g+ha nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ mchod pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i
104a3(rgyud): gzungs dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ badz+ra sA ra pra mdza ne/ ta thA ga tA ya/ an te sa myaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM badz+ra badz+ra
104a4(rgyud): ma hA badz+re/ ma hA te dza badz+re/ ma hA bid+yA swA hA/ ma hA bo d+hi tsit+ta badz+re/ ma hA bo d+hi ma two pa saM kra ma Na badz+re/ sarba karma A ba ra Na/ bi sho d+ha na badz+re swA hA/ gzungs sngags 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te
104a5(rgyud): dran pa tsam gyi mod la phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma'i rdul phra rab snyed la mchod pa byas par 'gyur zhing / zhabs la phyag byas par 'gyur ro// me tog dang / bdug pa/
104a6(rgyud): dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan thams cad dang / gdan dang / gding ba dang / na bza' dang
104a7(rgyud): spyan gzigs dang / bshes btsang la sogs pa dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang
104b1(rgyud): ldan par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mthong bas yang dag par dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang
104b2(rgyud): nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad dang / lag na rdo rje la sogs pa gsang ba pa'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams phyi bzhin yang dag pa
104b3(rgyud): 'brang zhing / srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par byed do// 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag ni ma bsgrubs par lan cig dran
104b4(rgyud): pa tsam gyis thob par 'gyur ro// mchod pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
104b5(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA
104b6(rgyud): au ta ra ta ra/ ti ri ti ri/ tu ru tu ru/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki la/ ku lu ku lu/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ b+ha ya b+ha ya/ ku ru ku ru/ sarba kar+m+ma A ba ra Na dza ni me sha pra b+ha
104b7(rgyud): ya sAhA/ dza la ne bi d+ha ni bai swA hA/ ku ru pany+tsa li swA hA/ sA ga ra saM bi re swA hA/ sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Thi te swAhA/ gzungs 'di'i cho ga 'di yin te/ nang par langs nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod
105a1(rgyud): byas na zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig lon pa'i/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ro// spyan lnga'ang rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// de la mi gnad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/
105a2(rgyud): lus la nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// yid kyi nyes pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// spyan lnga'ang rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du yid rnam pa lnga'ang thob par 'gyur ro// tshe rabs thams
105a3(rgyud): cad du sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang phrad par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi rab du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos thos pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang // sems can/
105a4(rgyud): thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// lus mdzes par 'gyur ro// sems dang bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa pad ma'i spyan zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
105a5(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ su rU pa nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ su ru pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
105a6(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// na maHsu rU pA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te samyaka sa bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM su ru su ru/ pra su ru pra su ru / ta ra ta ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra/
105a7(rgyud): slar slar/ san+ta pa ya/ san+ta ra pa ya/ sarba pre ta nA ma swA hA/ gzungs 'dis chu dang bcas pa'i zan la lan bdun yongs su bzlas te/ lag pa g.yon pas se gol gyi sgra lan gsum du byas/
105b1(rgyud): nas yi dgas thams cad la dben pa'i sa phyogs su sbyin par bya zhing / 'di skad kyang brjod par bya ste/ skabs tshol ba dang grags lta ba rnams dengs shig/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
105b2(rgyud): na gnas pa'i yi dgas rnams la bza' ba 'di bdag gis sbyin par bgyi'o zhes pa'o// zas ma zos pa'i sngon rol nyid du sbyin par bya'o// de ltar na yi dgra thams cad la 'bras bre bo che re re'i
105b3(rgyud): bza' ba so sor byin par 'gyur ro// de ltar byas na skye ba nas skye bar yang nyam chung bar mi 'gyur ro// dbul por mi 'gyur ro// stobs che ba dang / mdzes pa dang / mthong na dga' ba dang /
105b4(rgyud): phyug cing longs spyod che bar 'gyur ro// tshe ring zhing nad med pa dang / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// shi 'phos nas
105b5(rgyud): kyang bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro// gzugs legs zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya
105b6(rgyud): ASh+Ta ma hA b+ha ya tA rA Ni nA ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las sgrol ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal
105b7(rgyud): lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas spos dri la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rtsal dang ldan
106a1(rgyud): pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ma phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin/
106a2(rgyud): gshegs pa zhi ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang ldan pa 'jigs pa med par byed pa la
106a3(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ d+ha re d+ha re/ d+hA re d+hA r+t+ti/ ran ko te/ a b+ha yA kal+le kal+le ni/ gaNe anan+ta kal+le/ a mr-i ta kar+the/ hu tA sha re/ anan+ta mu khe/ anan+ta nak+ShA sa mung+gate/
106a4(rgyud): oM b+ha swA hA/ rigs kyi bu gzungs kyi gsang sngags 'di dag ni sems can ngan song du 'gro ba rnams kyi don gyi phyir/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis gsungs pa dang /
106a5(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs pa dang rjes su yi rang ba yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang la la gzungs 'di 'dzin par byed pa de/ 'jigs pa brgyad po sems can dmyal ba'i 'jigs
106a6(rgyud): pa mtha' yas pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / yi dgas kyi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang /
106a7(rgyud): bgrod dka' ba'i 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / skye ba'i 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / nad kyi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dag las
106b1(rgyud): yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// sems rnam par g.yeng ba med par 'chi ba'i dus byed cing / sangs rgyas/
106b2(rgyud): rnams kyi spyan sngar skye bar 'gyur/ zad mi shes pa'i lus thob par 'gyurasprul pa'i lus kyang thob par 'gyur ro// na ma \u0f7fsarba bid+yA/ sid d+han+tu me man+ta pA da swA hA/ 'phags pa 'jig
106b3(rgyud): pa chen po brgyad las sgrol ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bai sha ba ti nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags
106b4(rgyud): pa khyad par can zhes bya ba'i gzungs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sbrul gyi lo'i dgun zlar
106b5(rgyud): ba chos nyi shu la yul phug ron can na/ grong khyer sin tse zhes bya ba'i gtsug lag khang na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe dge slong tshe brjod ces bya ba don gcig gi phyir/ grong khyer gnas zhes bya bar song ste/
106b6(rgyud): dge slong de mi yul gyi grong khyer nas dpag tshad brgya'i lan du na byin pa dang / dge slong nges par der mi lus chen po khrun du 'dom sum cu yod pa/ bzhin 'dom bzhi pa zhig rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo //
106b7(rgyud): mthong nas kyang dge slong tshe brjod des mi de lta bu de la 'di snyam du bsams te/ kye ma mi 'di ni lus che ste/ 'di ni 'jams dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yin du nges so snyam nas/ des pus mo gnyis
107a1(rgyud): ka'i lgang sa la btsugs te/ me lus chen po gal ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba bdun nas/ mi lus chen po de la 'di skad ces smras so// mi khyod khams dpal gnod du/
107a2(rgyud): gyur pa ste/ 'dir 'khor dam/ 'jams dpal gyis smras pa/ dge slong de de bzhin no// dge slong des smras pa/ 'jams dpal khyod ci'i slad du 'di na 'da'/ 'jams dpal gzhon nur gyur pas spras pa/
107a3(rgyud): dge slong 'dzam bu gling 'dir sems can rnams la nad rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'byung ste/ gnod sbyir dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za rnams ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi ngos gcig la gnas so// des
107a4(rgyud): zla'i 'od kyang mi mngon/ nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / gza' dang / rgyu skar rnams kyang nam mkhar bar skabs na mi snang ngo // de'i tshe lha dang lha ma yin kyang g.yul 'gyed de/ g.yul bkye ba dang / lha rnams ni 'pham
107a5(rgyud): lha ma yin rnams ni rgyal te/ de'i tshe 'byung po dang yi dgas rnams bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can rnams la nad gtong ste/ 'di lta ste/ lkog ma'i lha gor dang / 'brum phran dang / me dpal dang //
107a6(rgyud): lto ban pa dang / rims nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / ban kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus
107a7(rgyud): pa las gyur pa dang / phrad pa na ba dang / bol mig dang / g.yan pa dang / tshad pa dang / mig nad la sogs pa nye bar sgrub bo// 'di lta ste/ char ches pa dang / na pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i
107b1(rgyud): gyis ma tog sun su mtshags par 'das 'jog/ sems can rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog/ tshe dang / srabs dang / mdog dang / gzugs 'brogs/ da tsha'angam bu gling sems can /
107b2(rgyud): cad nad sna tshogs kyis yongs su nyen to// gtum po sang ga dang / spyang ki dang / stag dang / sbrul la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis sems can rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog ste/ 'dzam bu'i rmi
107b3(rgyud): gi sems can rnams la dus ma yin par chud nga ba nye bar gnas pas/ sems can rnams nad las thar par bya ba'ang dka' ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir sems can rgan pa dang / bar ma dang / gzhon pa dag
107b4(rgyud): las dkrigs phrag sum cu 'chi bar 'gyur ro// de'i phyir nga dge slong khyod kyi gam du yongs kyis/ khyod kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sgrogs shig/ de ci'i
107b5(rgyud): phyir zhe na/ 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i sems can thams cad ni 'di snyam du/ bdag cag ji ltar sdug bsngal gyis bcings pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur snyam du re ba'i phyir ro// de lta bas na dge slong
107b6(rgyud): khyod kyis sems can thams cad la mdo 'di sgrogs te/ sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir nan tan gyis shig/ dkon mchog gsum la rtag tu rgyun du dad par gyis shig/ lha rjod
107b7(rgyud): cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rnams sam/ sku gzugs rnams la spos dang / me tog dang / bdug pa rnams kyis mchod par gyis shig/ khyad par can gyi gzungs kyang lhogs shig/
108a1(rgyud): nyi ma bdun yan lag brgyad pa dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gnas par gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa blo yangs zab mo 'brug bsgrags rgyal po sa phyag/
108a2(rgyud): 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ bi pu la gar+Ni te/ bi sU la sA re/ bi pu la yo ni she/ a na sa le/ a na la saM b+ha be/ a na ta le/ sha ta ka ra/ b+he dza li ne sAhA/ dza ma b+ha naM/ swam+b+ha ne/ mo ha na sa?H
108a3(rgyud): bon ta ri ka yang s+yAm+b+ha/ tse maHrme/ d+harmA tsi ta ye swAhA/ d+ha ra b+hi d+ha ra swAhA/ ka la bi kA r+ya ta ye swAhA/ shrI te ben ne ni rba paN+ya swAhA/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ bdu ru d+hi ye swAH/ bi lam btsun d+ha ye swAH
108a4(rgyud): a ba lo ki ta bi lo ki tA ye swA hA/ a dz+nyA na bi d+ha ma n+ye swA hA/ pad+ma swa re/ pad+ma saM b+ha re/ king ka re/ hi taM ka ra ye swA hA/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste//
108a5(rgyud): tsan dra prad+he/ tsan dran gar+b+he/ tsan dra tsuNi/ ke la sa pa ti/ sarba bud d+ha/ a daMSh+Ti ta a nu mo da ti swAhA/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ ts+tsha/
108a6(rgyud): dza ye/ dza ya la ba d+he/ dza ya ma hA ma he swAhA/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ ga ga na ar+ye/ ga gnas ruH
108a7(rgyud): ga te/ ga gan bi krAn ta/ bi krAn te/ oM dza me d+hi paSh+pe dzi swAhA/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po yi phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ hoHdre/ ma hA b+ha dre/ a te b+hirbe/ sa mahA b+ha dre/ bi ga tan rdzo
108b1(rgyud): mthatheg dzas/ sa gting ga te swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo// 'du sa ste/ mnyam nya ma hA ma swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag bad pa/
108b2(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ a mai tod b+ha be/ a mi ta sa~M b+ha be/ a mi ta bi krAn+te/ a mi ta bi kAn+ta ga re/ a mi ta ga ga ni kArti ka re swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'byung gnas la phyag
108b3(rgyud): 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ ga ga na a ka re/ ga ga na saM b+ha re/ ga ga ni kAtI ka re swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas spos mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ sa ma sa mi swA hA/ de bzhin gshes
108b4(rgyud): pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan rtsal gyis 'brug bsgrags gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ a sa ma a sa me swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa nga rgyal gnon la phyag 'tshal lo//
108b5(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ mA nA bi shud d+he/ pad+me shwa re/ pad+ma saM b+ha re/ king ka re/ hi tang ka re ye swA hA/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa/
108b6(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ ma ti bi ga rA dza se/ he ma ga ti/ karma ma hA ra dza dzaH/ bai sho d+ha naM swA hA/ byang chub sems
108b7(rgyud): dpa' 'phags pa byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ mai tri ma na~M se swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ gar+b+he gad+hi/ gar+b+ha bi sha
109a1(rgyud): d+ha ni swAhA/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ ak+Sha ye ru/ a kA ye pu/ ak+Sha kar+m+ma bi sho d+ha ni pu sA hA/ byang chub sems
109a2(rgyud): dpa' 'phags pa dri ma med par grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ kIrti tA/ sar+b+ba dza nai/ a b+hi kIrti tA/ badz+ra sar+b+ba dzi naM/ badz+ra a ka re/ badz+ra be dA ka re swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib
109a3(rgyud): pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ sarba A ba ra Na bi skam bi t+yai swAhA/ d+hA tu bi ka ra t+ne swA hA/ me g+ha me s+pho Ta mi swA hA/ a pA rA dze ta kA yi sAhA/ ba la dang N+ye swAhA
109a4(rgyud): da kar+Na da pa me swA hA/ kArma nir+m+ma bi ta kA ye swAhA/ e ka a ra ma ye swA hAyo gra tsa rA ye swA hA/ sar+b+ba bud+d+ha a b+hi Shi ka tA ye swA hA/ prad+mo ba ku te ye swA hAsar+b+ba d+harmA e b+hi Shi ka ta ye swAhA sar+b+ba
109a5(rgyud): bud+d+ha a b+hi ShI ta ye swA hA/ e ka shr-i gA yai swA hA.a shraM gA ye swAhA/ b+hu ta yaM sAhA/ a saM b+hu ta ye swA hA sar+b+ba duHkho pra sha ma N+yai swAhA zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di/
109a6(rgyud): lha ste/ tsa dra pra b+he su pra b+he/ pra b+ha a ka ri pra b+hod kA re/ pra b+ha ba ti/ d+har+m+ma bi shud d+hi/ karma bi shu d+hir/ b+ha ba tu me swA hA/ tshe brjod gang la la zhig rig sngags 'di nyin zhag bdun du rmi/
109a7(rgyud): lan bdun mtshan lan bdun du bya ba byas na/ de'i las kyi sgrib pa ma lus pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// dge slong bdun la zas sbyin no// me las me spel bar bya'o// mtshan mo mar me thogs
109b1(rgyud): te mchod rten la bsti stang byas la bskor ba bya'o// dam pa'i chos bri ba dang bklag pa la brtson par bya'o// gal te yams kyi nad cher byung na/ khyim nas khyim dang / grong nas grong dang / grong khyer/
109b2(rgyud): nas grong khyer du/ khu ba dang / bdug pa dang / gtor ma dang / lha bshos kyis mchod pa bya'o// nad pa gang yin pa des kyang cho ga 'di bzhin du byas na// de myur du nad las thar par 'gyur ro// de nas
109b3(rgyud): yang 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pas/ dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smras so// dge slong rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin tam/ klog gam
109b4(rgyud): yi ger 'dri'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par ston na/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// yang 'jam dpa'
109b5(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pas/ dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smras so// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ci nas skye bo thams cad kyi rna lam du grags par 'gyur bar yul nas yul dang / grong khyer nas grong khyer/
109b6(rgyud): dang / grong nas grong du bskur bar bya'o// yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe brjod rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la chos kyi rnam
109b7(rgyud): grangs 'di lan cig bklags na de bdag nyid thar par 'gyur ro// sus lan gnyis bklags na de bu dang chung ma dang lhan cig thar bar 'gyur ro// sus lan gsum bklags na de rtsa lag gi tshogs kyi
110a1(rgyud): skye bo dang bcas te thar bar 'gyur ro// sus lan pani bgrags na de yul 'khor thams cad thar par 'gyur ro// sus lan lnga bklags na de nyen kor gyi rgyal po dang thar par 'gyur
110a2(rgyud): ro// yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smras so// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di myur du yul gzhan dag tu bskur bar bya ste/ der yang yon tan 'di dag 'byung
110a3(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// tshe brjod gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos la mi 'dzin tam/ mi klog gam yi ger mi 'dri'am/ yi ger 'drir mi 'jug gam/ kun chub par mi byed dam/ gzhan/
110a4(rgyud): dngag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu mi ston nam/ yul gzhan du mi 'byin tam/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te mi nyan tam/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
110a5(rgyud): tu yongs su mi sngo na/ mtshams med pa lnga byed pa rnams kyi 'gro ba ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar mngon par 'grub ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis smad pa'o// yang 'jam dpal
110a6(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pas/ dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe brjod su zhig 'di tshad mar byed pa de ni ngas thog ma nyid du dad par bya ba yin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams/
110a7(rgyud): cad bde bar 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/ nga ri'i rgyal po ri rab la song ste/ lha dang dri ba rnams la rjes su bstan pa dang mthun par sbyar bar bya ba'i phyir nan tan bya'o// de skad ces spras nas 'jam dpal sa/
110b1(rgyud): rur gyur pa mi sdang bar gyur to// dge slong tshe brjod kyis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon dur gyur pas smras pa la mngon par bstod de bzung nas song ngo // 'phags pa khyad par can zhes bya ba'i bdu/
110b2(rgyud): rdzogs so// @rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma ny+dzu shr-i mU la taN+Da/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rgyud/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub
110b3(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gnas gtsang ma'i steng gi nam mkha'i dkyil na byang chub sems dpa' 'dus
110b4(rgyud): pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs so so tha dad pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba/ so sor rab tu gnas pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnas
110b5(rgyud): gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag khyed cag nyon cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa'i cho 'phrul gyi spyod pa/
110b6(rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba/ ting nge 'dzin gyi bye brag dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub
110b7(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad kyi nye bar 'tshe ba/ tshe dang / nad med pa dang / dbang phyug dang / yid la bsams pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i sngags kyi gzhi dag sems can rnams la phan pa'i/
111a1(rgyud): phyir bshad par bya ste/ de shin tu legs par nyon la yid la phung zhig dang ngas bshad par bya'o// de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag gis thal mo sbyang bar
111a2(rgyud): btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la leg so zhes gsol to// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par dang / sa chen po thob par bya ba dang / rdo rje'i gdan gnon pa dang
111a3(rgyud): bdud 'dul ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nges par 'byung ba dang / lha rnams dang mi rnams su skye bar bya ba dang / sdug bsngal
111a4(rgyud): dang dbul ba dang / nad rnams zhi bar byed pa longs spyod kyis phyug pa 'dren par byed pa/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags kyi spyod pas 'phongs par mi byed
111a5(rgyud): pare ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung 'bras bu med par byed pa ma yin pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa'i thugs dang
111a6(rgyud): phan pa'i thugs dang / bdag dang sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thaH/
111a7(rgyud): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang / gtsang ma'i gnas la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs nas dag pa'i yul la 'od rnam par spros te/ yul rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom/
111b1(rgyud): par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu mdzod sru nas me tog kun tu skyes pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od byung /
111b2(rgyud): 'od bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma'i 'khor gyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su song nas/ byang shar phyogs su brgya
111b3(rgyud): gi gang+gA'i klung gi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas/ me tog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rjes su zhugs te/ gang na me tog kun tu skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po zhes bya
111b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par ro// der yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa dang ldan pa rnams dang lhan cig
111b5(rgyud): gnas par gyur to// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'od zer gyi snang ba de mthong nas bzhin cung zad 'dzum pa dang ldan par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' tshogs de dag la smras pa/ rgyal ba'i
111b6(rgyud): sras dag 'od 'di ni nga la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir 'ongs pa yin gyis/ khyed cag g.yeng ba med par gyis shig ces smras so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam
111b7(rgyud): dpal gzhon nu pup+na mig mi 'dzums shing kha bye bas 'od gang na ba de logs su mngon du bltas nas 'dug go/ de nas bskul ba'i 'od des me tog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams
112a1(rgyud): snang ba chen pos snang bar byas te/ me tog kun tu skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la lan gsum bskor bzlas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpan
112a2(rgyud): chen po 'jab dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyi bor nub par gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das me tog kun tu yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po dbang po
112a3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das me tog kun tu skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po la 'di
112a4(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bdag la dgongs te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni/
112a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa dang / sgrub thabs dang / dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga dang / gsang ba dang /
112a6(rgyud): cho ga zhib po dang / cho ga'i ngo bo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs dang / gsang ba dang / phyag rgya dang / dbang bskur ba bstan pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsams pa
112a7(rgyud): cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas mchi bar 'tshal lo// 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das me tog kun tu skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshes
112b1(rgyud): bal gsal pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon rur gyur pa ting nge 'dzinag papa smoms pa zhugs pan phyogs pa ni mtha' yas mu med pa sded dang / 'og dang / bra ga thams cad dang ldan par phyogs sangs/
112b2(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yang dag par gang bar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams de dang / bcom ldan 'das dang bcas pas rgyal ba'i sras legs so legs so// 'di lta bu'i ting
112b3(rgyud): 'dzin gyi khyad par la snyoms par zhugs pa ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang mi rus/ byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la zhugs pa dang / sa bcu la gnas pa dag gis kyang
112b4(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs par mi nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog kun tu yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams dang lhan cig tu
112b5(rgyud): yang dag par bgros te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di'i snying po mchog tu gsang ba don thams cad sgrub pa'i snying po gsung pa ni yi ge gcig pa zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba/ sems can
112b6(rgyud): thams cad kyi las thams cad byed pa/ sngags kyi spyod pa khyad par can bzang po yang dag par sgrub par byed pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin
112b7(rgyud): gshegs pa yud tsam zhig cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yang dag par
113a1(rgyud): dgongs nas byams pa'i thugs kyis sngags gsungs so// na maHsarba bud+d+hA rA oM ma~M/ 'di ni 'jam dpal gyi snying po mchog yin te las thams cad byed pa'o// de nas 'jam dpal
113a2(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pa ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/ dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa lag pa bskums pa las brkyang ba dang / brkyang ba las bskum pa 'am/ se gol gtogs pa tsam mam/ mig 'byed
113a3(rgyud): 'dzum tsam la rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis shugs blo ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su chas te song ba dang /
113a4(rgyud): steng gi nam mkha'i dkyil na nor bu rin po che rab tu gnas pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha rnams gnas su chas te/ gnas gtsang ma'i gnas de thams cad 'od chen po'i snang bas gsal bar byas te/ 'od kyi/
113a5(rgyud): rin po ches rab tu brgyan cing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu rin po che rnam pa tha dad pa du ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang /
113a6(rgyud): rin po che'i gdugs dang / dpag tshad brgya stong phrag du ma rgya che ba'i lha'i gos dang / dar mang po'i tshogs kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa'i 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
113a7(rgyud): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig/ 'on kyang nga'i ba kas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la gnod pa nyung ngam nyam nga ba chung ngamabaskyod pa yang ngam bde ba la
113b1(rgyud): reg par gnas sam zhes zhus par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' sa/
113b2(rgyud): to// gzhan yang gzhon ru gang+gA'i klung brgya stong gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi khyod kyi sngags kyi spyod pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga 'ab
113b3(rgyud): mo dang / gsang ba dang / dbang bsrung ba dang / phyag rgya'i tshogs dang / cho ga dang / sbyin sreg dang / bzlas pa dang / btul zhugs bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ sems can thams
113b4(rgyud): dga' bar byed pa/ 'od rin po che'i tshogs kyis rab 'byams 'das pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa shes pa/ rgyal po'i dbang phyug lung ston par byed pa/ sngags brdza ba/ yul gyi mthar 'gro bar
113b5(rgyud): byed pa/ mi snang bar byed pa dang / dus dang / dam tshig rab 'byam gyi tshogs thams cad dang / 'jig rten pa ma lus pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang //
113b6(rgyud): 'phags pa nyan pos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi nges par 'byung ba'i spyod pa mthar thug pa gsungs pa dang / gsung ba dang / gsung bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de ltar rjes su mi rang ba nyid de/ 'jam dpal gas/
113b7(rgyud): nur gyur pa de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig/ shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar mngon sum du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par gyur te khyod kyang ston par 'gyur ro// yang gsung ba/ na maHsarba ta thA ga tanA
114a1(rgyud): a tsin t+ya a pra ti ha ta thA sa nA nAM/ oM sma ra sma ra a pra ti ha ta shA sa na ku mA ra rU ba ha ri NaM/ oM hU~M hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags so//
114a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs la gsung zhing gsung bar 'gyur la/ khyod kyang mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song nas dbye ba dang
114a3(rgyud): rnam par dbye ba rgya cher ston par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya bas kyang las thams cad byed pa 'di rjes su gnang bar 'gyur ro// 'dir snying po mchog tu gyur pa ni oM bA kye
114a4(rgyud): na maH/ 'dir nye ba'i snying po ni/ bA kye hUM/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pas gnas nas bkod
114a5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rgyan byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang rgyun mthun pa byang chub kyi snying po thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la mchod pa bya ba'i
114a6(rgyud): phyir lha'i me tog rnam par bkod pa dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / 'phreng ba'i tshogs dang / rin po che'i dril bu'i dra bas 'brel ba/ snyan pa'i sgra sgrog pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i
114a7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i sa thob par byed pa lha'i dri dang dbyug pa dang / 'phreng ba dang / phye ma'i char dbab par mngon par sprul to// de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis byang
114b1(rgyud): nub sems dpa'i ngo mtshar rmar du byung ba'i cho 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong nas bsku ldang zhing gnas g.yo ba mthong nas snying 'dang zhing dngangs te/ ci bdag cag gi 'byor pa nyams par ma gyur
114b2(rgyud): tam zhes phan tshun du rings par 'gro zhing skad mthun pos smra ba rtsom par byed de/ 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das yongs su bsgrub tu gsol shAkya thub pa yongs su bskyab tu gsol zhes gsal te/
114b3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag ma 'jigs ma 'jigs shig byang chub sems dpa' sems
114b4(rgyud): dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spyan snga nas ngal blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / don chen po
114b5(rgyud): spyod pa dang / sngags kyi tshig dang / rgya che zhing rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi tshig ston pa'i phyir 'ongs pa yin no// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lan gsum
114b6(rgyud): bskor ba byas te/ mig mi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das la blta zhing zhabs gnyis la btud de/ tshig 'bru 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/ skyes bu bskyed pa khyod phyag 'tshal/
114b7(rgyud): skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// skyes bu gtso bo khyod phyag 'tshal// spyod pa thams cad don grub pa// skyes bu seng ge khyod phyag 'tshal// phung krol thams cad zlog byed pa// dpa' bo chen
115a1(rgyud): po khyod phyag 'tshal// ngan 'gro thams cad 'jig byed pa// skyes bu pad dkar khyod phyag 'tshal/ kun nas bsod nams dri ldan pa/ skyes bu badz+ra khyod phyag 'ams/
115a2(rgyud): srid gsum 'dam ni rnam dag byed// rnam grol khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sdug bsngal ma lus rnam grol byed// zhi gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// thams cad ldan pa legs 'dul byed// thams/
115a3(rgyud): cad grub pa khyod phyag 'tshal// sngags kyi spyod pa'i don sgrub byed// bkra shis khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa// sangs rgyas/ kun la khyod phyag 'tshal// chos kun rnam
115a4(rgyud): par rtogs mdzad pa// chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid spros pa med pa'i ngo bo la yang dag par rjes su zhugs shing ston par byed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// shes bya dang shes
115a5(rgyud): bya'i dngos po thams cad dang / 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas dang / theg pa gsum gyi lam dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la 'jog par byed pa dang gnas par byed pa thams cad mkhyen pa khyod la phyag
115a6(rgyud): 'tshal lo zhes/ tshig 'bru 'di dag brjod pa'i bstod pa'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon sum du bstod nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di nas gang+gA'i klung brgya phrag stong gi byem/
115a7(rgyud): snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams na me tog yang dag par skyes pa zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mchis te/ de na me tog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams
115b1(rgyud): na gang du bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa dbang po'i rgyal po bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rigs pa dang 'bras su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs/
115b2(rgyud): pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kho lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa de chos ston te/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dag pa/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po// tshig 'bru bzang
115b3(rgyud): ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su dkar ba/ tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par ston to// ded ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang stod to// sngags kyi spyod pa dang
115b4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod dang / lam gsum gyi spyod pa'i lam sgrub par byed pa/ skyob pa dang / gnas dang / skyabs dang / dpung gnyen dang / bde ba dang / shin tu mthar thug pa dang / shin/
115b5(rgyud): tu yongs su mthar phyin par byed pa sems can rnams la ston te/ bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyis rjes su gnang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung 'di mchis so// bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag
115b6(rgyud): par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de'ang bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes 'dri'o// 'di skad kyang gsung ste/ gang du 'di lta bu'i
115b7(rgyud): sdigs ma lnga'i dus su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'byung ba ni ngo mtshar to zhes so// de'ang lam gsum dang / byang grol dang / mir skye ba thob pa med kyi chos ston par byed do//
116a1(rgyud): gang du'ang sems can gyi ris skal ba med pa dang / srid pa gsum yang dag par 'joms par byed pa'i lam dang / gtan du grub pa dang / bde ba dang mthun pa'i mya ngan
116a2(rgyud): las 'das pa la sems can rnams 'god par byed pa'i bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i brtson 'grus ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab go// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
116a3(rgyud): kyi thugs ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen par 'gyur gyibadag gis ci zhig 'tshal ba rngo thogasadabang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rmad du byung ba'i sangs rgyas
116a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa shes par gyur ta ma'atshal bar ram/ thugs kyi spyad pa spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i sgrub pa dang spyod pa 'tshal bar ram/ mdor na bskal
116a5(rgyud): pa bye ba khri phrag brgya stong gi bar du'ang bstan par mi nus so// gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa bsdus pa 'am/ tha dad ma lus pa'i ngo bo 'di ni chos
116a6(rgyud): 'dus ma byas su blta bar bya ste/ mthong bas spang bar bya ba la brten pa 'am yon tan ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kho nas mkhyen pa yin gyi/ bdag gis ni ma lags so//
116a7(rgyud): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pas rin po che'i pad+ma sprul pa la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la blta zhing 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya
116b1(rgyud): thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs sngon du 'gro ba mdzad nas chos bstan/
116b2(rgyud): pa dang / rjes su mthun pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sgrub pa dang rjes su mthun pas tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / ka la bing ka'i skad dang / 'brug sgra dang / rnga bo che'i sgra skad kyi gsung
116b3(rgyud): gi dbyangs kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa khyod legs par 'ongs sam/ sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
116b4(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs pa sgrub pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don thob par byed pa/ sngags thams cad kyi tshig dang / gsang ba dang bcas pa dang dbang bskur ba dang phyag
116b5(rgyud): rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga dang dbang bskur ba dang / tshe dang / nad med pa dang dbang phyug dang / bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa sgrub pa'i thabs
116b6(rgyud): thams cad dang ldan pa/ rgyud shes pa dang / shes bya dang / 'dus dang / mi sdang ba dang / rgyal po'i zhing du gyur pa/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i shes par byed pa/ mdor
116b7(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa// rang gi yon tan dang mthun pa'i sngags kyi spyod pa rjes su 'jugs pa/ sems can gzhan dga' bar byed pa/ me snang
117a1(rgyud): bar 'gro ba/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba chu la mi nus par 'gro ba yid gzhungs par byed pa/ 'gugs par byed pa/ sa 'og tu 'jug pa/ mngon du spyod par byed pa
117a2(rgyud): 'dod pa thams cad thob par byed pa/ gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyin mo thams cad dang / yangag gzhugs pa dang / sha ba dang / 'byung po thams cad 'gugs par byed pa/ byis pa dang / rgan po dang /
117a3(rgyud): gzhon nu gnas ji lta ba bzhin 'jog par byed pa/ mdor na las thams cad byed pa ste/ yid la re ba thams cad rdzogs par byed pa/ mngon spyod dang / rgyas pa dang / zhi ba'i las dag rab tu byed pa/ ji lta/
117a4(rgyud): ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che bskal pa chen po'i rin po che'i le'u rab 'byams 'di ngas kyang rjes su gnang zhing / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang gsungs te/
117a5(rgyud): sems can dag pa'i rang gi sngags spyod pa'i don gyis chos kyi mdzod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / lha dang mi rnams dang / sems can thams cad kyi don du bstan pa'i phyir ro//
117a6(rgyud): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'od kyi snang ba bkod pa'i rgyan yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
117a7(rgyud): par zhugs ma tha ga tu/ dag pa'i sems can gyi 'od kyi snang bas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'og min gyi genas kyi bar dang / mnar med pa'i dmyal ba
117b1(rgyud): chen po'i bar du khyab par byas te/ sems can gang su dag shin tu sdug bsngal ba de dag thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar gyur to// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub/
117b2(rgyud): sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yang dag par bskul nas/ 'od de'ang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyi bo'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to// 'dir gang dag gar phyogs na
117b3(rgyud): rnam par gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der 'od zer rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi reg pa'i bya bas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par bskul te/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi zla ba dri snang ba'i dpal
117b4(rgyud): zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi pra bai DUR+Ya'i 'od dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dpal kur tu snang ba zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal po yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba dang /
117b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa sa la'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa ye shes rnam par nges pa'i rgyal
117b6(rgyud): po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba'i 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas bcom
117b7(rgyud): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag nas// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
118a1(rgyud): #bcom ldan 'das 'dus pa dag la/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gtsang ma'i khang pa yang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thug
118a2(rgyud): pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ston pa dang / sngags kyi tshig gi don gyi le'u rab 'byam ston te/ de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang gi phyogs dang /
118a3(rgyud): phyogs mtshams dang / steng dang / 'og dang / thad ka thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing snang bar byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du bdud kyi gnas thams cad sra bkong bar byas nas/
118a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su bskor cing nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pas mdun gyis bltas te/ gnas gtsang ma'i gnas su sangs rgyas kyi 'phrul pa dang / byang
118a5(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid chen po blta bar 'dod pa dang / sngags kyi spyod pa bsgrub pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par dang / le'u'i tshogs dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa thogs pa med/

118b1(rgyud): dpal dang / 'od dpal dang kadon thams cad kyi dpal dang / thams cad phyag na rin po che dang / phyag na gtsug gi rin po che dang / phyagar lhur po'i rgyal mtshan dang / ma par snang mdzad meng po dpa /
118b2(rgyud): na snying po dang / ye she snying po dang kha sam gyis mi khyab pa'i don gyi snying po dang / chos 'phags kyi snying po dang / rgyal mtshan gyi tog dang / tog bzang dang / mtha' yas tog dang / dri ma med pa'i
118b3(rgyud): tog dang / mtha' dag gi tog dang / nam mkha'i tog dang / rin po re'i tog dang / 'brug sgra dang / rnga bo che'i skad kyi rgyal po dang / mtha' yas par snang ba'i ye shes kyi rgyal po dang / mun pa
118b4(rgyud): mun nag thams cad 'joms pa'i rgyal po dang / gnod pa thams cad rnam par 'jigs pa'i rgyal po dang / spyod pa thams cad kyi yul shes pa'i rgyal po dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang /

118b6(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yang dag par 'phags pa'i rgyal po dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs med pa'i rgyal po dang rang bzhin gyi 'od dang bsod nams 'od dang / 'jig rten 'od dang

120b7(rgyud): dang / 'dab ma brgya pa dang / rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang / 'jig rten mthon po dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang / mngon par 'phags pa'i gtsug tor dang / pad+ma'i 'od dang / me tog

122b7(rgyud): ma dang / de dag dang gzhan yang rig pa'i rgyal mo dag la ri khrod lo ma gyon ma dang / mya ngan las skyes ma dang / yid las skyes ma la sogs pa grub pa mtha' yas pas chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'
123a1(rgyud): dang 'dra ba'i ngo bo dang / sems can gyi spyod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa gnas pa la byung ba'i mid dang / bo \u0f7f dang / bol mo dang / zan po dang / zan mo dang / mngag ga/
123a2(rgyud): pa dang / mngag gzhug ma dang / gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyin mo dang / srin po dang / srin mo dang / sha ba dang / sha ba mo dang / pad+ma'i rigs dam tshig la rjes su zhugs shing rjes su spyod pa na
123a3(rgyud): dang / gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i gzhal med khang sems can dag pa gang na 'dug pa der phyin par gyur to// phyin nas kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la mchod pa'i las la brtson pa'i yid kyis gnas par gyur
