129a6(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs par gyur to// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'di dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong du ma'i rdul phra
129a7(rgyud): rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag par rab tu g.yos te/ snang ba chen pos gsal bar yang byas nas rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs skyed pa ston te/ ra
129b1(rgyud): gi sngags kyi tshig kyang ston pa la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA/ a b+hA ba swa b+hA ba muH trAnA~M/ na maHpra t+ye ka bu d+hA Ar+ya shrA bak+Sha nA~M/ na mo bo d+hi satwA na/ dag b+hU mi prA ti Thi ti~M shwan+na d+hA/ bod+hi sarbA nA~M/ ma hAsaH/
129b2(rgyud): nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM kha la khA hUM khA r+thi/ duSh+Ta satwA da ma ka a si mu sa la par shu pa pA sha h+ne ste/ tsatu d+hu dza/ tsa tu sprul/ Sha Ta tsa ra Na/ gasma ga r+b+he/ sarba big+h+na big+h+nAM taka/ bai kr-i tra nan/ sarba b+hu ta d+d+ha
129b3(rgyud): ka ra/ an+d+ra nA hA sa ni nA da ni/ b+ha g+h+ra tsarma Ni bA sa na/ ku ru ku ru/ sarba d+harmA NAM/ tsin+ta naMn+ta/ sarba ma tA na/ bin+d+ha bin+d+ha/ pa ra mud tAM A kaR+Sha ya A kaR+Sha ya/ sarba b+hu tra na/ ni ma tha nirma tha/ sarba
129b4(rgyud): duSh+TA na/ pr-i be sha ya pra be sha ya/ maN+Da la mad d+h+ye/ bai ba satwa dzi bi tAn+ta/ kar/ ku ru ku ru ma ma sarba kAr+yaM/ da ha da ha/ pa tse pa tsa/ mA bi lam+bu mA bi lam+ba/ sa ma ya ma nusma ra/ hUM hUM phaT/
129b5(rgyud): s+pho Te ya s+pho Ta ya/ sarbA sha pa ri pUr ka/ he b+ha ga pi ki tsinA ya si ma me sarbA rba sA d+ha ya/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i khro bo chen po gshin rje'i gshed ces bya ba yon te/
129b6(rgyud): gshin rje'i rgyal po yang 'joms pa dang 'gugs par byed pa yin na/ sems can gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos gzungs sngags 'di smras ma thag tu sems can thams cad
129b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags par gyur te/ 'jigs pa dang / nyam thag dang / dngangs pa dang / yid skyo ba dang / snying 'gas par gyur te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / 'jam dpal
130a1(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pa ma gtogs par skyabs gzhan med/ skyob pa gzhan med/ dpung gnyen gan med par gyur te/ de nas gang su dgasal gnas pa dang / tshul gnas pa/
130a2(rgyud): dang / nam mkha' la gnas pa dang / brtan par gnas pa dang / mi brtag par gnas pa dang / mngal nas skyes pa dang / sgo nga las skyes pa dang / drod gsher las skyes pa dang / rdzus te skyes pa'i
130a3(rgyud): sems can gyi grangs su gtogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa dag na rnam par gnas pa/ steng dang / 'og dang / zad ka dang phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams dag tu skad cig de dang
130a4(rgyud): yud tsam de la gab cing gnas pa dag skad cig de nyid la khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos 'di nyid du bkug par gyur to// khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags 'di ni 'dod chags dang ma bral ba rnams kyi mdun du brjod
130a5(rgyud): par mi bya ste/ ci'i phyir na/ de yang 'chi bar 'gyur ba 'am bskam par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// dam tshig la dmigs par byas nas sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs sam/ sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod
130a6(rgyud): rten nam/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar bzlas par bya'o// yang na las gzhan gyi ched du brjod par bya ste/ gang de dang de dag tu ni brjod par mi bya ste/ ci'i phyir
130a7(rgyud): zhe na/ ltas ngan chen po dang / mya ngan chen po dang / bdag nyid 'jigs pa chen por 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// thugs rje mchog dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa'
130b1(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po ni thams cad mkhyen pa ye shes kho na'i spyod pa rjes su sgrub cing bstan pa dang / sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba dang // chos kyi tshul yang dag par gnas par bya ba dang /
130b2(rgyud): sems can gyi khams mtha' dag mya ngan las 'das pa yang dag par thob par bya ba dang / bstan pa med pa dag tu bskrun pa dang / lam gsum la yang dag par sbyor ba dang / dkon mchog gsum
130b3(rgyud): gyi gdung mi bcad pa dang / sngags kyi spyod pa bstan pa'i phyir dang / thugs rje chen po'i mthu'i rgyu mthun pa'i thugs kyis bdud kyi stobs zil gyis gnon pa dang / bgegs chen po rnam pa
130b4(rgyud): gzhig pa dang / rgyal po ma rungs pa rnam par gzhom pa dang / bdag gi stobs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / gzhan gyi stobs rnam par gzhig pa dang / rengs par bya ba dang / gas ga/
130b5(rgyud): dang / mi snang bar bya ba dang / rab tu bstan pa dang / nye bar bsgom pa dang / dga' bar bya ba dang / rang gi sngags kyi spyod pa rab tu bstan pa dang / tshe dang / nad med pa dang / dbang phyug mngon/

130b7(rgyud): dang de dag gi rgyu mtshan du rtogs pa dang / rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i sems kyis smras so// de nas klu dang / klu chen po de dag dang / gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyin chen po

135b2(rgyud): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der lhags shing phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btud nas rang rang gi gnas su 'khod par gyur to// gang yang gnod sbyin mo dag gnod sbyin mo brgya stong
135b3(rgyud): phrag du ma'i 'khor dang bcas pa la 'di lta ste/ mig bzangs ma dang / smin bzangs ma dang / skra bzangs ma dang / skad snyan ma dang / blo bzang ma dang / dge ldan ma dang / sna tshogs mig ldan ma
135b4(rgyud): dang / rdzogs byed pa dang / gsang ba ma dang / bzang po ma dang / ska rags bzang po ma dang / pad+ma ltar smra ba dang / 'jigs byed ma dang / mi 'jigs sbyin ma dang / rgyal ma dang / rnam par rgyal
135b5(rgyud): ma dang / nam grum dang / sgra gcan ma dang / skya mthar byed ma dang / rlung ma dang / yid 'phrog ma dang / yid ldan ma dang / me tog ldan pa dang / me tog gi grong khyer la gnas ma dang / ser skyam dang /
135b6(rgyud): baphrog ma dang / dpal ldan ma dang / dpa' mo dang / dpa' babang mo dang / shin tu mi bzad ma dang / mi bzad ldan ma dang / lha mdzes ma dang / ro bzung ma dang / gsang ba dam pa ma dang / shing
135b7(rgyud): la mu la gnas ma dang / mya ngan med ma dang / mun par mdzes ma dang / snang bar mdzes ma dang / 'od ldan ma dang / lhag par ldan ma dang / gzugs mdzes ma dang / dkar med pa dang / zhib ma dang //
136a1(rgyud): phyogs mtshams ma dang / sdug ma dang / dga' byed ma dang / nye ba'i dga' byed ma dang / 'jig rten las 'das ma ste/ gnod sbyin mo chen mo 'di dag gnod sbyin mo brgya stong phrag
136a2(rgyud): du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der rgyang ring po nyid nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur to// gang yang sha pha mo dag sha ba mo brgya stong phrag du ma'i
136a3(rgyud): 'khor dang ldan pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der rgyang ring po nyid nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal zhing mchod par gyur pa la 'di lta ste/ skud ma dang / phyag dar khrod kyi sha pha mo dang /
136a4(rgyud): ba mo drag mo dang / sha za mo skar mda' ma dang / sha za mo bar ma dang / thal ba za ma dang / sha za ma dang / dug ma dang / bung ba ma dang / rmongs byed ma dang / sngags mdzum ma dang / dmar ldan ma dang / klang
136a5(rgyud): mar ma dang / 'jig rten nye gnas ma dang / thal bar nye gnas ma dang / shing pi lu dang ldan ma dang / mang ldan ma dang / mang ma dang / gdul dka' ma dang / e la ma dang / mtshon byed ma dang
136a6(rgyud): ba la gnas ma dang / du ba ma ste/ sha za mo chen mo 'di dag sha za mo'i 'khor bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang bcas pa de dag kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der 'dus shing rab tu zhugs par gyur to//
136a7(rgyud): gang yang ma mo dang / ma mo chen mo dag 'jig rten gyi rjes su rnam par spyod cing sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed cing / gtor ma dang / me tog dman ma la spyod par byed pa dag la 'di lta ste/ tshangs
136b1(rgyud): pa dang / dbang phyug chen po ma dang / khyab 'jug ma dang / gzhon nu ma dang / rgan byad ma dang / phag mo dang / dbang mo dang / gshin rje mo dang / me phyogs ma dang / nyi ma'i bu mo dang / 'jig /
136b2(rgyud): mthar byed ma dang / chu lha ma dang / dbang ldan ma dang / rlung phyogs ma dang / gzhan gyi srog 'phrog ma dang / mgo bregs ma dang / bya ma dang / byam chen mo dang / srul mo dang / lus srul mo dang /
136b3(rgyud): skem byed ma ste/ ma mo chen mo de dag kyang ma mo'i 'khor byi ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma dang bcas pa de dag kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i tshig 'don cing 'a/
136b4(rgyud): par gyur to// de bzhin du mi dang / mi ma yin pa bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma dang / sems can dang / sems can ma yin pa nas/ dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa nas/ srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du thams cad
136b5(rgyud): kyang skabs 'dir nam mkha'i dkyil du snang bar gyur to// sems can gyi ris na srog chags su la'ang phan tshun mi mthun pa med par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
136b6(rgyud): cho 'phrul gyi rgyan gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sems can thams cad kyi spyi bo'i gtsug na bzhugs par mthong bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das shA
136b7(rgyud): thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi kham su sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rnam par gzigs nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ dag pa'i sems dpa' sngags kyi spyod
137a1(rgyud): pa'i don rnam par gtan la dbab pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u rab 'byam byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod gang 'di bshad pa'i dus la bab par sems na shad cig/ de nas 'jam/
137a2(rgyud): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas rjes su gnang bar mdzad pa na/ nam mkha'i ngo bo dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje 'thug cing sra ba'i rgyud bkod pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug
137a3(rgyud): te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang de dpag tshad brgya stong du ma rgya che ba'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin du lhag par gnas par gyur to// gang du gnong
137a4(rgyud): sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri ba dang / rlung lha dang / sha ba de dag dang / mdor na sems can gyi khams thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis gzhal med khang de dag rdo rje'i nor bu rin po ches
137a5(rgyud): bur gyur te/ der rab tu zhugs nas 'khod par gyur kyang phan tshur rnam par 'tshe bar byed par med do// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de 'dus par gyur par shes nas/
137a6(rgyud): khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed la smras pa/ kye khro bo chen po sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' tham cad kyi rjes su nges par 'byung bar byed pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dus pa 'di'i sems can thadra/
137a7(rgyud): cad la srungs shig srungs shig/ dbang du gyis shig/ ma rungs pa gdul bar gyis shig/ sems can zhi ba dag sad par gyis shig/ sems can thams cad dad par gyis shig/ ji srid du nga'i rang
137b1(rgyud): gi sngags kyi spyod pa rjes su sgrub pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde snong rgya che bdag las sngags spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'chad par byed pa de srid kyi bar du 'di dag gi phyi rol tu song la srung ba gyis shig
137b2(rgyud): de skad ces smras pa dang / khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos bka' mnyan nas khro bo chen po'i gzugs kyis sems can thams cad rjes su bsrung ba dang / rjes su bstan pa'i phyir 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams
137b3(rgyud): cad du khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed khro bo'i 'khor brgya stong phrag du ma phyogs bzhi kun dang / steng dang / 'og dang / zad ka dag tu shin tu mi bzad pa'i sgra rab tu 'dod cing gnas par gyur to// de
137b4(rgyud): nas sems can de dag zhi ba dang / yid dang / sems bzang po dang ldan par gyur te/ bka' las mi 'da' bar byed par gyur to// 'di lta bu'i sgra'ang thos par gyur te/ gang dam tshig 'di las 'da'
137b5(rgyud): bar byed pa de dag ni ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du mgo tshal pa brgyar 'gas par 'gyur te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyang de yin no// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rang gi
137b6(rgyud): sngags kyi spyod pa'i don du ros kyi tshig smras pa/ chos gcig la yang dag par bsams na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sngags 'grub par 'gyur te/ gcig pu gang zhe na/ 'di
137b7(rgyud): lta ste/ chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i rnam par rjes su mthong ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gnyis la rab tu gnas na sngags 'grub par 'gyur te/ gnyis po gang
138a1(rgyud): #zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba nyid dang / sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa'o// chos gsum dang ldan na sngags kyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/
138a2(rgyud): gsum po gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa srung ba dang / rang gi sngags yongs su mi gtong ba nyid do// chos ba
138a3(rgyud): dang yang dag par ldan na dang po sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sngags 'grub par 'gyur te/ bzhi po gang zhe na/ rang gi sngags yongs su mi gtong ba nyid dang
138a4(rgyud): gzhan gyi sngags rjes su gcod pa med pa nyid dang / sems can thams cad la byams pas gnas pa nyid dang / snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i sems pa nyid do// chos bzhi po 'di dag dang
138a5(rgyud): ldan na dang po sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sngags 'grub par 'gyur ro// chos lnga dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la 'jug cing sngags kyi spyod pa grub pa yongs su rdzogs
138a6(rgyud): par 'gyur te/ lnga po gang zhe na/ rnam par dben pa'i phyogs yang dag par sten pa nyid dang / bas mtha' dgon pa sten par byed pa nyid dang / sems can gzhan la zhe sdang med pa nyid dang /
138a7(rgyud): 'jig rten pa'i sngags la mi lta ba nyid dang / tshul khrims dang / zos pa dang / spyod pa la gnas par byed pa nyid de/ chos lnga po 'di dag dang ldan na sngags spyod pa'i don 'grub cing yongs su rdzog
138b1(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// chos drug dang ldan na sngags kyi spyod pa 'grub cing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ drug po gang zhe na/ dkon mchog gsum la dang ba rjes su mi gcod pa nyid dang / byang chub
138b2(rgyud): sems dpa' la dang ba rjes su mi gcod pa nyid dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags la kun tu dga' ba nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings smras pa med pa la lta ba nyid dang / theg
138b3(rgyud): pa chen po'i mdo sde zab mo'i chog gi don mi spong zhing skyo ba med pa'i sems nyid dang / sngags kyi spyod pa yongs su btsal ba dang / dge ba'i phyogs yongs su mi gtong ba nyid de/ chos drug po 'di dag
138b4(rgyud): dang ldan na rig pa'i spyod pa dang sngags 'grub cing yang dag par sgrub pa nyid du 'gyur ro// chos bdun dang ldan na rig pa sgrub pa'i dus kyi thabs thob par 'gyur zhing / sngags kyi spyod pa la rjes su spyod/
138b5(rgyud): pa nyid du 'gyur te/ bdun po gang zhe na/ zag pa zab mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid sgom pa dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / 'don du 'jug pa dang / 'dri ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
138b6(rgyud): la mos pa nyid dang / dung dang / phyogs dang / nges par sdom pa dang / bzlas pa dang / spyir sreg dang / mi smra ba dang / dka' thub la gzhol ba nyid dang / rtog pa dang / blo dang / dran pa dang / shes
138b7(rgyud): rab dang / brtan pa la bsnyen pa nyid dang / byang chub kyi tshogs dang / theg pa chen po dang / zab pa'i chos kyi tshul la yang dag par rab tu zhugs pa nyid dang / rang dga'i sngags dgug pa'i bya ba la
139a1(rgyud): mkhas pa nyid dang / snying rje chen po dang / byams pa chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / dga' ba chen po nyid yongs su sgom pa nyid dang / spros pa med pa'i sems can
139a2(rgyud): gyi khams kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su 'chol ba nyid dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba nyid dang /
139a3(rgyud): theg pa dman pa la dga' ba med pa nyid de/ chos bdun po de dag gis ni rig pa dang sngags 'grub cing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chos brgyad dang ldan na rig pa dang sngags kyi spyod pa'i don 'grub cing
139a4(rgyud): lam du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ brgyad po gang zhe na/ mthong ba dang ma mthong ba'i 'bras bu dag la blta ba dang sems par 'dod pa nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang rnam
139a5(rgyud): par 'phrul pa nyid la the tsom med cing dang ba nyid dang / phyin ci ma log pa'i sngags gzung ba dang bla ma la gus pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyi sngags dang / rgyud dang
139a6(rgyud): spyod pa bstan pa mi slu ba bzung zhing bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rmi lam na mthong ba rab tu ston pa la mkhas pa nyid dang / ser sna dang //
139a7(rgyud): gnyid dang / rmugs pa mtha' dag dang bral bar byed cing rtag tu brtson 'grus rtsom la/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la bdag nyid 'bul bar byed pa nyid dang / mdor bsdu na dge ba'i rtsa bas
139b1(rgyud): chog mi shes shing go ma chen po bgos pa dang / bgegs thams cad rab tu sel bar 'dod pa nyid dang / byang chub kyi snying po gnod pa dang / longs spyod chen po dang / dbang chen par grags par bdag
139b2(rgyud): nyid 'dod pa nyid dang / dbang chen rab grags pa'i gang zag la bsnyen pa dang / dge ba'i gshes gnyen dang mi 'bral bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la nye dar /
139b3(rgyud): gnas pa nyid de/ chos brgyad po 'di dag dang ldan na sngags spyod pa'i don 'grub pa'i yang dag pa'i lam du 'gyur ro// grogs po dag mdor na byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral ba dang / dkon mchog
139b4(rgyud): gsum la dad pa dang / mchog tu sdug bsngal zhing tshul khrims nyams pa la yang mi skyo ba'i yid kyis rtag tu mngon par brtson pa la nga'i sngags kyi le'u rab 'byams mtha' yas shing rmad du byung ba byang
139b5(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i yid las byung ba 'grub par 'gyur te/ de las gzhan du shes par bya ba ma yin no// rnam par rtog pa med pa'i yid du byas nas nyams sad pa'i phyir yang
139b6(rgyud): bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dag
139b7(rgyud): gis 'di skad du tshig rjod par byed de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras legs so legs so// sngags spyod pa'i don rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bya ba chos kyi tshul la rjes su 'jug pa dang mthun zhing / chos bstan/
140a1(rgyud): pa legs par bstan pa ni sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir ro// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas chos rnam pa sna tshogs bstan pa dang rjes su mthun zhing sngag/
140a2(rgyud): kyi spyod pa dang rjes su mthun pa legs par bstan pa nyid do// rgyal po chen po gang la la zhig 'dus pa'i le'u 'di klog par 'gyur ba dang / 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / yid la byed par 'gyur ba dang //
140a3(rgyud): g.yul gyi thog mar glang po che'i steng du gzhag pa dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod par byed na/ de la bdag cag byin gyis rlob
140a4(rgyud): par byed cing phyir rgol ba dang dgra bo dag kyang dbang du 'gyur la/ gzhan gyi dmag gi dpung yang gzhig par bgyi'o// glegs bam la bris pa byas te rang gi khyim du bzhag na/ de la rigs kyi bu 'am// /
140a5(rgyud): rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po chen po 'am/ rgyal mo 'am/ rgyal mo chen mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma dag la srung ba chen po dang
140a6(rgyud): longs spyod chen po dang ldan pa dang / tshe ring ba nyid dang / nad med pa nyid dang / longs spyod rtag tu mngon par 'phel bar nyid kyang bgyi'o// de skad ces smras nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor/
140a7(rgyud): cing mi smra bar gyur to// theg pa chen po sngags kyi spyod pa bstan pa'i cho ga zhib mo chen mo las/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u rab 'byams
140b1(rgyud): rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo las 'dus pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la bltas nas/ sems can
140b2(rgyud): thams cad kyi dam tshig la rjes su 'jug cing kun tu lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu lte ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
140b3(rgyud): phyogs nas 'od zer bye ba brgya stong du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa'i 'od zer phyung ste/ sems can gyi khams thams cad kun tu snang bar byas nas slar log ste/ gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang snang
140b4(rgyud): bar byas nas 'khod par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la smras pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dam tshig la rjes su zhugs
140b5(rgyud): pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u rab 'byams kyi spyod pa sgrub pa/ sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur pa/ khyod kyi sngags kyi tshogs gang du sems can yang dag par zhugs na 'jig rten/
140b6(rgyud): dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi sngags 'grub pa yang dag par thob par 'gyur bas sems dpa' chen po khyod smros shig smros shig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po
140b7(rgyud): gnod sbyin gyi bdag po la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyud sbas so// rig pa thams cad yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par
141a1(rgyud): 'phrul pa ston par byed do// lag pa g.yas pa bteg nas sor mo'i rtse mos 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la sor bar byed de/ sor mo'i rtse mo de las rig pa'i rgyal po bye gzi zag
141a2(rgyud): brgya stong du ma byung ste/ byung nas kyang gnas gtsang ma'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang thams cad snang ba chen pos gnas par gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas khro bo'i rgyal po gshin
141a3(rgyud): gshed kyi snying po las thams cad byed pa dang / dpa' bo gcig pa dang / spyan drang ba dang / gshegs su gsol ba dang / zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / mngon spyod dang / mi snang ba dang / nam mkha'
141a4(rgyud): la 'gro ba dang / sa 'og tu 'jug pa dang / chu la mi nub par 'gro ba dang / dgug pa dang / rnam par dbye ba dang / dbang du byed pa dang / dri thams cad dang / 'phreng ba dang / mar me dag kyang rang gi
141a5(rgyud): rgyud kyi sngags kyis sbyin par byed de/ mdor na ji lta ji ltar sbyar ba de lta de ltar sgrub par byed pa ni yi ge gsum zhes bya ba stobs chen po don thams cad sgrub par byed pa khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags smras
141a6(rgyud): pa/ de gang zhe na/ oM AHhUM/ 'di ni khro bo chen po de'i snying po ste/ las thams cad byed pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad dang sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa la sems dpa' chen po 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis
141a7(rgyud): spras te/ bgegs thams cad 'jig par byed pa'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lag pa g.yas pa btag ste khro ba'i spyi bor bzhig pa byas so// 'di skad du'ang smras te/ sangs
141b1(rgyud): rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dgongs su gsol/ gang su dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rnam par gnas shing mtha' yas su med pa'i rdza
141b2(rgyud): 'phrul dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dam tshig la lhag par gnas par gyis shig/ de skad smras nas khro bo'i rgyal po la lag pa bskor nas btang bar gyur ro// khro bo'i rgyal po chen po btang/
141b3(rgyud): thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu song nas skad cig tsam gyis gang dag sdang ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rdzu 'phrul che ba dag tshar bcad cing der bkug par gyur nas/
141b4(rgyud): chos kyi dkyil 'khor chen po gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang der yang dag par bcug ste/ gnas ji lta ba bzhin du gnas par byas nas sems can ma rungs pa dag la'ang kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng
141b5(rgyud): pa'i tshogs su byas shing spyi bo la yang dag par gnas par byas so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de la'ang bltas nas/ sems can khyed cag thams cad nyon
141b6(rgyud): cig/ gang yang dam tshig 'di las 'das par gyur na de la khro bo'i rgyal po 'dis chad pa gcod par 'gyur te/ gang gi phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi dam tshig ni 'da' bar bya ba ma
141b7(rgyud): yin te/ sngags kyi don gyi tshig gsang ba byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis mdor bstan pa brjod par bya yis/ de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang /
142a1(rgyud): nas / na smra /
142a2(rgyud): 'phags pa 'jam dpal zhes bya ba yin no// khrag rgya ni gtsug phung lnga pa zhes grags te/ de la rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// rtsa ba'i sdigs 'din las thams cad pa zhes bya'o// snying ba'i sag
142a3(rgyud): las thams cad byed cing shes pa yin te/ oM bA kye daM na maH'dir phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni gtsug pung gsum pa zhes bya ba yin te/ longs spyod thams cad mngon par 'phel bar byed pa'o// 'a
142a4(rgyud): ba'i snying por 'gyur ba ni/ bA kye hUM/ 'dir phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni gtsug pud gsum pa zhes grags pa yin te/ sems can thams cad 'gugs par byed pa yin no// 'dir snying po mchog tu gyur/
142a5(rgyud): pa ni maM/ 'dir phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni rma bya'i gdan zhes bya bar bstan pa yin te/ sems can thams cad dbang du byed pa'o// gzhan yang phyag rgya thams cad kyi snying po dpa' bo chen po zhes bya ba yi ga
142a6(rgyud): brgyad yod de/ dpal mchog tu byed pa/ dag byed chen po/ srid pa gsum gyi chos nye bar gcod par byed pa/ ngan 'gro thams cad zlog par byed pa/ zhi ba thams cad byed pa las thams cad byed pa/
142a7(rgyud): mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba thob par byed pa/ sangs rgyas mngon sum du mthong ba bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyid bzhin du nye bar gnas pa
142b1(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyi na kyi phyir mchog tugs ra 'a rlabs nye bar gnas pa/ ri mams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ gang du dran pa la gyis rnarnams med pa 'ang mongs su sbyang/
142b2(rgyud): byed pa/ bzlas pa lta spos kyang ci dgos/ de'ang gang zhe na/ oM A bIr hUM le tsa ra/ grogs po dag 'di ni yi ge brgyad po dpa' bo chen po zhes bya ba'i gsang ba'i snying po'i bdag nyid yin te/ sangs rgyas
142b3(rgyud): nyid bzhin du rab tu nye bar gnas pa yin no// mdor na bya ba thams cad la yon tan gyi mtha' rgya chen po brjod par ni bskal pa bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du mar yang mi nus te/ 'dir phyag rgya'ang stobs po
142b4(rgyud): che zhes rnam par grags pa/ re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o// spyan drang ba'i sngags ni/ oM he he ku mA ra bi shA rU pi Na~M/ sarba pA la b+h+ra shi Ta pra bo d+ha na/ e h+ye hi thA ga bAn/ e h+ye ti ku mA ra k+Sha/
142b5(rgyud): Da rut+na d+hA ri na ma hA la ma d+h+ye taSh+Thi tiSh+Tha sa ma ya ma nu s+pha ra/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nan hUM/ mA bi liM ba ku ru swA hA/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gyi spyan drang ba'i sngags so// sangs rgyas thams cad/
142b6(rgyud): dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / wa dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / rnaM za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
142b7(rgyud): me'am ci dang / sto bye chen po dang / sha ba dang / phrin pa dang / 'byung po thams cad kyi'ang min// can dan gyi chung byas nyi yin bdun bsngags nas byugs pan dang / steng dang / 'og dang / thams cadas/
143a1(rgyud): gtor na sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa rang nyid lakhor dang bcas pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pathams cad dang /
143a2(rgyud): sngags dang / de bzhin du 'byung po'i tshogs dang / sems can thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur ro// na maHsarba bud+d+hA nAn/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAn/ oM d+hu d+har rbur d+hu ma bA sin/ tu mar tsang shi dz+re tISh+Ta sa ma yam/
143a3(rgyud): nu sma ra swA hA/ bdug pa'i sngags so// tsan dan dang / ga pur dang / gur kum gcig tu byas te/ bdug pas bdugs na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang
143a4(rgyud): sems can thams cad bdug pas tshim zhing dgyes nas bzhugs par 'gyur ro// 'dir yang phyag rgyar 'gyur ba raM// pad+ma'i 'phreng ba zhes grags pa// thams cad 'gugs byed zhi ba yin// spyan drang //
143a5(rgyud): ba yi sngags la yang // pad+ma'i 'phreng ba'i bzang po zhes// bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di nyid do// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / sems can thams cad byon pa la mchod yon
143a6(rgyud): dbul bar bya ste/ ga pur dang / tsan dan dang / gur kum chu dang sbyar nas me tog su pa dang / mA li ka dang / dbyar gyi me tog dang / me tog pu na ka dang / me tog pa ku la dang / me tog bid+d+hi ta ga ru 'di
143a7(rgyud): dag gang yang rung ba'i me tog gas/ dus nges po'i me tog bran ma po bcug ste/ sngags 'dis mad mon dbul bar bya'o// na maHsarba dudz+nyAn+da/ a pra ti ha ta thA sa nA nA~M/ dat+yama?/ ti te ma
143b1(rgyud): ru Ni ka badz+ranA ba d+hA NI/ a ha~M pra tI dz+nyA pa ya/ sa ma ya ma ru sbyar te/ Neny+dza/ maN+Da la ma d+h+ye pra be sha ya pra be ma/ sarba b+hu tA nuka pa ka b+ha~M h+NatrAM/ aM bar ban riHswAH/ 'dri yang byug rgyan gang
143b2(rgyud): zhes bya bar grags pa sems can thams cad dang rjes su mthun zhing brtan pa'o// 'dir yang dri'i sngags su 'gyur ba ni/ na maHsa men+ta bud+d+hA nA/ na maiHsa man+ta gan+d+ha a ba b+hA sa shri ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ tad+ya/
143b3(rgyud): gan d+he gan d+he gaM d+hA de/ gan+d+he na mo ra te/ pra tAts+tsha pra tAts+tsha maM/ gaM d+h+waM sa ma tA nu tsa ri Ni swA hA/ 'dir phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni lo ma zhes bya ba re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// 'dir me tog gi
143b4(rgyud): sngags su 'gyur ba ni/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA n+tu/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nAnAM/ nam sa ku su mi ta ra dza s+yA/ ta thA ga ta s+ya/ tad+ya thA/ ku su me ku su me ku sa ma d+h+ye/ ku sum pUr bA sa ni/ ku su ma pa tI swAH
143b5(rgyud): bdug pa'i sngags 'di nyid dang gong du bstan pa'i bdug pas bdugs par bya'o// sku ni rmang byung bas ma mi khyab// sangs rgyas thams cad phyag 'tshas te/ rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa yi
143b6(rgyud): gtong ma'i sngags ni pa shad bar bya// namaHsa pa~M dz+rat+tA// Arba tiHsatwAn+tu/ 6/ kaH/ ma hA satra san pa log te ma tho ba ma rbadz+nyA pa la tha~M pa ma ts+tsha sa 'i pa
143b7(rgyud): nga/ 'di na pags dbu pa bya/ 'byung ba thams cad kyi gatsha pa yang bya'o// 'di byag rgyar 'byung ba na mdung shes byab ma rungs pa thams cad tham par byed pa'i// namam sa/
144a1(rgyud): nAM/ a pra tita ta trA sa nA nA~M/ sarba ta mon d+ha kA ra bidz+nyA sA nA~M/ na maHsa man+ta N+yo ti gar+b+haHthA sa tsi ye/ ta thA ga ta ya/ tad+ya thA/ he he b+ha ga n+d+ha/ d+yo ta TIg tus ha sra rba ma twa~M ta sha
144a2(rgyud): ri bi ku rba bi ku rba ma hA bo d+hi sa tra sa man+ta dz+wa lo d+yo ti ta mut+ti khurda/ khud/ aM ba lo ka ya/ a ba lo kA ya ma~M/ laM sarba/ satwA~M nA d+hu swAhA/ mar ma'i sngags te/ 'dis mar me dbul bar bya'o//
144a3(rgyud): kha bye ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya na sems can kun gyis mthong ba'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nAnAM/ tad+ya thA/ dz+wA laM dz+wa la/ dz+wa la ya dz+wa la ya hUM bi b+hod ka ha ri kr-iSh+Na ping+ga la swAhA/ me
144a4(rgyud): bya ba byed pa'i sngags so// 'dir yang phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni// sems can kun la 'od gsal byed// kha sbyar zhes byar 'jig rten grags// byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyis// thub pa mchog
144a5(rgyud): gis sngon bshad pa'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la spras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po sngags kyi tshig 'di ni gsang ba dang bcas shing mchog tu
144a6(rgyud): gsang bar bya ba yin te/ khyod bu 'jig rten rnam grags pa'i// mi bzad pa ni gang yin pa// sngags rnams dag ni thams cad kyis// mkhas pa rnams kyis sgrub pa ste// spyi bo'i gdu bu zhes
144a7(rgyud): grags pa// rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs kyang yin// de ni rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir// rig pa 'di ni yang dag 'arjod// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA~M/ oM ka kar/ ku ru ku ru/ mam
144b1(rgyud): kAr+yAHny+dza b+har+N+Na/ sarba bi s+t+rai da ha na sarba badz+ra bi na ya k+She mur+d+ha karba dzi bi d+h+wan+da kA ra ma hA bi kri ta nub d+ha ri Ni/ patsa pa tsa sarba duSh+Ta/ ma hA gan pa ti dza~M bi n+ta kar ban d+ha bar rgas barba d+har/ ShaDa mu khA /
144b2(rgyud): Tu dza~M/ Sha Sha tsa ra Na ra dra ma nA ya/ bin+d+ha ma nA ya/ zah+ma t+yad ba man+ta sa mA ri yam pa/ ya tsul du maN+Da la ma d+h+ye be sha ya/ sa ma ya ma nu sA ra hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT suhA/ gsang ba pa'i bdag
144b3(rgyud): po 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mchog tu gsang ba'i sngags chen po gdong drug pa zhes bya ba yin te/ khro bo'i rgyal po bgegs thams cad 'jig par byed pa ste/ 'di brjod pa tsam gyis
144b4(rgyud): sa bcu'i dbang phyug la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jig par byed pa yin na/ bgegs ma rungs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'di brjod pa tsam nyid kyis bsrung ba chen po byas
144b5(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// 'dir yang phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni// nag po chen po zhes bya ba'i// bgegs rnams thams cad zhi byed pa'o// 'di nyid kyi khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying po ni/ oM hrIHSh+T+rIHbi kr-i tA naH
144b6(rgyud): sarba sha tru rA sha ya s+t+waM b+ha ya phaT phaT swA hA/ sngags 'di brjod pas dgra thams cad zug gzer chen po dang / nad chen po dang / nyin bzhi pa'i rims kyis thebs par 'gyur ro// rtag tu dga'is
144b7(rgyud): med pa dang / byams pa med pa dang / sring rje'i sems thob par mi 'gyur te/ bzlas pa len gyi bar du grol bar mi 'gyur zhing 'chi bar 'gyur ro// dkon mchog gsu khrigand pa byed pa dag la
145a1(rgyud): d+ham na pa tha sems yod pa gan gapa yin// byas can rgyagan rnaldan pams smra gyur ba s+ho// 'du pa stong bar gyur na/ la rdu tu dz+dzaH/
145a2(rgyud): phyag rgyan ci gsum chen po zhes bya ba nyid sbyar bar bya'o// ma rungs pa thams cad la gang 'dod pa de byed par 'gyur ro// snying po'i mchog sangs rgyas thams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ma
145a3(rgyud): gcig pa zhes bya'o// hUM/ 'di ni las thams cad byed pa'o// phyag rgya'ang rtse gsum chen po zhes bya bar sbyar bar bya'o// phung krol thams cad zlog par byed pa/ 'byung po thams cad dbang
145a4(rgyud): du byed pa ste/ mdor na khro bo'i rgyal po 'di ni las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzlas pa byas na grub pa'i dus su khyad par du 'phags par 'gyur ro// 'dir gshes
145a5(rgyud): su gsol ba'i sngags su 'gyur ba ni/ na maHsarba bud+d+hA nA/ oM pra ti ha ta g+hA san+na nA~M/ tad+ya thA/ dza ya dza ya su dza ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka Ti shArU pa~M NI gardza sarba bud d+hA sh+tsa bi sirnga ma sa pa ri tA
145a6(rgyud): b+hA ban+d+ha tsa pra be sha yas pa ya ma nu smar sarba na ga sasid d+harU man+ta pAd ma nir ba rtsi/ me pa re pUr ya nu swAhA/ 'di ni gshegs su gsol pa'i sngags te/ las thams cad la sbyar bar bya/
145a7(rgyud): ga rten pagang pa'i gas zhes bya yin te/ 'dis gdan la 'di skye par bya'o// yid kyis rdzas ma bdun byas te gshegs su gsol lo// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las rings pa
145b1(rgyud): kyi ma chud / gas dang/ sngags 'grub padag dang / da rgyu da / rnas pa nga / nas da/ sa pa smram pa du ba /
145b2(rgyud): dpal gzhin dur byung bas gdas gnang ma'i gnam med ladila'ang bzlas te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rten pa dang / rang gi rig pa'i tshogs kyi sngags kyi se ra buM 'byams smras so/
145b3(rgyud): sa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ oM pra ti ha ta gA tI dz+dza/ oMr Ta Ni swAhA/ 'di ni 'jam dpal gyi rjes su 'brang ba sgyu can ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa las thams cad byed pa ni phyag rgya chen po gtsug phung sde zhes bya/
145b4(rgyud): dug gi las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// na maHsarba bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sanA nA~M/ oM ni ti/ 'di ni nye ba'i skra can ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa yin te/ las thams cad byed pa'o//
145b5(rgyud): phyag rgya ni kha bye ba zhes bya ba gza' thams cad kyi las la sbyar bar bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA naM/ a pra ti ha ta ga tI nA lon+di/ rig pa 'di ni pad+ma can zhes bya ste/ las thams cad byed cing
145b6(rgyud): dge ba'o// phyag rgya bzang po'i gdan zhes bya ba dang ldan pas gnod sbyin mo nges par dgug par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a tsa~M tud b+hu ta rU pI NAM/ oM Sh+NISh+TaM swA hA/ phyag rgya mdung ni bsngags/
145b7(rgyud): pa yis// mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'joms par byed// sangs rgyas dag ni thams cad kyis// thams cad gzugs can rab bsngags pa// rig pa thaMd can zhes bya ba// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis
146a1(rgyud): ba gad pa yin/ namaHsa man s+'utrAnA/ a rba ti hata68// trA thA/ oM bar d+he swA dza/ phyag rgya gtsug dud gsum nyid // dpal stosbyin byed pas sbyang ba 6// gzugs/
146a2(rgyud): mang 'chang ba lha mo ni// myur du longs spyod grub byed pa'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ a tsa~Mt+te b+hu ta d+ha pInA~M/ oM b+hu ri swA hA/ phyag rgya mdung rtsi yang dag sbyar// rims nad thams cad nam 'jig
146a3(rgyud): yin// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA/ a tsa~M tAd b+hU ta rU b+h+r-i nA~M/ oM tA re s+yAhA/ rig pa pu ga rin zhes bya ba// las rnams kun la rab tu bsngags// phyag rgya mdung dang ldan pa yis// bgegs ni 'joms/
146a4(rgyud): par byed pa yin// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a tsi t+yA da b+hu ta rU pI NAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM bi lo ki ni swA hA/ rig pa snang ldan zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten thams cad dbang du byed// bde ba thams cad sbyin byed pa//
146a5(rgyud): gdong gi phyag rgya sbyar bar bya// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ a tsin+nad b+hu ta rU pI NI/ ta d+ya thA/ oM bi shre bi shre saM b+hA be bi shwa rU pI Ni ka ha A be sha sa ma ya ma nu sA ra ru ru tiSh+Tha swAhA/ rig pa chen po sto
146a6(rgyud): chen 'di// 'jog rten 'dren pas bstar byas// miche ba'i phyag rgyu ldan byas na// sems can thams cad 'bebs shing dge/ 'byung po kun la mchog smin pa// thams can ces ni yang dag
146a7(rgyud): bzags// na maHsa man+ta budz+nyA nA~M/ a tsit+ta b+hu ta dru pI tAM/ oM shwe te shrI ba su swA hA/ rma bya'i gdan gyi phyag rgya yis/ rnam dgod las ni thams cad byed// dkar chen mo zhes bya ba// rmad phyung
146b1(rgyud): bsam med gzugs can te// 'jig rten rnams kyi skal ldan byed// skyes pa bud med dbang du 'gyur// na maHsa mnu bu d+hA n+tu/ a tsi t+tang Tu nu bI d+h+ra/ ta thA 'a thal sa par rje dzungs
146b2(rgyud): ga hU~M staM b+ha ya dza~M b+ha ya mo ha ya ba dag mAn ya swA hA/ rig pa 'don rig chen po// rnal 'byor ma zhes rab tu bstan// phyag rgya gdeng gsum skyer byas ni// ma rungs sems can 'dul bar byed/ nA
146b3(rgyud): sa men+ta bu d+hA nAM/ oM pra ti ha ta sha ka ti pra tsa rI NI/ tad+ya thA/ oM shrIH/ rig pa 'di ni dpal chen mo// 'jig rten mgon gyis bstan pa ste// phyag rgya kha sbyar sbyar byas nas// rgyal srid chen po sbyin
146b4(rgyud): byed pa'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ sarba satwa b+ha ya pra dA yi nAM/ oM a dzi te ku mA ra rU pi ni e h+ye hi A gats+tsha ma ma kAr+yaM ku ru swAhA/ rgyal byed ma zhes rnam grags pa// gzhon nu bdud rtsi las byung ba/
146b5(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i phyag rgya ldan pa yis// dgra rnams cad zlog par byed// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ a tsin+d+had b+hu ta rU b+h+r-i NA~M/ tad+ya thA/ oM dza ye swAhA/ a dzi te swA hA/ a pa rA dzi te swAhA/ srong mo
146b6(rgyud): bzhi zhes rnam grags pa// byang chub sems dpa'i rjes 'gro ba// sa rnams thams cad kun 'gro na de// kun la rjes su 'dzin byed pa'o// maming po gtum ze ru zhes zags// 'di dag shi na/
146b7(rgyud): rjes su 'thang // gru mi bzhin pa la non nas/ rgya mtshalan gnas pa yin// su tshur phyag rgya lachings pa mas/ khasam tha mams cad yangs rdzogs byed/ namams ma su
147a1(rgyud): la kA prA d+hi ba NAM/ t+ya thA/ oM kum+bA ra ma hA ka m+bA ra ki Ta ki Ta/ ga mu kha bo d+hi satwA nur+N+Na ta/ ma su nA san/ gako te te thA ne/ rak+ta ga rAk+Sha gad+hA nu le ban pra sA hA/ 5
147a2(rgyud): khA hi khA hi hU~M nid t+ya/ rak+ta pa shU tsi ta mu rti sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ b+h+ra ma b+h+ra ma/ b+h+ra ma ya b+hU ma ya/ la hu la hu mA bi laM baM sarba kar+ya Ni me ku ru ku ru bi tsid tra rU pa d+hA ri NI/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM sarba bud+d+ha ru dz+nyA ta
147a3(rgyud): swA hA/ skyob pa byang chub sems dpa' ni// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bshad pa na// sa rnams ma lus rnam drug tu// kun nas yongs su rab tu g.yos// sems can kun gyi don phyir dang /
147a4(rgyud): ma rungs sems can bzlog pa'i phyir// mi bzad dbang phyug bu'i gzugs su// gdul ba'i don du 'dir skyes te// skem byed dang ni mig dmar gyi// phyag mtshan gyis ni mtshon pa ste// snying rjes
147a5(rgyud): thugs ni brlan pa yin// 'jam pa'i ngag gis gsungs pa yin// sems dpa'i nang na bdag nyid ni// byis pa rnams la phan byed gang // sems can spyod phyir brtson pa ni// 'gro ba kun la rnam/
147a6(rgyud): par spyod// phyag rgya mdung dang ldan pa mas// bdag nyid chen pos spya na te// tshangs pa la sogs pa'ang 'gugs byedan// mi rnams la na sras kyi dgos// gzhin nu'i sems sun ma 'dag skye
147a7(rgyud): mdu yinas yongs su sa pa per bya// srin drug su dpa la mdapas kyi// sngags su 'don yang dag pasan// sems can rjes su gsung ba khyim// byang chub sems dpa pa di gyud te/ maungs/
147b1(rgyud): sa pa skye ma// nganas rnams su badzu pa// sems su 'dun par bya / yangs sun na la na ga m+b+ha ga sa nga ldan pa smras/ smra
