147b4(rgyud): rnams ni dngangs byed cing // ma rungs 'jug pa zlog par byed// 'jam dpal gzhan nur gyur pa 'di'i gdong drug gi bu zhes bya ba'i 'jam dpal gzhon nu ni rjes su 'brang ba ste// las thams cad/
147b5(rgyud): byed pa ste/ bzlas pa tsam khe nas las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// 'byung po thams cad dngangs par byed pa dang / skrag par byed pa dang / 'gugs par byed pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang
147b6(rgyud): skems par byed pa dang / 'jig par byed pa dang / rig pa 'dzin pa ji ltar 'dod pa de thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha tra shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM bra h+ma brah+ma bar
147b7(rgyud): sa shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ sngags 'di tshangs pa chen po ste// byang chub sems dpas bshad pa yin// 'byung pos ni gyur rab tu thob// skad cig nyid la bsil bar gyur// phyag rgya gtsug sred lnga
148a1(rgyud): sbyar na// myur du dge legs thob par 'gyur// mngon spyod dag ni thams cad la// srid srung gi ni rig byed 'dod// 'dir ni mdong bsus bstar pa ste// 'di yi chog bsdus pa/
148a2(rgyud): yin// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nAnAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM ga ru Da pA ha na tsakr-i pA Ni/ tsa tur+N+Na dza hUM hUM sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ bo d+hi satwa Adz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bka' stsal
148a3(rgyud): pa// zhi ba'i don ni myur byed yin// 'byung po rnams ni rnam 'jig cing // khyab 'jug gzugs kyi lus can yin// phyag rgya gtsug pud gsum sbyar na// las rnams kun byed brtan pa yin//
148a4(rgyud): gang dag khyab 'jug rgyud las ni// bya ba rgya chen bstan pa dag/ thabs kyis gdul bya'i sems can la// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bshad pa yin// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ a pra ti ha ta sh+tsa
148a5(rgyud): sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM ma hA ma he shwa ra b+hu tA d+hi pa ti pra Sha b+ha d+h+wa dza pra laM ba dza DA mu ku Ta b+hA ra NaM/ si ta b+ha swa d+hu sa riT mU NI hUM hUM phaT phaT/ bo d+hi satwo dz+nyA pa ya taM swAhA/ sems can rnams la pa na 'dong /
148a6(rgyud): pas// sngags 'di bdag gis spras pa ste// phyag rgya mdung rtse gsum sbyar na// 'byung po thams cad rnam 'jig pa'o// bdag gis sngon no gang bsten pa// 'di yi chog sngon byung ba/
148a7(rgyud): sems canas steng gnas pa sa// ni ba pa zhes brjod paste// yod tan sna chags rgya cheb// ni ba'i rgyud las nga yis bstan// na maHsa man+ta budz+nyA nA/ a pra ti hata shA sa nA nA/ dad+ya sh+tha/ ma~M hra
148b1(rgyud): ramarba shA kan/ badz+ra ba d+hi ta k+Shas r+b+ba pA shrIg kha kha hU~M khA hi sa ma sa ma nu swar d+ha tiH ba rjes twA ya dz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ sngags 'drim thun chen po ste// ya mkha' lding nas dam par grags/
148b2(rgyud): gdul dka' 'dul byed rnams kyi mchog/ gdengs kwa can gyi dug rnams 'joms// phyag rgya che dang sbyar byas na// phung krol shin tu mi bzad 'joms// gnas dang 'gro ba'i dug dag ni// gso
148b3(rgyud): bar byed par the tsom med// sems can gdul bya'i thabs su ni// byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag dka'// nam mkha' lding gzugs sa la spyod// 'dab rabs dbang po 'od chen ldan//
148b4(rgyud): srid dam mkha' lding rgyud du// cho ga rgya cher bstan de dag/ sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// thams cad nga yis bstan pa ste// byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i lding // gdul ba'i
148b5(rgyud): don du 'di bstan to// gdengs can dug ni gzhom bya'i phyir// 'dab chags tshul gyis rnam par rgyu// 'jig rten sngags ni ji srid pa// cho ga 'di ni bstan pa na// sems can gdul bya'i do//
148b6(rgyud): du ni// de ltar ldang rnam par rgyu// gang yang de bzhin gshegs sngags dang // rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs drug kyang // nga yis rog rab 'byams dang // mdo dag kyang ni bstan pa yin// je ltad pa pa/
148b7(rgyud): mang po ni// dbad pas byibyas par masrung ba// de bzhin byis par blo can la// sngags kyi tshul gyis nga yis bshad// snod ni skabs bcu ldan pas bstar// daning lam bstad pa yin
149a1(rgyud): sngags rgya do/ ma lus pa/ du gzhon nus bstan pa smra// rgyal ba mchog gis gang gsungs dang // stobs brgya na pa'i mas su sungs dang // d+hA b+h+ya /
149a2(rgyud): bsam mi khyab tshul gyis// 'jam dbyangs kyis gsungs de dag go/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang dang / 'khor gyi
149a3(rgyud): 'khor chen po la gzigs nas dam tshig thams cad yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// gang du ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na sems can mtha' dag
149a4(rgyud): gi sgrub pa'i spyod pa sems la rab tu zhugs par gyur to// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang nor bu chen po sna
149a5(rgyud): tshogs pa'i rgyan bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor du gyur te/ bsam gyis mi khyab cing rmad du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos
149a6(rgyud): dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la zhugs pa dang / sa bcu'i dbang phyug la gnas pa dag gis kyang dkyil 'khor de bri ba 'am 'drir 'jug par mi rus na/ so so'i skye bor gyur pa'i sems
149a7(rgyud): can gyis lnga spos kyang ci dgos// 'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor bzang po de grub pa'i gnas skabs la gnas pa/ 'jam dpal gzhan nur gyur pas gzigs nas// sangs rgyas bcom
149b1(rgyud): dam lams cad dang / rang sa ngamatshas thams cad dang / 'phags pa can thos thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'as brgyal rab tugs pa cwas rab tu dang cu sa/
149b2(rgyud): dang / spyod pa la zhugs pa thams cad dang / phag pa dang bcas pa dang bag pa med pa thams cad 'ja ma dpral gnon nur gyur pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ sangs rgyas dang bang rlob sems dang /
149b3(rgyud): mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyu mthun pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par gyi thugs las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor la zhugs par bdag nyid kyis yang dag par shes par gyur to// sems
149b4(rgyud): can so so'i skye bo'i yid kyis kyang de dmigs par mi nus na// bri ba 'am 'drir 'jug pa lnga smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dkyil 'khor chen po bzang po de la rab tu
149b5(rgyud): zhugs pa'i sems can de dag la smras pa/ grogs po dag nyon cig/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bzla bar bya ba ma yin na/ sems can gzhan
149b6(rgyud): 'phags pa dang 'phags pa ma yin pa rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras mi
149b7(rgyud): las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa yid las byung ba ni bstan to// mi rnams kyi dkyil 'khor bstan par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das na'ang sems can rnam/
150a1(rgyud): masmra sa sa u sa su
150a2(rgyud): sa mas sa ga sa
150a3(rgyud): 'das sa/ sems su masas sa s+ho/ skro sa pa 'di da/ sa
150a4(rgyud): mi shes chog nyams pa'am// dam tshig bdag por ma gyur na// bdag nyid chen po mongs pa yang // sngags rnams 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// sngags ya dad pa med pas ni// 'bang pa dum byas kyir
150a5(rgyud): kyang // sngags rnams 'grub par mi 'gyur bas// ma rungs dam tshig mi bstan to// dam tshig sbyor ba nyams pa ni// rab 'byams brgya byin yin na yang // sngags rnams 'grub par mi 'gyur//
150a6(rgyud): mi rnams spos kyang ci zhig dgos// dam tshig bstan bcos de nyid shes// las kyi spyod pa sgrub pa la// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// sngags rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// 'jam
150a7(rgyud): pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor ni// las kun byed la rab zhugs na// bstan pa la ni gzhon nu bzhin// sngags rnams 'grub par 'gyur ba yin// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/
150b1(rgyud): sems dnga' chen po de la gsol ba btab pa// kye sems can chen po sems can chen po/ sems can gyi don gyi phyir mdor bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gsungs shig ces so// gsang bang
150b2(rgyud): bdag bro de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhor nur gyur pas sems can gyi don gyi phyir dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga smras pa/ ri zhig dang po cho 'phrul gyi tha phyed dam/ dpyid zla 'bring po 'am
150b3(rgyud): dpyid zla tha rung ngam// zla ba yang ngo'am/ nyin zhag dge ba dang / gza' bzang po la bltas te/ rgyu skar bzang po dang ldan pa yang ngo'i tshes gcig dang / zla ba nya ba dang / dus gnan la dbyar gyi dus
150b4(rgyud): spangs la/ snga dros byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ gang du grong khyer chen po la brten pa 'am/ dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon rang nyid 'dug par bya'o// rgya mtsho chen por 'jug pa'i gnas sam/
150b5(rgyud): mtsho'i ngogs dang nye ba grong khyer chen po'i byang shar gyi phyogs su ha cang yang mi ring / ha cang yang mi nye bar dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon song ste/ lo ma'i skyil bu byas pa la zhag bdun nam/ zla
150b6(rgyud): byed kyi bar du gcig pu rab tu gnas par bya ste/ gang gnas de dag tu'ang gtsang ba'i sa phyogs rdo ba med pa/ gyo mo dang / thal ba dang / sol ba dang / pu ma dang / rus pa spangs pa/ shin tu
150b7(rgyud): gtsang ba shin tu yongs su srung ba'i sa phyogs su srog chags med pa'i rul ba'i rnam lnga 'am/ can dan dang / gdur dang / gur sum gyi nus bsres pa khro bo gshin rjeg shed kyi sngags sde/
151a1(rgyud): sa brgyad bzlas te/ gtsug sud+ma A'i phyag rgya chen po dang ldan pas sa phyogs der phyogs pa/ dang / steng dang / 'og dang / bdag dang / phyogs mtshams thams cad du
151a2(rgyud): bsang gtor ba'o// de nas phyogs deng kun nas gru bzhir khru bcu drug gam/ khru bcu gnyis sam/ khru brgyad pa byas te/ de la chen po ni khru bcu drug pa'o// 'bring ni khru bcu gnyis pa'o// chung
151a3(rgyud): dun khru brgyad pa'o// dkyil 'khor 'di ni rnam pa gsum// thams cad gzigs pas gsungs pa yin// rgyal po 'dod pas chen po ste// 'bring ni longs spyod 'phel byed pa// chung ngu dam tshig yang
151a4(rgyud): dag srung // las rnams kur byed zhi ba yin// de dag las yid la gang 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor bri ba ni de la sa phyogs der khru do tsam brkos la// der rdo ba dang / sol ba dang / thal ba dang / rus
151a5(rgyud): pa dang / skra la sogs pa dang / srog chags kyi rigs rnam pa sna rogs gal te mthong na sa'i phyogs gzhan du brko ba byas na/ gnod pa med pa dang 'tshe ba med par 'gyur ro// ri bo'i rtse mo dang /
151a6(rgyud): chu bo'i ngogs dang / rgya mtsho'i 'gram dang / chu bo chen po'i ngogs su bye ma'i phung po chen po rnams 'bad pas shin tu so sor brtags te/ shin tu gtsang ba dang srog chags med par byas la dri
151a7(rgyud): bya'o// sa phyogs de'ang srogs chags med pa'i tshul ba'i rnam lnga bsres te/ chu bo'i klung gis gtsang ma 'am/ grog mkhar gyis gang du srog chags med pa'i sa des dgang bar bya'o// bka
151b1(rgyud): nas kyang legs par bdungs te kun nas mnyam par byas pa/ dkyil 'khor rnam pa gasnam gang 'dod par bya'o// seng phreng gi sur pa banil zla ba'i rgyal po'i rtags lan bdun pagra 'ang du/
151b2(rgyud): bzhir gdab bo// tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la khro bo'i snying po lan bdun bzlas pa byas te dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhi kun nas bskor bar bya'o// de bzhin du dbus kyi gnas su nang du'ang zu
151b3(rgyud): bya'o// dbus na gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis rang gi rig pa rtsa ba'i sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzla bar bya'o// gtsug pur lnga'i phyag rgya chen po bcings nas rtsa ba'i sngags kyis grogs
151b4(rgyud): po dang bdag nyid bsrung bar byas la/ sngags blo bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tu byung ste/ dkyil 'khor de la g.yas su bskor ba byas nas kha shar phyogs su bltas te ku sha'i star la
151b5(rgyud): 'dug par bya'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yid la byas te/ dkyil 'khor de'i gru ba ni kun tu ku shes bskor zhing dgram par bya'o// de nyid kyi phyi rol tu'ang
151b6(rgyud): rnams dgra gcig gnas pas bsngal zhing dbyung bar bya'o// de la dkyil 'khor gyi slob dbyin gyis sngon du bya ba rnams byas nas rang gi rgyud kyi sngags pa mkhas pa dang / sems can rje
151b7(rgyud): don gyi thabs kyi phyi theg pa chen po la mos pa da gag ge gcig sbyang bar byas pa dang / grogs bzang po dang ldan pa dang / bstan bcos snga tshogs kyi las mthong bas chen sna lnga'i phyi ma sa
152a1(rgyud): mo shin tu gsal zhing legs par sbyar ba byas la/ yi ge drug pa'i snying po mngon par bzlas pa'i bye ma dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag par bya'o// phyi rol tu'ang \u0f7f
152a2(rgyud): mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng ba dang / rta babs bzhis brgyan po/ chu shing 'bras bu'i tshogs kyis g.yur za ba dang / rnga bo che dang / dza rnga brdung ba dang / dung gi sgra dang / dga' ba dang / bkra shis
152a3(rgyud): pa'i sgra sgrog pa dag bya'o// zur bzhi nas chos mnyan pa dag la bshad par bya'o// phyogs bzhir theg pa chen po'i mdo sde bklag par bya ba la 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das yum shes rab
152a4(rgyud): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lho phyogs su bklag par bya'o// 'phags pa zla ba sgrol ma'i ting nge 'dzir nub phyogs su bklag par bya'o// 'phags pa sdong pos brgyan pa byang bogs su bklag par bya'o//
152a5(rgyud): 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde shar phyogs su bklag par bya'o// glegs bam dag med ni mdo sde bzhi po shes pa'i gang zag chos 'chad pa po la chos mnyan pa'i phyir bskul bar bya'i//
152a6(rgyud): de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon langs nas tsan dan dang / ga pur dang / gur gum bsres pa'i me tog dri zhim pa dkar po la rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas te/ dkyim 'khor de thams cad du mal pa dgrag
152a7(rgyud): par bya'o// mngon pang 'akral pa byas nas phyi rol du byang ste/ zhage bdun gyi bar du 'dod pa'i khabs bsten pa'i ri mo mkhan gnyis sam gsum byang chub tu sems bskyed pa / ga mi skyong ces
152b1(rgyud): bskyen pa mkhas pa dag bcug ste/ rtsa ba'i sngags kyis gtsug phud bcing ba byas la/ de nas gser dang / dngul dang / phangs dang / rin po ma rnam pa sna tshogs lus chod sna lnga shin tu mnges pa/
152b2(rgyud): yid du 'ong ba'i phye ma zhib mo rab tu blangs te/ longs spyod chen po dang ldan pa dang / chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po dag 'drir gzhug pa byas na dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyis nges par byang chub thob pa
152b3(rgyud): yin na/ sngags sgrub par byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ shAkya'i skyes mchog 'das gyur nas// sems can bsod nams chung ba la// 'di 'dra'i longs spyod ga la yod// de bas cho ga 'dri bstan
152b4(rgyud): bya/ 'jam dbyangs 'od chen ldan pa yis// skye bo 'phongs par gzigs nas ni// nyung zhing dkyil bsdus dkyil 'khor ni// mdor bsdus nas ni bstan pa yin// 'bras sA lu dang thug po
152b5(rgyud): ma shin tu zhib pa'i tshen sna lnga bzang po dkar ba dang / ser ba dang / dmar ba dang / nag po dang / ljang khu dag gis bsgyur te/ sngar bzhag pa'i tshon gyi phye ma slob dpon rang gis blangs nas gtsug pud
152b6(rgyud): lnga'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te/ rtsa ba'i sngags kyi bzlas pa byas nas phye ma de la phyag rgya bcing ngo // sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gi slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol shar lho mtshams kyi phyi/
152b7(rgyud): su chog mthong ba'i las kyis thab khung bya ste/ rgyar khru do la thabs su khru gang ba kun nas 'khor bar bad+mo'i the ba 'dra ba/ phyi rol yang bad+ma'i bab 'dra ba/ shing ba la sha'i yam shing gis me sngo
153a1(rgyud): bar bya/ shing bil ba'i yam shing mtho gang tsam rlon pa la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar la btags pa la rtsa ba'i sngags 'bru drug pa'am/ snying pos khu tshur gyi phyag rgya bcings te
153a2(rgyud): me la spyan drang bar bya'o// spyan drangs nas sngar bstan pa nyid kyi rtsa ba'i sngags yi ge gcig pa'i snying pos phyir yang brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis cod pan dang /
153a3(rgyud): 'tshog chas byas nas/ bdag nyid dang ri mo mkhan yang rtse gcig par byas nas sbyin sreg byed du gzhug go// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams yid la bya/
153a4(rgyud): ste/ sngar bstan pa'i bdug pas bdugs nas thal mo sbyar nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la rab tu btud nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la'ang phyag byas te/ tshon gyi phye ma blangs nas/
153a5(rgyud): sku'i gzugs kyis bcad pa la ri mo mkhan gyis yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// cho ga 'di dag gis dang por sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub bo nyid rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa sa
153a6(rgyud): grol bcugs pa gnas gtsang ma'i gnas med khang na chos ston cing gzhugs pa za bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi slo ba dpon mo 'drub la 'did sgrub pa'i gro gus mchog gis slob dpo padag zhes su sa/
153a7(rgyud): bdag nyid bsrung ba nga ba'i sngags kyis 'byung ba thams cad pa ga ma gtang 'a bya ste/ phyi rol gyi phyogs pa ni dang / gang dang / 'ag ga tu gtor bar bya'o// denas grus byas temag su
153b1(rgyud): bar song nas pos gtsang sa bgos te/ gtsang sru dang srung ba'ajos byas nas sum sum dang bsres pa'i mang gyi sbyin sreg stong ma brkyang ba'o// denas ku sha'i thes la 'duganas dazlas pa byas nga/
153b2(rgyud): du gnas par bya'o// chungs dkar la khro ba'i rgyal po gshin rjeg shed kyi sngags brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bsngags la lam por kha sbyar gyi nang du gzhag par bya'o// bgegs kyi rnam pa 'jigs su
153b3(rgyud): rung ba'i gzugs can mi bzad pa'i sgra rnam pa du ma rlung dang / char dang / yul ngan gzhan dang / gzhan gang yang rung ba mthong na khros pas nyungs kar chang par bcangs te/ lan 'dur sbyin sreg byas pa
153b4(rgyud): des ni bgegs rab tu 'joms par 'gyur ro// mi'i bgegs la ni lan lnga chang pa nas sbyin sreg byas na skyes bu de rengs par 'gyur ba 'am/ nus pa med par 'gyur ba 'am/ 'chi bar 'gyur ba 'am/ skad
153b5(rgyud): cig de nyid la mi ma yin pas zin par 'gyur ba la nams kyang the tsom med de brgya byin yang 'chi bar byed na/ ma rungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i mi 'am/ bgegs tha mal pa lta smos kyang ci dgas/ khro bo gnyi
153b6(rgyud): rjeg shed kyis 'jigs pas bgegs rnams phan tshun du 'bros shing me snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gis de nyid du ku sha'i zhes la gnas nas khro ba'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed /
153b7(rgyud): bkrus pa byed cing gnas par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku gzugs kyi g.yas ngos su rang sangs rgyas gnyis kyis pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa
154a1(rgyud): bya'o// de gnyis kyi 'og tu nyan thos chen po gnyis chos nyan pa bya'o// de dag gi'ang g.yas su bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rgyan thams
154a2(rgyud): cad kyis brgyan pa/ ston ka'i 'dam bu'i mdog ltar dkar ba/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yon pa na pad+ma bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pa mchog sbyin pa/ de'i yang g.yas na bcom ldan/
154a3(rgyud): 'das yum gos dkar mo/ phyag g.yon pa na pad+ma bsdams pa/ phyag g.yas pas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal ba/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ phyag na gser gyi cod pan 'chang
154a4(rgyud): ba dang wa dkar po'i ni bza' mnabs pa/ dar wa'i bla gos mnabs pa/ thal ba nag pos thig le gsum bya sa ma/ de bzhin du sgrol ma dang khro gnyer can yang rang rang gi gnas su spyod lam dag gis
154a5(rgyud): gnas par bya'o// de dag gi steng du ni bcom ldan 'das yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan dang / gtsug tor gyi rgyal mo rnams bya'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems
154a6(rgyud): dpa' bcu drug bya ba la 'di lta ste/ kun tu bzang po dang / sa'i snying po dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / ngan song rnam par sbyong ba dang / byams pa rnga yab
154a7(rgyud): lag na thogs shing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / dri ma med par 'gro ba dang / dri ma med pa'i tog dang / nor bzang dang / zla ba'i 'od dang / dri ma med par grags pa dang / nad thams cad
154b1(rgyud): gso bar byed pa dang ga chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang / 'jig rten 'gro ba dang / blo chen po dang / blo bzang po ste/ sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni lus shin tu zhi ba dang / rgyun thams cad/
154b2(rgyud): kyis brgyan pa bri bar bya'o// reg pa'i rgyal po gi tso bo dang / rig pa'i rgyal mo dang / pad+ma'i rigs gzugs dang / phyag rgya lung ji lta ba bzhin du gnas ji lta ba ma lus pa dag tu bri bar bya'o// mtha'i gru
154b3(rgyud): ba zhi'i gnas dag tu ni gnas rnams gzhag par bya'o// pad+ma'i me tog legs par byas pa dang / rig pa'i lha gang dran pa'ang de dag tu gzhag par bya'o// de bzhin du lho phyogs su bcom ldan 'das shAkya
154b4(rgyud): thub pa dang / rang sangs rgyas gnyis ni ri spos kyi ngad ldang ba la bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi shar du bdag nyid lta ba dang / thams cad la'ang 'jug pa'i sgo rnams bya'o// bcom
154b5(rgyud): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i g.yon phyogs su rang sangs rgyas gzhan gnyis te/ tsan dan dang / grub pa zhes bya ba gnyis bri bar bya'o// de gnyis kyi 'og tu nyan thos gnyis ni 'od srungs chen po dang / ka t+ya ya
154b6(rgyud): na bri bar bya'o// de dag gi'ang g.yon du 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje ut+pal ltar mdog sngo bsangs gzugs shin tu mdzes pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ lag pa g.yas pa na rnga yab thogs pa/
154b7(rgyud): g.yon pa khro bo'i lus kyis gnas pa/ rdo rje khu tshur ma/ rdo rje lcags kyu ma/ rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma/ dpung bzang ma/ rdo rje sde ma cha byad ji lta ba bzhin du bgegs kyi gdan la gnas pa/ rig pa'i rgyal po
155a1(rgyud): thams cad dang / rig pa'i rgyal mo 'khor dang bcas pa bzlas pa dang / phyag rgya dang ldan pa ji ltar shes pa bzhin bri bar bya'o// de dag gi'ang g.yod du zur bzhir sna tshogs
155a2(rgyud): phyag rgya bri bar bya'o// bris nas kyang gnas gang du rig pa'i tshogs ma dran pa'i gnas de dag kyang 'dir bzhugs shig ces brjod par bya'o// de'i steng du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / bcom ldan 'das
155a3(rgyud): yum mA ma kI bri bar bya ste/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gzugs shin tu mdzes par bya'o// de dag gi steng du gtsug tor gyi rgyal po brgyad kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas/
155a4(rgyud): rang rang dag gis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po'i gzugs su bri bar bya ste/ gser gyi mdog can dbang po shin tu dul la/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa la zur gyis
155a5(rgyud): lta ba dag la 'di lta ste/ gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba dang / gtsug tor mngon par 'phags pa dang / gtsug tor gdugs dkar po dang / rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang / pad+ma'i gtsug tor dang
155a6(rgyud): rnam par rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang / gzi brjid phung po'i gtsug tor dang / gtsug tor mthon po ste/ brgyad po 'di dag ni gtsug tor gyi rgyal po rnams so// g.yon du bri ba ni rang sangs rgyas rnams so//
155a7(rgyud): 'jug pa'i phyogs kyi sgor ni byang chub sems dpa' gnyis bya ste/ g.yas phyogs su ni 'jig rten las 'das par 'gro ba zhes bya ba ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ lus ni ba/ lag pa g.yon pa mchog/
155b1(rgyud): sbyin pas 'phreng ba 'dzin pa/ lag pa g.yas pa spyi thugs 'dzin cing sgo la mngon du phyogs pa/ bzhin cung zad khro gnyer dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o// 'jug pa'i sgo'i g.yor phyogs su ni byang /
155b2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' chen po ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba zhes bya ba dri bar bya ste/ lus rab tu zhi ba/ ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ lag pa g.yon pa na dbyig pa dang smre thugs 'dzin pa/ lag pa g.yas pa ni
155b3(rgyud): mchog sbyin pas 'phreng ba 'dzin pa/ bzhin cung zad khro gnyer dang ldan pa sgo la mngon par phyogs pa bri'o// seng ge'i khri'i 'og tu chos kyi 'khor lo kun tu 'bar bas khyab pa/ de'i 'og tu rin po che'irigan
155b4(rgyud): med khang de la gnas pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gzhon nu'i gzugs can sku mdog dmar skya/ zhi ba'i gzugs dang mdzes
155b5(rgyud): pa'i gzugs can/ cung zad zhal 'dzum pa/ phyag g.yon pa na ut+pal sngon po bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pa na bil pa bsdams pa/ byis pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gtsug pud
155b6(rgyud): lngas nye bar mdzes par gyur pa/ mu tig gi 'phreng ba'i mchod phyir thogs pa/ dang lnga'i stong g.yogs mnabs pa gdar gyi na bzas smad g.yogs mdzad pa/ 'od kun nas 'phro ba/ 'bar ba'i 'phrang
155b7(rgyud): bas kun nas khyab pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar bzhugs pa/ khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed la gzigs pa/ dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i sgo la mngon du phyogs pa blta na sdug pa bri bar bya'o//
156a1(rgyud): de'i g.yas phyogs kyi ngos kyi pad+ma'i 'og tu khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed ze bar bya ste/ mi sdug pa chen po'i gzugs can/ kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas khyab pa/ bka'
156a2(rgyud): len cing 'dzin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i phyogs su blta ba/ g.yon phyogs kyi pad+ma'i 'og tu gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu'i gzugs can byang chub sems dpa' lnga bri bar bya ba
156a3(rgyud): la 'di lta ste/ shin tu dri med dang / shin tu dul ba dang / dag pa dang / mun sel dang / kun tu snang ba'o// de dag thams cad kyang gnas gtsang ma'i gzul med khang na 'dug pa/ rin po che dum
156a4(rgyud): 'bar ba'i rdo'i steng dang 'dra ba kun nas 'bar ba/ me tog sna tshogs kyi gcal bkram pa shin tu mdzes pa bri bar bya'o// phyi rol khor yug tu zur bzhi'i rnam par byas te/ rta babs bzhi dang ldan
156a5(rgyud): pa/ phyogs bzhi nas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i tshen sna lngas gsal bas ri mo shin tu drang ba dang ldan pa nang gi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o// shar gyi bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i steng du ri mo'i dbus
156a6(rgyud): su me tog kun nas skyes pa'i rgyal po'i dbang pos pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs cung zad chung bar bya'o// 'od zer 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas khyab pa/ mdzag
156a7(rgyud): sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang ljon pa/ skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ de'i g.yas su gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o// g.yon du ni gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o// de gnon/
156b1(rgyud): gshegs pa'i spyan gyi steng du ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa stan ngas gzigs dbang phyug gi seng dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi ngas
156b2(rgyud): phyag rgya'i g.yas su bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs can bya ste/ phyag rgya mchog sbyin pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ kun nas 'od 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas/
156b3(rgyud): khyab pa/ de'i yang g.yas phyogs su ni lhung bzed dang chos gos kyi phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du mthar gyis 'jug pa'i gnas la ni pad+ma'i phyag rgya'o// bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes
156b4(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yon phyogs su gtsug tor gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya bri ste/ kun nas 'od 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas khyab pa/ de'i g.yon phyogs su de bzhin gshegs
156b5(rgyud): pa rin chen tog bya ste/ rin po che'i ri bo'i steng du chos ston cing bzhugs pa/ bai DUR+Ya sngon po dang / margad dang / pad+ma rA gA rnam pa sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba'i kun nas 'od dang ldan pa bri bar/
156b6(rgyud): bya'o// de'i yang g.yon phyogs su rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas khyab pa bri'o// de'i yang g.yon phyogs su chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba dang
156b7(rgyud): pa bri'o// de'i yang g.yon phyogs su 'khar gsil dang / skye thugs dang / 'phreng ba dang / bzang po'i gdan gyi phyag rgya bri'o// mthar gyis sgo'i gnas su rdo rje rtse gsum pa gnyis ka la'ang kun
157a1(rgyud): nas 'bar ba bri'o// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i 'og tu phyag rgya chen po gtsug pud lnga zhes bya ba dang / ut+pa la'i phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba 'di/
157a2(rgyud): gnyis phan tshun 'brel bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor kun nas sgo bri bar bya'o// sgo dag ni rgyab kyis blta ba dang / 'jug pa ni mdun gyis blta bar bya'o// phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'gyur/
157a3(rgyud): ba yang kha dog lnga'i tshen shin tu gsal ba sna tshogs blta na sdug pa/ zur bzhis rnam par mdzes pa/ rta babs bzhi'i rnam pa phyogs bzhir khru gnyis tsam/ nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi
157a4(rgyud): shar phyogs su tshangs pa chen po bri bar bya ste/ gdong bzhi pa/ gos dkar po bgos pa la stod g.yogs gos dkar po dang / tshangs skud dkar po thogs pa/ kha dog gser 'dra ba/ ral pa'i cing
157a5(rgyud): pa na 'dzin pa/ lag na dbyug pa dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa/ de'i g.yas phyogs su 'od gsal gyi lha'i bu bya ste/ mdog gser 'dra ba/ bsam gtan khyad par can gyi gzugs can/ dar lnga'i gos
157a6(rgyud): bgos pa/ dar lA'i stod g.yogs byas pa/ bzhin shin tu gsal ba/ ral pa'i cod pan 'dzin pa/ mchod phyir thogs dkar po can/ skyil mo krung gis 'dug pa/ lag pa g.yas pas mchog sbyir
157a7(rgyud): pa/ de'i g.yas phyogs su 'og min gyi lha'i bu bya ste/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ lus rab tu zhi ba/ bsam gtan gyi rnam pa'i cha byad can/ dang wa'i gos bgos pa/ dar lnga'i gos kyi
157b1(rgyud): stod g.yogs byas pa/ skyil mo krung gis 'dug pa/ lag pa g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/ mchod phyir thogs dkar pos byas pa/ de'i rim gyis dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan rdzu/
157b2(rgyud): dbang byed dang / 'thab bral dang / brgya byin la sogs pa'i lha'i bu bri bar bya ste/ go rim ji lta ba dang / cha byad dang dbyibs ji lta ba bzhin du'o// brgya byin gyi 'og tu rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris la rtag
157b3(rgyud): tu myos dang / 'breng thogs dang / lag na gzhong thogs dang / pi wang gnyis pa dang / sa b+ha'i lha'i bu dag go rims ji lta ba dang / cha byad ji lta ba bzhin du bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du lho phyogs su mi
157b4(rgyud): che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / dge chung dang / bsod nams skyes la sogs pa'i lha'i bu cha byad dang dbyi bas ji lta ba bzhir bri bar bya'o// nub phyogs dang
157b5(rgyud): byang phyogs su'ang de bzhin te/ de dag ni rim pa 'og ma gnyis la brten te bri bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi phyi rol du dkyil 'khor gsum par 'gyur ba la mthar gyis phyogs bzhi'i rgyal po
157b6(rgyud): chen po bzhi ste/ byang phyogs nas 'jug pa'i g.yas ngos su gter nye bar gnas pa la gnod sbyin rgyan thams cad kyis brgyadan pa/ gtsug pud cung zad 'dud pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi gzugs can/
157b7(rgyud): de'i g.yas su nor bu bzang dang / gang ba bzang po gnod sbyin gyi bdag po gnyis bri'o// de bzhin du mthar gyis gnod sbyin mo cher mo 'phrog ma'ang bri'o// de bzhin du mthar gyis nub phyogs su ru lha/
158a1(rgyud): lag na zhags pa thogs pa dang / klu dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / 'jog po dang / nor rgyas la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po chen po brgyad po bri'o// de bzhin du rim pa gnyis la
158a2(rgyud): gnas pa'i mthar gyis gnod sbyir dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / drang srong dang / grub pa dang / yi dgas dang / sha ba dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi dang / mir/
158a3(rgyud): yin pa la sogs pa dang / sman dang / nor bu rin po che'i bye brag dang / ri dang / chu bo dang / gling dang / mthar gyi sa gtso bo thams cad bri bar bya'o// lho phyogs su ni gshin rje ma mo bdun gyi 'khor/
158a4(rgyud): dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o// shar lho mtshams su me lha kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas khyab pa/ dbyug pa dang / spyi blugs dang / 'phreng ba lag na thogs pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag za ba/ ral pa'i/
158a5(rgyud): cod paran 'dzin pa/ gos dkar po bgos pa/ dar lU'i stod g.yogs byas pa/ mchod phyir thogs dkar po thogs pa/ mdog gser 'dra ba/ thal ba'i thig le gsum byas pa/ de bzhin du rgyan dang /
158a6(rgyud): mtshon ra dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa rim pa gnyis pa la rten te bri bar bya'o// thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i sgo'i phyi rol du dka' zlog gi bdag po khyA/
158a7(rgyud): mchog la zhon pa/ lag na mdung rtse gsum thogs pa/ lha mo dka' zlog ma kha dog sna tshogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ smin drug gi bu rma ba'i gdan la 'dug pa/ mdung thogs pa/ gnon/
158b1(rgyud): nu'i gzugs can/ gdong drug pa/ lus dmar por snang ba/ gos ser po bgos pa/ gos ser po'i stod g.yogs car/ lag pa g.yon pa na dril bu dang ba dan dmar po thogs pa/ mthar gyis rdzing/
158b2(rgyud): gau ri ti shin tu rid pa 'dra ba dang / tshogs kyi bdag po chen po dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / nag po chen po dang / ma mo bdun po rgyan dang / mtshon cha dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs ji lta ba bzhin bri bar
158b3(rgyud): bya'o// nor lha brgyad dang / drang srong bdun dang / khyab 'jug lag pa bzhin 'khor lo dang / dung dang / ga d+hA dang / ral gri thogs pa/ gdan nam mkha' lding rgyan thams cad kyis brgyad pa/ gza' brgyad
158b4(rgyud): dang / rgyu skad nyi shu rtsa bdun dang / gang yang nye ba'i gza' brgyad sa steng gi dkyil 'khor na rab tu rgyu ba'ang bri bar bya'o// mthar gyis tshes grangs bco lnga dang / yang ngo dang mar ngo'i phyogs dang / khyim bcu
158b5(rgyud): gnyis dang / dus drug dang / zla ba bcu gnyis dang / lo tshigs dang / sring mo bzhi gru la zhon pa dang ming po lnga gru la zhon cing chu la gnas pa ste/ mdor na phyag rgyar gzhag par bya ba'ang yin no//
158b6(rgyud): lha mo de dag mthar gyis rim pa gnyis pa la bsten te bya ba yin no// slob dpon bdag nyid phyi rol tu byung nas dkyil 'khor de la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ mdor na dkyil 'khor gsum
158b7(rgyud): yang dkyil 'khor gsum la rten cing bri bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gsum car yang gru bzhir rnam par gnas par bya ba yin no// mdor na 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams
159a1(rgyud): kyi mgon po ni nges par bri bar bya'o// pad+ma'i rigs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang nges par bri bar bya'o// rdo rje'i rigs 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'ang
159a2(rgyud): nges par bri bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gtso bo 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'ang nges par bri bar bya'o// 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa'ang nges par bri bar bya'o// lhag ma rnams
159a3(rgyud): kyi ji ltar rnam par gzhag pa bzhin phyag rgya bri bar bya'o// 'di ni nang gi dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor bar ma la'ang shar phyogs su ni me mjed kyi bdag po tshangs po bri bar bya'o// sgo'i drung
159a4(rgyud): du ni smin drug gi bu rma bya'i stan yod pa/ lag na mdung thogs pa/ lus kyi kha dog dmar ba/ gos ser pos stod g.yogs dang gos byas pa/ lag pa g.yas pa na dril bu dang ba dang
159a5(rgyud): thogs pa gzhon nu'i gzugs can gyis dkyil 'khor la blta ba'o// shar phyogs su ni nam mkha' lding 'dab chags kyi gzugs can/ drang srong gi nang nas mar kan nges par dri
159a6(rgyud): bar bya'o// lhag ma ni ji ltar gnas pa bzhin phyag rgyar bri bar bya'o// shar lhor ni gzhon nu ma bzhi dang / ming po gzhon nu dang bcas pa gru'i bzhon pa la gnas pa/ rgya mtsho chen po la
159a7(rgyud): rnam par rgyu ba dang / me'i lha'i rgyal po'ang nges par bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du lho phyogs su ni srin po'i bdag po las ni grong khyer lang ka'i bdag po b+hi b+hi sha na shing pi tsu marda la gnas pa dang
159b1(rgyud): dzam+b+ha la ru dbang zhes bya ba gnod sbyin gyi gzugs can gyi byang chub sems dpa 'dres par bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du mthar gyis gshin de'i rgyal po yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen mongs par tha ba dpa'o//
159b2(rgyud): de bzhin du sha ba'i rgyal po rnam par g.yeng byed ces bya ba nges par bri bar bya'o// lhag ma ni ji ltar gnas pa bzhir phyag rgyar bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du lho rub kyi mtshams su ni klu'i gtso bo dga' bo
159b3(rgyud): dang nye dga' bo nges par bri bar bya'o// ga pa'i gtso bo nyi ma bri bar bya'o// nub phyogs su ni drang srong thub pa'i mchog dang / gcer pu pa mu stegs kyi mchog gcer bu'i gzugs brib
159b4(rgyud): bya'o// lhag ma ni ji ltar gnas pa bzhin phyag rgyar bri bar bya'o// nub byang mtshams su ni gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po mchog sbyin dang / dri za'i rgyal po gtsug phud lnga pa dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal
159b5(rgyud): po ljon pa nges par bri bar bya'o// lhag ma ni gnas ji lta ba dang / dbyibs ji lta ba bzhin du phyag rgyar bri bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor bzhi pa phyi rol tu ri mo lnga bkod do// phyag rgya'i 'phreng bas
159b6(rgyud): nye bar mdzes par byas pa/ zur bzhi nas rta babs bzhi dang / rgyal po chen po bzhis brgyan pa/ ji ltar gnas pa la 'di lta ste/ phyag rgya 'gyur ba ni sgor 'jug pa la ut+pal sngon po bri'o//
159b7(rgyud): g.yas pa dang g.yon phyogs su ni pad+ma/ rdo rje/ dgra sta/ ral gri/ mdung dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / ga dA dang / 'khor lo dang / swasti ka dang / bum pa dang / nya dang / dung dang /
160a1(rgyud): gdub kor dang / spyi blugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / kha dan dang / zhags pa dang / dril bu dang / ru gri dang / gzhu dang / lcags mda' dang / tho ba dang / 'di dag rnam pa
160a2(rgyud): 'di dag 'dra ba'i mtshon cha'i mchog gi phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs su kun nas khyab par bya'o// de nas phyi rol gyi phyogs bzhir rgya mtsho chen po gzhag par bya ste/ byang phyogs su ni dkyil
160a3(rgyud): 'khor gru bzhir bya ste/ sna tshogs rdo rje rtse gsum yod pa kun nas 'bar ba bya'o// shar phyogs su ni dkyil 'khor gzhu'i dbyibs can byas te bzhag la/ kun nas 'bar ba'i pad+ma'i phyag rgyas
160a4(rgyud): mtshan pa'o// lho phyogs su ni dkyil 'khor zur gsum pa byas te/ kun nas 'bar ba'i lhung bzed kyis mtshan pa'o// nub phyogs su ni dkyil 'khor kun nas zlum po byas te/ ut+pa la sngon po
160a5(rgyud): sdong bu dang 'dab ma dang bcas pa kun nas 'bar bas mtshan pa'o// phyogs mtshams bzhir yang phyag rgya bri bar bya ba yin te// nub byang gi phyogs su ni dkyil 'khor thum po bya ste/ zhags pa
160a6(rgyud): kun nas 'bar bas mtshan pa'o// lho nub kyi mtshams su ni dkyil 'khor gzhu 'dra ba bya ste/ dbyug pas kun nas 'bang bas mtshan pa'o// sham lho'i mtshams suni dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa
160a7(rgyud): byas te/ dgras 'od ba kun nas 'bang bas mdzan pa'o// byang shar gyi mtshams su ni ril gri 'di kun nasa'i bang ba gzhag par bya'o// dpa' thams cad thos nas kyi dang / 'og dang yang
160b1(rgyud): phyag rgya gsum dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol sgo dang nye bar bye mas bri bar bya ba la 'di lta ste/ na bza' dang / rnga yab dang / lha mo 'od zer kun nas 'bar ba bri bar bya'o// 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni tho can gyis
160b2(rgyud): sems can rnams la phan bzhed nas// dkyil 'khor gyi ni cho ga rnams// 'dir ni 'dor bsdus bstan pa yin// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis dang po nyid du slob mo gzung bar bya ba/
160b3(rgyud): la/ dbang po ma tshang ba med pa dang / yan lag thams cad mdzes pa dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / theg
160b4(rgyud): pa chen por zhugs pa'i rang bzhin can dang / theg pa dman pa mi 'dod pa'i ngang tshul can dang / sems dpa' chen po dang / dad pa dang ldan pa dang / dge ba'i chos can dang / rgyal po chen po
160b5(rgyud): mngon par 'dod pa dang / longs spyod chung ba la smod pa dang / longs spyod chen po mngon par 'dod pa dang ldan pa dang / bza' ba dag dang / dul ba dang ldan pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan par
160b6(rgyud): dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams yang dag par sdor pa la nges par gnas pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar gnas shing sdom pa la gnas pa dang / byung chub
160b7(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po lan mi ldang ba dang / phyogs chen po dang / rigs mtshan po dang / rang bzhin nyid kyis chos srung pa dang / zhag gcig sbyang ba byas pa dang / gos gtsang sa pa gos pag
161a1(rgyud): mthun ma pa dang / dus kyus mdu khrus byed pa dang / na zhags gas dang / zu ga dang / 5/ 'di sa pos na stsu 'du /
161a2(rgyud): ku sha'i khris la 'dugs pa dang / zung ba'i chog byas pa dang / tshangs par stong pa dang / bde ba dang ldan pa dang / dus batshams las rgyal ba dkyil 'khar gyi phyi rom de nyid du bcang yi
161a3(rgyud): ha cang yang mi ring bar gzhag par bya'o/ shin tu gtsang ba dang / shin tu gtsang sgra dang ldan pa gcig nas brgyad kwi bar te/ de las gnan ma yin pa de dag kyang ban tshun gnyen du 'phral ba
161a4(rgyud): rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po chen po dag gi bu gzhon nu ma 'am/ gzhon nu grong gi chos mi shes pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gzhon nu'i gzugs
161a5(rgyud): can byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal ni byis pa'i skye bo dga' bar byed pa/ gzhon nu'i rol pa la dgyes pa des na/ dang po nyid du gzhon nu nang du gzhug par bya'o// rgyal po chen po mngon
161a6(rgyud): par 'phel ba dang / tshe dang / nad med pa dang / dbang phyug dang / skal pa chen po mngon par 'phel ba yin te/ khyad par du byis pa rnams la nges par sngags grub pas grub pa gnas pa
161a7(rgyud): yin te/ de dag sngar bzhag pa byas nas grogs po bag yod pa bzang po dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis ga pur gyi bdug pas bdugs te/ rgyab kyi phyogs pa ma yin/
161b1(rgyud): pas phyi rol du byung bar bya ste/ byung nas dus dang ji ltar mthun pa'i chu legs par gtsang sbra byas pa dang srog chags med pa la rtsa ba'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bzlas te
161b2(rgyud): gtsug pud lnga'i phyag rgya chen pos phyag rgyar byas pa'i chus khrus byas la nye reg byas nas gos gtsang ma bgos pa'i gtsang bas me thab kyi drung du song ste ku sha'i khres la 'dug ras byang gar gyi
161b3(rgyud): phyogs su mngon par bltas te/ mar gyi skyor sreg ga pur dang / gur kum dang / tsan dan dang bsres pas stong rtsa brgyad bya'o// sngar bshad pa'i tsho gas spyan drang ba dang gshegs su gsol
161b4(rgyud): ba bya ste/ yang dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya'o// nges par yang bum pa gang ba brgyad ras gtsang ma'i gos dang ldan pa/ shing a pra'i lo ma dang 'bras bu dang ldan pa/ gser dang / dngul dang /
161b5(rgyud): rin po che dang / 'bras bu dang / 'bru nang du bcug pa gcig bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la dbul lo// gnyis pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad la'o// gsum pa ni rang sangs rgyas thams
161b6(rgyud): cad dang 'phags pa nyan thos la'o// bzhi pa ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad la'o// lnga pa na byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 'jam dpal la'o// drug pa ni lhamams
161b7(rgyud): cad la'o// bdun pa dang brgyad pa ni dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i sgo lang la gzhag par byaste/ gcig ni 'byung po thams cad la'o// gcig na sems can thams cad kyi phun mong du byung
162a1(rgyud): ba bsngos nas gzhag par bya'o// de bas snarang bsad pal rdzogs stan drang bar bya'o// de bshin du mdog dang / 'dug pa dang / dzA dang / yang me dang /
162a2(rgyud): bshos kyang sngar bstan pa nyid kyi las kyis dbul bar bste/ thams cad kyi thams cad dugo rims bzhin du bya'o// mang me 'dzin pas mang gyi mang mi gsung bar bya'o// 'phags pa dang
162a3(rgyud): 'phags pa ma yin pa thams cad la lha bshos zhes smos pa ni 'bras sA lu'i chun no dang bcas pa dang / srang rtsi dang ldan pa'i 'othug khyad par can gyis che bar sbyang ba'i mngal bcos pa'i sA
162a4(rgyud): 'khur gyi 'breng bu la sogs pa dang / khan+da la sogs pa'i bza' ba thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dbul bar bya'o// mar gyis gang ba dang / tsan dan gyi thang chu sbrang rtsi'i snying po
162a5(rgyud): dang 'o mar bcos pa'i bza' ba ni rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang / 'phags pa'i lha thams cad la dbul bar bya'o// de bzhin du/
162a6(rgyud): gaN+Dod u lo pi ka dang / khyad par du snum 'khur gyi yo byad 'byung po thams cad dang / sems can thams cad la sngags dang ldan pa'i cho gas sbyin par bya'o// de bzhin du me tog dri zhim pa sna ma'i
162a7(rgyud): me tog dang / rgya spos dang / klu'i me tog dang / me tog pun na ga la sogs pa sngar bstan pa sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa'
162b1(rgyud): chen po dang / 'phags pa dang 'phags pa ma yin pa'i lha rnams la dbul bar bya'o// khyad par du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la ni snga ma'i me tog dang / pad+ma'i rigs la ni me tog pad+ma dang /
162b2(rgyud): bzhin du rdo rje'i rigs la ni me tog ut+pal dang / lha gzhan dag la ni gzhan gang yang rung bas dbul bar bya'o// ga pur gyi bdug pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la'o// can dang ni badz+ra
162b3(rgyud): rigs la'o// de bzhin gu gul ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la shes par bya'o// lha gzhan thams cad ni bdug pa tha mal pas bya'o// mar gyi mar me 'phags pa rnams// thams cad la
162b4(rgyud): ni dbul bar bya// 'phags min lha ni thams cad la// dri zhim 'bru mar dbul bar bya// cho ga ji bzhin rim pas ni// bdug pa mthong ba'i rgyu yis so// de ltar gsungs pa de bzhin dri// sngag
162b5(rgyud): rnams kun la rtag tu bya// spyan ras gzigs la gang gsungs dang // gang gsungs phyag na rdo rje la// rang rang gi ni sngags dag gis// sngags spyod don du sgrub pa'o// cho ga gcig pu blta bya ste// /
162b6(rgyud): tu rjes su mthun par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpor gyis snang mthong ba'i tshogs sur drang ba dang / mchod pa dang / bdug pa la sogs pa byas nas gnor mthun pa'i bya ba byas te/ de'i 'og
162b7(rgyud): tu sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gis mkhas pa dang byur bas 'byung ba thams cad pa'i gtor mi sha med pa/ kun nas rnga pa ta Na dang / dung gi sgra dga'o bar sgra sngags pa la sogs pa des 'dug pa dang /
163a1(rgyud): spos dang / me tog dang / 'phreng bas brgyan pa'i phyogs pa ni mtshams brgyad/ steng dang / 'og dang / zad ka thams cad du dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du bskor ba bya zhing
163a2(rgyud): 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma rgya cher gtor bar bya'o// de nas khrus byas te yang zho dang / spang rdzi dang / mar gyis bsgos pa'i sA lu dang / 'bras thug po che'i sbyin sreg rtsu ba'i sngags yi
163a3(rgyud): ge drug pa dang snying pos stong rtsa brgyad bya'o// sbyin sreg byas nas dkyil 'khor la rjes su bcug cing sngar bzhag pa'i sems dpa' chen po la bsrung ba byas nas/ dkyil 'khor gyi sleb dpon
163a4(rgyud): gyis slob ma nyid du khas blangs pa/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ gso sbyong byas pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la bdag nyid kyi lus phul ba/ dngos grub kyi phyir sems
163a5(rgyud): car thams cad kyi nye bar longs spyod pa dang / yongs su longs spyod pa thun mong du gyur pa dang / dge ba'i rdza ba bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi snying po banod par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i
163a6(rgyud): ye shes kyi sangs rgyas thob par bya ba la dkyil 'khor bstar bar bya'o// bstar po tsam nyid kyis sdig pa'i rnyog pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur te/ mtshams med pa lnga byed pa'i skye bo'o/
163a7(rgyud): dem thag tu grol bar 'gyur ro// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis ras ma nyams pa tha ga mas btags pa zag pa sgra med pa la rtsa ba'i sngags kyis lan gsum bzla so te/ phrin
163b1(rgyud): tsan+dan dang gur gum gyis bsgos pa'i ras kyis gdong g.yogs par bya'o// dang por byis pa lo gsum das lo bcu drug pa'i bar bur dung lngas nye bar mdzad pa'am/ gtsug pud gcig gis t+yen/
163b2(rgyud): mdzes pa'am/ gtsug dud kyis nye bar mdzes pa sna dang ldan pa/ rgyal po'i du skye bo nas dbang bskur ba'am/ rgyal rigs kyi bu 'am/ gzhan bdag nyid chen po rgyal po dpo 'dod pa dkyil 'khor/
163b3(rgyud): dugazhug par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gnyis pa la phyin pa na gdong g.yogs par bya ste/ ut+pa la'i phyag rgya bcings nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags lan cig brjod du ga zhug
163b4(rgyud): sbed me tog dri zhim po tsan+dan dang gur kum dang bsres pa shin tu gtsang ba byas pa log pa gnyis su byin la me tog 'dor na gzhug go// gang du de'i me tog babs pa der de'i sngags sbyin par bya /
163b5(rgyud): sngags 'di ni de'i yin par bstan te/ skye ba brgyud pa nas de dang rjes su 'brel ba yin te/ de nyid dge ba'i bshes gnyen byang chub kyi snying po la gnon pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams
163b6(rgyud): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa'i don du mngon par sgrub par byed pa/ longs spyod chen po dang / rgyal po chen po dang / grags pa chen po dang / gang zag rtse gcig par mngon par
163b7(rgyud): sgrub pa yin no// tshe 'di nyid la'ang chos thams cad la the tsom med par bsgrub par bya ba 'grub par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du mthar gyis dngos grub 'dod pas brgyad kyi bar du bya ste/ gzhan la ni
164a1(rgyud): ma yin no// gzhan dag la ji ltar sdig pa spang ba'i phyir dam tshig tsam sbyin par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis dbang bskur na dang por re zhig dkyil 'khor gyi phyi ro//
164a2(rgyud): ha cang yang mi nye/ ha cang yang mi ring bar byang shar gyis phyogs su rtsa ba'i sngags kyis dag par byas pas byin gyis brlab par bya'o// rgyal po dbang bskur ba bzhin du bdag nyid sems pa dang / gcig
164a3(rgyud): tu sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la dad cing dang ba dang / spro ba chen po dang ldan pa dang / byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral ba dang / theg pa chen po la zhugs pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la phan/
164a4(rgyud): par byed pa dang / dbang po ma tshang ba med pa dang / ma smad pa dang / tshe 'di nyid la sngags 'grub par 'dod pa dang / bsam pa bzang ba dang / sngags kyi spyod pa la spo ba dang / blta bar 'dod pa'i rang
164a5(rgyud): bzhin can dang / sad par 'dod pa'i phyir yang sngags kyi don la rnam par rtog pa med pa dang / der gtad pa'i yid dang / gcig la sogs pa nas lnga'i bar du dbang bsrung bar bya'o// lhag ma ni spang ba
164a6(rgyud): bya'o// shes rab can dang spyod pa la rmongs pa med pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa la dbang bsrung bar bya'i/ gzhan dag ni ma yin no// de nas rgyal po thams cad dbang bskur ba bzhin du yo byad thams cad
164a7(rgyud): bsogs te/ slob dpon mkhan po mnyes na/ de nas thar chen po zas te/ rgyal mtshan dang ba dan mthon po bsgreng zhing / gdugs dkar po dbul 'dzin pa dang // rje la ba dkar pos gseb pa dang /
164b1(rgyud): bkur sti chen pos dung dang rnga bo che'i dga' ba'i sgra sgrog cing rgyal ba'i sgra dang / bkra shis kyi tshogs su bcad pa dang / bde legs dang rab tu bsngags pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rgyal bas gsungs pas/
164b2(rgyud): mngon par bstod pa dang / dkyil 'khor de la bskor ba bya sku/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la phyag byas nas 'di skad du/ slob dpon bdag ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sngags
164b3(rgyud): kyi spyod pa sgrub pa la yang dag par 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i gsang ba'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor la yang dag par 'jug pa dang / chos kyi rgyal
164b4(rgyud): srid thams cad kyi sangs rgyas nyid rtogs par 'dod pa dang / mdor na sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir ro zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas ku sha'i khres la 'dug ste/ shar gyi phyogs su phyos/

164b6(rgyud): 'dab mal gi'u lang gis bri bar bya'o// bris nas kyang tsan+dan deng gur kum gyi chus lag pa dang lam por kha sbyar bkrus la/ de nas gro ga'i 'dab ma de kham bong kha sbyar gyi nang du bzhag par byas pa/
164b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi nang du byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyi zhabs drung du gzhag par bya'o// de nas ku sha de la gnas nas rig pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad snga ma nyid du bzlas par bya'o//
165a1(rgyud): de nas ku sha'i khres la 'dug pa la dbang bskur bar bya ste/ phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor la gang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du gyur pa'i bum nga gangabasgo dang nye bar sdang
165a2(rgyud): bzhag pa blangs te/ slob dpon gyis rtsa ba'i sngags brjod pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur bar bya'o// gzhan dag la ni ji ltar 'dod pa'i chus so// de nas kham por la sbyar te de la sbyin par bya ste/ mar
165a3(rgyud): me la klog tu gzhug par bya'o// gal te de nyid yin na ni rim gyis 'bad pas 'grub par 'gyur ro// yang na ci ste gzhan na ni sngags bzlas pa kho nas 'grub par 'gyur ro// yang na yi ge yan lag
165a4(rgyud): nyams pa'am lhag pa byin na ni dang po sgrub pa kho na la 'grub par the tshom med do// de ltar slob dpon gyis sngar bris pa'i sgrub pa gsum gyis nges par 'grub par the tsom med do// de bzhin du dang pos ni
165a5(rgyud): rig pa'i dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gnyis pa la dbang bskur ba ni gnyis pa'i dkyil 'khor du lha thams cad la bstabs pa'i sngar gyi bum pa des dbang bskur bar bya'o// spyi ba/
165a6(rgyud): la sngar gyi cho ga ji lta ba de nyid kyis byas na sdig pa'i rnyog pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis gnang zhing / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ba/

165b6(rgyud): 'byung po thams cad kyis rab tu thub par dka' zhing / lus can thams cad kyis mi pham pa dang / sngags thams cad las khyod rgyal ba dang / ji ltar 'dod pa sgrubs shig pa'o// de nas dkyi/
165b7(rgyud): 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis re re la 'ang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du dbang bsrung ba lnga sbyin par bya'o// sems can rnams la'ang lnga po nyid kyis bya'o// de dag mthar gyis dkyil 'khor la bcug ste
166a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid phul nas dkyil 'khor la bskor ba lan gsum byas te slar gtang bar bya'o// de las gzhan pa'i nyin zhag/
166a2(rgyud): la mthar gyis sngags kyi spyod pa la bslab par bya zhing sbyar bar bya'o// skad cig de nyid la bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sngar phul ba'i bum pa
166a3(rgyud): gang ba blangs nas/ dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa de dag la chu khyor ba gsum shar du mngon par blta bar byas la blud par bya'o// 'di skad du brjod par bya ste/ kye byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal
166a4(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig las 'das par gyur nas bsod nams ma yin pa mang po skye bar ma byed cing / sngags thams cad kyang 'dor bar ma byed cig/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub
166a5(rgyud): sems dpa' dag kyang slu bar ma byed cig/ bla ma mnyes par gyis shig/ gzhan du dam tshig las 'das par gyur na sngags 'grub par mi 'gyur zhing / bsod nams ma yin pa mang por 'gyur/
166a6(rgyud): zhes de ltar spras la gtang bar bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis yang zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i sA lu dang 'bras thug po che'i sreg blugs kyis yi ge brgyad/
166a7(rgyud): pa'i snying po dang sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas langs nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su zhugs te/ sngar bstan pa'i me tog gi sngar bstan pa'i tshogs lha thams cad yid la bya ste mchod yon dbul lo//
166b1(rgyud): bdug pas sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan pos thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyid dang / rang
166b2(rgyud): mkha' lding dang / dri ba dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / sha pa dang / 'byung po dang / rnal 'byor pa dang / grub pa dang / zang srong rnams dang / sems can za
166b3(rgyud): cad yang dag par bdugs nas me tog gtor te/ tsan dan dang gur kum gyis bsangs la sngar bstan pa'i cho gas slar gshegs su gsol bar bya ste/ sems kyis thams cad gtang ba
166b4(rgyud): yin no// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis bshos dang / gtor ma dang / sa tshon thams cad chu bor dong bar bya ba 'am/ srog chags sdug bsngal ba rnams la sbyin par bya'o// sa byoH/
166b5(rgyud): de legs par byugs shing 'jam par byas te/ legs par phyag pa byas nas ba lang gi lci bas 'byug tu gzhug pa 'am/ chus byugs par bya ba 'am/ shin tu gtsang ba'i sas byugs pa/
166b6(rgyud): 'am byems gtor bar byas la/ de nas ji ltar 'dod par 'gro bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor la zhugs pa des bdag nyid 'o me dang 'bras chan gyi bas sam/ lha la dbul ba'i khabs
166b7(rgyud): daza' bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod tshe ga zhib mo rgyal po'i dbang po las/ 'jam dpal gzhon dur gyur ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa byang chub sems dpa'i le'u rab 'byams las/
167a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bstan pa ste le'u gnyis pa rdzogs so// / de nas gzhan yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal/
167a2(rgyud): med khang gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dus pa la gzigs nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal te/ yi ge gcig pa mchog tu gsang ba/ dug thams cad
167a3(rgyud): 'joms par byed pa/ las thams cad byed pa/ sngags dang dkyil 'khor chung ngu sgrub pa'i thabs dang / las phran tshegs thams cad la nye bar sbyar bar bya ba sbas so// de yang gang zhe na/ na maH
167a4(rgyud): sa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ tad+ya thA/ oM dza/ grogs po dag 'di ni 'byung po thams cad nyon cig/ sngags 'di nyid ni yi ge gcig gi dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i cho ga thams cad du dgos pa/ khru brgyad/
167a5(rgyud): dam khru ba ni sa'i phyogs yang dag par byas la/ tshon sna lnga'i phye mas rang nyid kyis bri bar bya ste/ gzhan gyis ni ma yin te/ gang de dang de dag tu'ang 'dir ni nges pa med do// dkyil 'kho
167a6(rgyud): gru ba ni banyam pos che bar mdzes pa/ gtsug pud lnga'i rtsig rgya chen po dang por zhig za'o// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i ut+pala'i phyag rgya dang / mche bar byag
167a7(rgyud): dang / zhal gyi phyag rgya dang / dbyig pa'i phyag tu rtse/ phyag rgya 'di dag dkyil 'khor gyinang du shar gyi mang bri bar bya'o// de nas pa dz+ra dang / da rje dang / ut+pal dang / phyag mar da /
167b1(rgyud): bdan dang / gdugs dang / rnababs dang / shing rtadang / glang po che dang / ta dang / thang dang / mahe dang / sa swaMka dang / rma dang / Sha dang / mug dang / skyes su gzhon nu'i gzugs sun+tu/
167b2(rgyud): rol gyi sgo'i rtse bar bri bar bya ste/ mthar gyis rim pa la brten nas bris te/ dkyil 'khor bsum la brten nas da ltar bri bar bya'o// de nas yi ge gcig pa'i sngags nyid kyis shar lho'i phyogs
167b3(rgyud): kyi char me'i las byA ste/ shing a pa marga'i yam shing no dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar la btags pas stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas me tog gi mchod yon dbul lo// yi ge gcig pa
167b4(rgyud): sngags nyid kyis ji ltar 'dod par gtor ma dang / lha bshos dang / mar me dang / bdug pa dang / spyan drang ba dang / gshegs su gsol ba rnams bya'o// de nas rgyal srid 'dod pas ni grong khyer
167b5(rgyud): gyi dbus su bri bar bya'o// longs spyod 'dod pas ni shing a mra'i drung du'o// bu 'dod pas ni bo de tsa'i shing gi drung du'o// chung ma dang / glang po che dang / rta 'dod pas ni brang po che'i bris sgyu 'am/
167b6(rgyud): d+ha'i zas sbyar ro// chu 'dod pas ni mtsho chen po 'am/ klu'i gnas su'o// nyin bzhi pa'i rims sam/ rtag pa'i rims sam// rims thams cad la rtags gcig pa'am/ grong gi g.yas/
167b7(rgyud): phyogs su'o// srir pos zin pa la ni dur khrod dam/ khang pa stong par bya'o// yang srin pos zin pa la ni ba ru ra'i shing gi drung ngam/ er N+ya ni shing gi drung du bya'o// ma mo thams cad kyis zin/
168a1(rgyud): pa la ni bzhi mdo 'am shi ba'i khyim dang bu btsas pa'i khyim du nye bar bya'o// tshangs pa'i srir pos zin pa la ta la'i shing drung du lo// sbyar ba'i dug 'byin pa la de yi ge
168a2(rgyud): gcig pa'i sngags kyis tshu la lan gsum bsngags pa bya ste/ dkyil 'khor de nyid du blud pa byas na grol bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du bud med dam/ skyes pa grags pa 'dod pa la ni bzhi mdo 'am thar
168a3(rgyud): se gnas par bri bar bya'o// bu shi ba la ni shing 'bras bu can nam/ 'o ma can gyi shing du'o// 'bras sA lu smin pa'i sa dang zhing gi dbus su ni bu med pa la bri bar bya'o// nad rnam pa gsum bdag gi
168a4(rgyud): byas pa dang / gzhan gyis nyams pa la ni 'jug ngog la sogs pa la'o// nad chen pos btab pa la ni dkyil 'khor chu bo'i ngogs dang 'gram du bya'o// nad thams cad kyis thams cad du btab pa
168a5(rgyud): la ni ri'i rtse mor bri bar bya'o// mkha' 'gro mas byas pa la'ang bram ze'i lhur ra bar/ khang pa stong pa 'am/ gnas dben pa gzhol ba'i phyogs su bya'o// de bzhin du las thams cad la
168a6(rgyud): nam byed dam/ dus thams cad du mngon par bri bar bya'o// yi ge gcig po de nyid kyi sngags kyis me tog gi mchod yon phul te gshegs su gsol la/ dkyil 'khor la chus gtoras
168a7(rgyud): rgyas no da thams cad srung ba na po byas par 'gyur te/ nad thams cad las grol bar yang 'gyur ro// bu med pas ni bu rnyed cing // skal med rnams kyang zhal ldar 'gyur// dkrol pan

168b3(rgyud): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ral gzigs nas/ gzhan dang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang 'dus pa la'ang gzigs te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya t+tha

171b2(rgyud): rab tu bsgrub par bya// 'bring ni 'bring la bsgrub par bya// pha ma phran tshegs las la ni// dman pa nyid ni thams cad la// bzo bo ji ltar smra ba bzhin// rin ni de ltar sbyin par bya// dang po'i

174a1(rgyud): 'dod// spob che zhing gzi brjid che// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i sngags dag ni// babad pa med par 'grub par 'gyur// dad pa med pa'i skye bo la// dkar po'i chos rnams/
174a2(rgyud): mi skye ste// sa bon tsha skor btab pa la// myu gu skye ba med pa bzhin// dad pa'i rtsub rtag tu chos// chos don gzigs pas gsungs pa ste// chos don spyod pa de dag la// sngags rnams rtag/
174a3(rgyud): tu 'grub par gsungs// de nas sgrub pa pos bzo bo legs par bslabs pa'i ri mo mkhan nam/ bdag nyid 'dri ba la mkhas pas tshon ma 'dres shing kha dog gsal ba dang ldan pa'i tshen gyi
174a4(rgyud): rnams blangs te/ sngar tha ga pa la byas pa'i cho ga ji lta ba de nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pas ri mo mkhan la snga ma bzhin sbyang bar bya ste/ sngar ji ltar tha ga pa la byas pa de nyid kyis ras la ri me 'drir
174a5(rgyud): gzhug go// yang na bdag nyid kyis bri bar bya'o// ga pur dang / tsan dan dang / gur kum la sogs pa'i dris tshon rtsil besko bar bya zhing bdug spos bsregs te/ de nyid kyi sngags kyis lan
174a6(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa la'ang bzlas te/ me tog nag ge sar dang / pun rA ga na dang / bku la dang / pan tsa ka dang / dbyar gyi me tog dang / d+hA nu kA ri dang / mA la te'i me tog la so/
174a7(rgyud): pas ras de gcal bkrab pa byas la/ shar du mngon par phyogs pas ku sha'i khres la 'dug ste/ blo legs par gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la dmigs pa'i sems
174b1(rgyud): pra mo lag par blangs nas 'khrug pa med pa'i sems kyis ras de la bri par bya'o// dang por reg zhig bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bri bar bya ste/ ram pa rnams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/
174b2(rgyud): skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis mtshan pa/ sku dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus nye bar mdzes pa/ rin po che'i pad+ma la bzhugs pa/ kun nas 'od 'bar ba/ sku 'od 'dim gang
174b3(rgyud): nye bar mdzes pa/ chos 'chad bzhin pa/ sku dang zhing rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ dbus na gnas pa'i pad+ma bai DUR+Ya'i sdong bu can// 'og na ni klu'i rgyal po gnyis kyis gdan
174b4(rgyud): chen po'i pad+ma'i sdong bu la 'dzin cing de bzhin gshegs pa la lta ba/ lag pa g.yas pas phyag 'tshal ba/ mdog dkar po/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ mi dang 'dra ba/ sa phyed sprul
174b5(rgyud): gyi gzugs can/ dga' bo dang nye dga' bri bar bya'o// kun nas pad+ma'i mtsho pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang / me tog cung zad kha bye ba dang / rnam par kha bye ba dang / chu las skyes pa'i srog chags rnams/
174b6(rgyud): dang / bya dang nya la sogs pas khyab pa yangs shing mdzes par skyes pa bri bar bya'o// gang bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i pad+ma'i sdong bu de las 'phros pa'i yal ga las pad+ma'i me tog du ma mthar
174b7(rgyud): gyis mtho bar bya'o// g.yon gyi phyogs su pad+ma'i me tog brgyad byas te/ pad+ma de dag la byang chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad kyi gzugs bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o// dang po la re zhig 'phags pa/
175a1(rgyud): 'angam dpa' chung ba la das pa 'i gas bzhin dus m+b+ha 'am/ klur ku las/ gser gyi mdog 'dra gad shA / byis pa dang 'a chu ba gzums na/
175a2(rgyud): bur pud lnga dang ldan pa/ gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis brgyad pa/ lag pa g.yon pa na ut+pal sngon po bsnams pa/ lag pa g.yas pas de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag byed pa/ sku mdzes pa/ zhi ba'i
175a3(rgyud): cha byad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la lta ba/ bzhin cung zad dgod pa/ 'od 'bar ba dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor kun tu khyab pa bri'o// pad+ma gnyis pa la 'phags pa zla ba'i 'od shin tu gzhon pa//
175a4(rgyud): can de bzhin du bri bar bya'o// gsum pa la ni nor bzangs so// bzhi pa la ni sgrib pa rnam par ser ba'o// lnga pa la ni nam mkha' mdzod do// drug pa la ni sa'i snying po'o// bdun pa la ni sdig med/
175a5(rgyud): brgyad pa la ni spyan bzang yin te/ de dag thams cad kyang gzhor du khye'u'i cha byad can/ gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogs su ni byang chub sems dpa'
175a6(rgyud): chen po brgyad byams par gtogs pargyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 'phags pa byams pa ni bcom ldan 'das dang nye bar bri bar bya ste/ tshangs par spyod pa'i cha byad 'dzin pa/ mgo ral
175a7(rgyud): pa'i cod pan bcings pa/ mdog gser 'dra ba/ ka sha dmar po gyon pa/ dang wa dmar po'i stod g.yogs byas pa/ thal ba'i thig le gsum gyis mtshan po/ gzugs mdzes pa dang ldan pa
175b1(rgyud): dbyig pa dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa/ kreSh+Na sa ra'i pags pa thal gong g.yon par bgos pa/ lag pa g.yon pas 'phreng ba 'dzin cing de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag byed pa/ der gtod pa'i lta bse/
175b2(rgyud): kyi spyod pa bsam gtan la dmigs pa'i rnam pa can no// pad+ma gnyis pa la 'phags pa kun tu bzang po mdog me tog pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs/ lus rgyan thams cad kyis brgyad pa/ lag
175b3(rgyud): pa g.yon pa na nor bu rin po che thogs pa/ lag pa g.yas pa na bil ba thogs shing mchog sbyin pa/ gzugs mdzes pa dang ldan pa de bzhin du bri bar bya'o// gsum pa la ni 'phags pa spyan
175b4(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug 'dam bu'i mdog 'dra ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ ral po'i cod pan 'chang ba/ mchod phyir thigs dkar pos byas pa/ 'phagos pa 'od dpag med gzug
175b5(rgyud): mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba/ stobs bcu dang ldan pa/ ral pa'i mthar skyil mo krung gis bzhugs shing cod pan du byas pa/ lag pa g.yon na pad+ma bsnams pa/ lag pa g.yas pa mchog
175b6(rgyud): sbyin pa/ sems kyi spyod pa bsam gtan la dmigs pa'i rnam pa can/ lus kun nas 'od kyis gsal bar byas pa'o// bzhi pa la ni 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje lag pa g.yon nu rdo rje 'dzin pa/
175b7(rgyud): lag pa g.yas na bil ba thogs pas mchog sbyin pa/ mdog gser 'dra ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gzugs mdzes pa/ zhi ba'i lta ba dang ldan pa/ dra ba dang dra ba byed pas lus
176a1(rgyud): bar dkris pa/ mu tig gi 'phreng bas mchod phyir thogs byas pa/ cod pan rin po che 'bar bas rnam par 'phro ba/ gos g.yo ba dang ldan pa bgos pa/ daralwa dkar por
176a2(rgyud): stod g.yogs byas pa'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / kun tu bzang po'i ni bza' stod g.yogs kyang 'di bzhin du bya'o// cha byad ni ji ltar bstan pa bzhin bya'o// de zhi
176a3(rgyud): pad+ma lnga pa la ni 'phags pa blo gros chen po/ drug pa la ni blo gros zhi ba/ bdun pa la ni rnam par snang mdzad snying po/ brgyad pa la ni ngan seng spong ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag bri bar bya ste/
176a4(rgyud): bil ba'i 'bras bu dang glegs bam lag na thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis shin tu mdzes pa/ dar las stod g.yogs byas pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ g.yo ba dang ldan pa'i gos
176a5(rgyud): bgos pa'o// de dag gi steng du'ang rang sangs rgyas brgyad bri bar bya ste/ dge slong gi cha byad 'dzin pa/ lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang ldan pa/ chos gos dmar po gyon pa skyil mo
176a6(rgyud): krung gis nye bar gnas pa/ rin po che'i ut+pal la 'dug pa/ cha byad zhi ba'i bdag nyid kun nas 'od 'phro ba'i 'phreng bas khyab pa/ me tog dri zhim pos gcal bkram pa la 'di la
176a7(rgyud): ste/ me tog ma li ta dang / dbyar gyi me tog dang / d+hA nu ng+ka ri ka dang / pun nA ga dang / nA ga gi sar la sogs pa'i me tog gis ras ris kur nas gcal bkram par bri bar bya'o// bcom
176b1(rgyud): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sayon phyogs 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi steng du rin po che rnams nye byar smras pa/ shin tu yangs pa'i gzhal med khang gi dkyir 'khor zag gi tshogs kyis na/
176b2(rgyud): tu nye bar mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i ut+pa las shin tu bkab pa/ ri'i rnam pa lta du bri bar bya'o// gnas der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brgyad bri bar bya ste/ 'di sa s+ho/
176b3(rgyud): chen gtsug gtor can rin po che'i bai DUR+Ya'i 'od rnam par 'phro ba/ kun nas 'od 'dom gang ba/ rin po che pad+ma rA ga dang / in+da nI la dang / margad la sogs pa dang / bai DUR+Ya dang /
176b4(rgyud): sma gar b+ha la sogs pa nor bu rin po che chen po'i bye brag kun nas 'od 'phro ba dang ldan pa/ nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang /
176b5(rgyud): bla gos dang ldan pa/ skyil krung gis bzhugs shing chos 'chad pa/ na bza' ser po mnabs pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyis sku la khyab pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku
176b6(rgyud): bar mdzes pa/ zhi ba'i gzigs pa dang ldan pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug tor can bri bar bya'o// gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pa/
176b7(rgyud): me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po kha dog gser 'dra ba bri bar bya'o// gsum pa pad+ma'i gtsug tor pad+ma'i ge sar dang 'dra ba'i chos 'chad pa bri bar bya'o// bzhi pa spyan bzang
177a1(rgyud): po'ang bri bar bya'o// lnga pa bskyen par dka' ba dang / drug pa rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad dang / bdun pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po dang / brgyad pa de bzhin gshegs/
177a2(rgyud): pa sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i spyan gyi rgyal po bri bar bya'o// 'di dag thams cad kyang gser gyi mdog can de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugasu bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi
177a3(rgyud): steng gi phyogs su g.yas g.yon nas sprin gyi gseb ras gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu gnyis lus mi sdang bar me tog gi char 'bebs pa bri bar bya ste/ bar snang la gnas nas sangs rgyas dang / byang
177a4(rgyud): chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas dang // 'phags pa nyan thos rnams la phyag 'tshal ba bri bar bya'o// rang sangs rgyas kyi 'og tu nyan thos chen po brgyad byang chub sems dpa'i mgo/
177a5(rgyud): la 'dug pa spangs te bri bar bya ba la/ 'di lta ste/ gnas brtan shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / 'od srungs ren po dang / rab 'byor dang / sgra gcan 'dzin dang / dga' bo dang / bzang
177a6(rgyud): ldan dang / ka bi na'o// rang sangs rgyas dag kyang 'di lta ste/ spos kyi ngad ldang dang / dman pa dang / nye ba'i 'chi ltas dang / dkar po dang / dkar po'i tog dang / mu khyud dang / mu khyud bzang po'o//
177a7(rgyud): 'di dag thams cad kyang shin tu mdzes pa/ zhi ba'i cha byad kyi bdag nyid can/ shin tu dul ba'i ra byang can ro// nyan thos chen po bdag nyid sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lta ba'o//
177b1(rgyud): steng du gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu gzhan gnyis sde ba kun nas gos kyi bu chu zhing yangs pa pa shin tu mdzes pa 'dzin cing / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
177b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos rnams kyi steng du lha'i gos dang 'phreng ba 'dzin pa bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i steng dbu'i steng du mu tig gi 'phreng ba dang / za gu dmar po
177b3(rgyud): pad+ma rA ga dang / in+da nI la la sogs pa'i mdud pa byas pa rin po che'i tha gu'i tshogs bya'o// de la'ang gos kyi bla re shin tu legs par kun ras bkod pa dang / mu tig gi 'phreng ba 'phyang bas mdze
177b4(rgyud): pa bri bar bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'og tu ni pad+ma'i mtsho las 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi zhabs drung dang nye ba na klu'i rgyal po nye dga'i phyogs su rin po che chen po'i ri bo pad+mo'i
177b5(rgyud): mtsho las mngon par 'thon pa/ rin po che'i myu gu dang / phug dang / ri sul dang / byu ru'i yal ga dang / rin po che'i shing gis yongs su bskor ba/ drang srong chen po'i gnas dang / grub pa dag gis
177b6(rgyud): de la brten pa/ ri'i rtse mo'i steng du khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed shin tu mi bzad pa'i gzugs can/ lag pa g.yas pa na zhags pa thogs pa/ lag pa g.yon par gzhu thogs pa/ bzhin
177b7(rgyud): khro gnyer dang ldan pa/ bka' nyan cing 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyogs te lta ba/ gsus pa 'phyang ba/ skra gyen du brdzes pa/ mig sman nag po dang sprin nag po dang 'dra ba/ kha spu ser gas/
178a1(rgyud): mo ring ba/ mig dmar ba/ mgul pa'i phyogs sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ stag gi pags pa mdabs pa/ bgegs thams cad rnam par byed pa/ rab tu mi bzad pa chen po che/
178a2(rgyud): bo'i rgyal po chen po kun nas 'bar ba khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed bri bar bya'o// ri de'i 'og tu rdo'i steng na 'dug pa/ lus sa la btud de spos kyi snod lag na thogs pa/ cha byad dang dbyibs
178a3(rgyud): ji lta ba bzhin rtags 'dzin pa/ ji ltar rjes su mthun pa'i spyod pa dang / 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rjes su lbu ba'i sgrub pa po bri bar bya'o// klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye bar bcom ldan 'das
178a4(rgyud): shAkya thub pa'i 'og de'i g.yas ngos su pad+ma'i mtsho las mngon par byung ba'i rin po che'i ri'i rgyal po ji ltar sngar ri'i rgyal por bstan pa de bzhin du bri bar bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed med
178a5(rgyud): pa/ lha'i me tog gis khyab pa bri bar bya'o// ri de'ang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu bri'o// ri de'ang shin tu mtho ba rin po che pad+ma rA ga'i them skas 'dra ba/ bai DUR+Ya'i rang bzhin rtse
178a6(rgyud): mo myu gu 'dra ba bri bar bya'o// de la rten pa'i lha mo 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thugs rje'i ngo bo 'phags ma sgrol ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dang dmar po se stod g.yogs
178a7(rgyud): byas pa/ kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gos can/ bud med kyi rgyan thams cad kyis lus brgyad pa/ lag pa g.yon pa na ut+pal thogs pa/ gser gyi kha dog can/ rked pa phra ba/ gcang
178b1(rgyud): mi skem/ ha cang yang mi sdom/ ha cang yang mirgan/ sems bsam gtan la zhugs pa/ bka' nyan cing 'dug pa/ phyag g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/ lus cung zad bdud pa/ skyil mo krung gis/
178b2(rgyud): nye bar bzhugs pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la cung zad lta bar gyur pa/ kun nas 'bar ba'i 'od kyi 'phreng bas yongs su bskor ba/ der yang bai DUR+Ya rin po che'i rtse mo la shing
178b3(rgyud): dun dga' yal gas kun nas bskor ba/ yal ga dag la'ang me tog 'phel zhing kha bye bas legs par rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma mngon par bkab pa/ yal ga mngon par 'dud
178b4(rgyud): pa de nyid kyang shin tu kha dog sna tshogs pa/ byu ru'i myu gu 'brel ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi ngo bo'i tshe na 'bar ba na lha mo sgrol ma mngon du phyogs shing lta ba bri bar bya'o// lha mo bgegs rnams
178b5(rgyud): ma lus 'joms// 'jigs pa sel bar byed pa'i mchog/ sgrub pa po ni srung don du// des na dam pa sbyin zhing dge/ stobs bcu ldan sras thugs rje ni// bud med gzugs 'chang
178b6(rgyud): lha mo yin// 'byung po kun gyi dpal don dang // mchog sbyin byed pa bri bar bya// 'jam pa'i dbyangs can 'od chen ni// gzhon nu lha mo 'dri la dgyes// bgegs rnams thams cad dasal
178b7(rgyud): ba'i phyir// sgrub pa pos kyang yang dag bkur// mi yi bdag po srung don dang // dpal sgrub phyir yang ri mor bri// khro bo'i rgyal po gang yin de// re yi rtse mor gzhag bris pa// bgegs
179a1(rgyud): rnams thams cad gzhig pa'i phyir// rgyal ba mchog dang sras kyis gsungs// mi bzad chen po 'khyil ba che// gtum chen 'od chen ldan pa po// ra rungs
179a2(rgyud): sems can tshar gcad phyir// sgrub pa la ni rab tu brtags// sgrub pa po ni srung ba dang // bgegs rnams thams cad sel bar byed// mi bzad khro bo'i ngang tshul can// sngags
179a3(rgyud): lha dag 'gugs par byed// shin tu mi bzang drag po'i gzugs// brtse ba med pa thams cad 'dul// sdig dang drag por spyod pa rnams// dbang du mi 'gyur dbang du byed// mkhan
179a4(rgyud): spyongs la spyod pa dang // sa 'og spyod pa thams cad kyi// thub pa'i bstan la 'gal byed gang // ma rungs thams cad 'dul bar byed// ras ni kun nas gru bzhi dang // zur ba ni dag
179a5(rgyud): za ba yin// ras kyi 'og tu thamar no// chu bo rgya che'i gnas bya ste// klu yi gdengs ka yan lag can// gcig ni kun tu bya ba yin// yan lag bzang po dkar po dang // lus phyed mi mi
179a6(rgyud): rnam par skyes// byang du mgo ni gzhag bya ste// rtag tu thal mo sbyor byed pa// stobs chen gdengs ka bdun dang ldan// mtha' yas zhes ni bya ba yin// de bzhin gshegs la nges
179a7(rgyud): par ste// nor bu rin chen gyis mdzes pa// legs par mdzes dang gzugs mdzes dang // rin chen rgyan gyis yongs brgyan pa'i// 'bar ba'i 'phreng can bri bani// klu rgyal chen por rnam par
179b1(rgyud): grags// 'jig rten kun la phan par brtson// sangs rgyas bstan la rab tu zhugs// bgegs rnams thams cad rnam gzhig phyir// chu bo la rten bri bar bya// ras kyi chog dam pa 'di//
179b2(rgyud): rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gsungs pa// rgyas bstan ngas ni mdor bsdus yin// mkhas pa gang zhig 'dri byed pa// de yi bsod nams pa
179b3(rgyud): yas 'gyur// bskal pa bye bar byas pa yi// sdig pa shin tu mi babad po// se steng ri mo mthong ba tsam// de yi mod la 'byang bar byed// mtshams med lnga po byed pa dang // tshul khrims
179b4(rgyud): nyams dang smad pa dang // sdig pa kun la 'jug pa dang // 'khor ba'i mun par spyod pa dang // 'gro ba'i skyes gnas ngan pa dag/ deng ni ras ris gzhag mi bya// ras ris mthong ba'ang
179b5(rgyud): don ldan zhes// thub pa'i dbang pos gsungs pa yin// mthong ba tsam gyis dag 'gyur te// de bas skad cig de tsam gyis// yid dag lus ni ngag 'jug dang // rjes su bzlas pa byed pa
179b6(rgyud): dang // sngags brten nyid la rtag brtson pa'i// mi rnams grub 'dod smos ci dgos// bskal pa bye bar sangs rgyas la// mchod pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa// sa steng ras ris 'dri ba
179b7(rgyud): yi// sngags pas bsod nams de thob 'gyur// gang+gA yi ni bye ma dag/ tshad du bstan pa gang yin pa// de dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas dang // rang rgyal dang ni byang chub sems// bse ru
180a1(rgyud): nyan thos 'jig rten na// lan mang dag tu mchod ston byas// ras ris mthong ba tsam gyis ni// mi yis de bzhin bsod nams 'thob// chog klog pa tsam dang ni//
180a2(rgyud): mchod dang rjes su yi rang ba// cho ga thams cad rab brtags pa// de la sngags kyi dngos grub nges// 'jig rten sngags rnams ji snyed pa// gang dag rgyal ba skyes mchog dang // de'i slob
180a3(rgyud): bse ru byang chub sems// bdag nyid chen pos gang gsungs pa// ri mo 'di ni mdun bzhag na// sngags rnams ma lus 'grub par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che
180a4(rgyud): theg pa chen po'i mdo'i sde las// 'jam dpal gyi cho ga las le'u dang po'i cho ga rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan
180a5(rgyud): pa'i 'khor la gzigs nas// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhan yang khyod kyi 'bring gi ras kyi tshi ga de ngas bshad par bya yis// legs par rab tu nyon la
180a6(rgyud): yid la zung zhig/ dang por re zhig sngar bstan pa'i dge pa dang / sngar bstan pa'i cho ga dang / sngar bstan pa'i bzo bo dang / sngar gyi tshang bar ma dang ldan pa/ ras shin tu bzang ba dang
180a7(rgyud): 'jam pa dang / shin tu bkrus pa kha tshar dang bcas pa dang / tshon ma 'dres pa dang / sba la sogs pa med pa byas la/ tshad ma gtogs pa dang po ji lta ba de bzhin du byas pa'i ris de la byims
180b1(rgyud): bri ba ba ste/ dang por re zhig gnas gtsang ma kun nas mdzes pa/ rin po che shel gyi rang bzhin lta ru/ mu tig dkar pos brgyad pa/ de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa theb da /
180b2(rgyud): ste/ na po che'i seng ge'i khri la rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa chos 'chad cing bzhugs pa'o// g.yas phyogs na 'phags pa 'jam dpal pad+ma'i ge sar ram/ gur kum mam/ nyi
180b3(rgyud): mdog 'dra ba/ g.yon pa'i dpung pa'i phyogs su ut+pal bsnams shing thal mo sbyar bar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lta ba/ bzhin cung zad dgod pa/ gzhon nu'i gzugs can/
180b4(rgyud): zur pud lngas mgo mdzes par byas pa/ byis pa gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga dang mgo 'dud pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i g.yon logs su 'phags
180b5(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ston ka'i mda' rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar ba snga ma ji lta ba de bzhin du bri bang bya ste/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das la rnga yab g.yob par bya'o// de'i phyogs su 'phags pa
180b6(rgyud): byams pa dang / kun tu bzang po dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / blo gros chen po dang / zhi bar gshegs pa dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba ste/ 'di dag kyang snga ma
180b7(rgyud): bzhin du bri bar bya'o// dang po ji lta ba de bzhin du rgyan thams cad kyis brgyad pa bri bar bya'o// 'di dag gi steng du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brgyad bri bar bya ste/ bzhengs pa dang / lag pa
181a1(rgyud): g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa dang / sku la na bza' ser pos stod g.yogs byas pa/ lag pa g.yon pas chos gos kyi dkyil nas 'dzin pa/ chos gos kyi kha dog cung dang /
181a2(rgyud): dmar ba mnabs pa/ kun nas 'od dang ldan pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa la 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po dang / rin chen
181a3(rgyud): gtsug tor dang / gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyo ba dang / log par dad sel dang / gser thub dang / 'od srungs dang / spyan pa dang ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bri bar bya'o//
181a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mdun du 'khor chen po'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste/ nyan thos chen po brgyad dang / rang sangs rgyas brgyad snga ma ji lta ba
181a5(rgyud): de bzhin du bri ste/ 'on kyang 'phags pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / shA ri'i bu ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la rnga yab kyis g.yob pa 'greng bag tu bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du
181a6(rgyud): gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu bri bar bya'o// lha rnams kyi dbang po rgya byin dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / dag pa dang / dri ma med pa dang / 'jam
181a7(rgyud): pa dang / mi gdung ba dang / 'od gsal dang / tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po dang / 'og min dang / de la sogs pa'i lha'i bu gzugs na spyod pa dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dag
181b1(rgyud): mthar gyis bri bar bya'o// 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang nye bar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor legs par 'god par bya ste/ rang rang gi gzugs dang ra byad du bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi seng /
181b2(rgyud): ge'i khri'i 'og tu ni rgya mtsho chen po las mngon par byung ba'i kun nas rin po che'i ri bo ras kyi mtha' mar bri bar bya'o// ras ris kyi phyogs gcig gi mtha' la sgrub pa por byad dang / dbyings
181b3(rgyud): ji lta ba'i rnam pa pus mo'i lha nga dang mgo btud pa/ spos snod lag ra thogs pa bri bar bya'o// rin po che'i ri bo de'i steng 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi 'og tu khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshes
181b4(rgyud): ji ltar bstan pa de ltar bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs seng ge'i khri'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung dang nye ba der rin po che'i ri bo'i
181b5(rgyud): steng du lha mo sgrol ma sngar ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin du bri bar bya'o// ras ris de'i khor yug tu me tog gtor bar bri bar bya la/ gcal bkram par bya ba la/ me tog tsam pa ka dang / nI lod
181b6(rgyud): pa la dang / pad+ma dang / dri mchog dang / ma la ti dang / bar shi ka dang / d+hA nurbA ri ka dang / dun nA ga dang / nA ga ge sar la sogs pa'i me tog gis ras ris de la khor yug tu gtor
