181b7(rgyud): bar bya'o// ras ris kyi steng gi mtha'i zur gnyis su lha'i bu gnyis me tog gi tshigs 'thor ba/ gzugs rnam par bkra ba/ bar snang la gnas pa/ char 'byin pa'i sprin gyi nang nas mgo
182a1(rgyud): tsam 'bon pa/ lding bzhin pa/ kha dog dkar po bri bar bya'o// ras ris 'bring du gsungs pa 'di// dpal don gnyer las yang dag byung sa yi steng gi mi rnams la/
182a2(rgyud): grub pa 'bring ni 'di la rten// 'khor bar sngan chad 'khor ba na// sdig pa cung zad gang byas pa// 'dir ni ras ris mthong tsam gyis// de yi mod la rnams par 'jig/ 'gro ba ldang na
182a3(rgyud): 'khor ba na// sems can rmongs pas mi shes te// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi ras ris ni// 'bring po mthong bar mi byed pa'o// mtshams med lnga po byed pa dang // sdig pa'i rnyog pa byed gyur pa/
182a4(rgyud): sngags rnam sna tshogs gsungs gyur pas// tshul khrims nyams pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur// myur du rtogs pa'ang 'grub pa ni// bzlas pas thob par byed pa yin// ras ris 'bring po mthong
182a5(rgyud): bas ni// nad pa dag kyang nad las thar// dbul po dag kyang dong thob byed// bud med rnams kyang bu thob 'gyur// de tshe mthong ba tsam gyis ni// bsod nams rgya chen thob par 'gyur
182a6(rgyud): nges par lha dang mi rnams kyi// bde ba mi yis spen par 'gyur// skyo ba gzhan du nges par ni// sangs rgyas nyid ni nges 'thob 'gyur// klog dang 'dri ba nyid dang ni// de bzhin mchod dang phyag
182a7(rgyud): 'tshal dang // mthong dang reg pa tsam gyis ni// sdig pa'i rnyog pa kun las grol// ras ris 'di ni mthu re la// don du gnyer dang bskul bas ne// myur du skye ba don yod 'thob// rjes su ma
182b1(rgyud): pa de bzhin no// ras ris mthong ba'i skye boyi// bsod nams thob pa dor yod pa// bskal pa bye ba rnams su yang / brjod par yang ni mi nus so// byang chub sems dpa'i sde rjod pa la na/
182b2(rgyud): theg pa chen po rgya che ba'i mdo las/ 'phags pa 'jar dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga lnga pa ras ris rab 'byams las ras ris gnyis pa'i cho ga rab 'byams rdzogs so//
182b3(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon dur gyur pa gzhan yang khyod kyi ngas ris gsum pa'i chog rab tu
182b4(rgyud): gsang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ gang sems can rnams la 'bad pa med par 'grub par 'gyur ba sngar bstan pa'i bzo bo dang / cho ga dang / bde bar gshegs pa'i mgo gang tsam thad kang de bzhin du kun
182b5(rgyud): nas zung bzhi snga ma bzhin du ras la ri mo bya'o// sngang bstan pa'i tshor gyis dang por re zhig 'phags pa 'jam dpal seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa/ snga ma bzhin du byis pa khye'u'i gzugs mdzes pa'i
182b6(rgyud): gzugs can/ 'od zer 'phro ba dang ldan pa chos 'chad pa bri bar bya'o// g.yon gyi phyogs su 'phags pa kun tu bzang po rin po che'i ri lo gnas pa/ dza yab la ge na thogs pa/ lag pa g.yon pan/
182b7(rgyud): nor bu rin po che thogs pa/ me tog pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya'o// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snga bzhin/
183a1(rgyud): rin po che'i ril gnas pa/ dza yab lag na thogs pa/ lag pa g.yon dran pa 'dzin pa/ lus can nas 'od dang ldan pa bri bar bya'o// seng ge 'i khri'i 'og tu rin po che'i rings kyi/
183a2(rgyud): mtha'i bar du bri bar bya'o// ras kyi mtha' ma dang nye ba'i bur du 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi seng ge'i khri'i 'og g.yas phyogs su khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya'o// de'i 'og
183a3(rgyud): tu sgrub pa po snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya ste/ spos snod lag na thogs pa thams cad kyang snga ma ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi steng du de bzhin gshegs pa me tog yang dag par/
183a4(rgyud): skyes pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po bri bar bya ste/ rin po che'i ri'i phug sor bcu drug gi tshad tsam gyi nang na bzhugs pa/ ri'i snod kyir khang pa brtsegs pa 'dra ba bri bar bya'o// ras ris kyi khor yug tu
183a5(rgyud): ro'i rnam pas yongs su 'khor ba bri bar bya'o// steng gi ras kyi mtha' gnyis la gnas pa'i ri'i stod kyi cha la lding ba bzhin du me tog gi tshogs 'thor ba'i gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dag pa dang rnam/
183a6(rgyud): par dag pa zhes bya ba gnyis snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya zhing / ras la me tog rnam pa snga rogs kyi gcal bkram pa'ang bri bar bya'o// rnam gsum ras ris mtshan nyid ni// thams cad 'dir ni
183a7(rgyud): bstad pa las// 'di ni thab zhes bya ste// par tshogs las rnams dag la shes// bskal pa bye bar mi bzang las// ras ris mthong ba tsam gyis grol// ras ris mthong btsam
183b1(rgyud): gyis ni// skad cig de la grol bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag ni/ mthong ba tsam gyis grol 'gyur te/ ras dris mthong ba tsam gyis kyang / de yi mod la grol bar 'grub
183b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag la// blo dang ldan pas bsnyen bkur bas// ras res tha ma mthong ba ni// bcu drug char yang mi phod do// sangs rgyas skyob pa kun la ni// mchod byas
183b3(rgyud): bsod nams gang yin pa// mkhas pas bsod nams gang thob de// ras ris tha ma mthong ba'i yin// dge ba dag gi las rnams la// longs spyod phyir yang 'dir spyad do//
183b4(rgyud): sngags rnams gang dag ci yod pa// tshangs dbang drang srong gis bshad dang // nam mkha' lding gis gang bshad dang // chu lha nyi ma lus ngan dang // nor sbyin sogs dang srin po dang /
183b5(rgyud): lha min dbang po lnga 'phye dang // gru bcung dang gshin je sogs// khyab 'jug lha chen sogs bshad pa// sngags rnams 'dir ni bkug pa dag/ ras ris mdun du dngos grub 'gyur/
183b6(rgyud): 'dir ni zhi ba bya ba ste// de bzhin du ni rgyas pa bya// 'dir ni mngon spyod spang bya ste// thub pa mchog gis sdud pa yin// byang chub sems dpa'a'i sde sdod pal po che theg pa chen po'i mdo sde shinaH/
183b7(rgyud): rgyas pa las/ 'jam dpal gyis pa'i tshig zhib mo le'u drug pa'i tshig raba'i byams las ngas ris chung ngu gsum pa'i cho ga rdzogs so// / de nas 'jam dpal gso/
184a1(rgyud): dur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lan gsum bskor ba zlas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di
184a2(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa ni legs so legs so// rig pa thams cad kyi
184a3(rgyud): brtul zhugs spyad pa'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa ston pa/ phung po lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya
184a4(rgyud): ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'gro bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyud nges par byang chub sgrub par byed pa/ sngags kyi spyod pa thams cad kyi don sgrub par byed pa/ bdag gi
184a5(rgyud): gsang sngags 'di skye bo thams cad la rgyas par byed par 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi bla ma 'das pa na de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma'i rigs nub po dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing
184a6(rgyud): thams cad spangs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyis mun par gyur pa dang / snod kyi 'jig rter
184a7(rgyud): rnamam pa 'jig pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam dang / rig pa thams cad dang / sngags dang / sran dang / nor burin po che med pa dang / skye bo dpe pa rnams kyis 'jig rtenan yongs su
184b1(rgyud): ma yin pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de lo can dang / dran pa nyams pa dang / mdad pa dang / mi bstan pa dang / me dge pa'i bshas gnyen gyis
184b2(rgyud): yongs su zin pa dang / g.yo spyad ba ldan pa dang / sgrub spyod pa de dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas sdug par 'gyur te/ le lo la mngon par 'dod cing dad par mi 'gyur la/ 'dod pa 'tshal
184b3(rgyud): zhing yid ches par mi 'gyur ro// log pa'i lta ba skye zhing bsod nams ma yin par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// mtshams med par gzhol zhing shin tu mi bzad pa'i yang shin tu mi bzad pa thob pa
184b4(rgyud): sdug bsngal ba de dag gi don dang / dbang med pa la dbang du bya ba'i don dang / dbang du gyur pa la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyir dang / thabs mkhas pas bsdu ba'i sbyor ba sngags kyi ras kyi ri
184b5(rgyud): po'i cho ga gang de'i dus la bab par mkhyen na bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/
184b6(rgyud): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa legs so legs so// 'jam dpal khyod kyi mchog tu gsang ba rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyod pa'i le'u ras
184b7(rgyud): ris kyi cho ga rab 'byams yod de/ snying po mchog rnams kyi don mchog tu gsang ba dam pa don chen po sngags thams cad kyi cho gar gyur pa drug pa 'di dag yi ge drug gi snying po'i mchog the tsom med
185a1(rgyud): brdar tshwa 'grub par 'gyur te/ sems can de dag gdul ba'i phyir dang / thabs la mkhas pa la yang dag pa rab tu zhugs pa'i bying dang / des pang yang dag pa'i drag/
185a2(rgyud): chub thob pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa drug gis sngar gsungs shing ltar yang ngas bshad de/ mya 'ongs pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la phan pa'i phyir legs par nyon la yid la zung zhing dadungs
185a3(rgyud): bshad par bya'o// de gang zhe na/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas sngags gsungs pa/ oM bA kyer+tha dza yau/ oM bAkye sha shaswa/ oM bA kye badz+ra ya/ oM dAkye na~MShA ya/ oM bA
185a4(rgyud): kye ya na maH/ oM bA kye daM na maH/ de ltar 'di dag 'jab dpal gzhon nur gyur pa khyod kyi sngags drug dang / yi ge drug pa mthu chen po dang stobs mnyam pa/ snying po dam pa mchog tu grub pa
185a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas bzhin du 'byung ba/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rab tu gsungs pa/ dam tshig nyams pa dang / dam tshig g.yos pa rnams kyi las thams cad
185a6(rgyud): byed pa/ byang chub kyi lam rjes su ston pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sngags kyi mchog tu byung ba/ mchog dang / 'bring dang / zam gsum la rab tu sbyor pa/ legs par
185a7(rgyud): sbyangs pa'o las kyi 'bras bu'i rnam par smin pa sbyin pa/ bstan pa nub pa'i dus su'ang dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ro// las kyi tshul dang bcas pa la yang dag par gzhol ba la skad cig gi/
185b1(rgyud): dor sgrub par 'gyur ba de dag srung du gan tu byung bar dam dang / de'i dus su 'grub par 'gyur ro// nyams sa dpa'i phyir mang sring po dam pa 'du dag bsgrub par byaste/ mdog sa
185b2(rgyud): sar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas ras ris kyi tshig 'di bya ba yin te/ de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jigs pa chen pa dang / snyigs ma la sems can bsod nangs chu sa
185b3(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur te/ grags pa chung ba dang / tshe thung ba dang / longs spyod chung ba dang / longs spyod chung bas shin tu rgyache ba'i ras ris kyi cho ga'i sgrub pa la sogs bcom par mi rus te/
185b4(rgyud): de dag gi phyir shin tu mdor bstan par bya'o// dang por re zhig dpa' bo'i tshong gi dog pa srang gcig gam/ srang phyed kyis nyos la/ chur khru gang / zheng du khru phyed tsam gyi ngas kha tsher dang
185b5(rgyud): bcas pa tha ga pa 'thag tu gzhug go/ yang na sgra med pa'i ras kyi dum bu gsar pa gzhan steng dang 'og tu ji ltar 'dod pa khru gnyis dang / bzhi dang / drug dang / lnga dang / bcu da//
185b6(rgyud): brgyad pa'i ras blangs te ji ltar 'dod pa'i ri mo mkhan gyis bri bar bya'o// tshon ma 'dres pa dang / tsan dan dang / ga pur dang / gur kum gyis bsgos te/ ras kyang tsan dan dang
185b7(rgyud): ga pur dang / gur kum gcig tu byas pa srog tshogs med pa'i chu rdul med pa dang bsres te/ snod gsar pa'i nang du bkrus la zhag gsum gyi bar du legs par bkab ste bzhag nas
186a1(rgyud): gtsang ba'i phyogs su bsrung ba byas shing / bdag nyid kyang gtsang bar byas te zla ba yang ngol chos bcom la ngas snod kyi mdun du shang du mngon par phyogs te/
186a2(rgyud): ku sha'i khres la 'dug nas sngags kyi tshig lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par bya ba la 'di lta ste/ oM he he bA ga bA na ba hu rU pa d+ha ra/ di bya tsak+ShuShe/ a ba lo ka ya/ a ba lo ka ya/ a ba
186a3(rgyud): lo ka ya/ mAM sa ma ya ma ru sma ra ku mA ra rU pa d+hA ri Ne/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa kin tsi rA ya saM hUM swa te swa te swAhA/ sngags 'dis bzlas pa byas la de nyid du nyal bar bya'o// gnyid log pa'i rmi
186a4(rgyud): lam du 'grub pa 'am mi 'grub pa ston par 'gyur ro// de nas langs nas rmi lam du grub pa'i mtshan ma mthong na ring por mi thogs par ras ris bri bar bya'o// gal te grub pa'i mtshan ma rmi lam
186a5(rgyud): du ma mthong na ras de snod de las phyung la/ nyi ma la bskams nas yang snod gsar pa gzhan du bcu ga la shin tu dben par legs par bsrung ba byas la gzhag go// de nas yang snying po'i mchog
186a6(rgyud): dag las gang yang rung ba'i sngags blangs la gang 'dod pa'i yi ge drug pa'ang yi ge 'bum pazla bar bya'o// de nas ras mi dge ba'ang 'grub par 'gyur ro// dang por re zhig ras de blangs la
186a7(rgyud): 'phrul gyi chang zed dang/ yang po'i chen zhags rgya gang bzang po dang ldan pa'i chos grangs babang po la/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal byisi pa khye'u'i gzugs can mgo rung ngud lnga ldan pa
186b1(rgyud): byas pa'i rkyen gyis brgyan pa/ mngag sas 'arlab/ rlab par rjod pa gso panan mnags pa/ na ba 'du sa ldan pas sred gsogs byas pa/ chos 'dadapa/ 'a 'i sa rgyu
186b2(rgyud): mo krung byed pas bzhugs pa/ zhabs g.yas pas rin po che'i zhabs rten la bzhag pa/ g.yon pa seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ rgyun thams cad dang ldan pa/ bzhi cung zad 'dzum
186b3(rgyud): pa dang bcas pa sgrub pa po la lta ba zi bar bya'o// g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa kun tu bzang po rnga ma dkar po g.yob pa/ pri yang ku'i mdog ltar sngo bsangs lag pa g.yon pa na nor bu na pa
186b4(rgyud): che thogs pa/ yan lag thams cad mdzes pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ na bza' sngon po g.yo ba mnabs pa/ mu tig gi 'phreng bas mchod phyir thogs pa/ pad+ma dkar po'i
186b5(rgyud): gdan la 'dug pa bri bar bya'o// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi g.yon phyogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ston ka'i mda' rgyu'i mdog lhur dkar ba/ na bza' sngon po gso
186b6(rgyud): ba mnabs pa/ yan lag thams cad mdzes pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ mu tig gi 'phreng bas mchod phyir thogs byas pa/ log pa g.yon pa na pad+ma dkar po 'dzin pa/ lag
186b7(rgyud): pa g.yas pa na rnga yab gser gyi yu ba can dkar po thogs pa zhi ba'i cha byad can/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la lta ba/ de bzhin du 'phags pa kun tu bzang po pad+ma dkar po la gnas pa gnyis
187a1(rgyud): ka'ang de ltar bri bar bya'o// de nas sdong bu gcig las skyes pa'i pad+ma gsum la dbus kyi rtsa ba'i pad+ma'i ge sar la ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi seng ge'i khri dang / rin/
187a2(rgyud): ngo che'i zhabs rten no// gnyis pa'i pad+ma la 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'o// gsum pa'i pad+ma la ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go// pad+ma'i sdong bu mdzes pa rin po che margad 'dra ba/ pad+ma'i
187a3(rgyud): me tog du ma kha ma bye ba dang / phyed tsam bye ba dang / kha bye ba dang ldan pa/ mtsho chen po ma dros pa las skyes pa klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis pad+ma'i sdong bu la 'dzin pa/ klu'i rgyal
187a4(rgyud): po de dag gi kha dog dkar ba/ gdengs ka bdun gyis nye bar brgyan palus rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ lus kyi stod mi la sbrul gyi gdengs kas mtshan pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la
187a5(rgyud): lta ba/ lus phyed chu'i nang du nub pa nor bu rin po che dang gos kyis nye bar mdzes pa bri bar bya'o// mtsho chen po kun gyi 'og tu sgrib pa po ras ris kyi g.yas phyogs kyi mtha'i zung du 'phags
187a6(rgyud): pa 'jam dpal gyi zhal gyi dkyil 'khor la lta ba / spos snod lag na thogs pa/ mgo dang pus mo'i lhang 'dud pa/ cha byad dang kha dog snga ma ji lta ba bzhin du bri bar bya'o// 'phags pa
187a7(rgyud): 'jam dpal gyi steng ras kyi zur gnyis su lha'i bu me tog 'phreng ba 'dzin pa nam mkha' la lding ba/ sprin gyi nang nas byung ba/ me tog gi tshegs chen po 'thor ba shin tu mdzes pa bri bar bya'o//
187b1(rgyud): ras ris kyi khor yug tu me tog nA ga ge sar la sogs pas rab tu gtor bar bya'o// ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs de bzhin du bri bar bya'o// 'phags pa 'jam dpal ches 'chad pa dang
187b2(rgyud): 'phags pa kun tu bzang po dang // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs lag na nga yab g.yob pa bri bar bya'o// yang na sgrub pa po ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du ras ris kyi gzugs nges par bri bar bya ste/
187b3(rgyud): ji ltar 'dod pa'i cha byad dam/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i dbyibs sam/ sgrub pa po ji ltar 'dod pa de lta de ltar bri bar bya'o// dbus su 'phags pa 'jam dpal/ g.yas g.yon du 'phags pa
187b4(rgyud): 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / kun tu bzang po ji ltar 'dod par nges par bri bar bya'o// yang na ji snyed pa'i ras kyi dum bu mtho gang ngam/ khru gang la bdag nyid dam/ gzhan gyis sam/ ri mo
187b5(rgyud): mkhan gso sbyong byis pa 'am/ gso sbyong ma byas pa 'am/ dad pa 'am/ ma dad pa 'am/ gtsang ba 'am/ mi gtsang ba 'am/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'am/ tshul khrims 'chal pa'i
187b6(rgyud): ri mo mkhan gyis kyang bri bar bya'o// bdag nyid dam sgrub pa pos nges par sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa dang / dad pa dang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni nges par bya'o// de ltar byas na sngags
187b7(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur gyi/ gzhan du sdig pa'i las can gyis ni mi 'gyur te/ de ljang dad pa dang / de ltar gyur pas bsgrub par bya'o// sngags kyi rgyal po dang / sngags kyi lha dag
188a1(rgyud): 'dir dad pa dang ldan pas 'grub par 'gyur gyi/ gzhan dag gis ni ma yin no// gang phyir dad pa theg pa mchog/ gang gis rnam par 'dren pa mchog/ dad pa med pa
188a2(rgyud): mi la ni// dkar po'i chos rnams mi skye ste/ sa bon tshig par gyur pa las// myu gu sngon po ji bzhin no// dad dang ldan pa'i mi dag la/ sangs rgyas las ni 'grub 'gyur te// sngag/
188a3(rgyud): rnams thams cad khyad par du// dad pa med la mi 'grub bo// gang yang 'jig rten lha dag dang // de bzhin 'jig rten 'das pa dag/ dad ldan kun la 'grub 'gyur te// sdig pa/
188a4(rgyud): dag dang bral phyir ro// byang chub der song yid kyis ni// de dag myur du nges 'grub ste// gzhan la 'grub par mi 'gyur zhing // bstan pa 'di la rnam par bzlog/ ras ni chung dang
188a5(rgyud): chen po dang // 'bring du nye bar bsgrags pa yin// las rnams kun la sgrub pa ni// de ni rab tu bstan par bya// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod pal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo/
188a6(rgyud): las// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga bdun pa'i le'u rab 'byams las ras ris kyi cho ga bzhi pa'i le'u rab 'byams rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'a/
188a7(rgyud): shAkya thub pas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nu gang khyod kyis bstan pa'i sems can de dag gi phyir yang le'u'i cho ga rab 'byams 'di thabs slabs
188b1(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur ba ngas kyang bstan te/ de dag gi don gyi phyir yon tan rgya che ba'i bye brag gi dbye ba las rnam par 'byed pa sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir yang dag par bshad par bya yis
188b2(rgyud): de legs par shin tu rab tu nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag gi tshig gi nus pa gsal bar mdzad kyi
188b3(rgyud): sngags kyi spyod pa'i yon tan grub par mdzad pa ni legs so legs so zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de'i dus la bab par mkhyen na bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du de bshad du gsol/
188b4(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la gzigs te 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer sngon po dang
188b5(rgyud): ser po dang / ljang khu dang / shel gyi kha dog lta bu byung ste/ 'od zer de byung ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor snang bar byas nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
188b6(rgyud): gyi khams kyi bdud thams cad zil gyis mnan nas rgyu skar gyi 'od dang / ri bo'i tshogs thams cad kyi 'od dang / gang 'di zla ba dang nyi ma rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba de dag gi 'od kyang zil gyis
188b7(rgyud): mnan te/ mi gsal zhing 'od med par 'gyur ba dang / rnam par mdzes par mi 'gyur zhing gsal bar mi 'gyur ro// nor bu thams cad dang / sngags dang / sman dang / rin po che'i 'od tham
189a1(rgyud): cad 'od med par byas nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zhal gyi sgor nub par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyagar do//
189a2(rgyud): rje 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'khod par gyur pa de stan las langs nas// rings pa'i tshul gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
189a3(rgyud): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ni rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang /
189a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das ni rgyu med pa dang //
189a5(rgyud): rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad de/ rgyu yod/ rkyen yod do// gang zhig mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga rig pa'i spyod pa rjes su sgrub pa las bsgrub pa'i thabs la
189a6(rgyud): yang dag par gzhol ba/ chos kyi sprin la rten pa la yang dag par 'jug cing rjes su 'brang bar byed pa dang / 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / klog par 'gyur ba dang / dang bar 'gyur ba dang / glegs
189a7(rgyud): ba ma la 'dri ba byas nas mchod par 'gyur ba dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / byug pa dang / bdug pa dang / 'phreng ba dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'am
189b1(rgyud): tshig gi bye brag gis sam/ sil skar rnam pa sna tshogs dang / pheg rdob pa dag gam/ za na rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgyud la thob pa 'am/ ba spu ldang bar byed pa'ang / rig
189b2(rgyud): pa'i mthu thos nas dga' ba skyes pa 'am/ rjes su yi rang bar 'gyur ba dang / spyod pa thob par 'gyur ba de dag ni ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan
189b3(rgyud): 'das su 'byung bar lung bstan te/ des na rgyal ba de ltar 'dzum pa mdzad kyi/ gzhan du ni ma yin no// 'dir dang por re zhig cho ga'i rgyal po 'di la dam tshig mthong ba sngon du bya ba rnams byas
189b4(rgyud): pa dang / dbang bskur ba thob pa rtsa ba'i sngags sar/ snying po 'am/ nye ba'i snying po 'am/ sngags gang yang rung ba bzung nas yi ge gcig pa 'am/ gang 'dod pa dben pa chen por song
189b5(rgyud): ste/ 'bum phrag gsum bzla bar bya'o// 'bras bu dang rus 'tshe ba 'am/ rtsa ba dang lo ma'i bza' ba byas na sngon du bya ba byas par 'gyur ro// de nas ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs nas ras
189b6(rgyud): ris chen po'i tshad nub phyogs su mngon du lta ba bzhag pa byas la/ bdag nyid shar du bltas te ku sha'i khres la 'dug nas/ pad+ma dkar po la tsan dan dang gur kum gyis btags te/
189b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos dag la 'bum phrag gcig ri mo'i res ris kyi
190a1(rgyud): 'og tu dbul bar bya'o// ga pur gyi bdug pa'ang ci 'byor pas bdugs go// lha'i bu dang klu rnams la ji snyed pa'i me tog gis mchod par bya'o// de nas mtshan/
190a2(rgyud): phyed kyi dus su ro 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed kyi zla ba nye ba la/ ras ris kyi mdun du pad+ma'i rnam pa lta bu'i me thab byas pa la tsan dan dkar po'i shing gis me sbar nas/ gur kum dang ga pur bsres pas/
190a3(rgyud): sreg blugs ci 'byor pas stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas bsrung ba bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa las 'od zer byung ste/ ras kyi ri mo'i khor yug nas gcig tu 'bar
190a4(rgyud): bar 'gyur te/ sgrub pa pos gur kum dang tson dan gyis btabs pa'i tsan dan dkar po'i me tog gis mchod yon dbul lo// de nas sgrub pa pos rings pa'i tshul gyis ras ris la lan gsum
190a5(rgyud): bskor ba byas te/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos rnams la phyag byas nas/ sgrub pa pos bris pa'i
190a6(rgyud): ras ris kyi mtha' ma'i phyogs nas 'jigs pa med pas ras ris gzung bar bya'o// de nas bzung ba tsam gyis 'phur te/ se gol gtogs pa tsam gyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du phyin par
190a7(rgyud): 'gyur te/ me tog can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su rab tu gnas par 'gyur te// gang du bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhugs
190b1(rgyud): te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// 'phags pa 'jam dpal yang mngon du mthong ngo // chos kyang thos so// byang chub sems dpa' du ma dag kyang mthong zhing / de dag la bsnyen bkur/
190b2(rgyud): yang byed de/ bskal pa chen po stong du rga ba dang 'chi ba med cing gnas par 'gyur ro// ras ris kyang de na gnas par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin
190b3(rgyud): gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de dag gis byin gyis brlabs par yang dag par shes so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong yang 'da' bar byed do// lus stong yang ston par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi
190b4(rgyud): mthu du ma'ang 'byin par byed do// 'phags pa 'jam dpal yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'gyur ro// nges par byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod pal poche
190b5(rgyud): theg pa chen po rgya che ba'i mdo las/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo rab 'byams sgrub pa'i thabs mchog gi las kyi le'u brgyad pa las dang po rdzogs so//
190b6(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha 'dus pa rnams la bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag khyed cag nyon cig/ 'jam
190b7(rgyud): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor sngags sgrub pa'i thabs kyi las byed pa/ sgrub pa po bsrung ba'i phyir mchog tu gsang ba dam pa/ snying po dam pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa
191a1(rgyud): thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ rig pa'i rgyal po chen po bzlas pa gang gis sngags thams cad bzlas par gyur te/ kye lha'i tshogs dag 'di ni 'da' bar bya bar
191a2(rgyud): yin te/ rig pa'i rgyal po 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'ang rig pa'i rgyal po 'dis 'gugs shing dbang du byed la 'byor pa med par byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan lta smos
191a3(rgyud): kyang ci dgos/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o sngags thams cad dang / bgegs thams cad kyang 'jig par byed de/ 'di ni stobs che ba dang / mthu che ba dang / dpa' ro gcig/
191a4(rgyud): pa dang / sngags thams cad kyi cho ga gcig tu bstan pa dang / yi ge gcig pa rnams kyi nang na gcig par bstan pa dang / yi ge gcig gis dor thams cad sgrub par byed pa/ bya ba tham/
191a5(rgyud): cad byed pa/ sngags thams cad gcod par byed pa/ ma rungs pa'i las rnams kyi sdig pa thams cad rab tu 'jig par byed pa/ sngags thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa
191a6(rgyud): dge bar byed pa/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags rnams kyi gong nas gong du 'dug pa thogs pa med pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po/ bsam pa
191a7(rgyud): thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de gang zhe na/ oM n+di/ grogs po dag 'di nyid mchog tu gsang ba dam pa las thams cad byed pa yi ge gcig pa zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal po 'das
191b1(rgyud): bar bya ba ma yin pa/ sems can thams cad kyis thub par dka' ba/ 'byung po thams cad kyi bkra shis pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad sgrub par byed pa/ sngags thams cad kyi mnga'
191b2(rgyud): bdag 'jig rten thams cad kyi dbang phyug/ rnam par snang ba rnams la byams pa'i bdag nyid dang / skye bo thams cad la snying brtse bor byed pa/ bgegs thams cad 'jig par byed/
191b3(rgyud): ba ste/ mdor na ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar las byed de/ bsgrubs pa med kyang las 'grub par 'gyur ro// sngags 'di bzlas la reg pas de dbang du 'gyur ro// gos la bsngag
191b4(rgyud): nas gon na skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro// se shing la bsngags na so dang nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// ka ra wir dkar po'i so shing la lan bdun bdun bsngags te dzes ni don du ma gnyer ba
191b5(rgyud): yang kha zas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mig gi nad la rgya ma tshwa btags te lan bdun mngon par bsngags la mig bkang na mig gi nad sel to// rna ba'i nad la 'brug sgrog pa las skyes pa'i rtswam
191b6(rgyud): tri ka zhes bya ba glang po che'i rgyab tu reg par byas la/ rang gi lo ma'i nang du gtums nas me chung ba la bsregs te shin tu 'jam par byas la/ rgyam tshwa'i bye ma chu dro 'jam tsam dang sbrus te lan
191b7(rgyud): bdun bsngags pas rna ba bkang ba dang / skad cig de nyid la rna ba nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// bud med bu 'byung ba'i dus su mngal nas mthon te na zhing nyam thag pa la ni shing A Ta rU sho ka'i rtsa ba
192a1(rgyud): srog chags med pa'i chu la btags te lte ba'i phyogs su bskus na nye bar ni bar 'gyur ro// mtshon nang du lus pa'i skyes bu la ni mar rnying pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par/
192a2(rgyud): ba sngags te btung ba'am/ byugs na phyogs de nas de'i skad cig la zug rngu med par 'gyur ro// ma zhu ba dang / gsud pa dang / 'khru ba'i nad la ni lan tshwa nag po 'am/ rgyam tshwa 'am/ tshwa gzhan
192a3(rgyud): gang yang rung ba la lan bdun bsngags te zos na nad de las grol bar 'gyur te/ de nyid kyi nyin par bde legs su 'gyur ro// ldan pa'i nad kyis tshad par 'khru ba 'am/ 'khru ba la ni ma du lung gzhi
192a4(rgyud): rtsa ba btags te/ lan cig gam gnyis bzlas pa byas nas srog chags med pa'i chu dang 'thungs na gnod pa med par de las grol bar 'gyur ro// bud med mo ga shar bu mi skye ba skye bar 'dod na a shra gan
192a5(rgyud): da'i rtsa ba mar bzang po dang lhan cig bskol la/ ba'i 'o ma dang lhan cig bskol te/ ba'i 'o ma dang bsres la lan nyi shu rtsa lngar bzlas la/ zla mtshan gyi dus su blud la khrus byas pa'i 'og tu khyim
192a6(rgyud): bdag gzhan gyi chung ma spangs shing / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spangs pas rang gi rung ma la mngon par song na rang gi khyod dang 'dra ba'i bu skye bar 'gyur ro// lo gsum mam lo lnga'i bar du
192a7(rgyud): btsa' ba'i dus su khrag 'byung ba 'am/ lo du ma'i bar du bu ma chags pa'am/ gzhan gyi sngags rgyud dang / sman dang / gzhan gyi phyag rgyas bcings pa dang / gzhan gyis ma rungs par byas
192b1(rgyud): ba 'am/ khu zla ba ma tshang bar 'byung ba 'am/ dad las yang dag par byung ba 'am/ gzhan gyi skyong bas yang dag par byung ba 'am/ gzhan gang yang rung ba cung zad gzhan gyis byas pa'i nad dang / gangs/
192b2(rgyud): pa dang / 'gro ba dang / bcos ma dang / bcos ma ma yin pa'i dbyig dug la sogs pa byin pa dang / rtsa ba dang / sman dang / sngags thams cad dang / mdza' bo dang / mi mdza' bas sbyor ba byas pa/
192b3(rgyud): la lan nyi shu rtsa bdun bsngags te/ mar rnying pa la rma bya'i sgo zla ba 'dra ba dang bsres te btags la/ de nas shin tu zhib par byas la sha khar dang lhan cig sbyar te a rur tsam bza' bar bya'o//
192b4(rgyud): zhag bdun gyi bar du kha ra dang ldan pa'i 'o ma bskol ba btung bar bya ste/ yang dang yang du sngags kyang bzla bar bya'o// mgo bo'i nang la ni khwa'i gshog pa la lan bdun bsngags te bya bas na bde
192b5(rgyud): legs su 'gyur ro// bud med la spyad drags pa la sogs pa'i nad ni shing a lam bu sil rtsa ba'i 'o ma dang lhan cig btags nas/ sman ni li ka'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa la brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags te
192b6(rgyud): 'o ma de dang bsres la btung bar bya'o// de bzhin du rims nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / ther zug pa'i rims dang / rtag pa'i rims dang /
192b7(rgyud): rims mi bzad pa la sogs pa la 'o thug mar dang ldan pa la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags te blud pa byas na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon gyis zin bdag
193a1(rgyud): la ni bdag nyid kyi gdong la lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags te nad pa la bltas na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du ma mo dang / byis pa dang / lus/
193a2(rgyud): srul po dang / ro langs dang / gzhon nu'i gdon la sogs pa mi ma yin pa'i mi bzad pa'i gdon thams cad kyis zin pa la ni bdag nyid kyi lag pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas
193a3(rgyud): nas/ gdon gyis zin pa'i mgo la rig par byas na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro// lan cig bzlas pas bdag nyid srung bar 'gyur ro// lan gnyis bzlas pas grogs po srung bar
193a4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// lan gsum bzlas pas ni khyim srung bar 'gyur ro// lan bzhi bzlas pas ni grong srung bar 'gyur ro// len lnga bzlas pas ni grong gi spyod yul gyi 'gro ba srung bar
193a5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de bzhin du lan stong gi bar du bzlas na dmag gi tshogs bsrung ba byas par yang 'gyur ro// de dag dang gzhan yang ma bsgrubs par las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro//
193a6(rgyud): ci sde sgrub par 'dod na ni las phran tshegs rnams bya ba ma yin te/ gcig pu dben pa'i gnas su song nas rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu bo 'byung ba'i gnas dang / rgya mtsho'i ngogs dang / chung
193a7(rgyud): gang+gA'i ngogs dang / gzhan gang yang rung ba'i chu bo chen po'i ngogs la brten das gtsang ma'i gnas su lo ma'i skyil po byas te/ khrus lan gsung bya zhing gos lan gsung brjes la
193b1(rgyud): thub par gnas shingaslong mo'i kha zas bza' ba 'am/ tshod dzad dA ra/ khyor gang tsam mam/ 'o ma 'ar/ 'bras bu za zhing bzlas pa sum 'bum byas te/ grub pa'i
193b2(rgyud): mtshan ma mthong na de nas sgrub pa brtsam par bya'o// phyogs de nyid du ras ris chen po bzhag la/ ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas te/ mar me'i snod gser ram/ dngul lam/
193b3(rgyud): zangs sam/ sa'i rang bzhin la shing du ru ka'i 'bru mar gyis bkang ba 'am/ dri zhim po'i 'bru mar gyis bkang ba 'am/ ba'i mar gyis yongs su gang ba'i mar me ras kyi dum bu
193b4(rgyud): gsar pa'i snying po byas te/ ras ris kyi mdun du 'bum phrag gcig gi mar me dbul bar bya'o// kho ra khor yug tu mar me'i 'phreng ba phul ma thag tu ras ris las 'od 'byung ste/ 'od
193b5(rgyud): byung ma thag tu ras ris kyi khor yug tu 'od 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas kun nas khyab par 'gyur ro// steng gi nam mkha' bar snang las rnga bo che'i sgra sgrog cing / legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra'ang
193b6(rgyud): thos te/ de nas rig pa 'dzin pas rings pa'i tshul gyis sgrub pa po ras ris kyi mtha' lo sngar bris pa'i ras ris kyi mtha' nas mchod yon gsol/ lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ sangs
193b7(rgyud): rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas gzung bar bya'o// de nas de bzung ba tsam gyis med me thams cad 'dzin pa'i sems can rnams gcig gis lhag pa'i gzhal med khang 'bum dang /
194a1(rgyud): lhan cig 'phur bar 'gyur ro// lha'i sil snyan dang yang dag par ldan pa dang glu snyan pa'i sku la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang / gar dang ldan pas rig
194a2(rgyud): pa 'dzin pa khor yug tu khyab pa dag gis mar mo thogs pa dang lhan cig sgrub pa po rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por dbang bskur bar byed do// rga ba dang 'chi ba med pas rol
194a3(rgyud): par 'gyur zhing bskal pa chen por gnas shing nyi ma dang 'dra ba dang / lha'i yan lag lta bur mdzes pa dang / gos rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyad pa dang / 'khor de dag dang yang 'di
194a4(rgyud): lhan cig tu spyod par 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyang 'di'i bran bzhin du nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// ring du 'tsho ba dang
194a5(rgyud): grub pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi bu mo rnams la mchog tu yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// rdzas thams cad la dbang du 'gyur ro// sangs
194a6(rgyud): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la bzhugs par 'gyur ro// skad cig gis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du 'gro zhing brgya byin la'ang bgrang ba med na/ rig pa 'dzin
194a7(rgyud): pa gzhan lta tshe smos/ 'di ni mthar yang sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyung zhing / 'bigs pa 'jam dpal yang 'di'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'gyur ro// gzhan yang las kyi sgrub pa po
194b1(rgyud): yod de/ de nas shin tu bcom pas gcig pu dben pa skye bo med la 'dres pa med cing 'dres pa dang bral bas dgon pa chen por zhugs te/ gnas gang du pad+ma chen po yod pa'i mtsho dang ldan
194b2(rgyud): pa'i ri'i rtse po gcig tu brten nas/ ri'i rtse mo de'i steng du 'dzegs te/ rig pa'i rgyal po yi ge gcig pa 'jam dpal gyi cho ga las bshad pa 'ang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'am
194b3(rgyud): gzhan byang chub sems dpas bshad pa 'am/ gang yang rung ba'i sngags gang 'dod pa de dag bzung ste/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba 'am 'o ma'i kha zas kyis 'tshe zhing rig pa 'bum phrag sum cu
194b4(rgyud): rtsa drug bzlas la/ bzlas pa'i mthar cho ga de nyid kyis sngar bskur pa'i ras ris kyi ri bo chen po rab tu bzhag ste/ me tog pad+ma la tsan dan dkar po dang gur kum gyis brtags la seng
194b5(rgyud): ldeng gi shing gi me 'bar te/ sngar yongs su brtags pa'i me tog gis stong phrag drug cu rtsa drug gi sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas sbyin sreg gi mthar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i ras ris
194b6(rgyud): las 'od zer 'byung ngo // de nas sgrub pa po snang bar byas te spyi bor zhugs par 'gyur la/ des reg ma thag tu sgrub pa pos mngon par shes pa lnga thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems
194b7(rgyud): dpa'i sa thob par 'gyur/ lha'i lus kyis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro bar 'gyur/ bskal pa sum cu rtsa drug gi bar du 'tshe bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing sum cu rtsa drug gnon
195a1(rgyud): par 'gyur/ de dag gi mthu yang dag par rjes su mthong bar 'gyur / sangs rgyas sum cu rtsa drug gi gsung rab 'dzin par 'gyur/ de la mchod cing bsnyen
195a2(rgyud): bkur ba la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur/ mthar yang byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis byang chub kyi mthar thug pa mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du dge ba'i
195a3(rgyud): ba shes gnyen du yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod pal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde las/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga dgu pa'i
195a4(rgyud): le'u rab 'byams las gnyis pa sgrub pa'i thabs dam pa'i las kyi le'u rab 'byams rdzogs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas sgrub pa'i las dam
195a5(rgyud): pa gzhan yang gsungs te/ cho ga'i rgyal po 'di las gang yang rung ba'i sngags bzung nas gang+gA'i klung chen por zhugs te/ dkyil du gru'i bzhon pa la 'dug ste/ 'o ma dang sbyar ba'i 'dra/
195a6(rgyud): chan pa zhing ji ltar 'dod pa'i nyi ma la bzlas pa sum 'bum bya'o// de nas bzlas pa'i tha ra li klu thams cad mthong ste/ de nas sgrub pa brtsam par bya'o// gru'i steng de nyid kyi nang du ma
195a7(rgyud): zab pad+ma'i rnam pa 'dra ba byas nas/ me tog nA ga ge sar dag gis ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas te/ ras ris chen po nub tu bstan pas bzhag la/ bdag nyid shar du bltas nas/
195b1(rgyud): sha'i khres la 'dug ste/ me tog nA ga ge sar re re la'ang lan bdun bdun bsngags pa byas nas shing seng ldeng gi me sbar ba la sbyin sreg bya ste/ tsan dan dkar po dang gur kum dang bsres/
195b2(rgyud): pa'i me tog rA ga gi sar gyis lan stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug gi bar du bya ste/ gzhan gyis ni ma yin no// klu rnams mthong ba'ang don yod pa yin te/ grub pa'i rdzas rnams la rab tu chags
195b3(rgyud): pas blang bar mi bya ste/ grub pa'i rdzas rnams chags pas len par mi byed na/ des na sbyin sreg rdzogs pa dang gru'i bzhon pa dang bcas pa 'phung bar 'gyur te/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor
195b4(rgyud): los sgyur bar 'gyur la/ klu'i rgyal po'i dbang po thams cad kyang rjes su 'brang zhing bran bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro// bar gyi bskal pa sum cur 'tshe bar 'gyur ro// 'di rang dbang /
195b5(rgyud): du'ang spyod par 'gyur ro// 'gro ba la thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa 'jam dpal mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro// spyi bo la phyag gis reg par mdzad de/ reg pa tsam
195b6(rgyud): gyis mngon par shes pa lnga thob par 'gyur ro// nges par sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob par 'gyur ro// las kyi mchog gzhan yang bstan pa ni bil ba'i shing gcig gi rang bzhin las
195b7(rgyud): gru'i bzhon pa shin tu brtan pa dang legs par byas te/ de la zhon nas gang+gA'i klung chen por zhugs te/ bil ba'i shing las rlung g.yor byas te/ de nyid kyis gru de rlung g.yor 'dzin
196a1(rgyud): pa mkhas pa gsal ba des phyag par bya'o// gang+gA'i klung chen po mi dor bar yongs su zad ka'am chur phyug par bya'o// de nas gzhan gang yang rung ba'i sngags /
196a2(rgyud): ba'i sngags sapa/ 'bru drug pa 'am/ 'bru gsum pa 'am/ 'bru brgyad pa'am/ 'bru gcig pa 'am/ khro bo 'am/ pho nya'am/ 'khor gyi sngags bzung nas/ dang po ras
196a3(rgyud): res chen po de nyid rub tu bltas pas bzhag la/ sgrub pa po shar du blta bar bya'o// de nas ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'o ma dang nas chan khyor gang dam/ 'bras bu'i kha zas sam/ chu dang /
196a4(rgyud): ba dang / 'bras bu'i kha zas kyis 'tshel/ mi smra ba'i dka' thub dang / dus gsum du khrus bya zhing gos lan gsum brjes nas dge ba'i las bzang po yang dag par spyod pa dang / blo dge/
196a5(rgyud): pa bzang po dang ldan pa'o// dang por re zhig ras ris kyi mdun du sngar ji ltar bstan pa'i sngar bshad pa'i cho gas rig pa 'bum phrag drug tu bzla'o// bzlas pa zin pa na gru do rgya mtsho chen por 'gro/
196a6(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// sgrub pa'i yo byad yang dag par blangs te/ sngar gyi gnas su gzhag par bya'o// de nas gru'i bzhon pa rgya mtsho chen por 'gro ba ra 'jigs par mi bya ste/ bzlog
196a7(rgyud): par yang mi bya'o// sgrub pa po ma gtogs pas bzlog par nus pa'ang ma yin no// de nas dpag tshad stong du gnas pa'i rgya mtsho chen por yang yud tsam gyis 'jug par 'gyur na/
196b1(rgyud): lam thung ngu lta spos kyang ci dgos rgya mtsho chen po der phyin pa na sgrub pa pos sgrub pa'i las brtsam par bya'o// de nas seng ldeng gi shing gis me spang la sngar byas pa'i me
196b2(rgyud): thab bam/ rdza mkhan gyis byas pa'i sa'i snod la me tog nA ga ge sar tsan dan dkar po dang / ga pur gyis bsres pa'i sreg thugs kyis shin tu nyung ba 'am/ rab tu mang ba'ang rung /
196b3(rgyud): 'bum phrag drug cu sbyin sreg bya'o// sbyin sreg byed pa na'ang lang ka'i grong khyer na gnas pa'i srin po'i gzugs dang cha byad mang po 'dzin pa ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra sgrogs pa dang / klu'i grong
196b4(rgyud): khyer gdengs ka dang ldan pa na gnas pa'i rgyal po rnams langs par gyur te/ cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs 'dzin pa rab tu drag pa dang / rab tu zhi ba'i klu de rnams dang / srin
196b5(rgyud): po de rnams 'di skad du khyed bzhengs shig bzhengs shig/ bdag cag gi bdag po mdzad du gsol zhes brjod do// de bzhin du lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha dang
196b6(rgyud): lto 'phye chen po dang / grub pa dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyang rab tu chags par byed na ldang bar mi bya/ de nas rig pa 'dzin pas sngags zlo zhing lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub
196b7(rgyud): mos sngags mdzub byas na de nas phan tshun du 'gro ba dang / 'byer ba dang / 'bros par byed do// de nas sbyin sreg zin pa na gru de sgrub pa po des blangs na/ skad cig gis 'og
197a1(rgyud): min du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khyams gzhan du'ang 'gro ba dang 'ong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang mthu mnyam par 'gyur//
197a2(rgyud): mngon par shes pa lnga dang / rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / mthu chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'dis 'phags pa 'jam dpal yang rtag tu mthong bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas
197a3(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos ma gtogs pa klu'i rgyal po thams cad dang srin po thams cad dang / gnod sbyin
197a4(rgyud): thams cad dang / lha thams cad dang / lha ma yin thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyang 'di'i bka' bzhin byed cing dbang du 'gyur ro// 'di'i sngags grub pa de dag la 'ang
197a5(rgyud): byams pa'i bdag nyid du 'gyur zhing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyis kyang mi thub pa'i bar du 'gyur ro// gzhan yang las sgrub pa'i thabs dam pa yod de
197a6(rgyud): shing bil pa chen po las gru'i bzhon pa byas la/ yang na shing gcig gi tshogs las gnas chen po byas te/ gang+gA'i dbus kyi klung der gru'i bzhon pa'i gnas byas la/ der yang gru'i
197a7(rgyud): bzhon pa la zhon pa'i skyes bu brgya nyi shu rnams mar me la gan thogs pa/ gos dkar po bgos pa/ bsrung ba byas pa/ cho ga snga mas yang dag par bzhag pa'i ris ris mduran druganas
197b1(rgyud): bar bya ste/ de nas ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas/ rA ga ge sar gyi phye matsan dan dkar po dang / gur kum dang / ga pur gyis bsres pa'i sreg blugs kyis seng ldeng gi me la/
197b2(rgyud): stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas sbyin sreg zin pa na skad cig gis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba dang 'ong bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin rnam par rgyu bar byed do//
197b3(rgyud): 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur te/ mthong ba tsam gyis sa thob par yang 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa lnga thob pa dang / yun ring du 'tshe zhing
197b4(rgyud): bskal pa chen por gnas par yang 'gyur/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar yang 'gyur ro// mar me 'dzin pa de dag kyang rig pa 'dzin pa 'di'i grogs por 'gyur te/ de dag dang/
197b5(rgyud): lhan cig ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rgyu zhing rang dbang du 'gro bar yang 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byed par mngon par dga' bar 'gyur zhing
197b6(rgyud): 'phral yang sangs rgyas nyid du nges par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang sgrub pa'i thabs kyi las dam pa yod do// chu klung rgya mtsho'i 'gram dag gam// de bzhin ri bo kha ba can// ri yi rgyal po 'bigs
197b7(rgyud): byed la// las kyi mchog ni bsgrub par bya// ma la ya ri sa ha dang // spos kyi ngang ldang ang bu dang // ri yi rgyal po sum brtsegs la// las kyi mchog ni bsgrub par bya// de bzhin rgyab mcher/
198a1(rgyud): po dang // rini shing ldan me tog yod// 'di dag gi ni phyogs dag tu// sngags grub par ni rgyal bas gsungs// gtsang zhing bas mtha' dper phyogs su/ zong /
198a2(rgyud): gi chos ni rnam par spangs// de bzhin re yi tshang tshing du// sngags kyi rgyal po thams cad 'grub// bas mtha'i gnas mal nyams dga' dang // rgyal bas de bzhin bsngags pa dang /
198a3(rgyud): ma rungs sems can thams cad la// sngags kyi rgyal po thams cad 'grub// chos ldan rgyal po yod pa dang // gtsang sbra spyod pa'i skye bo yod// pa dang ma la gus pa dang / bram ze'i
198a4(rgyud): rigs ni yod pa yi// gnas der lha rnams 'grub 'gyur te// gzhan du 'grub pa ma yin no// chu bo gang+gA'i 'gram dang ni// de bzhin legs mdzes ya mun// sin du nar mad nang dang /
198a5(rgyud): zla ba'i cha ni gtsang ngogs dang // de bzhin ka ba'i sar srad// chu bo chen po si ta rnams// 'di dag grub pa'i zhing du ni// stobs bcu ldan sras rnams kyis bshad// stobs bcu ldan/
198a6(rgyud): pas bshad pa'i zhing // byang phyogs yod pa'i ri dag dang // kha che dang ni rgyu yul dang // bal po de bzhin nang yul dang // rgya yul tshwa dang li yul dag/ de dag ma lus grub pa'i
198a7(rgyud): zhing // byang phyogs la ni gnas pa dang // nas dang grol spyod pa dang // ri dang chu bo dag la yang // bsod nams yul du bstan pa yin// sems can snying rje ldan gang gnas/
198b1(rgyud): de dag la ni nges 'grub 'gyur// dpal gyi ri bo'i ri chen ni// lho phyogs na ni yang dag gnas// dpal ldan 'bras bung mchod rten ni// rgyal ba'i ring bsrel gnas pa'i sa/
198b2(rgyud): thams cad don gyi gnas dag la// der ni sngags rnams myur du 'grub// mchod rten chen po rdo rje'i gdan// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor dang // thub mchog zhi bar rab gshegs
198b3(rgyud): pa// der yang grub par rab tu snang // lha las babs pa'i mchod rten dang // ne ka sha dang cho 'phrul bstan// grong mchog ser skya zhes bya dang // nags tshal lum bi ni 'khrungs la//
198b4(rgyud): sngags kyi rgyal po 'grub 'gyur zhes// rgyal bas rab sngags brjod pa yin// bya rgod phung po'i ri dang ni// de bzhin sa steng bsil ba'i tshal// grong mchog me tog ces bya dang //
198b5(rgyud): rtag tu de bzhin ka sha dang // bcom brlag kan n+ya ku ba dza dang // sa steng grong ni 'phags rgyal dang // de bzhin yangs pa can mchod rten// mi thi la yi grong khyer sa// grong dang //
198b6(rgyud): grong khyer mchog dang ni// gang gzhan skye bo yang dag 'byung // rab sngags bsod nams yul dag ni// de dag tu ni bsgrub pa bya// de dang gzhan yang yul dag dang // grong
198b7(rgyud): dang ljongs dang ri bor dang // gnas dang grong mchog gtso bo ni// bsod nams gnas la rab brten nas// der ni slong mos rjes 'tsho zhing // bzlas dang sbyin sreg dga' ba dang /
199a1(rgyud): gnas khang bla gab med pa dang // rtag tu khyim ni spong ba la// sngags rnams las ni thams cad la// thog ma nyid du bya ba yin// sngags pas rtag tu yul dbus
199a2(rgyud): su// sngags bzlas mngon par 'dod pas bya// bzlas la rab zhugs rtag tu brtson// sngags rig gtong ba dag la goms// tshul khrims spyod cing shin tu dben// 'byung po/
199a3(rgyud): kun la phan par dga'// sngags spyod pa la dga' ba yi// sdom brtson gyis ni sngags bzlas bya// gtsang zhing gtsang sbra yod phyogs dang // kra klo rkun ma rnam par spangs// sems
199a4(rgyud): can sdig sbrul la sogs pa// spangs pa'i sa phyogs 'dod pa yin// 'bras bu me tog yang dag ldan// dri med rab sngags chu yod par// sngags rig sngags ni bden byas na/
199a5(rgyud): sbyor ba thams cad rab tu 'grub// gzhan yang dur khrod chen po ni// der ni bzlas pa rtag tu bya// dri med chu dang 'bab chu ni// srog chags dag kyang rnam par spangs// der ni de nyid bzla bya ste/
199a6(rgyud): ronyam par gzhag pas sngags bzla bya// 'jig rten spyod pa'i bsod nams min// der ni cung zad mi mthong ste// 'on kyang sngags ni bstan pa yis// cung zad dus ni bsten pa'o// da
199a7(rgyud): tshig tshogs pa'i rgyu ldan na// de las gzhan du'ang 'gro bya ste// der ni dam tshig thob bsten pa// cung zad dus de bzhin du min// de nas gzhan du'ang myur du ni// sngags rig pas ni
199b1(rgyud): ci rus 'gro// bde gshegs mchod rten bzhugs pa yi// sa steng dag la rtag tu brten// 'jig rten mu stegs thams cad ni// lta ba log par ltung ba dang / gzhan
199b2(rgyud): yang stegs su gyur pa rnams// sngags rig pas ni rtag tu spang // rgyu ngan 'gro ba ngan yod par// sngags rig pas ni der mi bsten// gang du rgyal ba mchog bzhugs dang /
199b3(rgyud): sa steng bse ru rang rgyal dang // byang chub sems dpa' skal ba che// nyan thos rgyal ba'i sras dag ni// de dag gnas pa'i phyogs dag tu// zlos pa'i sngags rig ldan pas bsten//
199b4(rgyud): 'bad pas snga ma nyid du ni// gnas de la ni rtag tu spyod// sngags shes cho ga mthong ba yis// yang dang yang du sngags bzlas bya// lus can sdig pa ma lus dag/ bzlas dang /
199b5(rgyud): sbyin sreg dag gis sel// de bas 'bad pa kun gyis ni// mnyam bzhag sngags ni bzla bar bya// las thams cad la gnas 'di dag gsungs pa las sgrub pa mchog gi las kyi
199b6(rgyud): thabs sgrub pa la gnas 'di dag ma rnyed na gang yang rung ba'i gnas de dag tu gtsang sbra byas te/ sngon du bsnyen pa byas la dad cing mos pas sgrub pa'i thabs kyi lam dam pa brtsam par bya ste/ dang
199b7(rgyud): bo re zhig ras ris chen po rub tu bltas pas bzhag ste/ bdag nyid shar du bltos la grog mkhar gyi sa 'am/ gar+b+ha'i klung gi ngogs na yod pa'i sa blangs te/ rtswa u shir dang / tsan dan/
200a1(rgyud): dkar po dang / gur kum dang / ga pur la sogs pa bsre ba bya ste/ rma bya'i gzugs byas la ras ris de'i mdun du gzhag go// ku sha'i rtse mo mnyams pas/
200a2(rgyud): phyogs gtsang mar skyes pa 'khor lo'i gzugs su bya ste/ ras ris kyi mdun du lag pa g.yas pas bzung zhing lag pa g.yon pas rma bya gzung la/ yang de'i zla ba nya ba'i mtshan mo ras
200a3(rgyud): ris la mchod pa chen po byas te/ ga pur dang tsan dan gyi dud pa bsregs la nam langs kyi bar du bzlas pa byasar/ de nas nyi ma shar ba'i dus su lha'i rang bzhin gyi rma ba ni rma bya chen po'i rgyal mo
200a4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// 'khor lo ni kun tu 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / bdag nyid kyang lha'i lus su 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i 'phreng ba dang / gos dang / rgyan gyis brgyan par 'gyur ro// nyi ma shar ba dang /
200a5(rgyud): 'dra ba'i 'dod pa'i gzugs 'dzes par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la phyag byas nas ras ris la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas la/ ras ris blangs te rma bya'i stan
200a6(rgyud): de la 'dug na yud tsam gyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gnon par 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba khri phrag brgya stong gi 'khor du ma dang ldan pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// bar
200a7(rgyud): gyi bskal pa drug cung 'tshe bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar 'dod par 'gro zhing spyod par 'gyur ro// 'gro ba la thogs pa med pa dang / lha'i phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur ro// 'phags
200b1(rgyud): pa 'jam dpal yang mngon sum du 'gyur zhing / de nyid 'di'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'gyur ro// mthar yang sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du dbyig pa dang / smye
200b2(rgyud): thugs dang / tshangs skud dang / ldeng ros dang / gi'u wang dang / ral gri dang / lcags mda' dang / mtshon rtse gcig pa dang / dgra sta dang / mtshon rnam pa sna tshogs kyi khyad
200b3(rgyud): ba sa'i rang bzhin nam/ rkang gnyis dang / rkang bzhi dang / bya dang / bzhon pa'i bye brag seng ge dang / stag dang / dom la sogs pa 'am/ grog mkhar gyi sa'i rang bzhin dri
200b4(rgyud): zhim po'i dris bsres pa las gdan dang / bzhon pa dang / gnas mal dang / gdugs dkar po dang / cod pan dang / rgyan gyi bye brag thams cad dang / rin po che'i bye brag thams cad
200b5(rgyud): dang / rab tu byung ba'i yo byad kyi bye brag 'phreng ba dang / lham dang / shing lham dang / lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / 'khar gsil dang / khab dang / gri la sogs pa lcags khyad
200b6(rgyud): par can gyi rang bzhin nam/ gzhan yang gang cung zad sems can gyi yo byad snod la sogs pa lpags bzang po'i rang bzhin nam/ grog mkhar gyi sa 'am/ chu bo'i ngogs kyi sa las byas
200b7(rgyud): pa de dag thams cad pa'i rnam lngas bkrus pa 'am/ chus gtor ba tsam byas la/ snga ma bzhin du yongs su dag par byed pa'i sngags sam/ yi ge gcig pa'i sngags sam/ gzhan gang
201a1(rgyud): yang rung ba'i sngags cho ga'i rgyal po sgrub pa'i thabs kyi sngags ma gtogs pas lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas te/ nges 'dod pa bdag cad bsrub/
201a2(rgyud): byas pa dang / grogs po'ang yongs su bskyab pa byas pa dang / shin tu gsang ba'i sngags dang rgyud shes pa/ sngar bstan pa'i gnas dag tu ngas ris rab tu bltas pas bzhag la bdag nyid
201a3(rgyud): ma bzhin du byas te/ ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas/ ras ris chen po la ga pur gyis bdugs te/ sngang bstan pa'i mtshon dang / yid byad dang / sems can gyi khyad par
201a4(rgyud): sngar bstan pa'i bcos mar byas pa la/ yang ngo'i zla ba nya ba'i mtshan mo gong ma'i rdzas gang yang rung ba de dag blangs te/ mtshan mo nyi ma shar ba'i dus kyi bar du bzla bar bya'o// bar 'dir
201a5(rgyud): 'od chen po'i 'phreng ba ras ris la yang dag par mthong la/ gal te bzhon pa'i khyad par sgrub pa pos gzung bar 'gyur na ni/ de la zhon nas ji ltar 'dod par 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gal
201a6(rgyud): te rgyun gyi khyad par ram/ mtshon gyi khyad par de blangs pas de bcangs na/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor lo 'dzin par 'gyur te/ ji ltar 'dod par 'gro zhing lha'i gzugs dang ldan pa dang
201a7(rgyud): tsam shar ba dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba dang / 'od kyi 'phreng ba chen po dang ldan pa dang / lus shin tu gsal bar 'gyur ba dang / reg pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi mnga' bdag tu 'gyur ro//
201b1(rgyud): ring du 'tsho zhing bskal pa chen por gnas pa dang / rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba khri phrag brgya stong gi 'khor du ma dang ldan pa dang / lha'i nor bu rin po ri'i gzhal med khang la spyod pa dang
201b2(rgyud): bzhon pa gang sngar yongs su brtags pa sa'i rang bzhin grub na de nyid 'dir mthu chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ bzhon pa de nyid 'dir grogs por 'gyur ba dang / gzhan gyi sngags
201b3(rgyud): 'gugs par byed pa/ grub pa rnams kyi sten pa'i gnas su gyur pa/ bdag gi sngags kyi grub pa la yang dag par sbyor bar byed pa/ byams pa'i bdag nyid dang phan par 'dod pas
201b4(rgyud): rab tu 'brel pa gang 'di nyid kyi mtshon dang / rgyan dang / rin po che'i khyad par dang / stan dang / gnas mal dang / sems can la sogs pa nyid 'di la srung ba chen po nyid dang
201b5(rgyud): ba dang / sred pa la rtag tu 'brang bar 'gyur ro// mthu chen po dang / brtson 'grus chen po dang / lus chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mngon sum du
201b6(rgyud): mthong bar 'gyur zhing / legs so zhes bya ba'ang sbyin par mdzad la/ skye bo la reg par mdzad cing / byang chub kyi snying po ma thob kyi bar du dge ba'i bshes gnyen du sgrub par mdza/
201b7(rgyud): do// / stobs bcu nyid kyang nges par thob par mdzad cing / sems can thams cad zil gyis gnon cing mchod par yang 'gyur ro// 'byung po thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro//
202a1(rgyud): yang dag pa'i rgyud kyi mtha' gcod pa med par 'gyur ba dang / sa thob par 'gyur ba dang / stobs bcu dang byang chub sems dpa'i sa nges par thob par 'gyur te/ mdong /
202a2(rgyud): na las dam pa thams cad gnas dam pa dag tu gnas nas ras ris dam pa dag gi mdun du mchod pa dam pa mngon par dga' bas las dam pa gzhan dag khor bya'o// rig pa 'dzin pa nyid du
202a3(rgyud): nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su zhugs pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga nyid dang / sa dang / sngags thob pa nyid dang / lus 'di nyid kyis 'jig rten/
202a4(rgyud): gyi khams dag tu 'gro ba nyid dang / stobs bcu'i rgyud yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang / 'phags pa 'jab dpal mngon sum du mthong ba nyid kyi phyir dang 'bras bu yod par
202a5(rgyud): mthong ba'i chos sor pa mnyan pa'i phyir dang / sangs rgyas kyi gdung rgyur mi gcad pa'i phyir dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mthar gyis rjes su thob pa nyid kyi phyir dang / chos kyi sprin
202a6(rgyud): las byung ba'i sngags bzang po la 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir dang nyon mongs pa bslab pa dang / bdud ni'i rir gyis con mongs pa'i bar bya ba'i phyir dang / 'jig rten rjes su gdung
202a7(rgyud): ba la rab tu 'jug par rjes su sgrub pa nyid kyi phyi dang // de bzhin du chos kyi tshul gzung ba'i phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung da yod par bya ba'i phying dang / sngags kyim pa sa/
202b1(rgyud): kyi sgrub pa'i cho ga rab tu gsang ba nyid kyi phyir dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi bdag nyid chen po
202b2(rgyud): 'byung ba'i phyir dang / cho ga'i rgyal po rab 'byams sngags kyi mthu dang rab tu rnam par ldan pa 'di ras ris chen po'i mdun du nye bar gnas la sgrus par bya ste/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten
202b3(rgyud): las 'das pa'i sngags kyi cho ga dang / sngags rgyud thams cad kyi cho ga'i lam gyi ste/ mdor na 'dir cho ga gzhan du gsungs pa'i las kyis kyang cho ga'i rgyal po 'di bsgrub par
202b4(rgyud): ste/ myur du de dag gi sngags rnams 'grub par 'gyur te/ gang ngas bstan pa de dag nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod pal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas
202b5(rgyud): ba'i mdo las// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga bcu pa ras ris chen po'i cho ga'i le'u rab 'byams rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/
202b6(rgyud): yang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyi ras ris bar ma'i cho ga gzhan sgrub pa'i thabs kyi/
202b7(rgyud): cho ga yod de/ mdor bsdus ras bshad kyis/ de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas bshad do// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
203a1(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten la thugs brdzi ba dang / ston pa sems can thams cad la phan par dgyes pa dang / bdag cag la thug
203a2(rgyud): brtse ba'i phyir dang / ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams la gzigs nas de'i dus la bab pa mkhyen na de bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'ong /
203a3(rgyud): skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal nyon cig/ dang por re zhig tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs dang / gtsang sbra'i spyod pa dang / nges par sdom pa dang / bzlas pa dang /
203a4(rgyud): sbyin sreg dang / bsam gtan dang / cho ga gang du legs par rab tu gnas pa la sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa sgrub pa'i las 'bras bu dang bcas shing don yod par 'gyur te/
203a5(rgyud): sngags thams cad kyi sbyor ba 'grub par 'gyur ro// ngas bshad pa de gang zhes na/ gzhon nu nyon cig/ dang por re zhig rig pa dang / brtul zhugs dang / tshul khrims
203a6(rgyud): kyi yid ram dang po nyid du blang bar byas la/ dang po re zhig dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis bstan pa'i dam tshig khyod kyi cho ga'i rgyal por bstan cing sngang bshad pa la rjes su 'jug
203a7(rgyud): par bya'o// blo gsal ba/ yid gzhungs pa dang ldan pa/ slob dpon du dbang bskur ba/ khyod kyis bstan pa'i cho ga shes pa/ dge ba/ gsal ba'i chos dang ldan pa/ bden par
203b1(rgyud): smra ba/ spo ba chen po dang ldan pa/ byas pa gzo ba/ yid gzungs pa dang ldan pa/ 'dris brtan pa/ ha cang ri rgad/ ha cang mi gzhon pa/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti la chags pa med pa
203b2(rgyud): tshangs par spyod pa/ snying rje dang ldan pa/ rnyed pa tsam par/ longs spyod kyi rgyu tsam mar/ rjes su chags pa'i rgyur yang brdzur mi sngan/ cung zad tsam ma ma/ chags pa 'am
203b3(rgyud): rmongs pa tsam gyi rnam pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ dam bcas pa brtan pa dang / sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa dang / sring rje dang ldan pa dang / tshul khrims dang
203b4(rgyud): ldan pa dang / sngon du spyad pa byas pa dang / khyod kyi gsang ba'i sngags rjes su zlos pa dang / snga ma nyid du rig pa goms par byas pa dang / khyod kyi dkyil 'khor la mthar
203b5(rgyud): gyis yang dag par zhugs pa dang / 'jig rten shes pa dang / chog shes pa dang / yang dag par rjes su 'dzin par byed pa dang / 'bras bu dang ldan zhing mkhas pa dang / legs
203b6(rgyud): pa la rab tu zhugs pa dang / gzugs mdzes pa dang / 'dod pa med pa dang / chags pa med pa dang / dpa' ba dang / brtson 'grus brtan pa dang / nad med pa ste/ nad
203b7(rgyud): gang gis las mi rus pa'i ngang tshul can gyi nad med pa dang / rigs mthor por skye ba'o// yon tan de dag dang ldan na ni dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon du 'gyur la sgrub pa po'ang de dang
204a1(rgyud): mnyam pa ste/ yan lag lhag pa'am mtshung ba cung zad kyang med pa'o// de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon la mchod pa byas shing don du gnyer bar byas
204a2(rgyud): slob dpon dang lhan cig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i dam tshig la rjes su 'jug par 'tshal na/ slob dpon gyis bdag la thugs
204a3(rgyud): brtse ba'i slad du phan pa'i thugs dang / brtse ba'i thugs kyis de bshad du gsol/ de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon des sngar bstan pa'i tsho gas slob ma la snga ma ji lta ba bzhin du brtags
204a4(rgyud): nas rab tu gzhug par bya ste/ sngar ji ltar dbang bskur ba bzhin du phyis kyang sbyin par bya'o// go rims ji lta ba bzhin du dam tshig bskrun te/ gsang ba'i phyag rgya dang / rgyud dang
204a5(rgyud): sngags dang / las kyang dus ring po nyid nas nges par brtags te/ bsam pa shes nas bstan par bya ste/ sngags la sogs pa'i las rnams kyang thams cad du gzhan du ma yin no/
204a6(rgyud): zhes cho ga 'di ltar bstan pa yin no// de nas slob pas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpor la ci nus pas gang gis slob dpor dgyes pa bdag dang longs spyod rab tu dbul bar bya'o//
204a7(rgyud): nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon des bu'i 'du shes nye bar gzhag par bya ste/ bu bzhin du bsgrub par bya zhing ma bzhin du'ang longs spyod kyis nye bar bsdu bar bya'o// de nas
204b1(rgyud): sgrub pa po des sngags gang yang rung ba bzung ste/ gcig pu dper par song nas sngar bstan pa gong ma bzhin du rgya cher skur te/ de dag nyid kyis sngags dag gis ni spur drang ba dang
204b2(rgyud): gshegs su gsol ba dang / mar me dang / dri dang / bdug pa dang / gtor ma dang / lha bshos dkyil 'khor la gsungs pa nyid kyi tsho gas rgya cher byas te/ spyan drangs nas
204b3(rgyud): gdan dang mchod yod phul la/ dus 'tshams gsum du khrus lan gsum bya zhing gos gsum brje zhing nyin re bzhin du bzlas pa bya'o// de la dus gsum zhes bya ba ni mtshan mo'i mtha'
204b4(rgyud): nas brtsams pa yin te/ zung tsam nas nyi ma 'char ba'i bar 'dir dang po'i dus su brjod do// nyi ma'i gung ni nyi ma gnyis ka'i gung tsam gyi tshad du nam mkha' la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i
204b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la ni nyi ma gung gi dus zhes brjod do// nyi ma nub pa'i dus su lhag ma zung tsam lus pa'i dus gsum pa zhes brjod do// tshul khrims brtul zhugs yang dag lda
204b6(rgyud): slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dang // mthon po'i rigs su skyes pa dang // rnam pa kun tu brtson 'grus brtan// sngags rgyud dag la mngon brtson dang // bya ba kun la blo gros dag
204b7(rgyud): zhib cing mkhas la mchog shes dang // chos kyi dbyings ni rtog tu 'dzin// spro ba che zhing gzi brjid re// 'jig rten chos la ltos pa med// thub mchog chos la dad pa dang //
205a1(rgyud): 'jig rten na ni yongs su bsngags// dben pa shes shing bzlas pa byed// sngon du bsnyen pas rjes bsnyen rnyed// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi sngags shes/
205a2(rgyud): shing // mthong bas nges 'dzin de mchog byed// sangs rgyas gsungs pa'i sngags rnams la// 'jig rten pa yi sbyor ba shes// srung byed mthu ni brtan pa dang // rtag tu gtsang sbra'i/
205a3(rgyud): spyod pa dga'// sangs rgyas bstan pa'i la ba la ni// thams cad du ni 'jug par byed// rab sngags rgyal bas bstod pa yi// sngags zlos pa la brtson par byed// las
205a4(rgyud): 'bras dag la rtag yid ches// 'jig rten pha rol de bzhin no// sdig pa kun la 'jigs byed pa// shin tu phra ba'ang de bzhin no// gtsang zhing grims dang le lo med// yid
205a5(rgyud): gzhung blta ra sdug pa dang // stobs bcu ldan pas sngags bshad dang // de bzhin rgyal ba'i sras dang ni// gang dag 'jig rten sngags dag dang // rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs dag gis//
205a6(rgyud): kha rtag tu brtson byed dang // gzhung dang bstan bcos don klog pa// nad med pa dang stobs ldan dang // rgas dang gzhon pa rnam par spangs// sngags grub de bzhin shes nyen can// kun nas/
205a7(rgyud): myur du byed pa dang // las mtha' mi ring nga rgyal chung // zung tsam gyis go khyad par can// tshangs par spyod cing shes rab che// gcig pu 'dre bar mi byed dang // 'jam dpal gyis
205b1(rgyud): gsungs rgyud dag la// dbang bskur thob cing dpa' ba dang // bzlas pa'i mthar byas ldan pa dang // de bzhin rig pa goms byas dang // sems dpa' me ning 'jig rten shes// 'gro/
205b2(rgyud): ba'i de nyid rjes sems dang // legs pa'i lam nyid rab sbyar byed// sbyin byed 'byung po phan la dga'// khyad par can de slob dpon la// rtag tu don du gnyer bar bya// dkyil 'khor des ni
205b3(rgyud): bris pa la// sngags rnams 'grub pa ster bar 'gyur// de nyid kyi ni dbang bskur na// 'bras bu chen po ster bar 'gyur// grub pa 'dod pa'i slob mas kyang // thub mchog de ni rtag tu mchog
205b4(rgyud): de yi bka' ni mi bgom par// slob mas 'bad nas bya ba yin// ji ltar 'byor pa yod pa bzhin// longs spyod de la sbyin par bya// nyung ba'ang yang na mang ba'ang rung // gang gis dga'/
205b5(rgyud): ba thob 'gyur ba// lus dang srog gi don phyir ni// nor ni ji ltar sbyin pa bzhin// slob ma chos rig de bzhin du// slob dpon phyir ni nor sbyin na// tshe dang nad med de bzhin du// grags pa
205b6(rgyud): thob par 'gyur ba yin// slob mas bla ma de mchod na// dag pa'i 'gro ba thob par 'gyur// lam ni sna tshogs nyer bstan pas// de la sngags ni 'grub par 'gyur// de la bsten
205b7(rgyud): dang bsnyen bkur byas// ri mo byas dang mchod pas ni// sangs rgyas rnams dang de bzhin du// rgyal ba'i sras rnams mnyes par 'gyur// bla ma rtag tu bsnyen bkur na// lha
206a1(rgyud): rnams thams cad dga' bar 'gyur// tham sngags rnams mthong ba yis// de lta thams cad bskrun pa yin// sgrub pa po na dang po ya / @
206a2(rgyud): la ni 'jug par bya// dma' ba'ang de dang mnyam pa'ang rung // gal te khyad par mya na yang // rmongs pa'am lkug pa yin yang rung // rtag tu tham brnyas mibya// ji skad
206a3(rgyud): de nyid rjes mthong la// sngags grub pa la bya ba yin// sngar bstan pa yi slob ma yis// de la phrag dog bya ba min// lus can brtse ba 'phel byed pa// mig ni gang la yod/
206a4(rgyud): gyur pa// de ni slob ma nyid bya ste// slob dpon rgyar yang bya ba yin// gang du phan tshun rgyun la ni// brtse ba'i 'phreng ba yod pa dang // brtse ba'i rgyud ni 'dzin pa la/
206a5(rgyud): de la sngags ni sbyin par bya// slob dpon la ni slob ma'am// bla mas slob ma mthong ba'ang rung // rtag tu spro bar 'gyur ba la// gnyis ka la ni grub pa gnas// de dag/
206a6(rgyud): la ni rtag tu yang // sngags spyod lam ni bstan par bya// gnyis kas pa dang bur shes la// sngags ni 'bras bcas gnas pa yin// slob ma bla mas rtag tu ni//
206a7(rgyud): brtan dang dga' ba de bzhin thob// bu ni chos dang rjes mthun la// 'bad pas rtag tu bsrung bar bya// de dag la ni sangs rgyas chos// rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur//
206b1(rgyud): gal te de med mgon bral la// sngags rnams ji skad gsungs pa sbyid// sems can dbul po rnams la ni// khyad par du yang sngags byinan// sems car/
206b2(rgyud): kun la'ang sbyin pa bas// sngags kyi spyod pa khyad par 'phags// mchog dang bar ma tha ma ni// dus rnams kun tu bya ba ste// rtag tu sems can kun la ni// rjes
206b3(rgyud): su gzung ba'i phyir bya'o// 'gro ba'ang skye ga ras rnams brtags nas// 'dod pa dag la sbyin par bya// de ni ji ltar 'dod pa'i sngags// slob mas de la blang bar bya//
206b4(rgyud): de nyid kyis bstan lam yin te// gzhan du ngo lta ma yin no// 'jig rten pha rol pa la ni// grub pa de las bslang bar bya// pa bzhin mgo bos phyag byas nas// de nas ji ltar/
206b5(rgyud): 'dod bzhin 'gro// de nas gcig pu 'gro byas nas// mnyam par bzhag ste bzlas pa bya// sdong mo slong bas rjes 'tsho zhing // thub pa dus gsum zlos par byed// sngar ni ji
206b6(rgyud): ltar bstan pa bzhir// lam du rab tu 'jug par byed// de la rjes 'jug bsten pa dang // 'dug pa dang ni gnas pa'o// dben pa chen po ri rtsa dang // de bzhin chu bo'i ngogs
206b7(rgyud): gtsang dang // ba lang gnas dang mtsho cher dang // dben pa skye bo rnam spangs dang // lha khang stong dang shing dang ni// mtshan gcig ri ni mthon po dang // rgya mtsho che ngogs dga' ba dang / gling
207a1(rgyud): rnams chen po dag dang ni// rnam pa sna tshogs sngar bstan pa'i// yul ni yid du 'ong ba dang // 'di dag las ni phyogs gzhan du// mnyam pa zhag sngags ni
207a2(rgyud): bzla par bya// grogs po mtshan nyid ldan pa 'i/ sngags dor lugs dang tshad mar ldan// zur gyi rnam pa de nyid shes// bdag dang de yang 'dra ba'o// dpa' zhing g.yul las rnam
207a3(rgyud): rgyal dang // snying stobs tshe zhing bzod dang ldan// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i bstan pa dang / sngags kyi spyod pa la dad cing // sngags pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan la/ bzod dang ldan pa'i
207a4(rgyud): grogs po la// de la 'bad pa med par ri// sngags kyi las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// tho rangs ma la nas langs nas ni// mtsho chen las byung chu bo las// byang chub srog chag/
207a5(rgyud): skyon med pa'i// bzang pos khrus ni rab tu bya// sa dang lci ba phye ma yis// sngags shes pas ni lus dril bya// sngags kyis de bzhin dag byas pa'i// dri med gtsang
207a6(rgyud): sbas byas pa'i chus// sngags ldan bdag nyid khrus bya zhing // ha cang ring bar 'dug mi bya// de rnams langs nas chu ngogs 'dug/ sa dag gi kyang lag gnyis bkru/
207a7(rgyud): bdun dang bdun dang yang bdun ri// nyi shu rtsa gcig bar du'o// de bzhin du yang nye reg bya// so shing dag kyang yang dag spyar// so shing rnam par bor nas ni// de nas skyob la
207b1(rgyud): phyag kyang bya// 'jig rten mgon la phyag 'tshal nas// mchod pa yid du 'ong bar bya// rnam pa sna tshogs mchod bstod dang // yang dag bstod pa yang yang bya// dri zhim me tog/
207b2(rgyud): de bzhin du// ston la zlos pas mchod yon dbul// sangs rgyas rnams dang de spo ba la// spyi bos rab btud phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten mgon po de dag gi/ mdun du sdig
207b3(rgyud): pa bshags par bya// ras ris bar ma'i mdun du ni/ bdag nyid dag kyang dbul bar bya// ku sha'i khres ni byas pa der// legs par mnyam bzhag 'dug nas ni// des ni 'phreng ba
207b4(rgyud): thogs nas su// 'bad pas bzlas pa bya ba yin// ji ltar rnyed pa'i sngags kyis bya// de tshe sngags gzhan bzlas mi bya// ha cang ngan pa spang bya ste// ha cang bzang po'ang de bzhin no// bar
207b5(rgyud): ma bar ma'i las dag la// sdom chen sngags ni rtag tu bzla/ ha cang skad mtho na 'bad pas spang // tshig ni dma' ba'ang ma yin no// bar ma dbus kyi yul dag tu// rjes mthun rgyal
207b6(rgyud): bas sngags pa'o// ha cang skad mtho dma' ba'ang yin/ khar mas rtag tu bzlas pa bya// sangs rgyas snga ma kun gyis ni// tshig ni legs ldan yin zhes gsungs// rtag tu gzhan
207b7(rgyud): gyi rna lam dang // gzhan gyi drung du mi bzla'o// dben pa'i phyogs su'ang bdag rig pas// sngags kyang bar ma bzla bar bya// de ltar sngags bzlas rab sbyar na// sngags ni gang yang
208a1(rgyud): myur du 'grub// bar ma'i sngags ni 'grub 'dod na// yang dang yang du bzlas pa bya// de bas bzlas pa rnam bral dang // sngags kyi de nyid don legs thos
208a2(rgyud): dper zhing gdung ba med par ni// zlog pas sngags ni bzla bar bya// mtshan mo yi ni bzhi cha dang // de byed de bzhin phyed nyid dang // skya rengs dmar po zung tsam la// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
208a3(rgyud): 'char ba la// dang po bar ma nyid du ni// thub pa mchog gis gsungs pa yin// zung tsam khru ni bzhi pa ste/ bar mar yongs su bsgrags pa yin// de nas nyi ma byed shar na/
208a4(rgyud): sngags bzlas de tshe spang bar bya// sngags bzlas de tshe btang ba na// sdom brtson mchod yon slar gshegs gsol// de tshe btang ba'i lhag dus la// thub pa'i bstan la dag pa bya//
208a5(rgyud): dam chos bkla ga la sogs pa ri// shes rab pha rol phyin la sogs// glegs bam sa bcu zhes bya ba// mchod dang bklag pa rtag tu bya// de nas dus la bab gyur na/
208a6(rgyud): grags sngags kyi da da/ thu / du dang da / sa su sa spyad
208a7(rgyud): thul// chos can sgrub la brtson pa dang // sangs rgyas bstan la rab tu dang // mi spu grong gi nang du 'dug/ rtag tu gtsang sbra srid la dga'// chos ldan sems can khyim dum/
208b1(rgyud): slong dus rtag zlog byed cing 'dug/ srog chags med chos grub pa yi// zas ni gtsang bar grags pa dang // yang dag lta ba'i khyim dag dang // sangs rgyas bstan la dad pa
208b2(rgyud): yi// de 'dra'i khyim la rtag tu ni// slong ba'i don du slong mo blang // ji ltar dpa' bos go bgos te// nyam nga'i yul du 'jug pa na// rtag tu dgra ni 'joms byed de// dgra yis
208b3(rgyud): 'joms kyang mi nus pa// de bzhin sngags pa rtag grong du// slong mo'i 'tshe bas 'jug pa na// gzugs sgra la sogs bzang po ni// de ltar mthong bas chags gyur na//
208b4(rgyud): 'dod chags zhi ba'i don gyi phyir// dge ba mi gtsang ba sgom par bya// lang tshe'i rnam pas brgyan pa yi// bud med gzugs ni mthong bar// mi gtsang dri ngan bsgom bya zhing //
208b5(rgyud): shin tu smad pa rnag dang gcin// srin bus zos dang dur khrod gnas// lus ni mi rtag sdug bsngal yin// byis pa sngags la rmongs pa yis// 'gro ba lnga po dag tu 'khor/
208b6(rgyud): las kyi skud pas bcings ras ni// yun ring dus su mya ngan byed// mi shis sgrib pas rmongs pa na// dmus long sdug bsngal rgyu yang yin// gang du blo ni phyin ci log/ skye bo
208b7(rgyud): chags pas 'phongs par gyur// rnam pa sna tshogs las gar gyi// rnam pa du mar chags byed pas// yun ring res kyis gnas nas ni// 'gro dang 'ong bar spyod par byed
209a1(rgyud): gar byed bzhin du spyod pa yis// zan bzhin du ni gtong bar byed// mi gtsang dga' ba'i sems can gang // yun ring lam du 'phongs par 'gyur/ 'khor ba'i
209a2(rgyud): rgya mtsho'i chu 'byung ba// zo chun gyi ni rnam pa bzhin// 'gro ba de dag mi bzad pa'i// sdug bsngal chu yis khyab pa yin// sangs rgyas kyis ni bud med dag/ ma 'dres sdug
209a3(rgyud): bsngal rtsa bar gsungs// nyan thos byang chub sems dpa' dang // rang rgyal thub pas de bzhin gsungs// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mi 'khrugs pa// rgya mtsho 'di ni bskum par dga'/
209a4(rgyud): bud med sems kyis bslus pas ni// gang du sems can bying gyur nas// dmyal bdud 'gro'i 'jig rten dang // yi dgas 'jig rten lha ma yin// de bzhin mi yi 'jig rten dang //
209a5(rgyud): lha yi 'gro ba'i 'gro bar 'gro// bud med chags pas bslus pas na// kun nas yongs su 'khor 'gyur zhing // 'dam chen nang du 'bying 'gyur la// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho btson ra yin//
209a6(rgyud): bud med chags pa'i blung po'i mi// rul ba'i ro la wa bzhin no// gang du mi ni chag byed pa// shin tu mi bzad sdug bsngal bzod// dkar po'i chos ni ngas nyams byed// sangs
209a7(rgyud): rgyas bstan la zhugs pas ni/ sdug bsngal 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho nyid// thams cad yongs su zlog byed cing // sngags zlos dga' zhing brtson pa dang // grags pa che zhing
209b1(rgyud): chags dang bral// gzi brjid ldan zhing kun dang mdza'// de dag la ni sdug bsngal med// yang dag sdom dang tshangs bden shes// bla ma lha la mchod byed dang // ma dang pa la gus pa
209b2(rgyud): rnams// de dag la ni sdug bsngal med// dam pa'i don la brten ras ni// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong pa dang // de bzhin dbyig dug zug rngu bzhin// zlos pa bud med lus bas pa bya/
209b3(rgyud): blo ngan phung po'i lcags kyung zin// 'khor ba las ni 'byung mi nus// rtag tu bud med tshigs gyur pa// de la grub pa yod pa yin// zlos pa 'di la tshul khrims nyams// de lagrung
209b4(rgyud): ba mchog med cing // grub pa 'bring yang yod med de// grub pa tha ma 'ang yod ma yin// tshul khrims 'tshal la thub dbang gis// sngags grub par ri ma gsungs te// mya ngan 'das
209b5(rgyud): grong 'gro ba yi// yul dang phyogs kyang ma yin no// byis pa ngan pa 'di la ni// sngags grub pa ni ga la yod// skye bo tshul khrims 'aral 'di la// de la bde 'gro ga la yod//
209b6(rgyud): mtho ris su yang mi 'gyur zhing // bde ba mchog tu'ang mi 'gyur na// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i sngags rnams ni// 'grub par 'gyur ba smos ci dgos// ta la'i shing gi mgo bo re// 5
209b7(rgyud): tshe gcad par 'gyur na'ang // sngon po nyid kyi skal med na// myu gu nam zhig 'byung bar 'gyur// de bzhin sngags grub rmongs pa dang // tshul khrims nyams shing sdig las byed// rtag tu
210a1(rgyud): bud med chags pa la/ 'di ni rab tu bstan pa yin// mi dge'i bshes gnyen bsten pa la// sngags kyi rgyal po ga la 'grub// de bas dul dang rtag zlas
210a2(rgyud): byed// bud med skyon ni rnam spyod la// de la chags pa rnam spangs la// de la grub par brjod pa yin// byis pa bud med la brgyal ba// gzhan la grub pa bstan pa mim/ rdo ldar
210a3(rgyud): g.yeng ba med la dga'// gtsang zhing ma chags shes nyen can// rigs mtho brtan dang dpa' ba dang / brtser ldan mthong na dga' ba dang // chos dang chos min rnam dpyod shes//
210a4(rgyud): de la grub pa rnyed mi dka'// de ltar sngags shes zhugs pa ri// grong du srong phyir rab tu 'jug/ sngar ni btags pa'i gnas dag tu// ji ltar 'dod bzhin song nas ni/ blo ldan dag
210a5(rgyud): pas bsrung ba'i snod// gtsang ba'i phyogs su yang dag gzhag/ phyi rol song nas rkang gnyis bkru// de nas yang ni yan lag ste// de tshe srog chags med pa'i chus// lag pa ga
210a6(rgyud): pas byin pa g.yas// lag pa g.yon pas byin pa g.yor// yang na gnyis ka dus gcig bkru// sa ni lag g.yor yang bzhag nas// sngar ni yang dag bzhag pa yi// bdug pa
210a7(rgyud): gtsang ba'i sa dag gis// lag pa gnyis ni rab tu bkru// de nas sngags kyis dag byas po'i// dri med gtsang sbra dag sdod la// ba ni ser skya sa bor ba yi// lci ba gsar pa blang bar
210b1(rgyud): srog chags med pa'i chu sbyang bas// ston pa la ni dkyil 'khor bya// dang po thub pa mchog la ni// khor yug khru gang tsam du bya// gnyis pa rang sngags mgon po la// gsum pa
210b2(rgyud): rang rigs lha la'o// sngags pa bzlas pa gang byed pa// rtag tu'ang de nyid bya ba yin// yang ni sems can thams cad kyi// longs spyod phyi ni bstan pa yin// g.yas su 'jig rten
210b3(rgyud): mgon po yi// dkyil 'khor 'dini rtag tu bya// dkon mchog gsum gyi dkyil 'khor ni// gru ba ni dag tu bya ba yin// gnyis pa rang sangs rgyasu rnams la// gsum pa stobs bcu
210b4(rgyud): ldan pa'i sras// dkyil 'khor bdun po 'di dag ni// kun nas gru bzhir bya ba yin// khru gang ngam ni khru byed du// nyin re zhing ni bya ba yin// sdig pa 'jig byed bzlas pa ri// dben/
210b5(rgyud): pa'i phyogs su nyin rebya// sngags pa de nas langs nas ni// 'bad pas lag gnyis rab tu bkru// gtsang ba'i chu yis te reg bya// dag cing srog chags spangs pa yin// dri med/
210b6(rgyud): gtsang sbras 'bad nas ni// gtsang ba'i snod ni de tshe brang // mtsho chen dang ni 'bab chu'am// chu mig chu bo la gnas dang // gtsang ba'i phyogs nas byung ba yi// sems can dag pa las
210b7(rgyud): blangs la// gnyis sam gsum du rtag tu yang // sngags pas che reg bya ba yon// de nas chu reg gdong dang ni// de bzhin du ni na khung dag/ mig dang snga dang lag gnyis dang
211a1(rgyud): spyi bo lte ba'i phyogs reg bya// dge ba spyod pas lan lnga 'am bdun// ro ga ji bzhin thams cad bya// gtsang sbra'i spyod pa legs ldan pas// zlos pa gtsang
211a2(rgyud): par gyur pa yis// slong snod yang dag blangs nas ni// chu yi ge zhir ni 'gro bar bya// gang du chu yi rgyun 'bab gnas// de bzhin du ni chu mig dang / chu bo rab tu 'bab pa la//
211a3(rgyud): rtag tu zas ni bkru bar bya// gtsug lag khang ngam gnas khang du// de nas langs nas 'gro bar bya// gang du sngon ni brten pa dang // gang du gnas pa der 'gro bya// de nas rjes
211a4(rgyud): pas lhung bzed de// song nas phyogs ni der gzhag bya// de nas nye reg myur byas nas// de bzhin yang ni lhung bzed blang // lhung bzed sa 'am lo ma'am// dngul dang gser
211a5(rgyud): gyi snod dang ni// zangs ma shing shun dag kyang rung // ston pa la ni dbul bar bya// stod pa la ni bshos phul nas// rang sngags sngags kyi rgyal po'ang brjod// 'gro na zhig sdug
211a6(rgyud): bsngal gyur 'ong na// ci nus par ni sbyin par bya// rnam pa kun tu kha zas ni// ha cang mang ba sbyin mi bya// sngags rig lu sa gdung mi bya ste// rnam pa kun tu ci rigs bya// lte
211a7(rgyud): ba'i tshad tsam gzhag bya ste// lhag ma'i zas ni rtag tu sbyin// bkres dang skom pas nyen gyur na// sngags kyi don la rten mi nus// kha zas mang dang nyung zos na// sngags
211b1(rgyud): rnams mnyes par mi nus so// de nyid phyir ni thub dbang gis// sems can zas kyis gnas pa'o zhes// lus can rnams la gsungs pa ste// gang gis mi rnams 'tsho ba dang /
211b2(rgyud): lha dang lha min dri za dang // klu dang gnod sbyin mi 'am ci// srin po yi dgas sha za dang // 'byung po skar ma gza' rnams dag/ gang zhig kha zas mi za ba// de ni gang yang yod ma
211b3(rgyud): yin// rags pa'i zas ni gang yin pa// kham gyi zas su rnam par bsgrags// sems can phra ba'i zas can yang // de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis gsungs// bsam
