275b7(rgyud): gi 'gro ba dang // mi yi 'jig rten gtso bo dag/ de tshe 'gul dang rnam par 'jig/ mtshan po'i thun ni dang po la// gal te sa ni 'gul gyur na// sems can 'dres pa sna tshogs dang // dud coM/
276a1(rgyud): skye gnas rnams su ri// mi ni 'jig rten gtse rnams su// rang chen rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur// cung zad thun de bri gyur la// sa ni 'gul bar gyur pa yin// de tshe
276a2(rgyud): rtags de snang gyur na// rlung dang char pa'i 'jigs chen 'byung // de nas thun de zad pa'i mthar// 'gul snang las ni mi bzad pa// nub phyogs mi yi bdag po yi// pha rol dmag
276a3(rgyud): tshogs 'byung bar shes// thun ni gnyis pa dang po la// gal te sa ni 'gul 'byung gyur// gzhan gyi dmag tshogs nad dang 'chi// khong pa'i nad ni mi bzad 'byung // mkhris pa bad kan las
276a4(rgyud): gyur nad// skye bo rnams la 'byung bar 'gyur// 'byung po rnams ni skyo 'gyur zhing // de tshe phyogs dang phyogs su 'gro// de nas gnyis pa'i thun dkyil du// sa ni rab tu 'gul byung na// rlung
276a5(rgyud): chen 'byung bar shes bya ste// shing dang lha khang 'gyel bar 'gyur// yang thog rab ri rnams kyi// rtse mo 'jig par the tsom med// gnas dang 'dug gnas bzang po dang // khang pa dang ni rtang
276a6(rgyud): dang // dud 'gro rnams kyi 'dug gnas kyang // sa la byung du ltung bar 'gyur// de nas mtshan phyed dus dag tu// gal te sa ni 'gul ba 'byung // de tshe shar phyogs yul gyi bdag/ mi
276a7(rgyud): mchog gtso bo 'chi ba 'am// de'u 'chi bar 'gyur ba 'am// mu ge 'byung bar rab tu ston// bar ma'i thun ni bri gyur nas// tha mar nye la 'gul ba byung // sa rnams dag nem lus la// mi ning
276b1(rgyud): nad med nges par ston// de nas mtshan phyed mthar gyur la// gal te sa ni 'gul bar snang // gsher che yul gyi dbus dag tu// mi yi bdag po nad kyis gnod// phan tshun mi mthun gyur/
276b2(rgyud): nas ni// sdug bsngal mi bzad 'chi bar 'gyur// thun ni gsum par phyin nas 'gul// byis pa rnams la bde ba 'byung // sbrang bu sha sbrang phye le ba dang // rkun po rnams ni 'jig par
276b3(rgyud): 'jug/ tho rangs 'gul bar gyur na ni// tshe rings nad med lo legs byed// grong khyer gyi ni khor yug dag/ me yis 'tshig par shes par bya// nyi ma 'chang ba'i dus dag tu// sa ni
276b4(rgyud): rab tu 'gul ba 'byung // dbus kyi yul ni thams cad du// rkun mas rnam par 'tshe bar 'gyur// de tshe zhag ni bdun dag las// rgyal po 'chi bar sdang ba yin// gang du stobs ni rab/
276b5(rgyud): che ba/ sa ni 'gul bar gyur pa yin// de tshe gnas ni de dag tu// dge dang mi dge'i sbyor ba snang // skar mnga' gnam grums 'gul ni// skar mda' dkar po 'bar 'byung na// des ni sngar
276b6(rgyud): bstan sel bar byed// de bzhin dkar mdog rtag tu ni// dge zhing rab tu bsngags pa yin// mi bzad chen po kha dog dmar// me yis 'tshig par nye bar ston// dud kha'i mdog nag/
276b7(rgyud): nag po ni// rgyal po 'chi bar ston pa yin// ser ba'am yang na ser skya 'am// 'dres pa'i mdog ni snang gyur na// de tshe 'dres pa'i las 'gyur ba// skar mda' ltung bas rnam par ston//
277a1(rgyud): gnam grum nyid du bstan pa ni// gar 'byung don ston pa ste// gal te dbus na de tshe dbus// yul nyid du rab tu bstan// sgra brnyan snyen pa byung ni// bde zhi da /
277a2(rgyud): ston par byed// ma rungs mi bzad 'jig rten du// rnga skra yis ni dge ba sbyin// 'jigs dang 'jigs dung shin tu sgra// der ni mu ge ston pa yin// de la sogs pa sbyor ba ni// rtag tugs
277a3(rgyud): rnams 'dod pa yin// rgyu skad 'di dag mthong ba la// grub pa'i las no de tshe bya// tha skar snang ma nyid dang ni// rgyal dang khrums ni stod smad gnyis// nam gru dang lha mtshams dag
277a4(rgyud): bzlas pa'i dus su rab tu bsngags// 'di dag la ni sngags rnams 'grub// grub pa'i don yang steng bar byed// skad ma dag ni 'di dag la// dkyil 'khor nyid kyang bri bar bya// gza'
277a5(rgyud): yi res kyi gtso bo ni// ser dang dkar bar snang ba yin// tshes ni 'di dag la dge ste// rtag tu zla ba nya ba yin// yul gzhan dag tu 'gro byed dang // dkyil 'khor dag kyang bri bar
277a6(rgyud): bya// dang po gsum pa lnga pa dang // bcu pa dang ni bdun pa dang // bcu gsum pa la ci bde bar// mi yi bdag po 'gro bar brtag/ skye bo kun la dge ba sbyin// chas shing 'gro bar
277a7(rgyud): rab tu bsngags// dkyil 'khor gyi ni sngags rgyud dag/ sngags rnams thams cad mi 'dri'o// 'di dag la ni sngags mi 'grub/ bgegs kyi rgyud ni bstan pa yin/
277b1(rgyud): 'gro dang sbyin sreg grub pa la// chos grangs gapa' ni dam par ldan// phung bu pa sangs za ba dang // gapa' lhag mchog ni las sman la// gapa' mchog 'di dag rtag tu sa
277b2(rgyud): bzhi po chos dang ldan pa ni/ sa steng 'jig rten kur tu ni// 'gro ba'i las ni grub par byed// ma rungs 'chi lhas bral ba y-i// nyi ba la ni brtag par bya// yud tsam/
277b3(rgyud): bcu gnyis kho na ni// de yi dus su rab tu sbyar// dkar dang byams ldan nyid dang ni// mig dmar du yang rab tu bstan// drag po dbang chen dag pa dang / byi bzhin nyid dang legs
277b4(rgyud): mdzes dang // 'khor dang 'khor bar byed pa nyid// dge ba sbyin zhes bstan pa yin// zla ba mchog ni sbyin pa nyid// 'di dag bcu gnyis mtshan nyid yin// yud tsam dag tu
277b5(rgyud): bstan pa ni// nyin zhag sum cu nyid la'o// bcu pa char ni 'bab 'gyur te// bcu bzhi pa ni yul 'khor 'jig/ brgyad pa bcu gnyis pa nyid dang // bzhi pa nyid ni spang ba bya/
277b6(rgyud): myur la sogs pa'i grangs dang ldar// mar ngo la ni mtshan mo yin// lhag ma bgegs ni byed pa yang // log 'dren yin te bzhi pa'o// 'di dag grangs ni ldan pa la// dus
277b7(rgyud): 'di dag tu rab tu bstan// mig ni 'byed dang 'dzum pa dang // se gol myur ba'i 'gros dag ni// 'di dag dus kyi tshad dag ni// rgya cher yang ni bstan par bya// se gong 'argya/
278a1(rgyud): mi tshogs dag la/ ma rgyun gcig tu bstan pa yin// sa rgyun bzhi la chu chod bstar// chu tshod bzhi la thun zhes bya/ thun pa ni lan nyin par te//
278a2(rgyud): mo dag kyang de bzhin bstan// de ltar brgyud dang ldan pa la// nyin mtshan du ni rab tu brtag/ mig gi 'byed 'dzums bcu la ni// skad cig tsam du rab tu brtags// skad cig/
278a3(rgyud): bcu zhes bshad pa ni// yud tsam du ni yongs su brtags// yud tsam bzhi la thur gcig ces// sngags rigs pas ni yongs su brtags// 'di tsam dus kyi tshad la ni/
278a4(rgyud): gsum gyi grangs su yongs su brtags// sbyin sreg dus dang bzlas pa yi// grub pa'i dus dang sbyar bar bya// nyal ba'i dus dang mi nyal dang // rtag tu nyin zhag phrugs
278a5(rgyud): btung la// nyin dang mtshan ni nyi ma zhes// de ltang ming ni 'jug pa yin// nyi ma bco lnga nyid la ni// zla ba phyed du rab tu bstar// zla phyed gnyis la zla ba zhes// rtsis shes 'dzin
278a6(rgyud): pa med par bstan// de bzhin zla ba za drug gis// sgra gcan gyis kyang 'dzin pa yin// de nas zla ba bcu gnyis la// lo yi slar ni rab tu bsgrags// de nas lo ni bcu gnyis
278a7(rgyud): la/ lo chen zhes ni de la bya// gza' dang rgyu skar phyin ci log/ lha min dbang po thams cad kyang // de nas lo ni bcu gnyis la// 'dir ni dge dang mi dge byed// gang tshe yang ngor lha
278b1(rgyud): min dbang // sgra gcan rab tu sdang 'gyur zhing // zla ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni// ma lus rab tu zin gyur // mtshon gyi tshogs ni chen po yang // sa yi steng du snang bar 'gyur// de la soH/
278b2(rgyud): pa chen po ni// dus dang dus su rab skyong 'gyur// rnam pa du ma mang po yi// bgegs ni mi bzad snang bar 'gyur// dus kyi tha mar phyin pa na// 'jig rten sdod ni chos min la// rgyu skang
278b3(rgyud): sbubs la gnas pa la// zla ba ma lus 'dzin 'gyur zhing // mtshan mo ma lus 'dzin pa nyid// zla ba 'dzin pa nub bzhin dang // gal te nyi ma nyin par ni// nub bzhin du ni 'dzin gyur dang //
278b4(rgyud): nyi ma dang ni zla ba nyid// mtshan phyed dag tu bzung gyur nas// lha min dbang po'i grim ma yis// gal te 'jigs shing nub gyur na// shar phyogs gnas pa'i rgyal po ra// sdang bas gsod/
278b5(rgyud): par the tsom med// rang nyid 'chi ba'i 'jigs pas sam// gzhan gyis de ni gsod par 'gyur// kla klo yi ni bdag po nyid// shar phyogs su ni gsod par byed// o R+Sha'i yul gyi mi
278b6(rgyud): rnams dang // de tshe rdo rje zhes bdag kyang // gal te tha skar snang ma dang // de bzhin du ni bra nya dang // smin drug dag la nyi zla ni// gang tshe 'dzin par snang gyur na// rnam pa sna tshogs pa/
278b7(rgyud): kan dang // mkhris pa dang ni rlung gyur na// de bzhin 'dres par gyur pa ni// gzhan yang lus can kun la 'byung // byis pa dag ni thams cad la// rnam pa du ma'i nad rnams 'byung //
279a1(rgyud): gal te rgyu skar mchu dang mi// gre dang de bzhin po nyid dang // me bzhi nag pa sa ri dang // sa gdag gi rgyu skar ni// de la nyi zla shang ba na// 'dzin par the tsom med 'gyur/
279a2(rgyud): zhing // nyi zla gnyis ni shar phyogs su// sgra gcan gyis ni zin gyur na// shar phyogs mi yi bdag po dang // lA ra yul gyi bdag po dang // aMng ga maM ga d+ha rgyal po// mig gi nad/
279a3(rgyud): kyis 'debs pa 'am// bu rnams 'chi bar gyur pa 'am// de rnams 'chi bas nyer 'jigs 'gyur// dgra rnams sdang ba'i sems ldan rnams// tshogs kyang de tshe 'byung bar 'gyur
279a4(rgyud): mgo dang lag dang nab so dang // de bzhin rgyal dang skag nyid dang // nyi ma zla ba 'di dag la// sgra gcan gyis zin snang gyur na// ma ga d+ha rgyal gnod 'gyur zhing // de bzhin yul mi
279a5(rgyud): dag la'ang gnod// blon po nang 'jigs shes par bya// 'ching dang nyon mongs grong khyer 'gyur// lha mtshams dang ni snron dag la// sgra gcan gyis zin kun la snang // de tshe nad
279a6(rgyud): rnams kun tu 'gro// yul mi kun la'ang nad rnams 'byung // gsad dang 'ching dang nyon mongs dang // gnod pa rnam pa du ma byung // 'ching dang gzhan gyi dmag tshogs ni// skye ba'i ga
279a7(rgyud): la de dag skye// chu stod dang ni gro bzhin dang // de bzhin chu smang kho na la// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas dang // zla ba la ni dmang bar snang // gza' ni 'dzin par snang gyur pa//
279b1(rgyud): rtag tu mu ge 'byung bar 'gyur// gro bzhin mon gre'i rgyu skar dang // de bzhin du ni khrums stod dang // gang tshe mon gre dag la ni// gal te nyi zla gzas zin te// ga ba 'ani byung ba/
279b2(rgyud): shes gyur na// kha dog nag pa la brten nas// mya ngan chen po nyon mongs dang // mu ge kun tu 'byung bar ni// yul mi kun la 'byung ba dang // rgyal po rkun ma'i 'jigs ren 'byung
279b3(rgyud): nam gru rgyu skar nyid dang // gang tshe khrums smad dag la ni// zla ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du/ shar nas sgra gcan 'dzin pa na// nub phyogs nas ni nyi ma 'dzin// ma ga d+ha ni maM
279b4(rgyud): yi bdag/ sems can rgyal po thabs nyams par// zla phyed gcig gis snang bar 'gyur// rtag tu sgra gcan 'gro ba yin// mtshan ma 'di dag bstan pa yin// zla ba nyi ma'i
279b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi// phyogs ni gang nas zin gyur pa// de dang de yi phyogs dag tu// dge dang mi dge 'byung bar 'gyur// gang nyid sa steng 'gul ba ni// 'jig rten mtshan mas bstan/
279b6(rgyud): pa dag/ dge dang mi dge de dang der// de bzhin gzas zin shes par bya// khug rna ser ba mjug rings ni// nyi ma lnga yi bar du yod// de 'og 'jig rten sems las 'byung // ngogs
279b7(rgyud): la spyod cing gnas pa yin// yul mi thams cad 'jig 'gyur zhing // nad kyi gzhi ni 'byung ba yin// byang phyogs gang+gA'i 'gram gyi ni// rgyal po dag kyang 'jig pa 'gyur// de bzhin
280a1(rgyud): kha ba can gyi dbus// bgrod dkar khrad khrod la gnas dang / sa yi bdag po la gnas dang // khor yug na rtse rje dang // byang phyogs gang+gA'i 'gram dag ma
280a2(rgyud): de tshe 'gram spyod bdag po dag/ mya ngan gdung ba du ma yis// skye bo'i bdag po de 'ching 'gyur// rgyu skar gang la sa 'gul ba// de la lug rna yang dag bstan// phyogs rnams ma/
280a3(rgyud): lus khug rna ni// mi bzad 'od ni spangs pa dang // nyin zhag lnga yi bar du yang // rtag tu nyin zhag mang por ni// phan tshun chos ni ma mthong dang // mi yi spyod yul mthong ba min//
280a4(rgyud): mi rnams dag ni phan tshun du// der ni mthong bar 'gyur ma yin// der ni 'jig cher 'byung bar shes// rgyal po yul 'khor bcas te 'jig/ skar mda' khor yug dag tu ni// gan
280a5(rgyud): dag las kyis byung gyur pa// phyogs kyi mthar ni rab snang ba// gnyis dang gsum ni mi bzad yin// mtshan mo dbang po'i gzhu nyid dang // bya rog gal te 'dab ma dkar// dkar
280a6(rgyud): ba'am yang na kha dog nag/ yang na dkar dang nag par mthong // phyin log 'dab chags kha dog dang // phyin ci log gi dus sgra dang // phyin ci log gi bya rnams yod// gang du da
280a7(rgyud): 'jig chen 'byung // rkang gnyis rkang pa bzhi nyid dang // rkang med dang ni rkang mangs dang // 'dab chags dud 'gro srog chags rnams// phyin ci log 'gyur 'jigs chen 'byung /
280b1(rgyud): khyi ni gyen du gdong bltas te// yang dang yang du thugs 'gyur ba/ nyin par ram ni mtshan mo ru// gang du der ni 'jigs chen 'byung // de ltar rnam pa du ma dang // rnam mang gang du rab
280b2(rgyud): brtags pa// der ni char mi 'bab par 'gyur// rgyal po'i tshogs kyang rnam par 'jig/ ji ltar skye ba'i skar ma ni// dge dang mi dge'i srog chags yin// de bzhin mtshan pa ga
280b3(rgyud): skyes pa// dge dang mi dge byed pa yin// sngon gyi rgyu ni ma yin pa// rgyu mtshan cung zad mi mthong ste// rgyu med rab tu 'jug byed pa'i// bgegs 'byung ba ni yod ma yin// 'phags/
280b4(rgyud): pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa' sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i medo las// skar ma'i dpyad kyi rgyu mtshan shes pa'i le'u rab 'byams las
280b5(rgyud): bco brgyad pa rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ gzhan yang gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / skar ma dang / skar mkhan gyi tshogs rnams la
280b6(rgyud): ba ka' stsal pa kye kye gza' dang rgyu skar gyi tshegs rnams khyed cag thams cad nyon cig/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i cho ga'i rgyal po 'di las 'da' bar ma byed cig
280b7(rgyud): sngags dang / rgyud dang / dbang bskur ba dang / dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga rnams dang / bzlas pa dang // nges par sdom pa dang / rig pa grub pa la 'jug pa dang / rig pa
281a1(rgyud): pa rnams kyi cho ga dang / rgyu skar gyi spyod pa dang / rtsis mngon par shes pa rnams kyi cho ga'i rgyal po de la khyed cag rnams kyis der bgegs ma byed cig/ bstan/
281a2(rgyud): pa la rab tu zhugs pa rnams la lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang de la srung ba gyis shig/ sems can ma rungs pa thams cad kyang dgag par gyis shig/ bstan par gyis shig/
281a3(rgyud): thams cad kyi thams cad du gsod par ma byed cig/ stobs bcu dang ldan pa rnams kyi bstan pa la rnam par gzhag par gyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas sems can
281a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi ma rungs pa thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so//
281a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya
281a6(rgyud): thub pa gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang na bzhugs pa la rnam par blta ba'i phyir nye bar lhags par gyur to// bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas nye bar lhags pa rang rang gi byin
281a7(rgyud): gyi rlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la bos te/ gsungs shig gsungs shig dpa' bo che// 'jig rten rnams la'ang phan pa'i phyir// sngags rgyud cho ga ji lta bar
281b1(rgyud): sngags rnams kun la rab 'jug phyir// rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che// sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa yi// gtso mchog yi ge gcig pa ni// dus nyams cod pa'i dus dag tu//
281b2(rgyud): sngags rnams kun gyi rab mchog de// sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa yin// gtsug tor rgyal po stobs po che// 'byung po kun ri zlog par byed// gza' dang rgyu skar sa mo rnams
281b3(rgyud): ma rungs sems ldan 'gog par byed// 'jig rten bgegs rnams ji snyed dang // de bzhin gzhan yang gdug sems ldan// sems can rnams ni rjes gzung dang // zlos pa rnams ni bde
281b4(rgyud): bya'i phyir// bstan pa 'di la cho ga mchog stobs chen 'khor los sgyur ba yin// gtsug tor rgyal po mthu bo che// kun la dbang phyug dam pa ni// gang gi dus ni 'di yin pa// de bzhin
281b5(rgyud): gshegs pa khyod kyis gsungs// de skad gsungs nas sangs rgyas rnams// mi gsung bar ni bzhugs par gyur// de nas sangs rgyas 'dus pa de rnams kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i//
281b6(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad snod kyi 'jig rten rnams gcig tu 'bar bar gyur la// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sems can gcig la'ang gnod par ma
281b7(rgyud): gyur te// snang ba chen po yang dag par snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs te// byang chub
282a1(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / de na gnas pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / bcom ldan 'das
282a2(rgyud): dang / 'khor chen po 'dus pa la bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dgongs su
282a3(rgyud): gsol/ yi ge gcig pa 'di ni rig pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gong nas gong du gnas pa/ bstan pa thogs pa med pa/ dpag tu med
282a4(rgyud): pa'i stobs dang pha rol gnon pa/ bcom ldan 'das gtsugator gyi rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba'i cho ga'ang ngas bshad par bya'o// bstan pa nub pa'i dus su rtsod pa'i dus 'dil bcom
282a5(rgyud): ldan 'das gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba de bstan pa 'di la srung ba gcig pur 'gyur zhing dus thams cad du grub par yang 'gro ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa nub pa'i dus chod la
282a6(rgyud): 'di nyid sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yin te bstan pa'i don byed par 'gyur ro// yi ge gcig pa 'di la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi mdzod 'dus par
282a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// kye lha'i tshogs dang sems can thams cad nyon cig/ hUM/ bcom ldan 'das ni thams cad mkhyen// sangs rgyas sngags gzugs rnam par gnas// ston pa thugs rje che dang
282b1(rgyud): ldan/ sems can kun la rnam par spyod// sngags rnams bdag po dpal dang ldan// gtsug tor las byung bstan pa yin// snying rje'i dbang la brten nas ni// 'don yi ge gcig tu gnas/
282b2(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings la brten nas ni// 'di ni sna tshogs gzugs la gnas// ji ltar sangs rgyas sku rnams ni// skye bo rnams la sku gdung gyur// 'jig rten gyis mchod zang zing bcas//
282b3(rgyud): zang zing med pa'ang khyad par du// dam chos sku gdung dag tu bstan// 'jig rten zang zing med pa'i rgyu// sku ni zing zing bcas par gsungs// thub pa'i zla ba zag pa med// zang zing
282b4(rgyud): bcas dang zang zing med// 'jig rten rgyud ni gsungs pa yin// chos kyi dbyings la brtan nas ni// thug rje'i dbang gis sems can la// 'jig rten mgon po 'od byed pa// sngags
282b5(rgyud): kyi tshul gyis bzhugs pa yin// sna tshogs gzugs can thams cad mkhyen// sa steng 'di la snang ba yin// sems can rnams kyi sngags sgrub pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyis
282b6(rgyud): gsungs pa yin// sngags 'di yongs su mdor bsdu na// rang gi cho gas 'di bzlas na// sngags rnams ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin// rtag tu 'bras bcas byed par 'gyur// 'di/
282b7(rgyud): yi cho ga mdor bsdus nas// dus su yang ni bshad par bya// dus mthar thub mchog 'jig rten du// de bzhin gshegs pa nub pa na// de yi dus su cho ga 'grub// sngags
283a1(rgyud): 'grub par ni gsung ba yi// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor gzhan gyi las kyi sbyong ba rnam par 'jig
283a2(rgyud): par byed pa// ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba/ sngags thams cad kyi bdag po// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don du gnyer ba/ gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i cho ga yi
283a3(rgyud): ge gcig pa sngar rgya cher bstan nas// yang mdor na re zhig dang por bzlas pas gang du gnas pa las dpag tshad lnga'i nang nas ma rungs pa'i mdon thams cad 'byer bar 'gyur ro//
283a4(rgyud): grub pa thams cad kyang rus pa med par 'gyur zhing lha thams cad kyi nus pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sgrub pa po'i 'dod pa ma gtogs par lha thams cad kyang gnas par
283a5(rgyud): mi 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub pa po gzhan rnams kyi grub pa 'phrog par byed cing // gzhan gyi sbyor bas gsang sngags bcas pa dang / bcom
283a6(rgyud): pa dang / phur bus btab pa'ang thar par byed do// bdag gis gzhan gyi rig sngags gcod par 'dor ro/ rtswa ku sha sngon po chang po gang blangs pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par
283a7(rgyud): bsngags pa byas nas mtshon gyis bcad na rig pa gang gi phyir dmigs te bcad pa de gcod par 'gyur ro// gzugs brnyar byas te 'dis seng ldeng gi phur byas snying la btab na gnang la
283b1(rgyud): bab par 'gyur ro// le brgan du btsos pa'i skud pa la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te mdud pa bor na bcings par 'gyur ro// kham por kha sbyar gyi nang du brgya rtsa brgyad ba zas te la/
283b2(rgyud): bkab pa byas na rengs par 'gyur ro// mtshon chas snying dum bu gnyis su byas na gnyis su gas par 'gyur ro// ske tshel drug dang khrag gis btab pas bsgrub byas 'chi bar 'gyur ro//
283b3(rgyud): ka ra wI ra'i lcug mas kun tu brdeg se na gnod par 'gyur ro// gzhan gyi rig pa thams cad la mngon spyod bya ba ni ci dgar byar rung ngo // sngar gsungs pa'i las thams cad la 'o mas
283b4(rgyud): khrus byas nas sbyin sreg byas na zhi bar 'gyur ro// mar gyi sbyin sreg gis ni thams cad zhi bar 'gyur zhing nyams brtan pa byas par yang 'gyur ro// khu tshur bcings pas sngags thams
283b5(rgyud): cad rengs par 'gyur ro// yid kyis ni dgrol bar bsams pas bkrol bar 'gyur ro// sngags sgrub par 'dod pas kyang 'di nyid kyis bcings pa byas te bsgrub par bya'o// cho ga
283b6(rgyud): gang sgrub par 'dod pas kyang de nyid 'dis bsgrub par bya'o// sngags sgrub pa dang 'di nyid kyi sngags kyis spyan drang bar bya ba dang / yang slar gshegs su gsol bar bya ba yin no//
283b7(rgyud): gang 'di nyid kyis srung bar byed pa thub par dka' bar 'gyur ro// gang gis sngags 'di ma grub bam lan ma tho ba na 'di nyid dang lhan cig tu bzlas brjod byas na myur du 'grub bam
284a1(rgyud): lan thob cing / gal te ma grub bam lan ma byin na de ring po mi thogs pa nyid du 'jig par 'gyur ro// sngags gang la dmigs te zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis til la/
284a2(rgyud): brtags te brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg dus gsum du zhag bdun byas pa de 'di dbang du 'gyur zhing / gang brjod pa de'i las byed par 'gyur ba 'am lan thob par 'gyur ro// lha dbang du bya bar
284a3(rgyud): 'dod na thang shing gi yam shing gis brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na zhag bdun gyis dbang du 'gyur ro// klu dbang du bya bar 'dod na mngang gsum gyis sbyin sreg bya'o// dri za dang dri za mtha
284a4(rgyud): cad dbang du bya bar 'dod na shing mya ngan med pa dang / pri yang ku'i yam shing ngam/ me tog gis sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin mo dang klu mo'i gdon rnams la ni ske tshes
284a5(rgyud): bya'o// rgyal po rnams la ni yungs kar gyis bya'o// bram ze rnams la ni me tog gis sbyin sreg bya'o// rje'u rigs la ni zho dang / 'o ma dang / mar gyis bya'o// dmangs rigs la
284a6(rgyud): ni phub ma'i rdul gyis bya'o// bud med la ni ldan tshwa'i sbyin sreg bya'o// gdol pa la min sran gre'u dang dza bu li ka'i sbyin sreg bya'o// bu mo gzhon nu ma la ni 'bras yos kyis sbyin sreg
284a7(rgyud): bya'o// sems can thams cad la ni mar dang til gyis sbyin sreg byas na dbang du byed do// thams cad du'ang dus gsum du zhig bdun du bya'o zhes gsungs nas rgyal ba'i mchog can
284b1(rgyud): cang mi gsung bar gyur to// thub mchog bdun pas sngags 'di ni// de tshe lha yi tshegs la gsungs// 'jig rten chos shes grol ba dang // de tshe de ni chags bral blos// de tshe thub pa
284b2(rgyud): mchog gis ri// sangs rgyas sras po thu bo lha// byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che// 'jam dpal la ni de tshe gsungs// lha yi Sh+Tha ni blo ldan pa// mgon po 'khor lo'i bdag pa'i
284b3(rgyud): cho ga 'di ni rgya che bas// gang gi bskal pa'i tshad du yang // rgyal bas kyang ni bshad mi nus// mi rnams la ni phan pa'i phyir// cho ga yi ni phyogs gcig tsam// mdor bsdus nas ni
284b4(rgyud): bshad pa yin// de tshe de skad gsungs nas ni// dpal ldan 'jam dbyangs rdzu 'phrul che// gtsang ma'i gnas kyi steng bzhugs pa'i// sangs rgyas de la skul bar byed// gsungs
284b5(rgyud): shig gsungs shig dpa' bo che// rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// dus mthar 'jigs pa'i dus su ni// mi rnams bde ba skyed pa'i phyir// mthu che ni sngags kyi rgyal po ste//
284b6(rgyud): gzi brjid rin po 'di yi ni// ras ris ji ltar grub par 'gyur// myur dus ras ris 'grub pa gsungs// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod pal po/
284b7(rgyud): che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ yi ge gcig pa 'khor los sgyur ba 'byung ba'i le'u rab 'byams las bcu dgu pa rdzogs so// de nas bcom
285a1(rgyud): ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal nyon cig
285a2(rgyud): mdor na yi ge gcig pa 'khor los sgyur ba rdzu 'phrul chen po'i ras ris cho gar 'gyur ba rgya che ba ni sngar bstan to// da ni dus kyi tha ma'i dus su sems can rnams brtson 'grus chung bar 'gyur
285a3(rgyud): zhing shes rab chung ba dang / yid gzhungs pa dman pa'i phyir ras ris kyi tshad rgya che ba'i sbyor ba sgrub pa nyams par 'gyur bas/ sems can rnams la phan par 'dod pas zlos pa pos ji ltar dngos
285a4(rgyud): grub mchog thob par 'gyur ba de ltar ngas mdor bshad par bya ste// sgrub pa mchog byed par 'dod pas ras ma nyams pa/ kha tshar ma bcad pa/ skra dang bral ba dag la tshon ma 'dres pa dag gis
285a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'drir gzhug par bya ste/ chos kyi rgyal po chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi bdag po skyes bu dam pa rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog/ de bzhin
285a6(rgyud): gshegs pa rin chen tog ces bya ba rgyal ba'i mchog chos 'chad pa kun nas 'bar ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'o// 'og tu ni tshangs pa dang 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje/ steng du ni 'phreng
285a7(rgyud): ba 'dzin pa'i lha'i bu gnyis/ 'og tu sgrub pa po de'i mdun du dus gsum du a ka ru sreg cing 'bum phrag bcu bzlas pa bya'o// de nas las su bya ba ni dang po'i 'khor lo'i sgrub pa byed
285b1(rgyud): par 'dod na/ lcags bzang po'i rang bzhin las rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor lo byas te/ cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed la bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dus gsum du a ka ru'i dud pas bdugs/
285b2(rgyud): cing 'bum phrag bcu bzlas pa bya'o// tha mar zla ba nya ba la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas lag pas bzung ste/ ji srid rab tu 'bar ba'i bar du bzlas pa bya'o// de bzung na rig pa 'dzin pa'i
285b3(rgyud): 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// gang gis mthong ba de dang lhan cig nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas gdugs sgrub par 'dod na gdugs kha dog sna tshogs pa gsar pa byas pa/
285b4(rgyud): gser gyi 'khor los mtshan pa/ ka shi ka'i gos 'phyang ba de nyid kyi cho gas mgo la gdugs bzung ba byas te/ bzlas pa byas na rig pa rang nyid nye bar zhugs par 'gyur ro// 'di nyid kyis
285b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dus gsum du a ka ru'i dud pas bdugs te 'bum phrag bcu bzlas pa byas la/ tha mar zla ba nya ba la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas lag pas bzung ste/ ji srid
285b6(rgyud): rab tu 'bar ba'i bar du bzlas par bya'o// de thogs ni rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// zla ba re re zhing zla ba nya ba dang cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed lnga'i bar gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro/
285b7(rgyud): 'di grub pa tsam gyis chos thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa thams cad rab tu thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mngon par
286a1(rgyud): dgyes pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis rjes su bsngags pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag gi 'khor lo
286a2(rgyud): sgyur ba stong gi g.yog 'khor dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de nas gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba sgrub par 'dod na gser dang / dngul dang / zangs ma dang / nor bu'i rang bzhin gyi dbyig pa
286a3(rgyud): zla gang tsam byas na/ ji srid rab tu 'bar ba'i bar du bzlas pa byas nas de blangs na nam mkha' la 'gro ste/ thams cad la chos ston par 'gyur ro// bskal pa chen por 'tsho bar 'gyur ro//
286a4(rgyud): tsi ste bum pa bzang po sgrub par 'dod na gser gyi bum pa bzang po byas la 'bru thams cad dang / rin po che dang / sman gyis yongs su bkang la ras dkar pos bcings te/ de la sngags/
286a5(rgyud): 'dis bsgrub par bya ste/ cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed gcig la brtsams na gnyis pa la 'grub par 'gyur ro// de la lag pa rab tu bcug na ci 'dod pa de thob cing mi zad par yang 'gyur ro/
286a6(rgyud): ci ste nor bu rin po che sgrub par 'dod na gser gyi dbyig pa 'am/ nor bu bzang po dang / shel gyi nor bu byas te gos 'phyang bar byas la/ cho ga 'di nyid kyis bsgrubs dga' bsams pa de
286a7(rgyud): thams cad 'grub par 'gyur to// lha dang mi'i nang du 'di thogs pa med cing stobs dang pha po gnod par 'gyur ro// ci ste bcom ldan 'das la bzlas pa byi ba byas na rang gi lus kyis
286b1(rgyud): nam mkha' la 'gro bar byung // de ljang lnga'i lus thob cing bskal pa chen por 'tsho bar 'gyur po// gzhan gang yang gtsug tor gyi rgyal po gdugs dkar po la sogs pa de' dang/
286b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'bum phrag bcu bzlas pa byas na las rnams byed par 'gyur ro// de ltar thogs pa med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tong gzhan gyi rtog pa'i tshigs de lta ltang
286b3(rgyud): rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar ring po mi thogs par 'grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la 'bum phrag bcu bzlas pa byas na thams cad la 'grub pa/
286b4(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang rig pa dang sngags thams cad kyi bdug po 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// ci ste rdo rje sgrub par 'dod na tsan dan dmar po la rdo rje rtse gcig pa'am/ yang na lcags bzang po la
286b5(rgyud): byas te/ ba'i rnam lngas bkrus la yar gyi ngo'i tshes bco lnga la ras ris kyi mdun du mchod pa chen po bya zhing mar gyi mar me brgyad spar la dri'i chus rdo rje bkrus te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub
286b6(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid phul nas gtsug tor gyi rgyal po'i 'khor ram/ bzi brjid phung po 'am/ gtsug tor gdugs dkar po'i sngags 'dis bsrung ba byas la/
286b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi nang du grogs la'ang bsrung ba byas nas rdo rje lag pa g.yas pas blangs te/ thun dang po 'das shing thun gnyis pa la nye bar 'dug ste/ sems rtse gcig pas ji
287a1(rgyud): srid rab tu 'bang ba'i bar du bzlas par bya'o// skabs 'dir rig pa 'dzin pa lnga dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin thams cad 'dus te/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po thams
287a2(rgyud): cad kyang 'ong bar 'gyur ro// de dag rig pa 'dzin pa'i bstod pa byed cing khyir du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khob pos sgyur bar 'gyur ro// lus phyag rdo rje dang 'dra zhing phyag/
287a3(rgyud): rdo rje dang 'dra bar mgyogs pa'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur ro// skad cig gis 'og min gyi lha'i gan su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// bskal par gnas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa
287a4(rgyud): byams pa mthong zhing chos nyan par 'gyur ro// shi nas gang du 'dod pa der skye bar 'gyur ro// gal te phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs drung du'ang skye bar 'gyur ro// ci ste ral gri sgrub par 'dod na
287a5(rgyud): skyon med pa'i ral gri blangs nas nyin zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po byas nas ji srid du rab tu 'bar po'i bar du bzlas pa bya'o// de grub na g.yog la
287a6(rgyud): dang bcas pa nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sman cha ga du ba kor dang 'dra bar 'khyil ba dang / lo bcu drug pa'i byad can dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs med cing rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad
287a7(rgyud): kyis pi tshugs pa dang / bar gyi bskal par 'tshe bar 'gyur ro// ci ste ldong ngos sgrub par 'dod na dpa' bo'i tshing gis nyos te rgyal dang ldan pa'i dus su zhag gsum sbyang ba byas te/ dag
287b1(rgyud): slong babar po dge 'dun la ba shos drangs das bka' lung stsal bar bskul lo// sgrub pa po la de rjes su gnanganas rang gi gnas spa ba tu zhugs te/ mchod pa man po byas sa rung
287b2(rgyud): gyi mang me stong rab tu spar nas zhag gsum smyung ba byas la/ sems can thams cad la byams pa bskyed nas bdag nyid phul te/ ldong ngos blangs nas/ ji srid grub pa rnam gsung thob pa de sri
287b3(rgyud): du bzlas pa byas te/ dro ba dang / du ba 'dzul ba dang / 'bar bas sdang gang bsams pa nyid du grub par 'gyur te/ dro bar gyur pas dpral bar thig le byas rwa lga dang / klu dang / gnod
287b4(rgyud): sbyin dang / 'byung po thams cad dang / sha za la sogs pa dang / 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i sems can zan du 'gyur zhing / gang cung zad thams cad sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro// lo stong /
287b5(rgyud): gi bang du 'tshe bar 'gyur ro// du ba 'thul ba la ni dpral bar thig le byas na mi snang bar 'gyur te/ gal te 'dod na lha rnams kyis kyang mi mthong bar 'gyur / skad cig thang cig yud tsa pa la snang
287b6(rgyud): zhing yang mi snang bar 'gyung ro// mi snang ba thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur ning lo sum stong gi bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// 'bar bas ni rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas/
287b7(rgyud): pa nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyur te/ lha gzhon nu'i lus su 'gyur zhing / lha thams cad kyis kyang mi thub par 'gyur na/ rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis
288a1(rgyud): lta smos kyang ci dgos te bskal par yang gnas par 'gyur ro// dus byas nas dga' ldan gyi lha'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ngo // ci ste mdung rje gsum sgrub par 'dod na
288a2(rgyud): lpags bzang po las byas pa'i mdung rtse gsum pa byas te lo'i bar du bzlas par bya'o// de nas bye ma'i rang bzhin gyis mchod rten khru gang tsam gyi tshad byas te/ de la mchod pa chen po byas shing
288a3(rgyud): gtor ma rgya chen po btang la/ lag pa g.yas pas mdung rje gsum pa blangs la skyil mo krung bcas nas ji srid du spros pa na 'od zer stong byung ba de'i bar du bzlas pa byas na/ skabs 'dir dbang
288a4(rgyud): phyag chen po la sogs pa lha rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad me tog gi char 'bebs pa dang / lha thams cad kyang me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs par 'gyur ro// de nas
288a5(rgyud): thams cad kyis yongs su bskor nas gang dag gis mthong ba dang / gang mthong ba de dang lhan cig tu nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po mig gsum par 'gyur te/ dbang
288a6(rgyud): phyug chen po gnyis pa dang 'dra ba'o// rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis phyag byas shing / bskal pa chen por gnas par 'gyur la/ bltas pa tsam gyis gdug pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams
288a7(rgyud): ltung bar 'gyur ro// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gang gis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur na/ rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ shi 'phos nas bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro//
288b1(rgyud): ci ste ro langs sgrub par 'dod na/ yan lag rma med pa'i skyes bu'i ro blangs te seng ldeng gi phung pa zhig btab la/ zang gi steng du rin po che'i phye mas gtor cing mchod na/ de'i lce'i rtse mo la nor bu rin po
288b2(rgyud): che snang bar 'gyur te/ de blangs na rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// mtshon gang dag yid la bsams pa tsam gyis de dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'od dpag tshad brgya tsam du snang bar
288b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// 'dod na dus byed par yang 'gyur ro// gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu'ang rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar yang 'gyur ro// shi
288b4(rgyud): 'phos nas kyang dri ma med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro// ro langs gnyis pa sgrub pa ni/ rma med pa'i lus kyi ro blangs te rgya shug gi shing gi phur bus btab la/ de'i khar lcags
288b5(rgyud): kyi phye ma gtor zhing byin na de'i lce 'byin par 'gyur te/ de bcad na g.yog 'khor brgya dang nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ bar gyi bskal par gnas par 'gyur/ ri rab kyi rtse mor rtse zhing dga'
288b6(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe phyogs gcig gi rgyal por 'gyur ro// ci ste lcags kyu sgrub par 'dod na rtsa ku sha'i rang bzhin gyis lcags kyu byas te/ 'thab mo pa mdog dag pa
288b7(rgyud): lag pa'i mthil gyis pa'i rnam lngas bkrus te mtshan mo gcig smyung ba byas nas lcags kyu khru gang gi tshad du byas la/ mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas phyag na rdo rje la mar gyi mang me brgya spang bar bya
289a1(rgyud): rdo rje lcags kyu dang bdag nyid la gdugs dkar pos bsrung bar bya'o// gzi brjid phung pos ni dkyil 'khor bcing bar bya'o// phur bu la lan bdun mngon par bsdu
289a2(rgyud): pa byas te phyogs bzhir gtor la phur bus btab na/ 'og tu bcing ba byas shing gnas yongs su bzung ba byas par yang 'gyur ro// de nas thun gnyis pa la rtse gcig pa'i yid kyis skyil
289a3(rgyud): mo krung bcas la lcags kyu la me tog dang / dri dang / bdug pas mchod na de bsrung ba byas pa yin no// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas/ skabs 'di
289a4(rgyud): lcags kyu lag pas bzung nas ji srid du dmyal ba'i sems can rnams 'tshe bar nye bar zhi ba'i bar du bzlas la/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal na nam
289a5(rgyud): mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po 'gro ba la thogs pa med pa lcags kyu lag na thogs pa/ lha thams cad dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin la sogs pa'ang thag ring po na
289a6(rgyud): nas mthong na phyag 'tshal bar byed do// bskal par gnas par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe phyag na rdo rje'i gnas su 'gro zhing phyag na rdo rje mthong bar 'gyur ro// gal te ngas ris sgrub par
289a7(rgyud): gyur na de 'bar ba na rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ cho ga gang sgrub par 'dod kyang de'i sngags kyis ming bzung la 'bum bzla zhing / de nas nub gcig smyung ba byas te mchod pa rgya chen po byas la/ shing
289b1(rgyud): arga'i me rab tu srang te til dag la zho dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad bya sa na sbyin sreg gi mthar 'ong nas nor gang 'dod pa de ster bar 'gyur zhing / mngag gzhug pa dbang
289b2(rgyud): du byed pa bzhin du nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// ci ste dbang phyug chen po dbang du byed par 'dod na dbang phyug chen po la mchod pa rgya chen po byas la/ lho phyogs su yud tsam gyis shing arga'i me rang
289b3(rgyud): du srangal sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas pa na ha ha zhes pa'i sgra byung bar gyur na 'jigs par mi bya/ de nas de 'ong bar 'gyur te/ bdag gis ci zhig bya zhes smra bar 'gyur ro// dbang phyug chen po'i
289b4(rgyud): rig pa thams cad bdag la grub par gyur cig ces smras pa dang / mchog gang 'dod pa de ster bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin du gyur cig ces byas nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du khyab 'jug
289b5(rgyud): dang tshangs pa la sogs pa'ang 'gugs par 'gyur te/ mchog gang 'dod pa de'ang 'di bzhin te/ cho ga 'di bzhin du byas la legs par bsrung ba'ang bya'o// ci ste gnod sbyin mo dgug pa/
289b6(rgyud): 'dod na de'i ming bzung la zhag bdun du shing mya ngan med kyi me tog gis sbyin sreg byas na 'ong zhing mchog steng bar byed do// zhag bdun gyi ma dang / sring mo dang / chung ma gang 'dod pa de'i cha byad
289b7(rgyud): du nges par 'ong bar 'byung // ca ste mi 'o na mi go 'gas par 'gyur ro// klu mo dbang du byed par 'dod dgru shing gi me tog gis cho ga 'di bzhin du bya'o// srin po dgug par 'dod na drab gsum
290a1(rgyud): du zho dang 'bras chan gyi sbyin sreg bya'o// sbyin sreg gi mthar zhag gcig smyung ba byas la bcom ldan 'das la mchod cing gnod sbyin la gtor ma 'bras chan rnams sbyin par byas/
290a2(rgyud): shing gnod sbyin dgug par bya'o// zhes yid la byed cing a mra'i shing gi yam shing zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na/ skabs 'dir lus ngan po la sogs
290a3(rgyud): pa'i gnod sbyir 'ong bar 'gyur la/ de dag la shing arga'i me tog gi mchod yon byin na de dag ci zhig bya zhes smra bar 'gyur ro// des brjod par bya ba ni nyid re zhing gnod sbyin lung bzhin du byed pa
290a4(rgyud): dgos so zhes brjod par bya ste/ des gnod sbyir re re ster bar 'gyur ro// des lung bsgo bar bya ba ni dpag tshad brgya nas bud med rnams 'dir 'ong bar gyis latho rangs de nyid du khyed cig ces pa dang //
290a5(rgyud): 'khor brgya la'ang 'bras chan byin cig ces brjod na rgyab tu khur nas gang du 'dod pa der 'gro zhing 'khyer bar 'gyur ro// lung stsal ba thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// ci ste phya na rdo rje sgrub par 'dod na/
290a6(rgyud): bzhi 'gyur dang bdun 'gyur gyis sngon du bsnyen pa byas la/ cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed po ma lus pa la rab tu rgya che ba'i mchod pa byas la ji srid zla ba nye ba'i bar du ste/ zla ba nye ba'i bar du mchod pa byas
290a7(rgyud): la dge slong gi dge 'dun khyad par can dag pa shos gsol nas/ 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin kho na la rjes su yi rang bar byed du gzhug go// de nas mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas dang po'i thun 'das
290b1(rgyud): gnyis pa'i thun la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la/ sems rtse gcig pas rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bar bya'o zhes sems la kun tu brtags te/ gu gul gyi ril bu rgya gug gi 'bras bu'i tshad/
290b2(rgyud): tsam gyis mtshad mo thun gcig tu sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yul bskyod par 'gyur zhing sa 'gul ba dang / sprin gyi sgra sgrogs par 'gyur ba dang / rig pa 'dzin pa
290b3(rgyud): thams cad me tog gi cher rab tu 'bebs par 'gyur/ skabs 'dir bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rig pa thams cad kyis yongs su bskor ba dang / rig pa mchog la sogs pa'i rig pa'i
290b4(rgyud): rgyal po sa yongs su bskor ba byon par 'gyur/ lha thams cad dang / gru thams cad dang / gnod sbyin thams cad dang / dri za dang / mi 'am cis byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bskor
290b5(rgyud): ba byon par 'gyur ro// de'i mod la dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyi shin tu drag pa'i tshor ba'i sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// dri'i chus mchod yon dbul zhing phyag 'tshal te
290b6(rgyud): 'dug par bya'o// de nas rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs pa ni mchog ci zhig sbyin par bya/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba nyid nasas 'og tu 'gro ba 'am/ rgyal srid dam/ mi snang
290b7(rgyud): bar 'gro ba 'am/ gang 'dod pa de nyid bcom ldan 'das las thob par 'gyur ro// gang 'dod pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba nyid dang / rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo/
291a1(rgyud): sgyur ba rdo rje'i sku dang / phyag na rdo rje dang 'dra ba dang / bsams pa tsam gyis mtshan thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bskal pa chen por gnas par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe
291a2(rgyud): 'dzin pa de'i tshe rdo rje'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pa gzhan dag gi'ang cho ga 'di bzhin te/ mdor na phyag na rdo rje'i tshi ga gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi/
291a3(rgyud): cho ga gang yin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i cho ga gang yin pa dang / tshangs pa'i cho ga gang yin pa dang / dbang phyug chen po'i cho ga gang yin pa dang / mdor na 'jig rten dang 'jig rten
291a4(rgyud): las 'das pa'i sgrub pa gang yin pa de dag kyang 'di nyid kyis bsgrub par byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro// sngags gang gi bsgrub pa byas kyang ma grub na ni 'dis lus la bzlas pa byas na rub bdun gyis nges
291a5(rgyud): par mthong ba sbyin par byed do// ci ste mi sbyin na ni rnam par nyams par 'gyur ro// dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha'i mdun du gal te zlos pa byed ra nub bdun gyis nang du mthong ba sbyin par byed do// ga la
291a6(rgyud): tesbyin par mi byed na mgo tshal pa bdun phrag gsum du 'gas par 'gyur ro// zla ba dang nyi ma gzas zin pa na mar dang / shu dag dang / mig sman dang / dag byed dang / so shing dang / mchod phyir thogs
291a7(rgyud): dang dbu bla dang / ldong ngos la sogs pa bsgrub par bya'o// ci ste rdzas rnams sgrub par 'dod na ldong ros blangs te mi'i 'o ma dang por byas la ril bu lngar bya zhing / a ka ru'i snod kha sbyar kyi nang du bcug cig
291b1(rgyud): srungs kar dang lhan cig bsgrub par bya'o// zla ba dang nyi ma gzas 'dzin pa'i dus su gtor ma'i cho ga byas te/ gang gi tshe yungs kar rtsi ta tsi ti zhes sgra 'don pa de'i tshe grub pa dang po yid te/ skye'o/
291b2(rgyud): thams cad dbang du 'gyur la/ de'i tshe 'di thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur te// gang smras pa de thams cad byed do// ci ste du ba 'thul bar byed na mi snang bar byed pa thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro//
291b3(rgyud): bar gyi bskul bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe 'bar bar gyur pa de'i tshe lha gzhon nu'i gzugs su 'gyur zhing / nyi ma 'char ka'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyur/ bskal pa/
291b4(rgyud): chen por 'tsho bar 'gyur/ de bzhin du gi'u wang dang ba bla la sogs pa la'ang bsgrub par bya'o// ci ste mig sman sgrub par 'dod na lig bu mig dang / ut+pal sngon po dang / ru rta dang / tsan dar dag gcig
291b5(rgyud): tu byas te zangs ma'i snod du bzhag la/ zla ba gzas zin pa'i dus su ji srid du pa 'thul ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o// des mig la bskus na mi snang bar 'gyur te/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs
291b6(rgyud): dang mi snang bar byed pa thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro// ci ste ral gri sgrub par 'dod na ral gri ma nyams pa blangs la mang ngo'i tshes brgyad dam bcu bzhi la ras ris la mchod pa rgya chen po dang gtor ma/
291b7(rgyud): btang zhing bsrung ba byas la/ ral gri lag pa g.yas pas bzung ste/ ji srid 'od 'phro ba dang 'bar ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas pa byas na/ gal te 'od 'phro na ni rig pa 'dzin pa gcig pur 'gyur ro//
292a1(rgyud): 'bar bas ni de rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi rgyal por 'gyur ba dang / stobs dang pha rol gnor pa thogs pa med pa dang / gang gis mthong ba dang / gang mthong ba de dang lhan cig rang
292a2(rgyud): mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ci ste rdo rje sgrub par 'dod na lcags bzang po'i rang bzhin las rdo rje byas te/ sor bcu drug pa rtse mo gnyis ka'ang rtse gsum pa tsan dan dmar pos byugs la/
292a3(rgyud): 'phrul gyi zla phyed kyi tshes nas brtsams nas ras ris la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te bzlas pa bya zhing / tshes nas nyi ma re re zhing re res kyang bskyed pa'i dge slong dag la bshos drang bar bya'o// tha ra
292a4(rgyud): nub gsum smyung ba byas la sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi mdun du ras ris rab tu bzhag cing mchod pa rgya chen po byas la ga mar gyi mar me brgya rab tu spang zhing ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug pa
292a5(rgyud): bya'o// lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje bzung la ji srid 'bar ba de'i bar du bzlas pa byas shing / de bzung na de 'khor dang bcas pa nam mkha' 'gro bar 'gyur/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba
292a6(rgyud): 'gyur/ phyag na rdo rje dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ pha rol gnod par 'gyur/ bskal pa chen por 'tshe bar 'gyur/ lus zhig nas phyag na rdo rje'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du mdung rtsi dang /
292a7(rgyud): 'khor lo dang / mda' dang / mdung la sogs pa mtshon thams cad dang / mchil lham dang / so shing dang / mchod phyir thogs la sogs pa gzhan gyi cho ga'i bya bas bsgrub par bya zhing thams
292b1(rgyud): cad kyang grub pa rnam pa gsum yin no// zhi ba byed par 'dod pa la pad+ma'i rnam pa 'dra ba'i thab khung byas la/ mchod sbyin la 'os pa'i yan lag gis me rab tu sbar la thugs gzar gyis zas
292b2(rgyud): mchog dang / no dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyir sreg stong rtsa brgyad zhag gsum byas na bdag dang gzhan zhi bar 'gyur ro// zhag bdun gyis ni grong ngam grong khyer gyi 'di ba mang po'i nye/
292b3(rgyud): bar 'tshe ba zhi bar 'gyur ro// shing sha ma'i yam shing la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad kyang bya'o// yang na shing u dub ba ra'i yam shing la zho dang /
292b4(rgyud): sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad kyang bya'o// char mi 'bab pa la ni mngar gsum gyis sbyin sreg byas na thams cad du mchog tu zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// slong
292b5(rgyud): mo'i zas za zhing cho 'phrul chen po'i zla phyed kyi zla ba nya'i bar du rub gsum sbyang ba bya sa la/ zla ba gzas zin par ba nag mo'i 'o ma la lar brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags te 'thungs na bcud kyis
292b6(rgyud): len gyi yon tan dang ldan par 'gyur ro// rtswa dung ba'i 'dzag ma la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pas stong rtsa brgyad rub bcu'i bar du sbyin sreg byas na dus ma yin par 'di ba rab tu
292b7(rgyud): zhi zhing tshe ring bar 'gyur ro// rgyal mtshan dang dung la sogs pa la mngon par bsngags na/ mthong ba dang thos pas pha rol gyi sde dpung gis mi g.yo bar byas par 'gyur ro// bum pa gsang ba
293a1(rgyud): 'bru thams cad dang spos chus bkang ba la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pas log 'dren gyis gtses shing zin pa bkrus te dbang bskur na dpal dang ldan par/
293a2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// 'dis dbang bskur na sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur te/ dkyil 'khor gyi las dang / gdon gyi las rnams kyang byed par 'gyur ro// rma bya'i mjug ma la lan 'bum
293a3(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas na dug thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro// de nyid kyis rims dang / mig gi nad dang / gzer thabs la sogs pa sel bar byed do// srung ba'i skud pas ni nad thams cad las
293a4(rgyud): grol bar 'gyur ro// phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i ji skad gsungs pa'i sngags kyi seng ldeng gi yam shing la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na lha ma yin gyi
293a5(rgyud): sngags 'joms par byed do// dus gsum du nyin mtshan nyi shu rtsa gcig la 'bras thug po che la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na longs spyod thob/
293a6(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// lha dbang du bya bar 'dod na a ka ru'i yam shing la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg dus gsum du nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig la stong rtsa brgyad bya'o//
293a7(rgyud): 'bras thug po che la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa gcig tu byas pas sbyin sreg byas na zas mi zad par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dbang du byed na gu gul gyi ril bu la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang /
293b1(rgyud): mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad bya'o// shing mya ngan med kyi yam shing gis ni gnod sbyin mo rnams la bya'o// klu rnams la ni klu shing gi me tog gis bya'o// 'phags pa phyag mardzoH/
293b2(rgyud): la ni a ka ru'i yam shing gis bya'o// rig pa 'dzin pa la ni po so 'cha'i shing gi yam shing gis so// a ka ru'i yam shing la du ru ka'i 'bru mar gyis btags pas ni dri za la sbyin sreg bya'o//
293b3(rgyud): yi dgas rnams la ni bil ba'i shing gi yam shing gis so// mi 'am ci rnams la ni sra rtsi pog gi sbyir sreg gis so// log 'dren thams cad la ni zhag bdun du sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o//
293b4(rgyud): rgyal po'i bu la ni yungs kar til mar gyis btags pa dus gsum du zhag bdun la sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya zhing / nyi ma la mngon du phyogs nas bzlas brjod 'bum byas na sdig pa thams cad
293b5(rgyud): las rab tu grol bar 'gyur ro// rig pa thams cad tshim par byed par 'dod na ba'i gcin dang nas kyi kha zas za zhing rdza u shir las gzugs brnyan byas te/ me tog dkar pos mchod cing 'o ma brgya
293b6(rgyud): rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin sreg byas nas 'o mas khrus byas te bzlas pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing a ka ru'i dud pas bdugs na tshim zhing rgyas pa byas par 'gyur ro// lan gcig ba zlas pas bdag
293b7(rgyud): bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro// lan gnyis bzlas pas gzhan bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro// lan gsum bzlas pa byas pas rdzas bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro// lus chad pa dang / zhom pa dang /
294a1(rgyud): dug gis reg pa dang / phur bus btab pa rnams la lta bar byed par 'dod na sman u shi ri las gzugs brnyan du byas te me tog dkar pos mchod la/ 'dis gtsug tong /
294a2(rgyud): gyi rgyal po'i ris ris kyi mdun du yungs kar gyi rgyal po la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags la sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byasan/ rig pa nye bar dmigs nas phur bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dzaM sri
294a3(rgyud): du bzlas kyang rig pa 'bras bu med par shes na gi'u wang gis gro ba la bris te/ gro ba de la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das la mdzod pa rgya chen po byas la/ bcom ldan/
294a4(rgyud): 'das 'di dang lhan cig stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la ku sha'i stan de nyid du gnyid log na rmi lam du 'ongs te/ 'bras bu med pa'i rgyu ston par 'gyur ro// ci ste me tog pad+ma sgrub par 'dod na can
294a5(rgyud): den dmar po las pad+ma byas te mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas zhag gsum smyung ba byas te/ pad+ma lag pa g.yas par bzung la ji srid 'bar ba de srid kyi bang du bzlas pa byas na g.yog 'khor nyi shu dang
294a6(rgyud): nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/ thogs pa med par 'gro bar 'gyur/ gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// ci ste rdo rje sgrub pa
294a7(rgyud): 'dod na grog mkhar gyi sa dang bye ma bsres nas rdo rje byas la/ bsrangs po'i kha zas kyis 'tsho zhing mi smra ba'i dka' thub dang / lam 'gog par byed cing / rdo rje bzung ste myur du bzlas pa 'bus
294b1(rgyud): bya'o// rdo rje ni rtse gcig par byas te/ do rje de yungs kar gyi nang du bzhag la/ yungs kang de ji srid du kyis kyi ti'i sgra sgrog pa de srid du bzlas pa byas na rdo rje 'grub par 'gyur te/ do rje de grangs nas las
294b2(rgyud): thams cad byed par 'gyur te/ ri'i rtse mo'ang bye mar byed la/ klu'i shing yang skem par byed cing chu bo'ang rgyur phyogs las zlog par byed do// klu rnams 'byed par byed do// dug rnams dug med par
294b3(rgyud): byed do// srog chags thams cad rengs par byed do// rmongs par byed do// ltung bar byed do// shing rta la sogs pa'ang rengs par byed do// de la sogs pa'i las thams cad byed pa 'di nyid rtse gsu
294b4(rgyud): pa'i rdo rjes sgrub par byed de/ gtsug spyod kyis kyang mngon sum du bgegs byed par mi nus so// 'di'i cho gas rtag tu bzlas pa byed pa'i dus su sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis sngags kyi thog ma dang tha bar
294b5(rgyud): kha na re re bzlas pa byas na de dag zhi ba nyid du 'gyur zhing grub pa'ang mngon sum du 'gyur ro// de nas rgya mtsho chen por 'bab pa'i chu bo la yi ge gcig pas pad+ma 'bum dor na dpal rang 'ongs nas mchog
294b6(rgyud): dang rgyal srid kyang sbyin par byed do// ci ste 'bru gcig pa dang bcas pa'i pad+ma bum phrag gsum dong nas kun la dbang ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// lnga 'bum bzlas 'dzam bu'i gling gi bdag por
294b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// sa 'og tu 'jug pa'i sgor rkang pa bzhag ste 'bum phrag gsum bzlas na 'khrul 'khor thams cad bcom nas dog pa med par 'gyur zhing / zhugs nas kyang bcud kyis len thams /
295a1(rgyud): 'byin par 'gyur ro// ci ste de nyid du 'dug nas yang khyab 'jug gi 'khor lo'i 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro// ci ste 'khor lo nang du byung na'ang sngags dran pa tsam gyis thal
295a2(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// bsams pa tsam gyis phying gso bar yang nus so// nam yang phyir rab tu 'jugs par yang mi 'gyur ro// yang bod dang de'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te dus gsum du sna pa'i me/
295a3(rgyud): tog la lan cig bzlas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthe bo'i drung du bzhag pa byas nas ji tsam na zhabs kyi mthe bong nas 'od zer byung nas sgrub pa po de'i lus la zhugs par gyur kyi ba
295a4(rgyud): du byas na/ de'i mod kho na la sgra 'khyil zhing 'khor dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro// 'khor dang bcas pa nam mkha' la 'gro zhing rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por yang 'gyur ro// bskal par yang gnas pa
295a5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de nas rgya mtsho'i ngogs sungs ris nub phyogs su bstan te bzhag la/ klu shing gis me rab tu srang nas rgyal tsho la dmigs nas klu shing gi me tog gis sbyin sreg 'bul byas na rgya ma
295a6(rgyud): rlabs 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ni grub pa'i mtshan ma yin pas 'jigs par mi bya'o// ji srid rgya mtsho las bram ze'i gzugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur te/ bdag gi ci zhig bya zhes smra bar khyod
295a7(rgyud): nga'i dbang du gyis shig ces bya ba smra bar bya'o// de nas gang ci bsgo ba de thams cad byed par 'gyur/ sa la pad+ma 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa bris te/ de'i steng du 'dug nas brgya phrag stong bzlas pa
295b1(rgyud): byas na pad+ma des las 'phags nas g.yog 'khor stong dang bcas pa nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// bskal pa chen por gnas pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por yang 'gyur ro// lam gcod/
295b2(rgyud): par byed par yang mi nus so// 'od dpag tshad lngar snang bar byed par yang 'gyur ro// cho 'phrul chen po'i zla ba phyed la sna ma'i me tog dang ldan pa re res bzlas shing / bcom ldan 'das kyi
295b3(rgyud): gtsug tor gyi steng du 'bum phrag gcig phul na ji srid gtsug tor nas 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur te/ sgrub pa po'i lus la zhugs kyi bar du byas ra de'i mod kho na la mngon par shes pa lnga thob par
295b4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag bcu bzlas pa byas na ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar las byed par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid dang lhan cig gal te rig pa zlo bar byed na de nges par 'ong
295b5(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// mngon sum du bzlas na'ang 'ong bar 'gyur ro// gal te 'ong bar mi byed na de'i mgo 'gas pa 'am skam par 'gyur ro// yi ge gcig pa 'di ni gzhan ci zhig yin/
295b6(rgyud): gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba de de bzhin gshegs pa 'di nyid mngon sum yin te/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na sngags dang rig pa thams cad kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa nyid do//
295b7(rgyud): gdugs dkar po dang gzi brjid phung po la sogs pa ni 'di'i g.yog 'khor yin te/ gtsug tor gyi rgyal po thams cad kyis kyang bsgrub par bya ba yin te/ cho ga thams cad 'di nyid la s+ya
296a1(rgyud): bar bya zhing / gtsug tor gyi rgyal po thams cad kyis kyang 'di bsgrub par bya'o// cho ga thams cad kyis kyang 'di bsgrub par bya'o// dngos grub dam pa 'dod pas kyang
296a2(rgyud): gnas ma yin par sbyang bar mi bya'o// gal te sbyor bar byed na grub pa dang par 'gyur ba ma yin zhing / mdor na lha thams cad kyang 'dis 'gugs par byed do// de nas gter 'byin par 'dod dgapa
296a3(rgyud): du gter yod pa der song la rtsa ba mi gnag pa'i bum pa blangs nas dri zhim po thams cad kyi lde gus byugs te/ tsan dan dkar po dang chus nang du bcug ste stong rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas
296a4(rgyud): na/ gal te gter yod nas de rang bye bar 'gyur ro// gal te gter de mi gang tsam na yod na chus gtor la khru gang tsam brkos la blang bar bya'o// ci ste seng ge sgrub par 'dod na grog mkhar gyis
296a5(rgyud): dang gi'u wang gi lde gus bsres pa'i gong bu las byas nas bzhag ste mchod pa rgya chen po byas la ji srid 'gul ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas pa byas na 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'gul ba na 'grub
296a6(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// rgyab tu non nan cha ga du ba kor dang 'dra zhing 'khyil ba'i sgra dang bdag dang bcas pa'i 'khor lnga bcu dang nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// tshangs pa ji lta bar lo sbyang
296a7(rgyud): phrag brgyar 'tshe bar 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis mi thub par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du glang po che dang ma he bsgrub par bya'o// gang gi tshe seng ge seng ge'i sgra sgrog pa de'i tshe
296b1(rgyud): lha rnams stan las sa la ltung bar 'gyur ro// pad+ma'i mchod phyin nas pad+ma 'bur gyis mdzod nus kun gyi rgyal thabs thob par 'gyur ro// shing ka ra wI ra'i me tog kha ma 'bus pa'i sbyin
296b2(rgyud): sreg 'bum byas na rgyal po'i bu mo thob par 'gyur ro// snga ma'i me tog 'bum gyis rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu bo la sngags dang bcas pas gtor na gang 'dod pa'i bu mo thob par 'gyur dang /
296b3(rgyud): grub pa mchog thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba 'di'i sngags kyis ni de gang du 'ong ba der dbang po'a'adi la stan stobs par 'gyur ro// lha'i rgyal po
296b4(rgyud): thams cad kyis kyang ring po nas mthong na 'jigs pas dga' bar 'gyur ro// lha rnams kyi rgyal po thams cad du'ang 'gyur ro// de ltar rgya cher bcom ldan 'das shAkya seng ge mi mcho
296b5(rgyud): gis gsungs pa yin no// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ yi ge gcig pa'i 'khor los
296b6(rgyud): sgyur ba'i las kyi cho ga dang ras ris bstan pa'i le'u rab 'byams las nyi shu pa rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang gnas gtsang ba
296b7(rgyud): gzhal med khang la gzigs nas/ de na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos dang / 'jam dpal
297a1(rgyud): gzhon nur byung ba la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal bstan pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor du gyur pa/ chos kyi mdzod/ 'jig rten pa rnams kyi
297a2(rgyud): bsam pa 'bras bu dang bcas pa byed pa'i phyir nor bu rin po che lta bur gyur pa'o// dus kyi tha ma'i dus de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das shing / sangs rgyas kyi
297a3(rgyud): dag stongs pa nas dam pa'i chos kyi tshul nub pa'i dus chod na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi mdzod yang dag par bsrung ba'i phying / gzhon nu khyod kyi sngags dang rgyud rnams kyi
297a4(rgyud): ga'i rgyal po ni thun mong du gyur cing gter du gyur par 'gyur ba yin te/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir cho ga bzhin du bzlas pa byas na thob pa yin no//
297a5(rgyud): 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags dang rgyud rnams kyi 'di ni snying por gyur pa yin te/ gzhon nu khyod kyi cho ga'i rgyal po 'di ni mchog tu gyur pa yin ro// yi ge gcig pa'o/
297a6(rgyud): 'khor los sgyur ba 'di bzlas pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i rgyal po bzlas par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gzhan yang khyod kyi cho ga'i rgyal po gter du gyur pa// snying po
297a7(rgyud): gyur pa/ mchog tu gyur pa/ gtso bor gyur pa/ yi ge gcig pa sngon byung bar gyur to// 'das pa'i dus dang 'das pa'i dus chod du gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma drug cu rtsa gnyis snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs
297b1(rgyud): pa dang / tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa//
297b2(rgyud): bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gis dran pa tsam ma pa/ ma
297b3(rgyud): 'dzin pas kyang mtshams med pa lnga'i las kyang zad par gyur/ gang gis mtshan thos pa tsam gyis kyang sems can mang po nges par byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur na/ sngags 'grub pa lta spos
297b4(rgyud): kyang ci dgos/ sngags zlos pa thams cad kyis kyang nges par tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'di la dang por dag gis
297b5(rgyud): kyang phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag
297b6(rgyud): 'tshal lo// de bzhin du de nas 'od dpag med dang rin chen tog la phyag bya'o// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag byas nas ci 'dod pa'i sngags bzlas pa byas dmyur du grub pa stsol ba
297b7(rgyud): 'gyur te/ gang gi phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa gsum gyi mtshan yongs su bsgrags pa dang phyag 'tshal bas ni bsod nams chen po 'phel ba'i phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams
298a1(rgyud): la'ang phyag 'tshal bas ni nges par byang chub la gzhol ba dang / dge ba'i tshigs 'di yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i grangs su 'gro zhing de'i
298a2(rgyud): sngags kyang myur du 'grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro// tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
298a3(rgyud): kyis yi ge gicig pa'o sngags 'di gsungs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang / sngags dang / rgyud thams cad kyi mngon par 'dod pa/ sngags thams cad kyi don sgrub par
298a4(rgyud): byed pa/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs khyod kyi cho ga'i rgyal po mchog tu gtsang ba dang / gtsang ba dam pa dang / 'jig rten rnams la phan pa'i phyir rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// slob pa ma yin pa dang
298a5(rgyud): chos dang mi ldan pa dang / de bzhin du ston pa dang bstan pa la ma dad pa dang / gzhan gyis pham pa dang / ma rungs pa dang / nga rgyal can dang / ston pa dang bstan pa la nyes pa 'tshel ba la ni nam yang
298a6(rgyud): rab tu sbyar bar mi bya'o// rgyal ba'i sras la rab tu mi dang ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams la'ang bachod pa dang / rjes su gzung ba mi bzod pa de la ni ngas sbyin par mi bya'o// de la
298a7(rgyud): ni sngags grub pa mi snang ste/ dad cing zhi ba'i sems ldan dang // sangs rgyas bstan la rab tu dang // byang chub sems la rtag tu ni/ mchod dang rjes gzang de gcong byed// de la sngags 'ang
298b1(rgyud): 'grub 'gyur zhes// cho ga 'dir ni yang dag bstan// sngags chen yi ge gcig pa ni// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis nges par sbyar// 'jig rten mgon 'dis sngags 'di mi/ re bskyed byed/
298b2(rgyud): stsol ba yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po yi// sngags rnams ma lus 'byung ba'i gnas/ bdun cu rtsa drug bye ba ni// rang byung nyid kyis sdod gsungs pa// lus can sdig pas
298b3(rgyud): rmongs rnams la// sngags rnams dge ba'i don du yin// de bzhin gshegs rnams kun gyi sngags// stor pa'i gzugs su yang dag gnas// de dag la 'di snying por gyur// rig/
298b4(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che// yi ge gcig par rtag par gnas// ther zug tu yang 'dir rab 'jug/ 'dir ni chos kyi mthar gnas te// 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas yin//
298b5(rgyud): chos kyi tshul la yang dag gnas// 'di ni yi ge gcig pa yin// sngags ni don rnams ma lus sgrub// rgyal po ma rungs zlog byed yin// las ni sna tshogs byed pa yin// las
298b6(rgyud): kun pa lus sgrub pa'o// las ni rtsa brgyad stong po rnams// nges par yang ri byed par 'gyur// cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis ni// phun sum tshogs pa sna tshogs ster// 'jam
298b7(rgyud): dpal gyi ni snying po ni// yi ge ma dang yang dag ldan// yi ge u dang rtag 'gro zhes// 'jig rten na ni rtag 'jug 'gyur// tshe dang ye shes dpag med rgyal// dbang pos nges
299a1(rgyud): pa'i don du gsungs// 'jam pa'i dbyangs la sangs rgyas kyis// dbang gi don du 'dirang sbyin// des na dus mtha'i 'jig rten 'dipa/ ston pa mya ngan 'das pa/
299a2(rgyud): na/ cho ga mthong ba'i rgyu yis ni/ myur du grub par 'gro bar 'gyur// tshe ni dpag med ces bya bas// rnam par brtags par gyur pa yin// der ni bcom ldan sangs rgyas te/ chos
299a3(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo skor byed pa// dpag med bskal par gnas pa na// tshe la dbang bar byin gyis brlabs// de nyid phyin de mtshan gyur// dpag med tshe dang ye shes nges// 'jig
299a4(rgyud): rten kun gyi rgyal po'i dbang // rdzu 'phrul che 'di de bzhin gshegs// des ni sngags mchog gtso 'di byin// sangs rgyas sras po blo dang ldan// sras kyi gtso bo dam pa ni/ rdzu
299a5(rgyud): 'phrul che zhing stobs kyang che// de nas sras po de nyid kyis// 'di ni kun tu bzang la sbyor// de nas sangs rgyas sras rnams la// de ni de bzhin gshegs dag gis/ sngags
299a6(rgyud): rnams kyi ni mchog gyur pa// chos kyi rgyal pos gsungs pa ni// 'byung po rnams la pa don du// sngags rnams ma lus gsungs pa yin// tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam
299a7(rgyud): par nges pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po che dpag tu med pa dang // 'od
299b1(rgyud): dpag tu med pa dang / rin chen tog la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum sngags bzlas par bya'o// yi ge gcig
299b2(rgyud): pa de gang zhe na/ muM/ grogs po dag 'di ni tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par gdon mi za ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
299b3(rgyud): kyis bkod pa dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su bzhugs te gsungs pa ni sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir
299b4(rgyud): dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i don dang / ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo dag la gzigs nas bstan pa nub pa'i dus tshod du mkhyen nas/ dus kyi tha ma la dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa'i ma
299b5(rgyud): rungs pa'i rgyal po bzlog pa'i phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi sras kyi gtso bo mthu chen po thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la sbyin pa'i phyir dang /
299b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis kun tu bzang po la byin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po des kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la byid do// 'jab dang
299b7(rgyud): gzhon nurur gyur pa des kyang sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir/ snying rje chen po'i dbang gis snying gi gnas su rang gi lus la bzhag go// ma 'ongs pa'i dus la bltos nas
300a1(rgyud): dus kyi tha ma bstan pa nub pa'i dus chod la de bzhin gshegs pa'i tha ma bdag gis kyang bstan te rtsod pa'i dus dang / bstan pa 'jig pa'i dus su nga'i bsdud pa/
300a2(rgyud): yang dag par srung ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro// 'di'i cho ga gzhan yang mdor bsdus nas brjod par bya ba ni 'jam pa'i dbyangs gzhon nu nyon cig/ bdag nyid chen po'i cho ga rgya che ba 'di'i tshe
300a3(rgyud): ga'i rgyal po'i dbang po brjod par bya ste/ dang por re zhig ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs te 'bum phrag sum cu bzlas pa byas na sngar bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro// 'o mas 'tsho zhing mi smra ba'i
300a4(rgyud): brtul zhugs dang / sngags gzhan la mi bstan pa dang / gzhan la mi sems pa dang / skyabs gsum yongs su blang ba dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / khrims lnga'i
300a5(rgyud): sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa yang dag par blangs pas bzlas pa byas la/ de las rnams bya ba ste/ dang por re zhig ras la ri mo bya ba ni ri mo
300a6(rgyud): mkhan gso sbyong byas la tshon ma 'dres pa dag gis bri'o// gtsang ma'i ngas kyi dum bu gang yang rung ba 'am/ dpal tsan dan dang / ga pung dang / gur kum gyi chus gtong la/
300a7(rgyud): gtsang ba'i sa phyogs su gtsang ba'i ri mo byed pa dkar gsum za zhing gos dkar po gyon pas/ zla ba nye ba'i bco lnga la nyi ma 'tshang ba'i dus su rnam par dag pa'i rgyu skar la nyi ma phyed pa'i
300b1(rgyud): bar du bri bar bya ste/ de nas grib spang bar bya'o// de bzhin du nyin re zhing yang yongs su rdzogs kyi bar du bya'o// dang po be zhig ras la tshe dpag tu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bri bang/
300b2(rgyud): bya'o// ras khru gang tsam mam/ bde bar gshegs pa'i mthogang gi tshad dam/ ras khru bzhi pa la kho ra khor yug tu che dpag tu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams zi'o// pad+ma rA ga dang
300b3(rgyud): in+d+ra rI la dang / shel dang / rin po che margad kyis ras ris kyi 'og gi phyogs su mdzes pa bya'o// de dag gi steng gi phyogs su rin po che'i gzhal med khang mdzes pa'i rnam pa dang / rgyal
300b4(rgyud): mtshan dang / ba dan mdzes pa'i rnam par bsgreng ba dang / de'i dbus su tshe dpag tu med pa rnam par gdon mi za ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'chad pa/ seng ge'i khri la bzhug
300b5(rgyud): pa/ kun nas 'od kyi 'phreng ba rab tu 'bar ba/ kha dog cung zad dmang zhing dkar ba/ g.yon phyogs su mthing shing gi rdo la bzhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu
300b6(rgyud): chen thob phyag g.yas na rnga yab thogs shing de bzhin gshegs pa la bstod pa'i lta ba dang / lag pa g.yon na sgyur rtsi chen po'i shing thog thogs pa/ me tog pri yang ku ltar sngo ba sangs
300b7(rgyud): gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis lus brgyan pa/ kun nas khor yug tu 'od 'phro ba/ g.yas ngos su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po rin po che'i ri la bzhugs pa
301a1(rgyud): lag pa g.yas pan ngas pa thogs shing gso pa/ lag pa gsod na nam tu thogs pa/ can thams ca kyis brgyan sa/ rna mtha' bo pa kyis cu
301a2(rgyud): pa/ me tog pri yang ku ltar cung zad dkar ba/ ras sngon po g.yo ba dang ldan pas g.yogs pa mu tig gi 'phreng ba dang na po ches mchod phyir thogs byas pa/ khor yug rab tu 'bar bas 'brel
301a3(rgyud): pa/ de'i g.yas ngos su 'phags pa 'jam dpal rin po che'i ril gnas pa/ gzhon nur gyur pa zung bud lngas mgo legs par mdzes par byas la/ byis pa gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/
301a4(rgyud): gser gyi mdog dang 'dra ba/ dang sngon po g.yo ba can mnabs pa/ mu tig gi 'phreng ba dang na po che 'dzin cing 'dres pa'i mchod phyir thogs byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs par song ba
301a5(rgyud): lta ba/ cung zad bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan pa/ zhi ba'i rnam pa/ gzugs mdzes pa dang thal mo sbyor ba/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa bri bar bya'o// de'i 'og tu rtags
301a6(rgyud): dang / cha byad dang / dbyibs 'dzin pa'i sgrub pa po me tog gi 'phreng ba 'dzin cing / pus po'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas yang dag par 'dug pa dang / mgo mngon par btud pa ras ris
301a7(rgyud): kyi zur gyi mtha' ma'i phyogs su bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhi bri bar bya'o// g.yas phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis bri bar
301b1(rgyud): bya ba la sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / rin chen tog khor yug tu kun nas 'bar ba'i 'od dang ldan pa/ g.yor phyogs su gser thub dang / 'od srungs rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog
301b2(rgyud): dang ldan pa/ me tog thams cad kyi gcal bkram pa/ pad+ma'i garan gnyis la bzhugs pa/ ha cang mi ring ba na chos 'chad cing skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dang
301b3(rgyud): ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi steng nas me tog gi char rab tu 'bab pa/ sprin gyi nang nas ro stong byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ma mkha' la lding ba spyan mdzes zhes bya ba mngon
301b4(rgyud): par bri bar bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ kun nas 'bar ba'i 'od kyi 'phreng ba dang ldan pa/ phyag g.yas pas mchog sbyid pa/ phyag g.yon pas chos gos kyi mtha'
301b5(rgyud): ma la 'dzin pa 'di ni tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ras ris kyi cho ga
301b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid yi ge gcig pa'i sngags kyi mchog 'di yin te/ 'di ni gtsug tor gyi rgyal po gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba dang rab tu 'gran pa/ brtson 'grus mtshungs pa
301b7(rgyud): stobs mtshungs pa 'di'i yon tan rgya che ba'i mthu ni bsam gyi mi khyab ste/ rdzu 'phrul che zhing stobs che ba/ mdor na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi rgyal po 'khor los sgyur/
302a1(rgyud): ba yin no// yi ge gcig pa la cho ga rgya cher bstan pa gang yin pa de thams cad kyang byed do// ma bsgrubs kyang bzlas pa tsam gyis kyang las rnams byed na// bstsuH/
302a2(rgyud): pas lta smos kyang ci dgos/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang 'dod pa'ang thob par 'gyur ro// yid kyis gang mngon par 'dod pa der ras ris mthong ba tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/
302a3(rgyud): ro// nges par byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ro// de nyid bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i dbang pos byin gyis brlabs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa/
302a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi snying po zhes brjod do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi rgyal po zhes brjod do// 'khor los sgyur ba zhes brjod do// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po
302a5(rgyud): zhes brjod do// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i snying po zhes brjod do// yi ge gcig pa zhes brjod do// mdor na 'di'i mthu bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ gang gi phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyis/
302a6(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sgrub pa med pa dang / sngon du spyod pa ma byas pa dang / khyim gyi rtsom pa thams cad la
302a7(rgyud): rab tu gnas pa dang / bza' ba thams cad sha dang / chang dang / grong gi chos la rab tu zhugs pa dag la'ang 'grub ste/ dad pa med pa dang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa med pa ni ma gtogs te/ 'di dag
302b1(rgyud): lani grub pa med do// dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa dang / de la zhugs pa la gnod pa byed pa dang / 'di dag la'ang mas phra mo'ang grub pa med na/ grub pa 'bring dang rabal ni lta smos
302b2(rgyud): kyang ci dgos/ 'dod pa thams cad dang / bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / spyod pa gtsor byed pa'i sgrub pa po la ni las stong rtsa brgyad kyi las phrad tshegs la rab tu sbyar bas 'grub par
302b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de dag kyang gang zhe na/ drang por re zhig lan gcig bzlas pas bdag bsrung ngo // lan gnyis bzlas pas gzhan bsrung bar 'gyur ro// lan gsum bzlas pas
302b4(rgyud): bsrung ba dam par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu la rab tu gnas pas kyang yang dag par bskyed par mi nus na/ de las gzhan pa'i sems can gyis lta smos
302b5(rgyud): kyang ci dgos/ tsher sna lnga'i skud pa la lan pa ni bzlas nas rked par bcings na sa bon bsdams par 'gyur ba yin te/ rmi lam na'ang 'di la sa bon 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rang 'dod pa/
302b6(rgyud): ni ma gtogs te/ de nyin par ngam mtshan mo gcig la gal te 'dod pa na nyi ma re re zhing bya'o// ci ste mi 'dod thal ba la lan bdun bsngags pa byas nas lta ba'i phyogs su bskus nazhag
302b7(rgyud): bdun phrag gsum du sa bon bsdam pa byas par 'gyur ro// lan lnga bzlas te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsgoms na gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// zla ba gzas zin cing zla ra
303a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor thams cad 'dzin pan shing a rka'i la rab tu srang la/ ras ris med kyang shar du mngon par bltas te mar gyis sreg thugs stong phrag bcus sbyi
303a2(rgyud): sreg bya'o// rgyal po'i pho zang dang nye ba/ chu bos par ma bcad pa/ lha'i gnas su ma byas pa/ phyogs gang du rgyal po gnas pa de dang nye bar sbyin sreg rab tu sgyur na tho rangs rgyal po
303a3(rgyud): dbang du 'gyur ro// gang smras pa de thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// gal te dbang du ma gyur na de'i tshe de'i sems phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba 'am/ sems g.yeng ba thob par gyur na phyir yang /
303a4(rgyud): bzlog par bya ste/ 'o ma'i sreg blugs stong rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin sreg byas// gang de'i dus de nas brtsams nas rang bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro// las de dag ni dad pa dang ldan pa
303a5(rgyud): dang / dkon mchog gsum la dad pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams la ni mi bya ste/ gal te byed na shin tu bsod napas ma yin pa'i phung po chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzhan
303a6(rgyud): dag la gnod pa byed pa ma rungs pa'i sems dang / drag pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams la ni bya ba yin no// nyin re zhing yang mthong ba sbyin par byas na sems zhi bar 'gyur ro// gal te/
303a7(rgyud): ni bar ma gyur phung krol chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// srog gi lhag ma tsam lus par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang las su 'gyur ba ni zla ba gzas zin gyi dus su shing ba la sha'i yam shing
303b1(rgyud): gis me rab tu sbar te mar gyis sreg blugs stong rtsa brgyad byas na tho rangs yul gyi bdag po'i rgyal po spyan drang bar 'gyur ro// de dang lhan cig gros byas na bsam pa bden pa nye bar stod par/
303b2(rgyud): 'gyur te/ de la bstan ngag byas na zla ba drug gi nang du bsod nams stong yod pa'i grong ster bar 'gyur ro// gal te zla gcig mtshan phyed du sbyin sreg byas na zla ba gsum gyis steng bar 'gyur
303b3(rgyud): ro// gal te thun thams cad kyi mtshan mo sbyin sreg byas na zla gcig gis thob par 'gyur ro// gal te zla gcig mtshan po re re la sbyin sreg byas na yul thob par 'gyur ro// yang na yul
303b4(rgyud): dang 'dra ba'i grong ngam/ yang na gzhan cung zad nor yod pa la'ang dgra yod par mi 'gyur te/ gal te dgra yod na'ang las rnams byas te zla ba gzas zin pa na shing a pa margas me rab tu spang la//
303b5(rgyud): shing pa la sha'i yam shing la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pas bram ze'i sgra la sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad bya'o// de'i tha mang shing pi tsu mdza'i lo ma la ske tshe'i 'bru mar gyis/
303b6(rgyud): btags pa'i sreg blugs kyis sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na tho rangs bram ze'i dgra zhi bar 'gyur ro// gal te rgyal po sdang bar gyur na las gzhan yang yod de/ zla ba gzas zin pa la
303b7(rgyud): shing ji snyed pas me rab tu sbar la mar gyi sreg blugs kyis sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas la/ sbyin sreg gi tha ma phyogs gang na rgyal po yod pa de'i phyogs su thal ba de gtor na de dbang du 'gyur
304a1(rgyud): ro// dus gang la longs spyod gang 'dod pa rgya che ba de dag gis grogs kyang byed par 'gyur ro// grong nyung ba 'am mang po rab tu ster bar 'gyur te/ nges par zla ba drug gis/
304a2(rgyud): don yod par 'grub par yang 'gyur ro// de nas rigs bzhi las gang yang rung ba brtags/ gtso bo dang ldan pa 'am/ lha gzhan nam/ 'jig rten pa la dad pa dag sems 'khrug par gyur na/
304a3(rgyud): phyogs gang na gnas pa der thal ba de gtor na yul gzhan du 'gro bar 'gyur ba 'am/ skyo bar 'gyur ba 'am/ mtshan mo dpal bar 'gyur ba 'am/ nye du la gnod par 'gyur ro// de phyir gas
304a4(rgyud): ba ni 'o ma'i sreg blugs stong rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin sreg byas na sos par 'gyur ro// yang na gza' bzhi po nyid kyi tsho gas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sku gzugs dang / ras ris
304a5(rgyud): sam/ dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam mam/ sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la gos gtsang ma bgos shing nyid zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/ srog rags med pa'i chu las bya zhing /
304a6(rgyud): me tog dkar po dri zhim po dang / gur kum dang ldan pa dang / ga pur gyi dud pas bdugs par bya'o// gang du las la sbyar ba ni bram ze'i dgra la ni shing pa la shes bya'o// rgyal rigs
304a7(rgyud): kyi dgra la ni shing a shwad thas bya'o// rje'u rigs kyi dgra la ni shing seng ldeng gis bya'o// dmangs rigs kyi dgra la ni de las gzhan pa'i shing gis me rab tu sbar la de nyid kyi las bya'o//
304b1(rgyud): zam ze'i rigs la nang shing ba la ga'i lam shing dang / rgyal rigs la ni a byung ba'i lam shing dang / rje'u rigs lani sed ldeng gi yam / 'drang / dpangs rigs la ni ma pa ldan
304b2(rgyud): yam shing ngam/ de las gzhan ji snyed pas mar gyis sbyin sreg bya'o// de bzhin du las gzhan yang bya ba ni rgyal po chen po la ni shing a pa ra tsi ta'i rtsa ba'i sam shing dang / mar gyi sreg
304b3(rgyud): blugs stong rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin sreg bya'o// tha mar yang de nyid kyi thal bas gtor bar bya'o// gang gi phyogs nas sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'ong ba de'i phyogs su gtsug tor 'khor
304b4(rgyud): los sgyur ba yi ge gcig pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas gtor ro// yang na ut+pa la'i phyag rgya bcings na de 'jigs nas ldog pa 'am/ dmag gi tshogs nyams par 'gyur ba 'am/ gzhan
304b5(rgyud): yang gang cung zad rnam par ltung ba chen por 'gyur ba 'am/ 'go ba'i nad chen po 'am/ sems sdug bsngal bar gnas pa 'am/ gang gis 'di'i ngag ldog par 'gyur ba 'am
304b6(rgyud): 'di dag dang gzhan yang ji ltar 'dod pa'i las rnams byed par 'gyur ro// gos la mngon par bsngags te bgos ra skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro// mig sman la mngon par bsngags te/ mig
