454a5(rgyud): sa srungs mang po ni// rgya che thams cad nyam chung ba'i// blo chung rnams kyis rtogs par byed// rgyal po'i gtso bo mdor bsdus nas// ming ni 'di dag nges par brjod// dang po'i yi ge
454a6(rgyud): dang na// dang po'i yi ge par yang bstan// dang po'i yi ge ba dang i// dang po'i yi ge ar yang bstan// dang po'i yi ge har bstan te// dang po'i yi ge bar yang bsgrags// dang po'i yi ge
454a7(rgyud): dang wa// dang yig d+ha ni zla ba'i rigs// yi ge ha nyid rnam bsgrags dang // de bzhin yang ni dang po'i a// dang po'i yi ge sa la yang // bud med rigs min 'jig rten snga ba/ dang po'i yi ge a dang
454b1(rgyud): ma/ 'jig rten namal mthu dang ldan// rim gyis rim gyis rigs dag ni// bram ze rje'u rigs dag tu 'jug/ phal cher chos min las byed cing // rnam sdang bud med la brkam chags// sa
454b2(rgyud): srungs skyon ni rab mang bar// deng tshe dus kyi tha ma la// yul gyi dbus su mi yi bdag/ 'byung bar 'gyur bar the tsom med// dus kyi tha mar 'di dag tshe// lo ni brgya dang nyi shu nyid// de yi tshe
454b3(rgyud): na mi rnams kyi// tshe ni ring bar rab tu bstan// de dag bar ma bzang po las// khyad par ring dang thung ba yin// rgyal po rnams ni tshe thung bar// de tshe dus su bstan pa ni// gang+gA'i 'gram gyi dog/
454b4(rgyud): dang ni// gangs can gyi ni ri zhol dang // de tshe ka ma ru yul du// de 'dra'i rgyal po 'byung bar 'gyur// dang po bar ma tha ma yin// rigs kyi lhag ma brjod bya ste// dang po'i gtso bo chen po

454b6(rgyud): 'byor gzhon nu dang // yi ge ba dang tha gnyis ni// yangs pa can du yang dag byung // gang du thub pa de skyes pa// ser skya zhes bya'i grong mchog tu// tha mar zas gtsang shAka rigs

455a1(rgyud): yin// gang zhig rgyal bas gsungs sngags dang // de bzhin bran po'i tshogs kun dang / po nya'i tshigs kun du ma dang // rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs dag kyang // rgyud rnams
455a2(rgyud): kun gyi don rig pas// ba sgrubs na grub par 'gyur ba yin// 'jig rten kun gyi sngags dag ni// yul gyi dbus der 'grub par 'gyur// dbus yul gnas par khyad par du//

455a7(rgyud): dbus kyi yul dang nub phyogs dang // byang phyogs dang ni shar phyogs dang // de bzhin phyogs mtshams thams cad dang // rnam pa bzhi du mtshon pa yi// gling dag de bzhin kun tu/

455b5(rgyud): bstan// dus kyi tha ma de dus su// rab tu gnas par the tsom med// de dag phyogs la gnas par ri// rgyal po thams cad gsungs pa yin// de bzhin shAkya'i gsung rab la// nges
455b6(rgyud): par rab byung gnas nas ni// 'jig rten mig gcig gyur pa yi// thub pa mchog ni med pa na// rtag tu sngags sbal dad pas// bstan pa'i don ni byed par 'gyur// de dag gzhon du ba

456a1(rgyud): the tsom med// dper na ma khol zhes bya dang // me tog ces byar rnam par grags// yi ge ma zhes gzhon nu zhes// dang po tha mar chos la dga'// klus bos zhes
456a2(rgyud): kyang rnam par grags// rin chen 'byung zhes bya ming dang // yi ge ga zhes gzhon du zhes// yi ge ba zhes chos sems byed// yi ge a ming bdag nyid che// ston pa'i bstan pa gces
456a3(rgyud): 'dzin byed// blo ldan yon tan kun gyis bkun// dang po'i yi ge la zhes bstan// rgyal po sangs rgyas pa yi phyogs// ston pa'i bstan pa gsal bar byed// sdom brtson yi ge a

456a5(rgyud): 'gyur// blo ldan tshe ni drug cur 'tshe// ka shi zhes bya'i grong du gnas// yi ge d+ha zhes sdom brtson nyid// lho yi phyogs su rnam par bsgrags// pha rol rgol ba bzlo gnas kyang /
456a6(rgyud): bzhin sdom brtsod sngags kyang grub// gzhan yang rapa byung dar pa ni// sing g+ha la yi grong ra gnas// 'phags pa min la 'phags pa'i ming // sing g+ha la yi gling na gnas// pha rol rgol
456a7(rgyud): ba bzlog nas ni// mu stegs rnams kyis sngags sun phyung // de dus 'jigs su rung ba yi// dus kyi mtha' la 'byung bar 'gyur// yi ge da dpal dang por// sdom brtson gang zhig/
456b1(rgyud): rab gsungs dang // yi ger dang ba dang por// dge slong gang zhig rab byung gsungs// ston pa'i bstan pa gsal byed pa// 'byung bar 'gyur bar the tsom med// rgyal po nag po zhes bya/

456b3(rgyud): pa nyid rnams ni// byed par 'gyur bar the tsom med// mtshon gyis lus nig mtho ris 'gre// de nas yi ge sa dang ka/ dang po dag tu brjod pa dang // de bzhin yi ger dang bya// dang
456b4(rgyud): po dag tu rab brjod dang // dang por yi ge ba dang ni// legs bzhin legs te de zhes bstan// sbyir byed sbyin par byed pa nyid// gzhan gyi grub mtha' sur byed pa// tshong pa sngon dang

456b6(rgyud): don yang byed// blo ldan dang por yi ge ma// de bzhin sdom brtson dad pa 'byung // rnam pa du ma sdom brtson gsungs// de tshe mtha' yas 'byung bar 'gyur// sdom brtson thams cad
456b7(rgyud): bsgrags pa yang // ston pa'i bstan pa gsal byed pa'o// bstan pa de tshe sa steng du// rnam par nyams shing snang med la// ston pa'i gzugs brnyan yid du 'ong // byed par 'gyur
457a1(rgyud): bar the tsom med// thams cad byang chub lung bstan te// nga yi byang chub mchog thob 'gyur// de bzhin 'jig rter sbyin gnas 'gyur// srid pa gsum gyi mthar
457a2(rgyud): yang byed// sngags dang rgyud la mngon brtson pas// grags pa 'dzin par shes par bya// bram ze'i chos kyi ngang tshul can// da ni rab tu brjod par bya// sngags dang rgyud la mngon
457a3(rgyud): bzod pas// rgyal po'i lugs la nye bar gnas// de tshe mi bzad dus dag tu// 'jig rten kun la 'byung bar 'gyur// yi ge ba zhes bram ze mchog/ phyug cing rig byed pha rol phyin//
457a4(rgyud): deng 'dir sa rna bas ma lus par// rtsod pa'i phyir ni rab tu rgyu// mtsho gsum sa yi mthar thug par// pha rol mu stegs rtsod la dga'// gang phyir dang po gtso bo'i tshig/ sems can
457a5(rgyud): rnams la phan 'dod pas// gzhon nus yongs su gsungs gyur pa// yi ge drug pa'i sngags kyang zlos// cho ga rab 'byams 'di dag las// des ni de phan de la bstan// rgyal dang
457a6(rgyud): legs par rgyal ba dang // grags ldan dge la bde las gzhan// rigs ldan chos dang ldan pa dang // brtson ldan legs pa khyab 'jug dang // sbrang rtsi sbrang rtsi bzang po dang // de bzhin
457a7(rgyud): grub dang dregs bral dang // ra g+ha pa dang dmangs rigs dang // de bzhin ka shing skyes pa gzhan// gzhon du 'di yi bzlas pa la// thams cad kun yang 'byung bar 'gyur// de dag kun
457b1(rgyud): kyang bzang po ste// blo ldan mang du thos pa yin// de kur sngags ni sngodan du gyur// rgyal po'i 'tshe bas yang dag gnas// de 'og rnam par grags pa ni// bram ze dang po'i yi ge bi// grong khyer/
457b2(rgyud): me tog ces bya bar// de ni khro bo grub par gyur// dbul bas yongs su zil mnan pa// rgyal po rnams ni tshar bcad byas// khro rgyal gshin rje gshed de yi// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis
457b3(rgyud): 'drir gsungs pa// sems can ma rungs rnams dang ni// gdul bka' 'dul bar byed pa dang // phan pa min las bzlog don dang // phan pa nye bar 'phel phyir dang // sems can rnams
457b4(rgyud): ni rjes gzung dang // sems can srog 'chad dgag phyir ro// bram ze'i khye'u rmongs pa de// dbul ba khro ba chags pa yis// rgyal po'i srog la gnod pa'i phyir// khro bo'i sngags ni zlos
457b5(rgyud): par byed// de 'og rnam par grags pa ni// bram ze yi ge dang po a// chos don dge ba ldan bdag nyid// bden par smra zhing dbang po thul// mnga' bdag mang pos bkur ces pa//
457b6(rgyud): tshe sngags ni zlos par 'gyur// sngags ni sgrub par gyur pa la// dbang 'gyur yin gyi gzhan ma yin// 'byung po dbang du gyur pa na// de tshe ner dang ldan par 'gyur// de 'og rnam par grags/
457b7(rgyud): pa ni// bram ze chos don sems byed pa// de nas mthar ni dang yig sha/ ma la'i yul du de ni 'byung // sa steng sngags ni zlos par grags// bstan pa mchog la'ang rab tu dang // rig
458a1(rgyud): #pa rjes gzung ma rungs dang // tshangs pa'i srin po srin po dang // 'byung po shin tu ma rungs bcas// rnam pa sna tshogs shu za dang / khartan dang 'gro ba sna tshogs ni/
458a2(rgyud): de dag ma lus dbang du 'gyur// de bzhin bram ze'i mtshan ldan pa// thams cad de yi dbang du 'gyur// de 'og rnam par grags pa ni// lho yi phyogs su bram ze ni// yi ge dang po pa bstan/
458a3(rgyud): pa/ ston pa'i bstan pa de gtsetso byed// mchod rten kun dga' ra ba gnas// ston pa'i gzugs brnyan yid 'ong gis// sa ni rgya mtsho gnyis mthar thug/ thams cad kyi ni rgyan du byas
458a4(rgyud): de 'og rnam par grags pa ni// bram ze gtso bo dor chen ldan// dang po'i yi ge na zhes pa// lho yi phyogs su yang dag brten// bdag nyid chen po sngags zlos ldan// nges par byang chub
458a5(rgyud): gzhol bar 'gyur// dbus kyi yul du bstan pa ni// bram ze gang ba bzang zhes pa// 'dul ba dang ni tshul bzang nyid// gang ba bcom pa rlag dag tu gnas// dang yig b+ha ni nor gyi spya//
458a6(rgyud): rgyal po rnams kyi sngags mchod byed// zam ze 'di dag bstan pa ni// ston pa'i bstan pa mchod byed pa'o// thog ma par mtha' gtso bo ste// rnam pa sna tshogs gnas dang rigs//
458a7(rgyud): phyogs kyi bram ze rnams// bram ze gzhan gyis mchod par byed// mu stegs sna tshogs rigs dang ni// rnam pa sna tshogs spyod yul spyod// gnas ni kun tu gsungs pa ste// bram ze khyen
458b1(rgyud): mang thos yin// rang byung sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal// sems can kun gyi dor sgrub pa// sems can rnams ni ma lus dang // lha gnas kyis kyang mchod pa'o// rgyal po chen po bzhi po yang /
458b2(rgyud): 'jig rten kun la grags pa ste// 'phags skyes po dang mig mi bzang // yul 'khor srung dang gnod sbyin rgyal// brgya byin de nas lha rnams kyis// nges pa'i tsher ni rab tu bsgrags
458b3(rgyud): 'thab bral lha yi bu dang ni// 'phrul dga' gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang // rgyal po dga' ldan gsungs pa dang // 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug mchog/ gcig gi ming ni brgya byin sog/
458b4(rgyud): de bzhin 'dod khams dbang phyug yin// de yang rtag tu gcig gnas te// rdzu 'phrul chen po gcig gi gzungs// de yang mtha' yas dag tu bstan// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs 'chang /
458b5(rgyud): lha// de las gong du thams cad mnyam// de yang thams cad rdzu 'phrul che// lha yi gtso bo ming gcig ste// 'du shes med pa'i mtha' yang bstan// de dag gtso bo med pa ste// mnyam pa'i
458b6(rgyud): tshul du yang dag gnas// 'og tu mnar med mthar thug par// der ni rgyal po yod ma yin// 'jam dpal de lta bas na de ltar phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus su rigs kyi bu 'am// rigs kyi bu mo ga
458b7(rgyud): kha las de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi mdzod 'di glegs bam du chud par byas te 'dri bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kha ton du byed par 'gyur ba 'am/ glegs bam du byas te
459a1(rgyud): 'chang bar 'gyur/ gus par byas te yid la byas par 'gyur/ gos rnam pa sna tshogs dang / bye ma dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / dril bu dang /
459a2(rgyud): rol mo dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / spos dang / dri dang / dri zhim po dag gis mchod par byed par 'gyur/ ri bor byed par 'gyur/ yang dag par 'dzin par byed par 'gyur/ yid
459a3(rgyud): gcig pa'i sems kyis chos byed par 'gyur ba de la ni phan yon bcu po 'di dag tu 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ deng 'di la pha rol dmag tshegs kyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ chang
459a4(rgyud): 'bab pa mi mkhas pa dang / gza' dang / 'chi ba chen po'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa'am/ der 'di la me'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//
459a5(rgyud): phyir rgol ba thams cad kyi 'jigs pa 'am/ der 'di la nad kyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'am/ der 'di la dus ma yin pa'i char gyi 'jigs
459a6(rgyud): pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// char ches pa'i 'jigs pa'am/ der 'di la rlung chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// sha za thams cad kyi 'jigs pa'am/ der 'di la
459a7(rgyud): dgra'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du g.yon can rkun po'i 'jigs pa'am/ der 'di la 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// gshin rje'i rgyal pos khya pa'i 'jig/
459b1(rgyud): pa 'am/ der 'di la chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// lha thams cad dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za'i 'jigs pa 'am/ deng 'di la gzhan gyi sngags kyi 'jigs pa
459b2(rgyud): 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// sbyar ba'i dug thams cad kyi 'jigs pa 'am/ der 'di la nad kyi 'jigs pa dang / rims dang / tshad par 'khru ba dang / ma zhu ba dang / yan lag dang ting lag gi
459b3(rgyud): 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ phan yon bcu po 'di dag tu shes par bya'o// gang du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis cho ga chen po rab 'byams chos kyi mdzod 'di glegs bam du byas
459b4(rgyud): te banag la/ 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / mchod pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / kha ton du byed na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis shin tu bzung zhing chos kyi mdzod mngon du 'gyur ro// dam tshig
459b5(rgyud): gi spyod pa la rje sum zhugs pa dang / dam tshig mi shes pa gzhan dag la ni rnam pa thams cad du bstan par mi bya ste/ gang gi phyir 'di ni gsang ba yin pa'i phyir te/ 'dis ni thams cad
459b6(rgyud): mtshon pa yin ni sems can rnams kyis dran pa med par ma byed cig/ 'on kyang khyod kyis shes par 'gyur/ mchod pa byed par 'gyur/ yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur zhing / bsod nams
459b7(rgyud): chen po'ang rab tu skye bar 'gyur ro// sems can skal pa med pa rnams la bstan par mi bya ste/ gzhan du na dbul ba dang / nad dang / mdze dang / 'tshe ba dang / 'gro ba'i nad nyid byed par
460a1(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de bas na gzhan dag la'ang bstan par mi bya'o// dam tshig dang / gsang ba dang / gsang ba'i sngags kyi spyod pa la rjes su zhugs pa'i sems can rnams dang /
460a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la legs par brlabs pa rnams dang / legs par rnam par bzhag pa'i dran pa dang ldan pa rnams dang / chos kyi don la mkhas pa dang / bsam gtan la
460a3(rgyud): rab tu zhugs pa dang / chos la gnas pa dang / bden par smra ba dang / sems can gyi spyod pa la rab tu gnas shing snying rje'i spyod pa dang rab tu ldan pa rnams te/ sems can 'di dag la
460a4(rgyud): bstan par bya yi// gzhan dag la ni ma yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bstan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i
460a5(rgyud): lha nga sa la gtsugs te thal mo sbyar ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grang sa 'di'i ming ci zhes bya/ 'di bdag gis ji ltar gzung bar
460a6(rgyud): bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya bar yang zung zhing / ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba
460a7(rgyud): chos kyi man ngag legs par bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa rgyad thams cad kyi mdzod ces bya bar yang bung zhig/ theg pa
460b1(rgyud): chen po shin tu rgyas pa nges par bstan pa nyams pa med pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ byang chub sems dpa' sde snod ces bya bang yang bu nig/ 'phags pa 'ang ma dpal gyurtsa pa'i cho gnas/
460b2(rgyud): bya bar yang zung zhig/ chos thams cad kyi don rdzogs pa nges par bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ 'jig rten ma lus thams cad la// chos dang chos min rnam spyod cing // byang chub sems/
460b3(rgyud): dpa' rdzu 'phrul che// gang khyod kun tu rnam par rgyu// de bzhin chos kyi dam pa mchog/ gsang ba gzhan ni ma mthong ngo // sngags rgyud don dang mdo rnams dang // 'gro ba yul ni skyon med pa// byang
460b4(rgyud): chub chos la rab gzhol ba// dpa' bo gzhan ni ma mthong ngo // gang 'di bla ma gsang ba dang // dang dod mdo yis yongs su brgyan// rnam pa sna tshogs mdo don dang // sngags dang rgyud kyi rjes
460b5(rgyud): 'jug pa// cho ga rab 'byams 'di las gzhan// ma byung gang yang yod ma yin// rgyal srid chen po longs spyod che// lha gnas dag tu phur sum tshogs// de bzhin lha dang mi rnams kyi
460b6(rgyud): grags pargyas pa'ang thob par 'gyur// mi khom brgyad ni spong byed cing // dal ba dag ni thob par byed// theg pa rnam gsum bdag po dang // de nges sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// mdo'ang
460b7(rgyud): 'dzin pa'i bsod nams dang // de bzhin du ni phan yon ni// 'di yi lus la mchod mi 'byung // dug dang mes kyang ma yin no// ro langs dang ni gdon dang ni// de bzhin srul po ma mo dang // srid pong/
461a1(rgyud): bas 'tsho byed pa'ang // gang zhig mdo 'di 'don la min// 'chang ba dang ni klog pa dang // yang dang yang du mchod byed dang // 'jigs pa med pas mchod byed dgag rnam pa/
461a2(rgyud): sna tshogs mchod byed de// phan yon nu di ni rab bstan pa// 'jig rten 'di dri thob 'gyur ba/ nad pa rnams nand las grol// sdug bsngal can ni bde bar 'gyur// dbul pos nod ni tad 'gyur te//
461a3(rgyud): bcings pa rnams ni 'ching las grol// 'gro ba lnga dang ldan pa yi// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ltung ba rnams// bde ba zhi pa mya ngan 'das// mi g.yo go 'phang thob par 'gyur// rang rgyal sangs
461a4(rgyud): rgyas nyid dang ni// nyan thos mthar ni phyin par 'gyur// mdo sde 'di ni bklags pa yis// sangs rgyas sku mdog thob par 'gyur// gang+gA'i bye ma mnyam pa yi// rgyal ba mchog ni mtha' yas pa//
461a5(rgyud): mchod pa thob pa'i bsod nams dang // mdo 'di bton pa'i bsod nams mnyam// 'jig rten ji snyed gang su dag/ zhing ni bye ba mtha' yas pa// de srid phra rab rdul snyed kyi// sangs rgyas
461a6(rgyud): rnams la rtag mchod pa// rnam pa sna tshogs bza' btung dang // na ba rnams kyi gsos sman dang // rnam pa sna tshogs gnas mal rnams// rtag tu thams cad rab sbyin dang // rnam pa sna tshogs
461a7(rgyud): gos dang ni// phye ma dag ni kun gyis kyang // bsod nams skye bos thob gang yin// 'di dag 'chang dang klog pas so// gang zhig rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // 'jig rten nyan thos rdzu 'phrul
461b1(rgyud): che// byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che// sa bcu la gnas de las gzhan// de rnams tshad ni de mnyam la// de dag mchod pa'ang de bzhin te// gang gi lag par glegs pamachud/
461b2(rgyud): mi yis de mnyam bsod nams thob// 'jig rten ji snyed bstan pa yang // 'jig rten khams na gnas pa yi// grangs med sems can ma lus pa// thams cad nad ni med byas te// skye bo
461b3(rgyud): gang zhig yang dang yang // bkur stir byas nas de mchod pa// chos mchog 'di la mchod na ni// blo ldan de yis bsod nams thob// bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas par// rgyal ba mchog gis
461b4(rgyud): rtag par yang // 'jig rten mgon chos mdzad mchog 'di// mchod par yang ni mi nus so// chos mchog 'di ni sa steng du// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen 'dra// 'jam dpal cho ga 'dir gsungs
461b5(rgyud): pa// klog pa dang ni 'chad pa yis// des ni 'dod 'jo'i ba 'drar 'gyur// longs spyod che nor phun sum chogs// yid ni skyo ba med byas nas// sa stengs 'di ni rab tu sgru ba// sngags dang rgyud don
461b6(rgyud): drang ba'i don// don yod tshig ni rab bshad pa// bya ba dus la brten nas ni// sa steng rig pa 'dzin slu ba ni// rin chen phun tshogs rab gang ba// de yi phyogs kun dag tu gsungs// 'bras bcas
461b7(rgyud): 'gro ba'i bdag cid de// spyod pa baba' bar brjod pa yin// gang zhig cho ga mchog 'di las// rgyal po sngags gcig 'chang byed pa// rgyal srid sun tshogs 'dod bcas te// tshe dun du
462a1(rgyud): tshogs par 'gyur// rnam pa sna tshogs longs spyod tshogs// rgyal mchog dam pas thob par 'gyur// 'gro dang gnas pa'i dug dag dang // gzhan gyis byas pa'i rig pa dang //
462a2(rgyud): ro langs sngags kyi sgrub pa dang // mtshon gyis kyang ni gnod mi 'gyur// gzhan gyis gnod byed gtser byed pas// sa stengs 'jig rten gnod mi byed// chom rkun nad ni gzhan dag dang // me yi 'jigs
462a3(rgyud): pa de la med// rgyal po skye bo dag kyang rung // su zhig de la mchod mi byed// gang zhig mdo sde dkon mchog 'di// 'chang dang klog pa'ang de bzhin no// rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas// dbang bskur yul
462a4(rgyud): du nyer gnas tshe// mdo sde mgo la nges bcings nas// yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal na// de la rkun pos mi gnod cing // mtshon gyis de la 'phog mi 'gyur// gzhon nu'i gzugs su yang dag byung //
462a5(rgyud): rma bya'i gdan la legs bkod pa// glang po'i 'tshogs ma'i steng bzhag nas// g.yul du yang dag zhugs byas na// skye bo rnam sdang de dag kun// mthong ba tsam gyis ldog par byed// byis pa
462a6(rgyud): gzugs can bzang po ni// gzhon nu rgyan gyis yongs su brgyan// gser dang dngul dang ragar gyis// rgyal mtshan yub bsgreng ba la// de yi tshan 'jug par bya// rgyu la mtshan pa dan btags nas//
462a7(rgyud): legs dgod legs par mnyam par bzhag/ g.yul du dgras ni legs gang ba// mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs byed pa// thams cad g.yul du 'dus pa las// de yi tshe na 'jug par bya// rgyal mtshar//
462b1(rgyud): bsgreng la gnas pa yi// gzhon nu las ni sna tshogs pas// rnam pa du ma'i gzugs dang ldan// bdag nyid chen po 'jam pa'i dbyangs// sa bcu'i bdag po'i bdag po ni// mthong ba tsam gyis 'jig/
462b2(rgyud): par byed// rgyal rigs rgyal po chen po ni// 'jig rten sa srungs sa gnas pa// dad ldan yid gnyis the tsom ni// rnam bram chos la mnyes gshin pa// bde bar gshegs la dang bskyed nas// gling rjes
462b3(rgyud): bdun pa'i yid kyis ni// 'dir bshad 'di dag bya ba ni// grub par 'dod pas rab tu byas// cho ga'i sbyor ba'i sngags dang ni// rgyud dang ldan pa sa steng du// chos dbyings tshogs pa'i rgyal ba yis// gsung
462b4(rgyud): rab 'di dag nges par bstan// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam gnas pa'i// rgyal mchog snga ma grangs med pas// sa yi steng gi mi rnams la'ang // chos kyi mdzod ni gsungs pa yin// lha dang lha min sngon/
462b5(rgyud): yul 'thab// pha rol 'jigs pa byung ba na// gang tshe brgya byin sngon gyur pa// dpung ni pham byas zhe sdang bas// de tshe gcig tu song nas ni// sa steng rnam par du bar gyur// rgyal mchog 'od srungs de la
462b6(rgyud): ni// thub pa mchog la de tshe zhus// ji ltar bya zhes tshig tu ni// bde sogs bdag pos rnam par smras// mi bzad lha min gyis pham nas// bdag kyang 'dir ni yang dag lhag/ de skad bcom
462b7(rgyud): ldan gsol nas ni// lha yi dbang po brgya byin gyis// de tshe thub mchog zhabs gnyis la// spyi bo'i gtsug gis rab btu nas// mig stong ko 'u shi ka ni// de yi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur// de
463a1(rgyud): skad gsol nas thub mchog ni// bram zer gyur pa 'od srungs kyis// de tshe gsung du bka' stsal pa// ka la bing ka'i sgra skad du// rgyal ba mchog gis sdod gsungs pa/
463a2(rgyud): gzhon nu sna tshogs yang dag 'byung // bdag nyid chen po 'jam dpal ni// rnyed dka' sku ni 'bum gyur pa// yang dag mtha' la gnas de ni// zab mo'i don gyi don ston byed// spos med rnam pa med/
463a3(rgyud): pa dang // gnas med pa la gzugs byas nas// shin tu don ldan chos kyang ston// lha yi dbang phyug de ni dran// de nas de ni de dran pas// byang chub sems dpa' dran tsam gyis// gzhon du
463a4(rgyud): tshogs gzugs can ri// der ni de yi mod la lhags// der ni bcom ldan 'das dang ni// bcom ldan lha yi dbang phyug bcas// lhags nas byang chub sems dpa' des// de tshe rgyal ba
463a5(rgyud): mchog la btud// rgyal ba mchog kun phyag 'tshal nas// 'od chen 'od srungs la yang btud// de tshe thub pas rjes gnang nas// sngags kyi tshig ni 'di smras so// na maHsarba bud d+ha bo d+his
463a6(rgyud): te b+h+yaH/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa ne b+h+yaH/ oM ha na ha na/ sarba b+ha yod s+thA dA ya tA stA ya/ mo Ta ya/ tshin+da/ tshin+d+ha/ dz+wa la dz+wa la hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal
463a7(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pas sngags 'di smras ma thag tu sa chen po 'dir dang rgya mtsho'i mthar thug pa dang bcas pa rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi zhing mtha' yas pa
463b1(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyogs kyi mthar thug pa thams cad dang bcas pa'ang rab tu 'gul bar gyur to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis kyang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag byir gyis/
463b2(rgyud): brlabs so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'jigs pa dang bral nas pa spu langs te ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba thob nas/ mig gnyis phye ste stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
463b3(rgyud): gnyis la btud nas lan gsum bskor ba byas shing / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mngon du bltas nas sngags kyi tshig de dag bzung ste yid la byas nas phyir yang shing rta la non nas lham
463b4(rgyud): yin gang yin pa de logs su phyin par gyur to// de nas lha ma srin thams cad rgya mtsho chen po'i mtha'i 'gram du gang rang gi grong khyer gang yin pa der mngon du phyogs shing song bar gyur te/ sems bum zhing
463b5(rgyud): nyams la dpung gi 'jigs pas sems dkrugs shing gdong gi mdog nyams shing nga rgyal dang dregs pa la sogs pa dang bral bar gyur la/ mtshon tshwa dang bral ning ri 'bigs byed 'bar ba bzhin
463b6(rgyud): du lha'i dbang phyug de mthong nas byed par gyur to// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la smras pa/ grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig ma 'jigs shig/ sangs rgyas
463b7(rgyud): kyi mthus lha ma yin las bdag cag nges par rgyal bas rang gi gnas su 'gro bar bya'o// rang rang gi gnas ji lta ba bzhin du song nas khyed cag rtse ba dang dga' ba yongs su spyod par gyis shig
464a1(rgyud): de nas lha de dag thams cad yid shin tu dga' nas phyir yang rang gi gnas su log par gyur to// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ gang bdag/
464a2(rgyud): gis gzhon nu'i gzugs can gyi gzugs brnyan gyi rnam pa de byas la rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la'ang btags na/ des na gong gi lha ma yin gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo zhes bstan to// de nas lhan/
464a3(rgyud): kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis chen po la 'os pa'i nor bu rin po che nang 'od dang ldan zhing gsal ba'i 'phreng ba blangs nas gzhon nu'i cha byad kyi gzugs brlan byas te/ steng gi khang bzangs su grong khyer
464a4(rgyud): chen po blta na sdug pa'i dbus na lha rnams kyi 'dun sa chos bzangs kyi rtse mor rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba legs par bkod pa byas nas bzhag par gyur to// de nas lha ma yin de dag rab tshim byed
464a5(rgyud): dang / thag bzangs ris la sogs pa de dag lha rnams kyi steng du mi 'gro zhing / lha de dag kyang zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur la/ rdzu 'phrul las rnam par 'phrul pa 'am/ g.yul mngon du phyog/
464a6(rgyud): par 'gro bar mi nus so// de ltar lo bye ba khri phrag du ma mi ma yin pa'i grangs kyis bgrang bar yang lha ma yin gyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du phar yon dpag tu med pa bstan pa dang //
464a7(rgyud): tshe dang / nad med pa 'phel bar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang sngon du gsungs pa yin no// de bzhin du phan yon gyi yon tan mchog 'di dag
464b1(rgyud): rgya che ba dang / mtha' yas shing mu med pa sngon gsungs pa yin no// gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spangs sam/ rnam par rtog par byed na bsod nams ma yin pa dpag tu med pa 'phes
464b2(rgyud): bar 'gyur zhing dmyal bar yang skye bar 'gyur la/ dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi skye ba ngan par yang 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sman dang sngags rnams med do// byang chub sems
464b3(rgyud): dpa' med do// de rnams bdag nyid chen po rdzu 'phrul che ba dang rnam par 'phrul pa'ang med do// cho ga rgya che ba'ang med do// 'phags pa ma yin pas bshad do zhes byas nas spong ba 'am/ yang na 'gro
464b4(rgyud): zhing 'di nyan par mi nus so zhes gnas de las gzhan du 'gro na de dag la bsod nams ma yin pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ci ste blo chung ba gang gis chos 'di ni thub pa mchog/ thub pa'i sras
464b5(rgyud): blo dang ldan pa ma yin no zhes rab tu spong bar byed do// mi de dmyal bar 'gro 'gyur zhing // de nyams nas ni dud 'gro 'gro// thig nag dang ni yang sos dang // spu gri so dang me ma mu // ro myags
464b6(rgyud): chu bo rab med skye// de nas phyir yang spu gri so// lo ma ral gri lta bu'i nags// yang na kyi hud zer de bzhin// 'jig rten grags pa so tha ma tha ma// sdig pa'i las kyis dmyal ba ru// gang gis
464b7(rgyud): chos ni sun byed pa// des ni skye bo de dag 'gro// 'jig rten smad par rab bstan pa// mi bzad mnar med pa zhes bya// ma dang sems kyis chos spangs pa// sdig pa'i las can gnas yin te//
465a1(rgyud): gang zhig chos ni 'di 'jig pa// des skye bo de 'tshed 'gyur// kur gyi mthang thug mnar med pa// de nyams de bzhin dmyal chen ste// dmyal ba'i samatha' mtha' yas pa pa//
465a2(rgyud): rtag tu blo med de ni 'gro// mdo sde de ni rgya che ba bcas// chos kyi nor kun rab spangs nas// de ni 'jig rten ngan par 'gro// dbang med rtag par dbang du 'gro// gang nig mdo sde'i cho ga 'di// sngags
465a3(rgyud): dang rgyud kyis legs par brgyad// grub pa sna tshogs brgya rnams 'thob// yang dag mtha' ni sgrib pa med// chos kyi dbyings kyi sku nyid yin// dmigs su med pa'i ngo bo nyid// cho ga cho ga rgya chen ba
465a4(rgyud): le'u ma 'byams 'dis 'dren byed// 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni legs dgod pa// phun tshogs dpal dang blo gros mchod// rtsa ba'i tshi ga mi chung ba// rgya che mang por bstan pa yin// rtag dang chad dang
465a5(rgyud): thog mtha' ni// gnyis ka'i mtha' don rnam par spangs// rim bcas rim ni nges par bstan// sngags kyis lus ni btus pa yi// me dang drung dang dam mkha' dang // stong pa 'di nyid legs gsungs
465a6(rgyud): pa// spangs pa rtag tu 'gro bde// 'og nas 'og tu de che 'gro// bskul pa rnam mang gsub gyi grangs// de tshe bsod nams yongs bsngags nas// de tshe byang chub thob nas ni// bdag dang rgyal ba
465a7(rgyud): mchog rnams kyis// sngags dang rgyud kyi don gsungs pa// 'gro ba yul ni sdig med lalo// rtsa ba'i cho ga dag byed dang // sdig pa med cing bkra shis pa'i// le'u rab 'byams rapa gsungs pa
465b1(rgyud): nges pa'i mdo sde bzang po yin// sa bdag yon tan bdag nyid che// yul dang dus kyi skyong ba dang // rgyal sras mi du skyes pa yin/ sa stengs dam pa'i chos bstan zhes// 'jig rten gtso 'i thub pa//
465b2(rgyud): rgyal ba bdudan pas bstan pa yin// cho ga rgya cher gsungs pa ni// blo dang dpal ni mngon par 'phel// rtsa ba rab 'byams le'u zhes// sngags dang rgyud dang ldan pa de// gang zhig mdo mchog gtso
465b3(rgyud): 'di/ rgyal bas mchod pa'i chos kyi mdzod// sa steng mis ni spong byed pa// de ni mnur med dmyal bar 'gro// bskal pa chen por de 'tshed ces// rnam pa du mar dbye bar bstan// nam zhig gang du
465b4(rgyud): 'byung ba ni// mi yi lus su skyes na yang // dbul zhing nad mang glen pa dang // kla klo dag tu skye bar 'gyur// 'jig rten smad par 'gro ba ste// de ni mdze can nad par 'gyur// lkug cing 'on pa yan lan/
465b5(rgyud): nyams// zo nyams long ba nyid dang ni// rtsub cing rtag tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs// sa steng yi dgas lta bur sdang // gos ngan sems ni zhan pa dang // sen mo dang ni lus kyang ngan// srid bu rnams
465b6(rgyud): kyis zos pa dang // shu ba g.yan pa yang dag ldan// mdo sde 'di ni rab spangs na// gang dang gang gi 'gro bar 'gro// de dang der ni skyes pa ra// blo ngan rmongs par skye bar 'gyur// de nas byang chub sem
465b7(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas// pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang sa la btsugs te mig phye zhing 'i 'dzub pas/
466a1(rgyud): thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang na gnas pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang ka 'byung po'i tshogs du mchos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dus par shes nas/ bcom ldan/
466a2(rgyud): 'das shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis ni ngo mtshar te mchog tu legs par gsungs pa lags na/ de la bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i
466a3(rgyud): dus na sems can mi rigs pa'i chags pas zil gyis non pa/ slu bar byed pa/ nga rgyal can/ ma dad pa/ gya gyu can/ dmu rgod/ tshul khrims 'chal pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag sngags
466a4(rgyud): rnams kyi rtog pa'i bdag nyid chen po rgyas pa grub pa dang / dus dang / yul dang / nges par sdom pa dang / sngags dang / spyod pa dang / sbyin sreg dang / bzlas pa nges par sdom pa dang / cho ga rab
466a5(rgyud): 'byams dag la ma dad par 'gyur/ yid mi bde bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin no zhes byas nas spong bar 'gyur te/ de dag nyon mongs pa'i sems su gyur nas dus byed par 'gyur
466a6(rgyud): zhing / sdug bsngal drag cing tsha ba'i tsher ba myong zhing de dag dmyal ba chen por skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal ba'i sems can de dag la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
466a7(rgyud): 'das ni thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la sogs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jab dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la spyi bor byugs nas bka' stsal pa/ 'jab dpal khyod sems can thams cad/
466b1(rgyud): kyi don gyi phyir rab tu zhugs pa khyod yang legs so legs so// 'jam dpal gzhon nu khyod de banin gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su zhu bar sems pa de khyod yang legs so// 'jam dpal gnon/
466b2(rgyud): rung gyur pa de'i phyir legs par shin tu rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang / lha dang / mi rnams dang / 'jig rten la rab /
466b3(rgyud): brtse ba'i phyir ngas khyod la bshad do// spyod pa thams cad la zhugs pa dang / byang chub kyi lam dang / thams cad shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa dang / 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sku
466b4(rgyud): la gnas par 'dod pa rnams kyis rig pa'i rgyal po mchog tu gsang ba/ gzhon nu khyod kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga'i le'u rab 'byams 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe'ang 'di dran par bya'o// de gang zhe na/ na maHsA ma
466b5(rgyud): d+h+ya ta thA te b+h+yo/ ar+ha te b+h+yaH/ samya ka saM bud+d+he b+h+yaH/ oM ku mA ra rU pi Ne/ bi shwa saM b+ha ba/ A gas+t+ra mA gadz+dza/ la hu la hu/ d+hu b+h+yAM/ dzi na dzi ka/ many+dzu shrI ya/ su shI ya/ tA ya pAM/ sarba duHkha b+h+yaHpaT phaT/
466b6(rgyud): ma ya shams/ a mr-i tod b+ha ba/ pA baM me rA sha ya swA hA/ 'jam dpal 'di ni khyod kyi snying po dam pa yin te/ zhi ba thams cad byed pa/ sdig pa thams cad zad par byed pa/ sdug bsngal thams cad
466b7(rgyud): las rab tu grol bar byed pa/ tshi dang / nad med pa dang / dbang phyug dang / skal ba bzang po mchog dang / ngag gi dbang phyug skyed par byed pa/ rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad gzengs bstod par bye/
467a1(rgyud): pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas 'di gsungs ma thag tu sa chen po ri dang rgya mtsho dang bcas pa/ sems can dang snod nye ba'i mthar thug pa rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos
467a2(rgyud): par gyur te/ 'gro ba thams cad yi dgas kyi 'gro ba dang / dud 'gro dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / dmyal ba'i sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu sbyangs shing bde ba rnams kyang rab tu
467a3(rgyud): thob par 'gyur la/ 'jam dpal rig pa'i rgyal po 'di'ang yid la byed cing / de'i tshe dam pa'i chos spong ba'i sems kyang med par gyur na bdud sdig to can gyis kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur la
467a4(rgyud): bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyang 'byed par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar yang sems bskyed par bya ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas dang chos ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ bsam
467a5(rgyud): pa 'am/ gzhal ba'am/ spong ba ni bdag cag gis ci zhig nus te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis mkhyen par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems
467a6(rgyud): dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ phan yon dang nyes dmigs kyi nus pa rab 'byams bstan pa'i le'u sum cu drug pa rdzogs so// bcom/
467a7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / gnas gtsang ma'i steng na gnas pa'i lha'i
467b1(rgyud): bu'i tshegs rnams dang / sems can bye ba khri phrag brgyad stong du ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen
467b2(rgyud): be dang / grub pa dang / rig 'dzin dang / drang srong mchog dam pa du ma dang / 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byams pa dang / mthu chen thob dang /
467b3(rgyud): mthu chen gnas dang / phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dang / chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas par bzhugs
467b4(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i ngo bo dang 'dra bar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang
467b5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams thugs rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon pa bstod do// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rgyud
467b6(rgyud): rdzogs so// / dpal lha btsan po lha btsun pa byang chub 'od kyi bkas/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po dge bsnyen chen po ku m+ba ra ka la sha dang / sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsa ba dge slong
467b7(rgyud): shAkya blo gros kyis bsgyur cing nus te gtan la phab pa'o// rgya gar skad du/ sid+d+hi e ka wA re mahA tan+da rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpa'
468a1(rgyud): kho gcig tu grub pa zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dpa' bo gcig grub dpa' bo'i gtso// rab
468a2(rgyud): mchog smras pa rnams kyi mchog/ 'gro ba'i bla ma 'jam rdo rjes// 'jig rten don du rgyud rab gsungs// lha nyid gsang sngags tshul gyis ni// dngos grub thams cad stsol mdzad pa// sngags
468a3(rgyud): pas de nyid bsgoms nas ni// de grub na ni dgrub 'gyur// sngags pa lu sa ni rnam dag dang // gang tshe dngos grub phra mo grug/ snod du gyur pa'i lus mas ni// dngos grub chen po rab tu skyes// rim
468a4(rgyud): pa 'di yis 'di la ni// sa la sogs pa thob pa skye// sngags pa yid bzhin nor bu ltar// rtag tu sems can don byed do// de ltar mkhyen nas thugs rjes non// rdo rje 'chang sogs kyis zhus tshe//
468a5(rgyud): grub pa'i gsang sngags gsungs pa ni// 'gro ba'i don du gsungs pa yin// oM ka le mu le lu kA lu mi lu stam+b+ha ya lA baR+Sha tuShA raM tsa luts+tsha i lu ts+tsha a swA hA/ gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di legs/
468a6(rgyud): par bzlas na ser ba gcod par byed do// dran pa nyid dang thal ba la mngon par bzlas pa ser ba 'bab pa gcod par 'gyur zhing gang du 'dod pa dar 'gro'o// de bzhin du glog dang / rlung dang / rdo rje dang /
468a7(rgyud): mig 'bab pa la sogs pa med par byed do// oM gdu' tsas te tsal tsal sAhA/ sngags kyi rgyal po 'di can pa tshad ni sang pa 'khob pa thog par byed do// de rgyas kyis rang tha ham bris shis sas/
468b1(rgyud): la mngon par bzlas pa'i dza paT ha'i sgras ser ba rdzog par byed do// de bzhin du dung la sogs pa'i sgras kyang bya'o// oM he he tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha/ d+hA ra ya/ ni ru d+ha/ de ba da ta ur+d+ha ma Ni swAhA/ gsang /
468b2(rgyud): sngags kyi cho ga 'di sngon du bsnyen pa'i tshigs 'bum phrag gcig yongs su bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur ro// glog dang / rlung dang / rdo rje dang / thog 'bab pa la sogs pa dran pa tsam nyid kyis
468b3(rgyud): zlog par byed do// char ches pa la thal ba dang chungs kar la mngon par bzlas na char ches pa gcod pa dang / byis pa dang / spang ma la sogs pa'i mchu 'ching bar byed do// skyed mos tshal lam
468b4(rgyud): ning la bya dang / 'bu srin dang / byi ba rnams kyis nye bar 'tshe ba zlog par byed do// dur khrod kyi ras la ming dang bcas pa'i sngags bris la spra tshil gyis gtums te dud khrod kyi bum par bcug
468b5(rgyud): nas kha bcad de de nyid du sbas pas mngal rengs par byed do// phyung nas 'o ma dang chus bkrus te chung bo bas zhi bar 'gyur ro// yung ba 'am ba zas gro ga 'am/ gos sam/ lo ma la mngon par
468b6(rgyud): bris te spra tshil gyi nang du gtums pa'i sngags 'di grog mkhar gyi sa la 'jigs byed kyi gzugs su byas pa de'i snying khar bcug ste thal bas bkang nas sbas na rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i kha rengs
468b7(rgyud): par byed do// rtsod sbyong byed pa na gzugs de nyid kyi lce la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa'i tsher ma bdun gyis btsugs na kha bcings par 'gyur ro// rdo rgyus kyis kham por la bris te thal bas kha
469a1(rgyud): myur du byas te zas na ni mi smad par smra ba'i kha rengs par byed do// rdza mkhan gyi lag pa byis pa'i 'jim pa la mug gi gzugs byas pa'i snying khang lnga tshutshal gyis gtums pa/
469a2(rgyud): sngags bcu gar khro ba'i kha rongs par byed do// ske 'am dpung pa la btags na g.yul ngogs kyi mtshon cha'i dpal zhi bar byed do// grog mkhar gyi 'jib las byas pa'i tshigs kyi bdag po'i
469a3(rgyud): rkang pa'i mthil du sngags kyi rgyal po bcug ste bzhi mdor sbas na 'gro ba dang 'ong ba thams cad rengs par byed do// brtag pa byed pa thams cad rengs par byed do// gro ga 'am gos la sngags kyi
469a4(rgyud): rgyal po 'di bris la spra tshil gyis gtums te de nyid kyi khong par bcug la bum pa gsar pa chus bkang ba'i nang du bcug na yongs su brtag pa rengs par byed do// bla gos kyi mtha' ma la sngags
469a5(rgyud): rjes su dran zhing mdud pa bcings pas lam du rkun po la sogs pa rengs par byed cing / nags kyi ba men la sogs parwa can rnams dang mche ba can rnams rengs par byed do// gyo mo la lan
469a6(rgyud): bdun pa zlos te chur bcug na chun gnas pa rnams kha bcings par byed do// dur khrod kyi ras la pha rol gyi dpung gi tshogs kyi gtso bo'i ming smos pa'i sngags sna tshogs rdo rje'i dbus su bris pa
469a7(rgyud): sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyi rol du yi ge laM brgyad bris shing phyi rol dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa bris te/ phyogs rdo rjes rgyan pa'i spra tshil gyis tshogs kyi bdag po'i khong par bcug pa'i sngags
469b1(rgyud): pha rol gyi dpung gi tshogs kyi mtshams su bcu gan dpung gi tshigs rengs par byed do// sngags gnyis kyi kha sbyor du bcug la yi ge tha zung gis yongs su bskor ba'i phyi rol du yi ge laM brgyad/
469b2(rgyud): kyis bskor ba dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyis non pa/ sna tshogs rdo rjes nye bar mdzes par byas pa/ grog mkhar gyi 'ji ba las byas pa'i tshogs kyi bdag po'i khong par bcug nas dur khrod
469b3(rgyud): kyi bum pa'i nang du bcug ste dur khrod du sbas pa'am/ phu ba ma'i sbyin sreg gis pha rol gyi dpung gi tshegs rengs par byed do// me la mngon du phyogs shing sngags 'dis mngon par bsngags
469b4(rgyud): ba'i chu snyim pa bdun rab tu gtor na khyim gang srung bar 'dod pa'i khyim de srung bar byed do// thal bas srung bar byed do// thal bas bcings pas skyugs pa ldog par byed do// mthe'u chung
469b5(rgyud): gi rtse dam du bcir la sngags brjod pas skyigs bu med par byed do// thal ba la mngon par bsngags pas mig rengs par byed do// 'brum bu la sogs pa rnam par 'tshe ba la byang bu la bris te
469b6(rgyud): khyim gang gi sgor btags pa'i khyim der 'brum bu la sogs pa'i rnam par 'tshe ba zlog par byed do// nya dang / sha dang / chang dang / 'bras chan la sogs pa sbyin par 'gyur ba las grong gi
469b7(rgyud): phyi rol gyi char gtor ma chen po gtang bar bya ba 'am/ yam shing lnga dang / 'bru lnga'i bye brag mar la btags pas grong gi dbus su ni ba'i thab khung du byas la sbyin sreg byas na bdud dang rnam par
470a1(rgyud): 'tshe ba thams cad rengs par byed do// gang 'ga' zhig la grong la sogs pa 'byin par 'gyur ba la bzlas pa tsam gyis zlog par byed do// rtag tu bzas na lha dang / lha/
470a2(rgyud): ma yin dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mi mthong bar 'gyur ro// dpal rje btsun sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon par byang chub pa'i dus su bdud bzhi las rgyal bar bya ba'i phyir sngags
470a3(rgyud): kyi rgyal po 'di mdzod sru las byung ba'i mdzod spu'i nor bu zhes bya bar rab tu grags pa yin no// gshag ma la mngon par bsngags te gtong bas sbrul dag 'byer bar byed do// rtsig ngos la rdo rgyus
470a4(rgyud): la mngon par bsngags pas zis na sbrul gyis non par mi 'gyur ro// yang sngags rdo leb la gzong bus brkos te bris pa sras na ri dgas dang sbrul gdug pa rnams khyim mam/ grong ngam/ grong
470a5(rgyud): khyer du ji srid 'dod kyi bar du mche ba 'ching bar byed do// phyung bas grol bar 'gyur ro// sngags 'dis bsgrubs su zin na'ang las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// gshag ma la sogs pa
470a6(rgyud): la yongs su bzlas te gtor na mche ba can thams cad kyi mche ba 'ching bar byed do// de dbang cher gyi dkyil 'khor gyis khyab pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i dbus su bsgrub par bya ba'i ming dang bcas
470a7(rgyud): pa'i sngags thams cad bri bar bya'o// dur khrod kyi ro bsregs pa'i shing gi phung bu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa'i sgo'i steng du sbas na skyed kyis 'tshe ba thams cad kyi skyed med par
470b1(rgyud): byed do// phyung bas grol bar 'gyur ro// oM ni he ni ts+tsha le a b+ha ya b+ha yaM ka ri e tsu le mu sha ma ya Da i dza ha ye lu A ga sa pa ke ra te i a tum+bA ri khi wa mo hin d+haM bi dza kA raM dza hiHka re Ni hi \u0f7f\u0f7f
470b2(rgyud): swAhA/ sngags kyi rgyal po 'dis sdang smos pa'i las rnams ma bsgrubs su zin kyang byed par 'gyur ro// de las gnon pa mngon par 'dod pa'i las thams cad byed pa the tsom med do// lan tshwa dang
470b3(rgyud): ske tshwa'i sbyin sreg gam phug ma'i sbyin sreg gis pha rol gyi dpung gi tshogs rnams 'byer bar byed do// oM aM b+hA shim+b+ha kap+pa su jo me be duprA su/ sngags kyi rgyal po 'di ma bsgrubs su zid
470b4(rgyud): kyang rtag tu bzlas na 'jigs pa thams cad zlog par byed do// rdo rje chu'i thig les dgra po thams cad rmongs par byed cing khro ba rab tu dang bar byed do// bcings pa la bzlas na bcings pa
470b5(rgyud): grol bar byed do// 'phongs pas 'gyur bas bzlas na rnyed pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// e shon thi to hu lu hu dz+wa la dzA twe hu lu ru tre ba pra ti rAts+tsha tu hu lu swA hA/ sngags kyi rgyal po 'dis 'thab pa dang
470b6(rgyud): 'thab mo dang / rnam par rtsod pa thams cad la bzlas pa byas na ni bar 'gyur ro// phug ma'i sbyin sreg gos kyang thams cad du zhi bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog la bzlas te chu la bskur na tham
470b7(rgyud): cad du zhi bar 'gyur zhing rnam par rgyal ba thob par the tsom med do// grong khyer 'tshig pa'i me la mngon par phyogs te 'dug la mngon par bsngags pa'i rwa snyim pa bdun khyim gang srung bar 'dod
471a1(rgyud): pa'i khyim de srung bar byed cing mes 'tshigs pa'i me'i kha las thar par byed do// rkang gnyis dang rkang bzhi'i mche ba la phub ma'i sbyin sreg gis ni bar byed do// oM pad+med paH/
471a2(rgyud): a k+She pad+ma su b+ha ge phuH/ sngags kyi rgyal po 'di thal ba la bzlas te bskus pas mig gsos par 'gyur ro// byabs pas mig rengs par byed do// lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa'i mig gis
471a3(rgyud): khros pa mthong ma thag tu rab tu dang bar byed do// lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa'i chus gdong bkrus na skye bo thams cad dga' bar byed do// rtsig pa la ming smos pa'i sngags rdo rgyas kyis bris namig
471a4(rgyud): gi nad thams cad 'joms par byed do// dben par 'dug sde sems rje gcig pas skyes bu'i mig gnyi sul mngon par bsngags pa byas na/ gang gi tshe g.yon pa 'gul bar gyur pa de'i tshe ba sams pa'i
471a5(rgyud): dngos po 'grub par ston pa yin no// g.yas pa 'gul bar byed na mi dge ba'i dgos pa ston par byed do// oM mo tsa ni mo tsa ya mo k+Sha Ni mo kA ya dzi baM ba ra de swA hA/ 'di mngon par bsngags pa'i til ma
471a6(rgyud): gyis bud med kyi skye ba'i sgo la bskus na sbrum ma bde bar bcas par byed do// bcings pa la phyogs par byed pas lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa'i rwa snyim pa bdun mngon par gtor ba dus gsum du byas
471a7(rgyud): pas bcings pa rnams grol bar byed do// gur kum ma mgi'u wang gis gro ga la mngon par bris te bcings pa'i mgo bo la mngon par btags na bcings pa las mngon par grol bar byed do// oM ha ri ma ka/
471b1(rgyud): Ta nA ma sa ha sahA sra bA hud de ba data taM bi d+ha rA mok+ShA ya swA hA/ rdo rgyus la mngon par bsngags pas sa'i steng du yang dang yang du bris te lugs las bzlog pas phyis nas bcings pa las grol bar byed do//
471b2(rgyud): lo ma la ming dang sngags su bcas te mngon par bris te mgo ba la btag san bcings pa thams cad las grom bar 'gyur ro// oM tA di Ni t+tAr ya mo tsha mo tsa sa mo kA ni mo kA ya dzaM ba par de swA hA/ sngags/
471b3(rgyud): kyi rgyal po 'di legs par bzlas na las thams cad byed par 'gyur zhing / lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa'i til mar gyis skye ba'i sgo la bskus na sgrub ma bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur ro// lan bdu
471b4(rgyud): mngon par bsngags pa'i chu 'thungs na mngal 'khyims pa bde bar bca' bar byed do// rtag tu bzlas da bdag dang gzhan 'ching ba las thar par byed do// ske 'am dpung pa la srung ba btags pas sdig
471b5(rgyud): pa thams cad las srung bar byed do// oM tA re tud+d+hA re tu re mo kA ya dza~M baM swA hA/ sngags kyi rgyal po 'dis sngar smos pa'i las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// gur dkum gyis gro ga la gang gi ming smos pa
471b6(rgyud): sngags mngon par bris pa la spra tshil du gtums te dri chus bkang ba'i bum pa ras gsar pa'i nang du bcug ste/ me tog dri zhim po la sogs pas dus gsum du mchod pa byas na 'thab pa dang
471b7(rgyud): 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa thams cad las rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur ro// gur kum gyis gro ga la gang gi ming smos pa/ oM e raN ra s+ya ba ne kA ko raM gA tI ra mu ya s+thi taH/ yi ba tu du ta/ yA ni ya bi sha l+yA b+ha ba
472a1(rgyud): hu gurba NI/ lan bdur mngon par bsngags pa'i rgyu khyor pa gsum po nyang 'ongs pas 'thungs na sbrum ma bde bar btsa' bar byed do// oM a ma ra NI dzI ban+d+hi ye swA hA/ sngags kyi
472a2(rgyud): rgyal po 'di legs par bzlas na las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// mngon par bsngags pa'i rgyu 'thungs na 'brum bu 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro// lus las skyes pa'i dug mi bzad pa dang /
472a3(rgyud): spre'u'i drug mi bzad pa dang / sbrul gdug pa la sogs pa'i rmal yung ba dang / a ru ra dang / ru rta la sogs pa la yongs su bzlas te bskul na rang bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro// nad dang rnam
472a4(rgyud): par 'tsho ba thams cad la sngags bdud bcings pas zhi bar byed do// rtag tu bzlas na tshe zad pa lo brgya par 'gyur ro// mar dang til mar gyi sbyin sreg gis thams cad zhi bar byed do// mngon pa
472a5(rgyud): bsngags pa'i sman gyi btung ba thams cad las thar par byed do// lan brgyar bkrus pa'i mang la mngon par bsngags pas na ba'i yan lag la bskus na rang bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro// 'ge
472a6(rgyud): pa'i nad la til mang la bsngags te bskus pas rang bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro// gdug pa'i rmal tshu la bsngags nas gtong bas sos par 'gyur ro// sman nad la be dang la sogs pa

472b1(rgyud): na rims nyid gcig pa dang / rims nyid gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin pani pa la sogs pa sel bar byed cing / rta 'byung po dang / gza dang / tshangs pa srin po la sogs pa se/

473a1(rgyud): mdud dam/ mngon par bsngags pa'i chu 'thungs pa 'am/ bya bas na nad thams cad sel bar byed do// gro ga la gu kum gyis bris pa'i sngags ske'am dpung pa la ba /

473b3(rgyud): gri la mngon par bsngags te g.yul du 'jug na rgyal ba sgrub par byed do// bya ba gang la 'jug pa na gtor ma nye bar bstabs na de dang de 'grub par 'gyur ro// sngags pa dge ba dang mi dge ba'i

473b5(rgyud): da ya mA bad+d+hA ni hU~M phaT swAhA/ sngags kyi rgyal po 'di bya rog gi sgra mi grag pa'i dus su lan bdun mngon par bsdigs pa'i chus gdong bkrus na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// rgyal ba

474a3(rgyud): pang sangs rgyas pa'i// slob ma yon tan bzhi yin pas// bla ma la gus mkhas pa la// rgyud kyi rgyal po bshad par bya// yon po bi la san+d+ha ya/ de ba su trA ma sa t+yan d+hi sa los kyi yang gih+na tas
474a4(rgyud): d+ha prA/ s+thi to lo kaHsat+ya brah+ma sap+tA ta naM/ sat+ya bud+d+hA sh+tsa d+har+m+ma sh+tsa saM gA sha tsa saM gu Na swa ga raHa na de sad+yaM bA kye na k+Shi pra mA ba darba Ne / tad+ya thA/ oM sa pa si ri su ru pu ru maM dang pra ti kA sa a ba sa kai la sak+ShA

475a3(rgyud): tad+ya thA/ ku mA ra rU pi na da R+sha ya/ A ta mA nAM bi b+hu li ta sa mud b+hA ya swa pa r-I daM be da ya thA b+hu taM hUM phaT swA hA/ rje btsun 'jam dpal gnon ru'i sku 'am lugs sku'i mdunar sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mched/

476a3(rgyud): zag bdun gyis 'gyod pa mi zad par 'gyur po// oM dza ye bi dza ye a dzi te pAdrA dza~M ha~M swA hA/ sring mo bzhi'i sngags kyi rgyal po 'di gong du bshad pa'i tshogs 'bum phrag bzhi pazla sa na gong du bshad/

476b1(rgyud): 'di ni gong du bshad pa'i las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// oM dzaM b+he mo he swA hA/ rje btsun ma sgrol ba l+yA ka ra wI ri'i me tog gis mngon par mchod de sngags kyi rgyal po 'di yi ge 'bub/
476b2(rgyud): bzla sa da yod la re brdzogs par byed do// oM ba sud+d+ha ri Ni swAhA/ oM shrI ba su swA hA/ oM ba su shrI ye swAhA/ oM shrI ba su mu khi swAhA/ oM shrI ba su ma ti shI ye sAhA/ bdag nyid dza pA la'i gzugs
476b3(rgyud): su bsgoms la rang gi skying khang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su ba sud+d+hi nga gser gyi mdog caran phyag gnyis pa rgyar thams cad kyis brgyad pa/ shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su lnga po banas //
476b4(rgyud): ga g.yas kyis mchog sbyin pa/ g.yon gyis 'bras kyi skem bsnams pa bsgoms na yid la re ba rdzogs par byed do// ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa khru do'i tshad du byas la dus

476b6(rgyud): ba ni byas na dpal chen por 'gyur zhing yi ge 'bu ma bzlas na dpal chen po 'grub par 'gyur ro// gu gul gyi ril bu'i sbyin sreg 'bu ma byas na yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
476b7(rgyud): oM ba su d+hA ri Ni a mu ka r+yaM de hi hA pa ya swA hA/ sngags 'di chu'i nang du zhugs nas khrus byas te 'bum phrag bzhi nges par sbyin sreg byas na mngon par 'dod pa'i bu mo rnyed par 'gyur ro// mtshan me'o
477a1(rgyud): pa can gyi yam shing gis klong gi ming nas spros nas sbyin sreg 'bum byas na grong rnyed bang 'gyur po// oM ba sud+hA ri Ni swA hA/ oM tsan+da kan+d+he swAhA/ oM dad+d+ha ye swAhA/ oM ba sudaH/
477a2(rgyud): ye swA hA/ oM Ar+ya ye swA hA/ oM su b+ha drA ye swA hA/ oM gup+tA ye swA hA/ oM de byai ye swA hA/ oM sA ngas t+ye swAhA/ gser gyi byang bu 'am/ dngul gyi byang bu 'am/ zangs mo'i byang bu'i me tog 'dab ma brgyad/
477a3(rgyud): pa'i dbus su ba su d+hA ra shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma la tsan+da kr-i t+yA la sogs pa gnod sbyin mo rnams mngon par bris pa'i byang bu gnyis kha sbyar du byas pa'i nang du mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang / ka ra bcug
477a4(rgyud): ste/ gong dA bshad pa'i cho gas sngar smos pa'i las rnams byed pang 'byung ngo ro// dbus su ni/ oM dza b+hA la dza len+d+rA ya swA hA/ phyogs su ni/ oM ma Ni b+ha drA ya swAhA/ oM pU r+N+Na b+ha drA ya swA hA/ oM d+had b+ha drA ya
477a5(rgyud): swAhA/ oM bai shra ba NA ya swA hA/ mtshams su ni/ oM ke li mA li swA hA/ oM bi tsa~M ku N+Da li ni swA hA/ oM mu khen+da ye swA hA/ oM tsa dze d+hA ye swA hA/ gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po chen po brgyad kyis yongs su bskor ba
477a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ni ba su d+ha ri dang bcas pa gser gyi mdog ce na/ ne'u me dang 'bras bu sa bon gyis bkang ba phyag dbasnams pa/ gsum pa 'phyang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gong
477a7(rgyud): du bshad pa'i gnod sbyin po dang gnod sbyin gyi bdag po dang bcas pa la dus gsum du mchod pa byas nas bsgobs shing bzlas pa byas na// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten gsum gyi
477b1(rgyud): rgyal srid sro la bar mdzad do// tho rangs chu khyod pa brgya rtsa brgyad sbyidan pa dang / bya rog gi sgra mi grag par chu'i nang du zhugs te bzlas pa byed pa gang yin pa de'i gter mi zad cing 'phel bar 'bru/
477b2(rgyud): po yang na gser las byas pa'i byang bu la ba su d+ha ri ga nod sbyin mo dang bcas pa dang / byang bu gnyis pa la bcom ldan 'das dzam+b+ha la gnod sbyin gyis bskor ba yang dag par bris la kha
477b3(rgyud): sbyar du byas te mnyes par byas na/ dngos grub chen po brgyad kyang steng bar mdzad grub pa gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ dpa' bo gcig tu grub pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las le'u gnyis pa rdzogs
477b4(rgyud): so/ oM badz+ra tAk+ShA duHkhad+hod prad+d+ha rmAn pud+d+ha ye d+hA da kA ya bA gI shwa ra a ra pa tsa rA ya te na maH/ bcom ldan 'das 'jab pa'i rdo rje dpa' bo gcig tu grub pa ston kar
477b5(rgyud): zla ba'i 'od ltung dkar ba/ phyag g.yon ra u t+pal sngon po bsnams pa/ g.yas kyi mchog sbyin par bdag nyid bsams la/ oM a nu ta pan+da pra kri ti pra b+ha sA raM su bi shud+ha d+harma d+hA tu tri sad+d+ha
477b6(rgyud): hA ta sAr swa ti bA Ni mu pa la b+ha te/ zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis dbyangs can gyi ngag thob par 'gyur ro// zla ba drug gis ngag gi dbang phyug grub par byed do// bcom ldan 'das ngag gi dab
477b7(rgyud): phyug mngon sum du mthong zhing thos pa yang thob par 'gyur ro// shu dag srang phyed kyi tsha da tsam la lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa tho rangs 'o ma 'am/ mar ram/ til mar zla ba gcig
478a1(rgyud): tu 'thungs na glen pa dang rig pa med par 'gyur ro// khyu byug myos pa'i skad dang 'dra ba du skad snyan cing tshig gsal bar 'gyur ro// zla ba drug goms par byas na mthos
478a2(rgyud): pa'i bstan bcos mngon du 'gyur zhing thos pa nam yang brjed par mi 'gyur ro// thos pa mdzin par 'gyur ro// oM bA kye don pasarje btsun gsung gi dbang phyug gi snying po 'di gong pa bzhin du
478a3(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas goms par byas na gong du bshad pa'i las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu la rked pa tsam gyis rgyal brgal nas dzA ti'i me tog phun pa 'bung
478a4(rgyud): phrag gcig blangs nas sngags brjod cing phun pa ri de rgyun phyogs su 'bab par 'gyur ba las phun pa gcig rgyun las log par 'ongs pa de so la ma reg par med na thos pa 'dzin pa stsol
478a5(rgyud): bar badzad do// ji lta ba bzhin rnyed pa'i me tog chu la sbyir sreg 'bu pa phrag bzhi byas na ngag gi dbang phyug dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro// smad brah+ma'i phye ba zho bzhi tsa ma la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
478a6(rgyud): la tho rangs dkyil 'khor byas te ci 'byor pas bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje la'ang yang dag par mchod de/ mngar ma ro sgyur dang 'thungs na zla ba drug gis thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// tshig
478a7(rgyud): gi bdag po'i dbyangs sman pa'ang skye bar 'gyur ro// sngon du bskyed pa'i cho gas yi ge 'bum bzlas na sngags kyi rgyal po 'grub par 'gyur ro// phyis zla ba gzas zin pa 'am/ nyi ma gzas
478b1(rgyud): zin pa na lcags las byas pa'i ral gri rang gi lag pas blangs te zla ba mi snang bar ji srid grol bar 'gyur ba de srid du bzlas pa byas nA ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du 'tsho//
478b2(rgyud): lo dang / rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang / mda' dang / tho ba dang / zhags pa la sogs pa bsgrub par bya zhing rig pa la sogs pa dang / bcud kyis len la sogs pa 'dus pa bsgrub par bya'o//
478b3(rgyud): yang na mig sman nam/ thig le 'am/ rkang pa bskus pa 'am/ dbang du bya ba'i rdzas bsdus te bsgrub par bya'o// 'o thug gam/ zho 'am/ zan nam/ mar dang bcas pa khar dang bcas pas
478b4(rgyud): snod bkang ste lag pas bkab nas bzlas pa byas te 'thungs na lo lnga brgyar 'tshe bar 'gyur ro// sran mA ShA khar bcug nas bzlas pa byas te mid na sdeb sbyor dang / thos pa 'dzin pa dang
478b5(rgyud): sgra mkhas pa dang / yid brdungs par 'gyur ro// pad+ma'i sbyin sreg 'bum gyis bcom ldan 'das mngon sum du 'gyur ro// bil ba'i sbyin sreg 'bum gyis 'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal srid

478b7(rgyud): gnod sbyin mo dang klu mo la sogs pa 'gugs par byed do// de bzhin du yam shing rnam pa lngas kyang bya'o// rtag tu goms par byas na tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas nyid kyang sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro//

479a3(rgyud): gyis yongs su dag par bsams la pad+ma dkar po khru bdun pa'i tshad dang / de'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i dbus su phyag gnyis pa pad+ma dang mchog sbyin gyis rnam par brgyan pa/ bcom
479a4(rgyud): ldan 'das thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi sku can gcig tu gzhan la phan 'dogs par zhugs pa/ sgrub pa po rnams la mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub stsol ba la dgyes pa/ ston ka'i zla ba
479a5(rgyud): ltar dkar ba/ tsan dan dkar po'i lde gus byugs shing me tog gis mdzes par brgyan pa/ na bza' dkar po dang mu tig gi 'phreng bas thugs kar mdzes par byas pa/ sku rin po che sna tshog
479a6(rgyud): kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i sku las yongs su smos pa'i 'od zer stong gis mtha' yas shing dpag tu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byed pa/ lo bcu gnyis kyi na tshad du 'khrungs pa'iH/
479a7(rgyud): can ngag gi dbang phyug chen por bdag nyid bsams par bya'o// de'i mdun du shes rab ma dang / g.yas su yid gzungs ma dang / rgyab tu blo ldan pa dang / g.yon du dran pa ma gong du smos pa'i/
479b1(rgyud): yon tan thams cad kyis mdzes pa'i lha mong bsam par bya'o// de'i 'og tu lte ba'i phyogs su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su yi ge oM mdog dkar po'i rnam par bsams la// dems
479b2(rgyud): byung ba'i ngag gi dbang phyug gi rang bzhin ma lus pa'i 'phreng ba rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung ba bsams shing / gcig pud deng phyogs pa'i yid can gyi sngags pas bdag nyid rang gi lte ba'i
479b3(rgyud): dbus na gnas pa'i mi snabs bzlas pa byas na/ zla ba gcig gis dbyangs can gyi ngag rab tu thob par 'gyur zhing / zla ba gsum gyis tshangs pa gsod pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur ro//

479b6(rgyud): nig longs spyad da// bla med tshig ni thob 'gyur zhing // zla drug nye bar longs spyad pas// ngag gi dbang phyug mngon sum 'gyur// shu dag shing mang send pa// a ru bca' skal la/

480a1(rgyud): thos 'dzin byed// zla ba gsum gyis tshig bdag 'byung // dra ba gcig gis tho ldan ning// khu byug gzhon nu'i skad bzhin du// dbyangs snyan pa skye bar 'gyur// gangs can

483b3(rgyud): ma le ku ma ku be sa pa yen prad d+hi si b+ha ra du ra id tsha ya de bo bdag ti b+h+yaN+yota yi ta thA dzo tapi s+sa ya ma hA ra dze/ sa mAM d+hi b+ha ra ta yaM t+yaM/ de be b+h+yA/ ma nu She b+h+yo/ gaMH/
483b4(rgyud): bye b+h+yo shi gi gra ha de ba Anad+ha s+ya gri ha ni yaM a ka ma na ya/ kra ma na ya dzu ho mi swA hA/ sngags kyi rgyal po 'dis bsnyen pa'i cho ga byas la khang pa'i bdun gyi dbus su bgyis
483b5(rgyud): byu ga sa la gru bzhir bre sa te ku sha cha la par bkram nas me sbar nas ar ga'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad blangs la sngags bzlas shing me tog re re me la sbyin sreg byas na 'dod pa'i skyes pa
483b6(rgyud): dang bud med 'gugs par 'gyur zhes mkhas pas de ltar shes par byas la gus par bya'o// dpa' bo gcig tu grub pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las lo'u bzhi pa rdzogs so//
483b7(rgyud): rgya gar gyi mkhan po di paM kar shI dz+nyA na dang / lo tsa ba dge ba'i blo gros kyis bsgyur dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bcos shing bsgyur ba'o//
484a1(rgyud): rgyag gad du/ Ad+yam d+hu shrI swA b+hA ton mad+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa'ajam dpal gyi zhal nas gsungs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs dkon sachos
484a2(rgyud): gsupa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa'ijim dpal la phyog/ 'tshal lo// namo / drA mA ma/ na po zag pa te/ tamadz+nyA tra ni gang dzi tad dA la/ ta thA ga tA sa/ an tes b+haka
484a3(rgyud): bu d+hA ya/ na mo pak+Shu shri ye/ ku mA ra b+hU ta ya/ tad+h+ya thA/ oM dz+nyA na lo ki/ tri rat+na baM sha saM d+ha ra ni/ b+ha ga ba ti/ e bA yaM d+hA d+hi a bA yaM da ha ta maM bo d+hi tsir+Ne badz+ra pa ri ba lAs/
484a4(rgyud): sa ma n+ta a ba b+ha saM ha na ha na/ sarba satwa saM ta na pa ti ti/ kle shA ru di tshe shA ya/ bi ra la kA Na/ a laM kr-i ta sha rI raM/ bo d+hi satwa shi shAM ba ti pU lA ya/ bud d+han de shA ya/ de bar+tha
484a5(rgyud): ga yak+Sha/ gan d+harma/ a sung / ga run+tu/ kin dar/ mahor ga/ bshe s+pha pA ya/ a pa yaM dang ti swAhA/ gzungs 'di'i phan mon ni lin cig brjod pas kyang bskal pa stong
484a6(rgyud): las kyi sgrib pa bsags pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'chi khar yang 'phags pa 'jam dpal mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spya dngas gzigs dbang phyug thong tshugs kyis dbu brgyan pa'i rgyu
484a7(rgyud): mthong bar 'gyur ngo ro// mdor na gzungs 'di'i lan yod ni mtha' yas so// 'phags pa'ajam dpal gyi ni lan sang gsungs pa zhes bya ba'i gsungs rdzogs so// rgya ga
484b1(rgyud): gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar d+ha dang / lo tsab bad de klu'i dbang pos bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud d+ha sing+ga dang / nu chen gyi lo tsa ba bar de de btsan+das gtan la phab pa/
484b2(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jam pa'i mgon la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas yang 'ja ba dpal gzhon dur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag
484b3(rgyud): gcig tu byas nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der thal po sbyang ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom
484b4(rgyud): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rig pa mthong bar bgyi ste/ rig pa dbu pa 'di smras na ni ngo mtshar du 'gyur ro// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor/
484b5(rgyud): des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal legs so legs so// 'jam dpal khyod kyis rig pa spros shig/ bdag
484b6(rgyud): gis bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung gis smra bar bgyi'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ja ma dpal gyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po chos thams cad la phyag 'tshal te mchod
484b7(rgyud): pa byas nas rig pa smras so// na maHsarba ta thA te b+h+yaHna ma many+dzu shrI ye/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ oM ma ny+dzu b.ramany+dzu g+ho Sha/ ha na ha na/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma ta mata/ mtha ma tha
485a1(rgyud): dz+has bas / ka / b+hUd+d+ha#gyis mams/ na/ ####
485a2(rgyud): za zla sa prab+h+re sa/ lo tra lo ta/ kriT kri Ta/ kri dkri dkr-i dkrid kriT kriT/ ha saHsa/ pra ban d+ha/ pra ban d+ha/ a b+hi sha a b+hi sha/ hUM dz+yA hUM/ phaT phaT phaT
485a3(rgyud): swAhA/ gang zhig gis nam phyed na lan gsum brjod/ nyi ma la'ang lan bdun brjod pa byas na rig pa chen mo thob par 'gyur ro// mi rnams kyi shro ka sum brgya 'dzin par 'gyur ro// 'dis
485a4(rgyud): cho ga ni tsan dar gyis dkyil 'khor byas te/ zhun mar gyi mar mes kyang mchod nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur/ ma grub kyang sh+lo ka brgya nyi ma re re la 'dzin par 'gyur ro// bcom
485a5(rgyud): ldan 'das bdag gis bstan pa 'dis ma grub na gang zhig mtshams med pa lnga byas na bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar mtshams med pa lnga byas par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis smod
485a6(rgyud): btsugs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// rnamo sa m+bu shri ye/ ku pA ba b+hU tA ya/ bo d+hi satwA sa mahA satwA sa/ ma hA ka ru Ni kA sa
485a7(rgyud): tad+ya thA/ oM a ra dze bi ra dze/ shud d+he/ bi shud d+he/ she d+ha ni/ bi sho d+ha ni a pa la/ bi pa le/ dza ya/ ba hi ni/ ru ru tsa le/ hUM hUM hUMphaT phaT phaT swAH
485b1(rgyud): gang gos gzungs 'di 'chang bar byed/ klog par byed/ stod par byed pa de ni tho rno ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// lan cig bstod na gzungs brgya 'dzin par 'gyur ro// bskal pa stong du
485b2(rgyud): bsags pa'i sdig pa ma lus pa byang bar 'gyur ngo ro// 'bum phrag gcig bzlas darig pa'i gnas lnga la mkhas par 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag gnyis bzlas na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro//
485b3(rgyud): 'bum phrag gsum bzlas na 'jam dpal gyi sku mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gyis dam bcas pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// @'phags
485b4(rgyud): pa'ajam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// au bA kyi te dza ya/ o bAkyaM Sha She srA/ oM bA kye kha na dzA ye/ oM bAkya diShA a oM bAkye ya na maHoM bA kye daM na paH'phags pa 'jam
485b5(rgyud): dpal gyi mtshan 'di nyid lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas mtshams med pa lnga'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad 'byung ngo // 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan rdzogs so// /
485b6(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI b+ha nA ra ka s+ya pra dzA buSh+Ti ba bad+han rA pa d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du rje btsun 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi shes rab dang blo 'phel ba
485b7(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i gzungs dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo many+dzu shI ye ku nI da b+hU tra sa tad+ya thA/ oM ar dze bai ra dze/ shud+d+he bi shud+d+he/ sho d+ha ni bi sho d+ha ni goH/
486a1(rgyud): sa bi go d+has/ yi ma le ngas pa tid+ha ruH la d+hAdz+dzar+b+hu/ phaT Ta paT mAT+Ta/ gang nag 'di 'dzin pa de zla ba gcig gis tho dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dbyangs
486a2(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// gzugs pa 'ang bar 'gyur ro// lan cig bkrag sa ni bskal pa stong gi bar du 'khor ba la chub kyis phyogs par 'gyur ro// bcangs pa tsam gyis skye badran par 'gyur /
486a3(rgyud): 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na mkhas par 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag gnyis bzlas na rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag gsum bzlas na 'jam dpal gyi zhal mthong bar 'gyur/
486a4(rgyud): ro// gal te mtshams med pa lnga byas pas grub par ma gyur na de'i tshong nying mtshams med pa lnga byed pa yin zhing / nga nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bslus par gyur cig
486a5(rgyud): rje btsun 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi shes dbu dang blo 'phel ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sngags mi
486a6(rgyud): ge 'bru gcig pa'i cho ga/ tad+h+ya thA/ oM k+Sh+mI/ gsang sngags yi ge 'bru gcig pa 'di ni rab tu gsang ba se/ don thams cad sgrub par byed pa/ las thams cad byed pa
486a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po/ re ba thams cad yongs su skong bar mdzad pa ste/ so shing la bsngags nas bcangs na son pa mi 'byung ngo // mig na pa la rgya mtshwa btags pa
486b1(rgyud): la lan 'dun bsngags te mig bkang na migand sel to// mi'i khong du mchod gyi dum bu lus pa la zhun mang rnying pa la lan bdud nam brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags te/ blud pa'am mkhar bskus
486b2(rgyud): na mchod gyi dum bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// zas ma nu ba dang / sros te gsud pa dang / chod pas 'khru ba la mu rang tshwa 'am/ rgya mtshwa 'am/ yang ra lan tsha gzhan ga yang rung ba lalan
486b3(rgyud): bsngags ti bas dang de las gros ted tshad kyi zin par sos par 'gyur // klad par pa la bya dog gi sgo la lan bdun bsngags te byabs na dang de sos par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gyi mig
486b4(rgyud): 'bru gcig pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dza shrI rA ma any+dza sha ka na/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi
486b5(rgyud): mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis su// thub la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags
486b6(rgyud): pa yi// mtshan rnams 'dir ni brjod par bgyi// gzugs mdzes gzugs dang ldan pa ste// gzugs rnams kun gyi bla na med// mtshan rnams thams cad kur tu rdzogs// 'jam
486b7(rgyud): dpal gyis ni dam pa lags/ khasam gyis mi khyab bsam dang bral// mthu rtsal bsam yas rmad du byung // sku gsung 'phrin las bsam mi khyab// de bzhin thugs kyang bsam pi khyab
487a1(rgyud): stong nyid slob pa'i bdag nyid can// sdong pa'i chos dang yang dag ldar// stong pa nyid la lhag par pos// srid pa gsum po slong bar sdor// thams cad mkhyen
487a2(rgyud): thams cad gzigs// sa rnams kun gyi bdag dang ldan// sems can kun gyi mchog tu gyur// sems can kun gyis phyag bgyis pa// ngan 'gro kun dang de bzhin du// mu stegs can
487a3(rgyud): rnams thams cad 'joms// phas kyi grol 'tshar gcod pa// smra ba'i seng ge mi yi mchog/ dul zhing tshon mongs dgra rnams dang // sgrib pa dri ma kun mi mnga'// sems can thams cad
487a4(rgyud): yongs su skyo ba// grol zhing 'jig rten grol mdzad pa// ral pa pud dza brtul zhugs can// tshangs pa tshangs pa'i gnas na bzhugs// bgrang nor thogs shing phyag 'khar bsnams
487a5(rgyud): dag cing dag la rnams dang ldan// 'jam pa'i dbyangs can mnga' bdag mdzad// pad+ma las 'khrungs pad+ma'i spyan// pad+ma'i zer ba'i kha dog 'dra// bzhugs pa'i gdar khri pad+ma lags/
487a6(rgyud): gtsang ma ut+pal sngon po bsnams// bsam dag ni ba'i thugs dang ldan// khyod ni sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas// khyod ni dang po'i sangs rgyas lags// rdzu 'phrul ldan ni ma
487a7(rgyud): dbang brnyes// bder pa bzhi dag spo pa po// 'jig rten skyong ba spyan stong mnga'// khyod ni dbang phyug skye dgu'i bdag/ khyod ni ni ba'i sems can rnams// kun gyi mnga' bdag
487b1(rgyud): yon ta gtse// khyod ni khyung mchog skye dgu'i gtso// thu bo de bzhin tshe rabs dgongs// rnam par 'dren dang 'dul mdzad pa// rgyal skyas rgyal ba nyid las 'khrungs// 'od zeb stong lda ti/
487b2(rgyud): ma khyod// zla ba dang ni phur bu'ang khyod// rnam thos bu dang chu lha'ang lags// dbang phyug che khyod khyab 'jug khyod// klu yi rgyal po mtha' yas khyod// de bzhin sde dpon skem byed
487b3(rgyud): lags// lha mi ni dbang po thags bzangs ris// mig dmar gza' lag pa wa sangs// spen pa dpa' bo lnga kun logs// lha rnams kun gyis phyag bgyis pa// 'jig rten
487b4(rgyud): chos kyi dri ma bral// khyod ni 'jig rten gang zag mchog/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa 'jig rten rig/ ye shes can gyi dam mchog pa// dang pa sbyin dang gnas dang skyabs// bdud /
487b5(rgyud): kyi las kyis yongs mi brdzi// khar ma tho mi mnga' zab// dge ba'i bshes gnyer kun tu grags// khyed ni spad pa zug rngu 'byin// mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba'i mchog
487b6(rgyud): gros ldan zhing rtogs dang ldan// blo dang ldan zhing mkhas pa lags// khyod ni bsod napas dpag bsab shing // byang chub yan lag be tog rgyad// rnam grol 'bras bu phun sum
487b7(rgyud): tshogs// lus can kun gyi mchog tu gyur// yid du 'ong zhing yid 'phrog pa// sdig pa mi mnga' tshangs par spyod// khyod ni mjug rings gza' mchog lags// khyod ni drang srong /
488a1(rgyud): thub pa mchog/ khyod ni rgyal tshab dbang bskur ba// sa bcu'i dbang phyug gtso bo lags// ded dpon 'gro ba rnams kyi gtso// mya ngan 'das
488a2(rgyud): pa mchog ston bzhin// khyod de dam mkha' sa chu bzhin// khyod ni me dang rlung lta bu// khyod ni yid bzhin nor bu ltar// sems can re ba kun rdzogs mdzad// 'byung po kun
488a3(rgyud): gyis phyag bgyis pa// rin chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jam dpal gyis ni bka' stsal pa// oM bA kye don ma swA hA/ ji skad smos pa'i mtshan rnams dang // rig sngags bcas
488a4(rgyud): bar 'dzin na ni// jig gyur rnam dag rab tu thob// brgya las rtsa brgyad lhag pa'i mtshan// skyes bu dus gsum su klog pa// de 'dod pas pa dgu yid bzhin du// gdon mi
488a5(rgyud): bar 'grub par 'gyur// bzang po'i mtshan rnams dran na ni// mtshams med bskal pa mnyam pa yi// las rnams mi bzad ga' byas pa// de dag thams cad byung du 'byung // 'jig rten pa ro/
488a6(rgyud): 'pho ba dang // 'jigs pa chen po 'byung ba'i tshe// sems can dag pas dran byas // 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyang thob par 'gyur// blo dang ldan pas rbad byas te// nges par gnas nas su klog pa/
488a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas nyid ni 'dod na yang // thob 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so//
